N√ÉO RECOMENDO ESTE S√çTIO A NINGU√âM, FOI EM TEMPOS UM BOM ESPA√áO, HOJE EM DIA JUNTAM-SE ALI PESSOAS DISCRIMINAT√ìRIAS E MAL EDUCADAS!

IREI APRESENTAR TAMB√âM QUEIXA FORMAL NA POL√çCIA SOBRE ESTE MESMO ESPA√áO E A DISCRIMINA√á√ÉO QUE EU E AMIGOS FOMOS ALVO!

title: Resolutely ignored!
text:
I have just come from traipsing up the hill, dragging my poor three kids with me, having a 30 minute window before leaving Lisbon. I have desperately wanted to come here for years to talk about Portuguese rugs and to look at buying quite a few. I waited politely for the shop assistant to finish her last customer with a multitude of packages. She didn‚Äôt acknowledge me. I just thought she was busy. Now I‚Äôm not so sure? Maybe it was because I was standing in the wrong place? Were there rules I didn‚Äôt know about? Another customer came up wanting to buy something. She serves him straight away and they started to chat. I find it so jaw droppingly rude I give up.

Such a shame. That wouldn‚Äôt happen in a shop that cared about craft and people. I feel so BAD for all the hardworking craftspeople and artisans being badly represented. It looks as if they‚Äôre hardly selling the better made Alentejo Blankets anyway and selling cheaper versions. Such a HUGE disappointment.

title: Bad management! Admission only with guided tours at fixed times and not indicated on the site!
text: I consult the website and read the opening hours, nothing else is specified. We do half an hour by tram to reach it... and of course another half an hour to return... but you can not visit! You enter only with guided tours. It was half past noon and the guided tour was at half past two. Of course we could not stay two hours there waiting and we had no way to return except missing the afternoon!!!! I'm very sorry because I would have liked to see it, I'm sorry I wasted more than an hour for nothing! I pointed out that on their website it is not indicated that you enter only with guided tours nor that there were fixed times of entry but they did not even reply! Along with us were 4 other people who, of course, left. Congratulations for the management!üò°

title: No real Lisbon, avoid
text:
There is no real feel of Lisbon unfortunately. The area were cruise ships port and the high street shops were was clean and pleasant.

Everywhere else once you moved from this tourist area was full of nomads and expats, didn't see any Lisbons. There are old houses and dirty streets that reeked, people urinating in the streets as toilets are "pay by coin" and many don't carry cash anymore. There are no public bathrooms anywhere otherwise. Streets with dog waste everywhere...

Got offered drugs multiple times a day however the guys selling it were really polite so didn't feel unsafe.

There are so many great places to visit so I would never recommend for anyone to go to Lisbon based on our experience and what we saw.

title: Bad experience
text: We had dinner after waiting for an hour despite the reservation: bad food to say the least, equally bad service and prices definitely much higher than the very poor quality of the food.

title: Boring
text: Bairro Alto area (or "High Town") I liked least in Lisbon (only Alfama is worse). There's nothing interesting here. We came up here from Baixa using the cable car Elevador da Gloria and the first thing we saw was a more or less pleasant open-air place with wooden tables and pavilions with street food. Then a couple of steps was viewpoint called Miradouro de Sao Pedro de Alcantara was not bad, but how many such observation platforms are there in Lisbon and in general in all major cities! The rest of the walk was hot and boring. There are old houses and dirty streets. Maybe this district works for the young people who visit the bars and clubs here, but not for the average tourists who want to see the sights. They are not here, don't waste your time.

title: Dangerous area!
text: Dangerous place at night! Stay away especially at night with cheap drinks and cheap people! Bouncers and customers looking for trouble!

title: Overated City
text:
Overrated city. It used to be a beautiful and authentic city but like many other European cities, its personality is gone.
Packed with tourists all year long, old and authentic businesses closed due to the locals running away from the city because of crazy  expensive prices for tourists and expect to find a tourist trap restaurant, souvenir and cafe on every corner, especially downtown and wherever you have a touristic attraction.
Lisbon is now a destination hub for bachelor parties, so expect to find  a dirty and smelly city, especially in the morning.
Be careful when using Uber services, especially if you are a woman. Uber services like most of the tourist traps businesses are now being running by suspicious Indians and moroccans and many problems with quality, safety and robbery are rising.
Locals run away from it. The city is empty of locals and you will only find nomads, expats and the poor and old that cannot afford to run away.
One of the most expensive European cities right now to live, to eat, to  visit.

title: Beware of the Oscar Burger stall in Barrio Alto
text:
Beware of the agressive man at the Oscar stall.

The views were lovely. We went up the tram and went to the viewing point at the top.

However, we had an awful experience at the outdoor food court at the top of the cable car where the viewing point is. I went to try the Bifana (a Portuguese traditional sandwich) at Oscar burger stall. What I got was a lump of dry plain meat sandwiched between an equally dry stale bun (see pic). I went back after opening the wrapper and showed the man and told him this is nothing like a bifana sandwich and also didn't one bit resemble the photo that he had displayed on his stall of a bifana sandwich. He rudely refused to accept that what he had served was inedible and was agressive and refused to give me a refund. I was taken back by his attitude and left frustrated and took a pic of the stall as I sat down. He then walked over to where I was sitting with my 5 and 8 year old children and swore at me, shouting abuse to my face. He was not happy that I had taken a pic of his stall. Shouting at a customer and especially intimidating a woman in front of her children is really not OK. I was left shaken, my little girl was crying as she was left frightened. We left immediately and the kids no longer wanted to stay in Barrio Alto and we got the tram back.
Think twice before going near his stall.

title: Might be nicer during the day!
text: Bar and club area very popular with tourists. VERY stag do heavy and reminiscent of the Maga strip - if you‚Äôre looking for a quiet drink go elsewhere. Clubs rammed and music pretty awful! Would not really recommend, try a rooftop Bar instead.

title: Traurig, doch auch mit vielen liebenswerten Menschen
text: Oh weh....Alles kaputt, verfallen, dreckig, laut, ungem√ºtlich. So ziemlich die traurigste Stadt, die man sich vorstellen kann. Die gesamte Altstadt vom Tejo beidseitig, zum Castel, Kirchen, Gassen, Promenade, alles sind wir abgelaufen und sind ersch√ºttert. Armut und Verfall. Menschen durchw√ºhlen M√ºllkisten, leben in Karton-Bauten, H√§user sehen bauf√§llig aus, zerbr√∂seln beschmiert. Das tut einfach nur weh.....

title: It was all messy and not settled
text: A nice tour but very messy. Our guide was Philippe, very nice but as a guide underwhelmed. It wasn't a big deal in English but he spent the whole tour pretending it was a theatre. That was disturbing for the whole group. We also had a flat tire that could not be repaired and the bikes were quite worn. My trouser leg and jacket were covered in grease. The tour costs quite a bit of money so some professional approach may also be appropriate. At the starting point the guides are busy with each other and jokes are plentiful. That was before two years ago when I made the same tour many times better. I cannot recommend it and would find another party.

title: Pessimo!
text: 2 pessoas. Encomendamos 1 queijinho fresco, 1 pastel de bacalhau, 1 dose de dourada, Salm√£o grelhados e 2 imperiais. Os pratos de peixe vieram meio cr√∫s. N√£o aceitamos a dourada, que nao tinha 400 a 450gr indicadas no menu, que voltou para traz, regressando a mesma! 10 minutos mais tarde, ainda mal passada, seca e salgadissima! Valor total da factura: 51,10‚Ç¨ (Cinquenta e um ‚Ç¨ e dez centimos) Servi√ßo de cozinha p√©ssimo! Informei o empregado de mesa do que estava mal e lhe pedi para informar o gerente. N√£o sei se o fez. Ningu√©m disse uma palavra. Senti-me defraudado. A nunca mais voltar!

title: Waste of money and vacationtime
text:
We wanted to take a look inside to see what dancestyles and atmosphere there was. After being in barrio latino of 10min and not liking the club we still had to pay the ‚Ç¨7 pp enterance fee.
They were very unfriendly and unwelcoming towards tourists. Waste of money and time.

title: Avoid at all costs
text:
Avoid at all costs. The service is poor, the drinks range is small and the quality of the food is awful. My partner ordered Lamb Croquettes. When they came they were cold. She ate the first of the 5, blandcand no seasoning, the second one had some grisle , the third was all grisle and the fourth had a piece of bone in it. She refused to eat the other.
I had steak sandwich, it left a lot to be desired. Chewy, and certainly not hot. Chips were greasy.
When asked if all was OK at the end of the meal, we said NO. The waiter spoke to the head waiter, who was seen to shrug his shoulders and shake his head.
The head waiter then came over, not a word spoken, offered the card machine, took 42 Euros for the food, then walked off. No apology, no reduction, no nothing.
Considering the place is mentioned in the Lonely Planet guide book, we were very disappointed.
Certainly won't go again and CERTAINLY WON'T RECOMMEND.
I created a trip advisor account just to leave this review as I was disgusted with the place

title: Just keep walking past
text: Just Keep walking past this place. Beautiful location but experience was horrible. My 21 year old daughter and I stopped in for drinks and lunch on our way to Belem tower. Waited 15 mins to take our drinks order. When cocktails came they were warm and an order of chicken tacos took over an hour. You literally have to chase the servers down for any sort of responsiveness. Seems very poorly organized, no hostess or buzzers only servers so they‚Äôve obviously overwhelmed.

title: NO RECOMENDADO
text:
NO RECOMENDADO.
Coca cola 4‚Ç¨, sin gas y de grifo, tardaron 20min en servirla y encima no te hacen ni caso si quieres quejarte.

title: Very unfriendly place!
text: Very unfriendly place! I love Lisbon and people from Portugal they are all family centrist. I asked politely to use their bathroom with my 5 years old little girl, offered to buy drink or pay for the service but the waiter and the main guy was shocking reluctant and chased us away humiliatingly. I have never experience such an inhumane place in Portugal. Never go there!

title: Awful. Simply Awful
text:
Awful

Been here an hour. Food came out and was stone cold. It was sent to another table and just sat there.

Staff are useless. Young and poorly trained. They have zero customer service.

Great setting but avoid at all costs.

Waste of time.

title: Fatal
text: Worst place in the world, if you're lone women don't ever go. As a woman they respect nothing, a shame. The worst place in Lisbon

title: Criminal cesspool. Worst experience in Portugal
text: Bouncers are criminals working with the hood rats working the corner in pink street. Worst experience ever in Portugal. Do not ever go there. A naive friend got cornerd and robbed for ‚Ç¨600,- by about 8-9 guys with the help of one of the bouncers working there @ around 23:30. 24.july. Frick this place

title: DO NOT GO NO MATTER WHAT
text: do not go here no matter what happens even if you offered ‚Ç¨100 do not go!!!! me and four of my friends went into the bar. Everything is OK. We stepped outside to smoke a cigarette then we are denied reentry. We are walking away from the bar and the bouncer comes up and punches, my friend. We call him some names and walk away again within five minutes there‚Äôs 30 other bouncers all on us and we‚Äôre getting beaten and tased out of pink Street. AVOID AT ALL COSTS THIS IS A NORMAL THING HERE

title: Fuyez
text: A shame run away. They're scamming. They charge above the Award shown on the card without refunding you. And they take foreigners and French for fools

title: Dull and dead
text: As you arrive onto the pink street you are hit with high energy and good music, a fun and lively atmosphere and fully expecting the vibes to carry on along the whole street only to find it stops dead as soon as you turn the slight corner, it was such a stark contrast in an instant. Unfortunately this is where the Liverpool bar is situated and it wasn‚Äôt a surprise to find it completely empty apart from two bored looking men, was very disappointed as expected a lot more!

title: Bouncer type security
text: Terrible experience, a completely unprepared security guard at the door, we didn't even get to eat due to the totally uneducated and rude approach of the security guard at the entrance near the tables.

title: Terrible
text: One word terrible. Food and service was unreal, we ordered 4 items to share, 3 only came out after a 45 minutes wait, the 4 came out after we complained to them.

title: It's not worth going there
text: It is not worth getting here, far from the rest of the tourist areas, to see this basilica. Just for the ride on 28.

title: Better skip
text: Church never open, only access to the top. Don‚Äôt even think about to go there, you will only see the boring outside!

title: Little information
text: Unfortunately, the guide only spoke English, even though we had requested German. A tour like this could be done better. Not much information.
Beat Balls Porto - Poor organization and lack of professionalism. They do not answer the phone, do not answer whatsapp and when they respond, do it completely late.

title: Miserable Service
text: We contacted the BeatBalls Porto organizer and tried to set a date. As it was not very early (4 days before) said that he had not arranged staff and asked if it could be on the weekend. We said yes and the day before the event again said that after all there was no staff. All this always takes a huge time to respond by WhatsApp and I don't know why there is a number to call, since they never came to answer. Organization and professionalism 1/5.

title: communication
text: very bad communication. resond to mail, then doesnt repond anymore. i would not recommend to use this service as it is very difficult contact.

title: Waste of time
text: A reservation was made at a defined location and the company didn't even show up to provide the service for a group of 30. I expected more professionalism.

title: TERRIBLE SERVICE, TERRIBLE PROFESSIONALISM, I DO NOT RECOMMEND IT AT ALL!!!
text:
Terrible service and professionalism!!!
I got in touch with the company as I was organizing a bachelor party, I spoke personally and exchanged some emails with the "operations manager", Mr.Antonio Cardoso, who sent me prices and to get everything sorted out, was the time available and the field to reserve for bubllefootbal , we are from the Setubal area and were going to Porto! At a certain point and 2 days before the event, Mr. Antonio stopped responding and answering the phone number, I called the fields that they sublease, in the industrial area of Porto, to which They told me that there was nothing marked with my name, they hadn't even called!!! In other words, the day before and with 10 people going to Porto I had no activity and no satisfaction at all! The funny thing is 2 days after the event, I called and the man there answered, after some things he had to hear from me, he said that they had a complicated week!!! Apparently these things happen frequently with beatballs.... which is why I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS SERVICE AT ALL, terrible professionalism and even lack of respect for customers, as they assured us that everything was ok, and then simply disappeared until the day of the event, and reappeared 2 days later!

title: Very disappointed with the experience.
text:
Very disappointed with the experience.
We had booked a beerbike activity and were well present at 5pm, scheduled departure time. Unfortunately, no one was there to welcome us. After waiting, the tour finally started late, which reduced our activity to only 30 minutes instead of an hour. We asked for a partial refund or a commercial gesture, but this was denied. Total lack of professionalism and no consideration for customers. Don't.
Namely that they changed 3 times days and time

title: I do not recommend
text:
I don't recommend it. Catch tourist!
Sangria in a cubi, canned beer, no atmosphere, does not go to the tower of Belem...

title: Not commercial...
text:
Our flights were canceled, we were not able to participate in the activity, but no commercial gesture for a possible refund or compensation was made.
I find this regrettable since not doing the activity was not up to us.
We had booked other activities in Lisbon which they understood the situation and reimbursed us without problem.
Go on your way, I think there are some companies more serious than others.

title: Nightmare
text:
There were no cold drinks. After 20 minutes you finally served hot beer. The bike wasn't working because the gears were not working and it was almost impossible to move the bike forward. It also made a lot of noise and the whole thing shook. I had beer all over my shoes because the "bartender" didn't know how to open the beers. And a 2 liter bottle filled with fluid fell from the shelf right next to my head. After like 50 meters we left.

I think the difference between what you sold me and what you delivered was significantly. I think your vehicle is worn out. I think in the sense of law you'd call it fraud.

JUST DONT!!!

title: Badly disposed employee.
text: Badly disposed employee. Unpleasant experience. Madalena urgently needs love. Bad-tempered and rude.

title: Trap for tourist
text:
Nice place with a view on the bridge, fresh fish but not cooked well, very oily and the most important part ‚Äúthey trick the tourist‚Äù. When you seat you find food on the table thinking that has been offered and instead you pay it very much.
In the end they say ‚Äúoh that‚Äôs how it works in Portugal, you can decide to eat that or not‚Äù.
Stay away

title: Very disappointing
text: My daughter bought a lovely ring for a reasonably significant sum of money. The young woman who served us in the store was lovely and said please don't hesitate to contact us if you experience any issues. Shortly after our return home, the chunky ring snapped into two pieces, this seems highly unusual and would make me seriously question the quality. I have emailed the team at Bergue jewelry twice and received no response even though I have the receipt to show purchse

title: Poor quality
text:
Gilding that leaves after a week‚Ä¶.
For a craftsman it‚Äôs pitiful.
I am disappointed with the very poor quality even though the models are very beautiful

title: P√©ssimos marinheiros
text: Falta de respeito e perigo na navega√ß√£o no rio Tejo. Operador n√£o cumpre as regras de seguran√ßa quer com os passageiros, quer com as regras mar√≠timas de navega√ß√£o

title: S-courtesy and arrogance!
text: S‚Ä¶. Courtesy, arrogance!! I entered the bookstore because I read that it is the oldest still open, but I found a bookcase like many, nothing special. At the bottom a bar with saleswomen who did not even dignify us with a look, nor a greeting and while we arrived what we had ordered with my friends, I asked for a bathroom that I did not use until the payment for drinks... the bathroom a disaster and in the library at least 4-5 saleswomen without doing anything!

title: Disrespectful treatment
text: This bookshop is usually my first stop when I travel to Lisbon. I love it for its wide selection of books and magazines, along with its charm being a more traditional bookstore. Unfortunately, yesterday I had a very uncomfortable experience with an employee who refused to let me go to the bathroom. I had already bought a book and a magazine a few days earlier, and the book with the bookstore stamp was still in my bag, as I informed her. However, without the receipt from the same day, she refused to let me in. This part of the bookstore was not busy at all and the employee didn't seem very busy either. But she told me to find a restroom in another establishment and then return to purchase a book. After this experience I didn't feel like going back and bought my book in another bookshop. Unnecessarily arrogant treatment. As a frequent customer it seems very strange that I am rejected the visit of the bathroom in that manner, baring in mind that I was carrying a recently purchased book.

title: Disappointing
text:
The library boasts the title of the oldest library in the world and will naturally attract tourists wanting to see this marvel. However, the staff deliver a very unfriendly service, it is almost like tourists (who are paying customers) are an inconvenience to the cashiers.

They could have made a lot more of the building given it it so old.

Would stick to Waterstones.

title: Tourists are bad!
text: For the first time in over 35 years of going to Betrand, which is near my house. I was pushed by a tourist. I pushed back and he fell, appropriately, into the Jos√© Saramago section. Lisbon has too many tourists, mostly rude, who go to these historic places in the centre and don't buy a thing.

title: Not interesting.
text: Well, I went to the oldest bookstore, but I was outside again within a few minutes. Really not interesting. Then you better go to the bookstore in the church in Maastricht!

title: Horrible service and online experience!
text: Personally, I don't know, but on the website I had difficulty registering payment methods, and because of that I was unable to buy my books. But so far, so good. The real problem is the terrible service, both on the website and on social media. Through social media, they simply don‚Äôt respond. And on the website, it took them two days to respond to me, in fact, it was an automatic message as it had no connection with the question I asked, they just "filled it with sausage".

title: The staff is of no advice!
text:
The staff is of no advice...
The Bertrand bookstore claims to be one of the oldest bookstores in Portugal.
The staff is too busy to advise tourist customers who are looking for a specific book.

title: Trato p√©simo
text:
Fuimos de vacaciones a Lisboa. El √∫ltimo d√≠a, antes de regresar a Espa√±a entramos a la librer√≠a para comprar un ejemplar y de paso nos pusieran el sello de reconocimiento como librer√≠a m√°s antigua del mundo en funcionamiento.Cual fue nuestra sorpresa, que despu√©s de esperar m√°s de media hora, repito m√°s de media hora,(cosa que puedo llegar a entender, aunque s√≥lo hubiese una persona atendiendo a los clientes, recordando que es una librer√≠a tur√≠stica con bastante afluencia), sin haber ning√∫n cartel informando de que s√≥lo se pod√≠a pagar con tarjeta. Cuando lleg√≥ mi turno nos rechazaron la compra por no pagar con tarjeta sin darnos ninguna soluci√≥n alternativa. Le explicamos que volv√≠amos a Espa√±a a la ma√±ana siguiente pero insistieron que solo pod√≠amos pagar con tarjeta.
Sospechamos que quedaba media hora para cerrar y no quer√≠an cobrar en met√°lico para no tener que volver a hacer la caja.
Con lo cual denota falta de profesionalidad hacia el cliente adem√°s de poco empat√≠a al turismo que no reside all√≠ y no podemos volver.
As√≠ que no puedo recomendarla por el trato recibido.

title: N√£o temos post-it!
text: Dirigi-me √† Bertrand onde comprei um conjunto de livros por mais de 160 euros. No momento de pagar pedi que me embrulhassem tr√™s dos livros por serem para presentes. Para n√£o me esquecer que livro continha cada embrulho pedi que me escrevessem os t√≠tulos em post-its para depois serem colados nos embrulhos. A resposta que recebi da colaboradora foi seca dizendo que n√£o tinha post-ir, passando-me uma esferogr√°fica para eu escrever no embrulho. Eu n√£o acredito que a livraria Bertrand n√£o tenha post-it. Foi simplesmente m√° vontade e este tipo de comportamentos associados pagar-se. Como? Comprando noutros locais...

title: Oldest Bookstore in the World
text: I came here with my family in April 2022 but when I saw how simple the store was, I decided just to quickly do a lap inside by myself. There wasn't much inside that made it seem old(er) than a standard building. There was a children's book section in the back, which I studied for a tiny bit (and then realized my kids wouldn't be able to understand any of the non-English board books).

title: Nothing much
text:
It's not worth it, landscapes without beauty and emotions, good for getting rid of toxins and if you really want to go, I recommend going early in the morning, the sun beats down hard
There is no shade along the route.

title: Bica
text: Too bad the tram was im maintenance. There's nothing online about this either. On site only an A4 sheet stuck on a lamppost. Anyway there is plenty more to see to make this beautiful city

title: Don't bother waiting for a ride
text: Historic funicular which looks great but it's tiny and is too small for the number of tourists wanting to ride. It's not worth waiting ages for a ride up the street that only lasts a few minutes. The best thing is to see it from the top and just take some pics but no point in wasting lots of time trying to get onto it.

title: Horrible staff, to avoid
text:
Terrifying experience.
Not recommended to everyone.

I knew this elevator having gone there years ago, I found it nice and I wanted to take my husband and my 5-year-old son there after years, enthusiastic about the experience. We climb up from the top, and ask the driver, on the phone and rude, if we could get back from the same cab anyway. Rude answer: yes. After waiting for his comfortable, empty cabin, we go down and at the terminus (i.e. after 200 meters) tells us that we have to get down and get back in the kilometer line to go back up. Which she, since she cannot do her job and was busy on the phone during her service, had not had the foresight to tell us! I said it wasn‚Äôt right but no, the polite lady with some problems (she started at one point to speak to herself in Portuguese) sent us to queue with the others very rudely, in the end, and, arrived after half an hour at our turn, literally barred the rope before our eyes! This out of clear spite for politely asking for explanations! My astonished son, we therefore waited for the next ride for 20 minutes because Madame does not know how to work and takes out her personal frustration on the patrons at the service she works for. Professionalism less than zero, I hope someone will take action. Leaving a city service in the hands of the incompetent damages Lisbon‚Äôs image.

title: Too much waiting... too bad
text:
Half an hour under the sun waiting in line and the driver only brings in half the car... and he leaves!!
We did not understand why.
People waiting to take this funicular and yet there is only one every 15 minutes...!!
Tourist catch for the folklore of Lisbon
Far too much waiting for a 2-minute climb charged at ‚Ç¨4.10
It is better to have planned to buy the weekly unlimited transport pass in Lisbon (‚Ç¨6.40)

title: Exploitation
text: We went for the experience. Very beautiful on the outside, very dirty on the inside and very expensive for a 5 minute ride. Pure exploitation.

title: Ugh
text:
3‚Ç¨80 for 5 minutes return trip typical but horribly expensive for such a short time.
We were a little disappointed by the duration of this activity

title: Mal servicio del personal
text: El trayecto corto pero bonito, pero es una l√°stima la forma con la que se trata al turista, con personal maleducado, de mal aspecto y tratando muy mal a la clientela.

title: Pre√ßo demasiado elevado para 1 viagem; o condutor tamb√©m n√£o prima pela simpatia
text: Portuguesa, fui ontem experimentar o elevador da bica, agora que estou reformada. Quando finalmente desci s√≥ estava eu e uma estrangeira. fui informada que pagaria no final; quando paguei o valor de 3,80‚Ç¨ que dava direito a 2 viagens fui informada que teria que ir para uma fila que tinha cerca de 15 pessoas e, claro, quando chegou a minha vez j√° n√£o tive possibilidade de entrar... lament√°vel!

title: Slaat nergens op
text:
Wat een onzin: het ding rijdt helemaal niet. Staat gewoon stil, geen trambestuurder erbij, alleen maar massa's toeristen.
Zelfde geldt trouwens voor die lift. Lange rij toeristen om mee te mogen, maar we hebben die lift geen √©√©n keer naar beneden of boven zien gaan.

title: Niente di che
text:
30 minuti di attesa x 5 minuti di viaggio, bello, caratteristico ma 5 minuti.
Se nn avessi avuto la lisboa card nn avrei speso 3,80 euro

title: Bicycle dealer - Flop / Lisbon - Top
text:
The reasons for the unsatisfactory assessment are as follows:
1. despite timely and repeated contact (about 3 months in advance), the bicycles were insufficiently packed for transport on the plane.
2. As a result, I had to prepare a bike at the airport myself for transport - although the service was part of the contract - and ultimately had to pay for it.
3. Knowledge of handling special baggage was also insufficient. The infrastructure for special baggage dictates the sizes, regardless of the airlines! For bicycles: Length: up to 180cm, Height: up to 90cm, Width: up to 40cm
4. the agreed and of course also paid cleaning service for two bicycles was not provided.
5. the paid and ordered service for two bicycles was also not carried out!
6. the refund of my expenses for service/cleaning offered by Biclas has not been refunded to date.
My rating is based on extensive/reasoned emails!
The Tagus experience from source to mouth was wonderful, the hospitality very good.
Except for the bicycle dealer in Lisbon.
Portugal can only be ashamed of this crook!

title: Old well worn patched up bikes that are not cheap.
text: Be aware you may not get the bike as advertised on their website. Three of us rented Giant gravel bikes for a 2 week tour around Portugal. All were well worn, bottom of the line bikes. Mine had the bar tape replaced with gaffer tape which oozed all over my hands. Mine had also had the chainwheel replaced with a 39 tooth small chainwheel on the front. Coupled to a 34 tooth on the rear this meant a lot of walking once grades got over 9%. Portugal is a hilly place. After a couple of days my front brake pads gave out. Expecting this they had supplied brake pads in the spares kit. Unfortunately they were the wrong size and did not fit. I managed to get some that did fit off one of the other riders

title: Bike Tour Disaster
text: The GPS app they have you download is terrible. Ride a bike through Sintra? Walk your bike up the narrow, crowded hills? What a joke. The guy who set us up told us it wouldn‚Äôt be crowded - just get off the bikes and walk. Yeah, ok! Fairly certain he has never done the self guided tour himself. No real guidance regarding the trains we had to take. Fine. We figure it out, but it would be helpful information. Overall, a failure. After walking our bikes up part of the crowded, narrow street in Sintra we turned around. It wasn‚Äôt worth it. People (tourists and locals alike) either laughed at us or made rude comments. I promise you, it‚Äôs not worth it.

title: Very nice team. The wheels are in bad condition. Not recommended!
text: Since the other bike rental was closed, we tried Bikeiberia and rented two bikes. The team at Bikeiberia is very nice, the service is ok, but the bikes are in poor condition. The shifts are not working properly, the brakes are murks. All in all, you don't enjoy the wheels. And that's what holidays are all about. It's also expensive.

title: Camino de Frances gone wrong
text: Arrived at St Jean-Pied-de-Port to start a 14-day trip to complete a leisurely bike trip with friends along the Camino de Frances. The Bike that I had rented 4 months previously was old worn and the batter was wrapped in insulation tape, but I decided that I‚Äôm sure its fine they would not have sent a dodge bike. On the second day coming into Estelle, I was soon shown to have been mistaken, the bike faulted while cycling with an alarm ‚ÄúSyncdrive warning‚Äù. A thunderstorm soon followed. I reached out hoping there would be an easy solution, there wasn‚Äôt. Two towns later and two repair shops later was told I was on my own no replacement bike was available and until confirmed otherwise by their repair shop the issue was my fault and all cost were to be incurred by me. These included transporting the bike between towns the cost of the first repair shop, the second said it wasn‚Äôt my issue, and they would bill bike Iberia, they also sent the bike back to Iberia. End result I was two days into my 14-day trip with no bike, my group had moved on, and I had no accommodation arranged. I had to start again sourcing a new bike and having to pay for the holiday a second time.

title: DONT RENT YOUR BIKE HERE!
text:
Dont ever go here!
Two of our four rented bikes broke so we had to carry our ebikes to a trainstation and bring them back to the rental store!!

The people working there are rude and didnt want to give us money back when we finally came with the bikes. (After extra costs for traintickets!)
They told us to fix the bikes by ourselves..one flat tyre and one chainbreak!! We were pulling and carrying the two bikes for 8km!

Dont rent here!

title: Poor customer service
text: We rented 5 electric bikes had to pay cash !!! after 2km one of the bike chain broke. We called for help we were told to get a train back- no apologies ! We didn‚Äôt want to terminate our tour as we only had the bikes for three hours. We found a bike store that repaired the chain. As we returned we were given no apologies and the guy refused to reimburse us the repair. What poor customer service - we are disappointed

title: Plates Plates
text:
Worn tire, the boss said it was sufficient, then 2x flat tires! The wrong battery was given. (2 day tour)
It's a shame, for these prices you can expect flawless bikes.

title: Negative attitudes and poor customer service
text: Very poor customer service and a negative overall attitude from the staff at the rental store. Employees were discouraging and quite condescending and assumed we didn‚Äôt know how to ride. We went with another local tour company that was much friendlier and helpful!

title: Bad service
text:
We have marked a session one month in advance to 17:00 via the app, which allowed us to select this time. However, we were later informed that this time was already busy and that the app was allowing for more marking. We got a message saying we should be here at 6:00.

We arrived at 6:00, but there was no one there. We tried to call several times, with no answer. Finally, at 6:20, someone attended and told us that the session was actually at 5:00. We explained the situation and the agreement that had been made, but the person completely dismissed what we said.

We are proceeding with legal action because of this situation.

title: TERRIBLE! SCAM! AVOID IT!
text:
We booked an appointment a month in advance for 5:00 PM through the app, which allowed us to select that time. However, we were later informed that the time slot was already taken and that the app was overbooking. We received a message instructing us to come at 6:00 PM instead.

We arrived at 6:00 PM, but no one was there. We tried calling multiple times with no response. Finally, at 6:20 PM, someone answered and told us the appointment was actually at 5:00 PM. We explained the situation and the agreement, but they completely dismissed it.

We are pursuing legal action over this.

title: Dishonest and dishonest
text:
First, the address of the meeting point is very vague. We should communicate with a GPS coordinates point! We wasted 10 minutes finding you in the sun.

In the offer, they announce that you pass Padrao dos Descobrimentos (The Tower of Belem) and that you go to the Bridge of April 25. You are not going to the Tower of Belem. You simply make a round trip on a paved bike lane by the water. You pass by no known buildings, no cultural sites.

Also, we booked for 12 but a friend who flew earlier was with us. We asked if he could come with us and the person in charge, who is not the boss, said we had to pay an extra ‚Ç¨35 for this participant. 35 ‚Ç¨! when we all paid 30 ‚Ç¨ per person. Clearly, that money went into his pocket, not his boss's.

In short, they sell us a guided tour to discover the city and the Tower of Belem, but in fact make you a 500m round trip on a linear and paved bike path in full sun.

If the young man hadn't asked me 35 ‚Ç¨ I wouldn't have posted a review on TripAdvisor. But clearly, it's dishonest.

Good luck, though.

title: Enganado. N√£o fizeram o servi√ßo e ficaram com o dinheiro
text:
Burlado. Acordei uma viagem com esta empresa e fiz o pagamento de 50% do valor adiantado, como a empresa exige. No dia, n√£o nos fizeram o servi√ßo. Durante a hora combinada estiveram constantemente a dar-nos indica√ß√µes erradas pelo telefone de modo a que nunca os encontr√°ssemos. Quando os encontramos, pessoalmente, negaram ser a empresa com quem t√≠nhamos falado e que t√≠nhamos contratado. Ficaram com 105‚Ç¨ do pagamento adiantado e n√£o cumpriram qualquer servi√ßo que fosse. Exigi o reembolso, o qual n√£o foi feito. Al√©m disto, n√£o houve emiss√£o de qualquer recibo do valor pago.

Scammed. I agreed a trip with this company and paid 50% of the amount in advance, as the company requires. On the day, they didn't do the job for us. During the agreed time they were constantly giving us wrong directions over the phone so that we never found them. When we met them in person, they denied being the company we had spoken to and hired. They took ‚Ç¨105 of the advance payment and failed to perform any service. I demanded a refund, which was not forthcoming. In addition, no receipt was issued for the amount paid.

title: Tourist catch
text:
Activity sold for ‚Äútour of the city‚Äù while we only pedal along tu Tagus. Organizer "john" very bad, bluntly insulted one of the participants.
We finished 15 minutes early, the organizer wanted to get us down to start the next group.
He will not have succeeded.
Very bad relationship of the organizer who rotted our business.

title: DON‚ÄôT waste your money!
text:
Personally think this is a huge waste of money. The staff on the bike try their best, but I think they know it‚Äôs a tourist trap with no real feeling of ‚Äòexperience‚Äô

There was some confusion re the booking time (I‚Äôll hold my hands up to being part of this) the organiser messaged ‚Äúconfirmed at 16:00‚Äù not ‚Äúconfirmed for 16:00‚Äù or ‚Äúbooked for‚Ä¶‚Äù when I booked it was 16:00, so I just thought they time stamped the booking confirmation ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è but the guy was so short with me and really dismissive, it put a massive downer on the whole thing.

He shrugged that we wouldn‚Äôt start any earlier, and gestured we were on another bike (I think he just wanted to make a point).

We started 5 mins late, had a 20min ‚Äúbreak‚Äù in the middle, where the staff chatted to people they knew, and then arrived back 10mins early. So all in all a complete rip off for around 30mins of drinking/ so-called touring‚Ä¶

The only thing they pointed out was the toilets, no sightseeing‚Ä¶at all

We arrived at 1pm with hours to then spare - absolutely fine as there‚Äôs lots to see and an amazing bar/restaurant nearby. Please go do ANYTHING but this bike in this area‚Ä¶

title: Took my money - did not get a tour!
text: This was one of the worst interactions with a tour company I have ever experienced. I attempted to book and select a time they not only ignored me but only gave me 7am or 9am as an option for a Sangria and Beer Bike Tour? I had not physically landed so was hoping to negotiate a time any time in the afternoon or any following day we were very flexible. This was for my bachelorette party and we were looking forward to this tour but never got the chance to take it. They took our money and never messaged us back. Would not recommend. Don‚Äôt chance it, there are many other tour companies with honest people that are genuinely interested in providing a good service and positive experience. This isn't one of them.

title: They didn‚Äôt turn up!
text:
I booked the beer bike a few weeks before the date & paid a deposit - full communications acknowledging the booking/deposit.
Arrived at the correct meeting point and the bike was nowhere to be found - on ringing it was explained that they‚Äôd booked me for a week later. Not much of an apology bearing in mind we‚Äôd traveled a fair distance out of the city to the meeting point, with plenty of taxi costs. Offered to rebook us the next day but wouldn‚Äôt offer a discount for our inconvenience and also the time didn‚Äôt really suit. My deposit was fully refunded the same day. I appreciate mistakes happen but I‚Äôd expected a bit more of an apology and discount for future bookings, therefore we didn‚Äôt actually make it onto the bike!

title: Terrible Experience with Sangria Bike Tours - Avoid at All Costs!
text:
I recently had an incredibly disappointing experience with Sangria Bike Tours, and I feel compelled to share my negative encounter. My friends and I were excited about booking a tour with them, but unfortunately, the entire experience turned out to be a complete disaster.

First and foremost, Sangria Bike Tours allowed us to book without providing any information about the available times. It was only after we had made the payment that we realized we were in the dark about the tour schedule. This lack of transparency is completely unacceptable and left us feeling deceived and frustrated.

When we tried to reach out to Sangria Bike Tours to inquire about the available time slots, their customer service was utterly unhelpful. We were met with indifference and vague responses, leaving us even more uncertain about our booking. The lack of professionalism and communication was disheartening, to say the least.

To make matters worse, when we requested a refund due to the company's failure to fulfill our booking and provide the necessary information, Sangria Bike Tours outright refused. Their refusal to provide a refund for a service they failed to deliver is nothing short of unethical and demonstrates a complete disregard for customer satisfaction.

Overall, my experience with Sangria Bike Tours was extremely frustrating and disappointing. Their lack of transparency, unhelpful customer service, and refusal to issue a refund have left a sour taste in my mouth. I strongly advise anyone considering booking with Sangria Bike Tours to steer clear and find a more reliable and customer-oriented tour company.

title: Scam
text:
This is an awful service. I booked it online and was not able to pick a time or date that suited me. The people organising thr bike tour sent me a message telling me they only had 2 times available during my trip to Lisbon but unfortunately neither of those times suited my group. The messages from the people running the bike tour were so blunt and rude and mostly just one word replies eg.."yes", "no".
I requested a refund as my group were no longer able to do the bike tour since the 2 times slots offered to us did not suit but the owner just stopped replying to me. I then requested a refund via TripAdvisor and the customer service for TripAdvisor told me they cannot process the refund for me. This is an disgrace and it has really taken from our holiday. I will never be recommending the bike tour to anyone. I will also be leaving this same review on all social media because it is a rip off and a scam. Terrible service.

title: Need some improvement !
text:
Unfortunately, our experience with this activity was quite disappointing. Firstly, there was a lack of a concise briefing at the beginning to explain the rules. The person in charge, Diogo, displayed an aggressive attitude towards us, warning that we would be removed if we continued to race, even though we were simply trying to motivate ourselves and have some fun. It would have been helpful if we were informed from the start to drive at a moderate pace and maintain a friendly atmosphere, as it would have greatly enhanced the overall experience.

During our ride, we encountered some issues with the equipment. One of the chains and one of the seats were broken, resulting in a 20-minute stop in the middle of our ride for repairs. This unexpected delay disrupted our enjoyment and the flow of the activity.

We arrived with high spirits, eager to have a memorable time for our bachelor party, but unfortunately, Diogo's aggressive behavior managed to dampen our mood and turned the experience into one we regretted. We sincerely suggest that Diogo adopts a less aggressive approach, as this would undoubtedly make the activity more enjoyable for everyone involved.

title: Really disappointed
text: We were going there for the bachelorette party of a friend! Everything was booked! We entered the address of the meeting that is on the booking ticket. We couldn‚Äôt find the place. We called them and it appeared that the address is wrongly written on the ticket. The couldn‚Äôt keep out booking because we were over 15 minutes late‚Ä¶ we would be greatful if we could have our money back!!!!

title: Desolation
text: Just a waste of time....maybe there were 10 people! Better a family bingo... quinquinquin prize less than one euro bingo prize less than 10 euros... absurd

Very poor, especially considering the inflated price. You have to get there early if you want a decent seat or even just to sit next to friends/companion, and then you are virtually obliged to buy overpriced pizza and drinks while you wait endlessly in a cheap deckchair. A DJ was promised, so I thought it would be lively, but no, just a dull couple playing dated covers. The acoustics were terrible, so it was virtually impossible to understand the film. Everything started late.

Worst? ONE toilet for about 400 people! The organizers blamed the venue, of course, but maybe they should make better arrangements with the venue beforehand. Overall, a total disappointment and waste of money.

title: Respect our language
text: The place is wonderful and has an incredible potential to provide a perfect night. Shameful to present the show and give instructions to the public only in English. More shameful offer legendary movies with AI. Always whe the Julia Roberts answered ‚Äúfine‚Äù would appear ‚Äúmulta‚Äù. And this is just one of many sad examples. We are in Portugal! Respect!

title: deplorable attention
text:
I was at the Gra√ßa garden session to watch Matrix on 17/09/2024. Everything was going well, the place is beautiful, the climate was great and I was going to watch my favorite movie, however, when I referred to buy pipocas, I had the unhappiness of going through with a low, short, yellow hair attendant who could not have been more unpleasant. In addition to serving me with an air of superiority, she handed me a Vacation Package with only HALF of the amount of pipoques, when questioning her said that that bag was bigger but that the amount was right (as I was seeing the other bags with more pipoques). I didn't want to argue, because with this kind of people we are only wasting time, but she managed to spoil the experience that, until then, was pretty pleasant.
Review the people you hire to deal with customers, because that ends up with the good Impression and the work of the rest of the company.

title: Bad experience
text: I was at the 22/07/24 session at the barbecue palace and it was a bad experience. Very bad by the way. I was in the last queue because I arrived 15 minutes before the movie started. I sat in a super uncomfortable 'realizer' chair, the staff behind did not stop talking, I heard if the customers of the restaurant talking at the exit, I heard during the whole film the kitchen of the restaurant pass orders and wash dishes, the sound of the film was not strong to get to the bottom, the sale of Ppipocas continued during the film was to hear them jumping from the pan and people crossing the whole space to go buy them. Do not recommend.

title: Disappointed do not recommend
text: Very disappointed. We had a session reserved and paid for yesterday at 19:30. Received an email at 19:17 informing us the session had been cancelled due to rain. Appalling. No apologies and still haven't received my refund. Will definitely not be trusting or using their services again. Do nor recommend.

title: Disappointment. The price is very high, not even in the capital. The quality of the food served against the price charged. I considered a r
text: The attention was very mediocre. The employees argued. We found the price very high in relation to the amount of food served.

title: Horrible, the French have gone your way
text:
To flee !
If you are French, don't come, the bouncer is racist and will not let you pass under the pretext that there is "a private party" when 10 minutes before you could come according to the lady on the phone...
A nice racism towards the French‚Ä¶

title: Don't bothet
text: Very disappointed. Lots of wasted time idling before and after very short tour. Tour guides had to be prompted to give information. The Lisbon harbor is not very attractive. Definitely would not recommend.

title: Bad image of Portugal
text: This transfer does not give us a good picture of the Portuguese population. Aggressive and unkind staff at all. I can understand that time is running out during a transfer but there are ways to address people with a minimum of correction and respect. Respect is both ways, so it is not surprising if passengers get annoyed.

title: No driver upon arrival
text: Upon our arrival there was no driver. We had to wait 35 minutes before one arrived. I wish I had called a cab, that would have been quicker, but I had already paid. I would not use this company again.

title: Niet komen opdagen!!!
text:
Op voorhand geboekt. Een dag voor vertrek nog telefoon gekregen met vraag voor exacte adres en uur. Bevestiging via mail. Maar de dag van vertrek zijn ze niet komen opdagen. Niet bereikbaar via mail en ook niet op de telefoon nr. Hebben last minuut zelf een Uber geregeld richting luchthaven!!!
Gelukkig wel via de helpdesk van Viator onmiddellijk een claim ingediend en geld terug gekregen.

title: Keep walking. The Staff doesn't care.
text:
Let me start with saying the food here was 4 stars maybe even 5 and the prices were good.
Blu is a beautiful venue with a rooftop bar and live jazz we had planned to visit after the meal.
That never happened because the service was awful.
The place was very slow during our visit and it seemed the other 3 tables for much more attention than ours.
Rafeal was polite to our face for sure but couldn't seem to get the orders right.
My drink order was wrong and all the drinks sat on top of the bar for a good 10 minutes while he talked on the phone and checked on the other parties.
The salad never made it to the table but we waited so long for our food we didn't even bother asking about it.
He would also completely disappear for long periods of time and when he did resurface.
one of our parties made the mistake of asking for a second drink.
The dessert did arrive in a reasonable amount of time and then came the check.
She never did see her second glass of wine but it sure was on the bill.
We had really hoped to enjoy cocktails with a view on the roof and our party of 6 was ready to spend more money.
So sad the great food was ruined by the dining experience.
A work to The Chef and The Owner
You have great food and a great venue and that's the hard part to get right.
Its a shame your staff is going to be the reason your going to be missing out on revenue and repeat guests.

title: 2 people couldn't make it at last minute. No compromise by tour guide. Information on web site little misleading.
text:
Over priced for what you get. Booked for 4 people. 2 could not make it at last minute because of travel schedule change. Had to pay full amount of booking.
No compromise from local tour company.

title: Good tour , very poor guide
text: First, all of the places we visited on the tour were great. Lovely and very interesting especially Fatima, Obidos and Nazareth. The drying of the fishin Nazarecwas very interesting. The castle and tasting of Jingon was really great. Our tour was supposed to be Wnhlish only and ended up being half in Portuguese. Our tour guide Teresa was dry , rude as md not very informative. She didn‚Äôt keep us informed of a delay at the end of our tour and offered little to no information in Fatima on how to acquire getting out religious purchases blessed. In summary the trip itself was good but I would not recommend our guide Teresa

title: Very tired
text: One suggestion: Change it to: Castle of San Jorge and Alfama neighborhood. Starting at the castle and ending at the Plaza del Comercio would be a good option. The climb to the Alfama neighborhood is long and very tired and it is not that Alfama is as wonderful as dedicating most of the route to it. In the end the castle is done in a hurry.

title: Very bad, we've been dumped.
text:
Ashamedly, we were three couples and since one of the couples came with a child, we have been left lying without the tour.
The very poorly educated Guide.

title: You're canceled 3 hours early and thank you.
text: Beware of this Pseudo-company that is considered professional. Notice of the cancellation of a tour at 6.48 am having the tour in Obidos at 10 am, with the excuse that they do not have enough people to do the tour. As you can tell, what they care about is just money and not offering customer service. DEPLORABLE and REGRETTABLE.

title: Bolt unreliable all over Portugal
text: Very unreliable all over Portugal. We were given a 50 Euro credit for a no-show booked in advance that caused is a lot of stress. Seemed good until we found we could almost never get a Bolt driver anywhere after that. Uber was far more reliable.

title: Be careful with the Bolt app
text: Beware of this app! They misuse it to charge for trips that have never been confirmed. The customer service is a nullity, there's no need to present proof arguments in plain sight that they don't even bother to analyze carefully and logically! Just tap your foot and the customer goes up in flames. What's more, the drivers don't even bother to call if there's a delay or some other issue.

title: Didn't happen, weren't notified, lost money
text:
Unfortunately we could not redeem our pass because the tram was not running that day (due to weather conditions) so I paid 19 euros and got nothing for it. We were also not informed by you or the booking agency.
Tried to get in touch with you, couldn't. My friend has been in touch and she would get the money back.
Would you be able to arrange this for me, too? Thanks in advance for the effort

title: Tram 28 not running - we want a refund!
text: We booked 2 tickets via this site for Tram 28 for 11:00am on Friday March 28. Our credit card was charged $59.80 CDN in advance of receiving the tickets. Unfortunately we were advised the Tram 28 was not running at all this day!!! Furthermore no one from the company actually showed up at the meeting point to advise us (there were other couples there in the same boat waiting for their prepaid tickets). When we tried calling the 2 different phone number on our confirmatIon email, no one answered our many calls. We also tried to ‚Äúlive chat‚Äù for assistance - there was zero response. So disappointed with this service. We want a refund. How do we get this??

title: I wouldn't advise, book individually as is cheaper...
text: Complete con, makes you jump through numerous unnecessary hoops. Unable to contact the agent (answerphone in Portuguese)! Failed to find said agent at the appointed time, complete waste of money & ended up buying a one day travel pass + individual admission passes..(actually worked out cheaper! Hey the great god of hindsight!!ü§î

title: Don‚Äôt be ripped off!
text: If you go down into the Metro you can buy a 24hr ticket which includes the Metro, Trams (inc 28) and buses for just 10 euros. Absolutely no need to pay more for it.

title: Third world still in Lisbon
text: The third world wrong that weighs on them with the Lisbons. An absolute disaster, huge queues waiting for the trams, they stand still for endless time, they pass the users.....and it is absolutely overrated. That said, the third world is still in Lisbon, unfortunately

title: Horses at work without proper conditions
text: Impressive place in the middle of the city and history was also impressive. However, we really experienced the back side of the local people's use of the horses - they were very aware that there were visitors and it felt like there were things they didn't do with the horses because we looked at them. We saw how they used the whistle a little too often to exercise and how they exercised power by whistling as a method. In addition, the horses had very bad hooves and shoes. Most of them wore too small shoes and one of the horses' Hove was even completely broken. So that they arrange Hove regularly is at least not true. They should have a look at that. And that's why they only get two out of five stars.

title: Unhappy with this particular tram ride.
text: Wasn't happy with this tram ride at all. It didn't run the full course of the route. I saw a sign prior to getting tram 28 that 28E no longer runs through the full route, so I made sure that I took the 28 tram. Only to find out to my disappointment that the tram ride gets cut short. I was going to try again the following morning, but found out that part of the tram 28 route is currently blocked off. I wish that info was openly available when the ticket was booked. I would have held back on ordering.

title: Appalling
text: YOU are led to believe this is special 28 tram service when in fact its a PUBLIC TRAM service that you pay 3.60 euro's each as against trip advisers rate of ¬£32 per couple the arrangement to get our tickets was appalling you then wait in a public queue for up to two hours to get on a packed PUBLIC TRAM do not book this service

title: Scam
text:
ABSOLUTE SCAM
it offers you the tickets shot queue that does not exist on the site.tickets adult / child same price.on site ticket adult 12 ‚Ç¨ and child 7 ‚Ç¨.
Audio guide tells anything have nothing to do with everything that exists.
In addition to that he has the right to choose your slots for you without asking you.

title: Don‚Äôt use this trip
text: Do Not Use this deal. No one at pick up point when you go to get your voucher. Which is all you get and they don‚Äôt accept on any of the trams. Just go to the metro and get your own tickets.

title: Terrible
text: Terrible service. They signed me up for the following day when I was leaving. Could not cancel the booking. I went to the tourism office in Lisbon and they tried calling them. But the line was not operational and they had never heard of the company and went on line to read about them and read reviews that they are a scam. Took me to another tour operator to see if they knew anything about them and they also never heard of them. Sent several messages to them and never heard anything until the evening in a very rude reply. Asked for my money back and they have just ignored me. I have had good luck with Viator in the past. What a disappointment.

title: Tickets through Tripadvisor
text:
I purchased two skip the line tickets weeks in advance. The booking company said that they would send me tickets by email 24 hours before my scheduled date.

The night before my date, I received an email stating my tickets were canceled...
UNBELIEVABLE.

DO NOT BUY TICKETS THROUGH TRIPADVISOR.

TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE

title: Don't waste your money!
text:
It was one of the worst experiences I had travelling abroad. I booked the day trip for my mom and I. We made our way to the described meeting point, a pharmacy with no additional information (poor staff members they were lost when we asked them questions). When I called/phoned the company, all phones and mobiles were disconnected. We noticed only after 1h trying to reach the company in 30 degrees heat that it doesn't operate on Mondays (the company didn't make it clear in the booking process).

I had to cancel the tickets as we were travelling the next day, and we were NOT offered a refund but rather a simple message saying 'we don't work on Monday'. I lost 38 euros in a day. Horrible customer service!

Don't waste your money. You can get a daily 6 euro pass in any metro in Lisbon and get the Tram. A small tip: these trams are like a but or metro, so you can hop on/off at any stop with a daily day pass from the Lisbon public systems. You don't need this ticket!

title: Buy your ticket in Lisbon .
text: My partner purchased what we thought were two tickets for Tram 28, what we got was a voucher to exchange for the tickets. We were given a meeting point and a time. We arrived 15 minutes early and waited, and waited, 15mins after the time we should have meet the agent we left as there was no sign of them, we had not received any messages and we had no way of contacting them. 20 minutes later we received a message from Alex the agent to say he was at the venue. We went back to the venue and he admitted he had been in a near by cafe talking with people. He insisted we took the tickets which by this time were of no use to us as the queue for the tram was to long for us to join. We are both over 70 years of age and the wait time was well over an hour. He did suggest we take a No 12 tram saying they were every 10 minutes, we knew different as we had waited 30 minutes before and not one tram had arrived. Our advice would be find somewhere near the tram stop and purchase your ticket on the day. as Alex being 45 minutes late in handing over the ticket spoilt our day.

title: Beautiful palate, poor service from seller
text: Paid 42 euros for 2 skip-the-line tickets with Audio Guide and ticket refused at the entrance because the company says it sent me the ticket by email (which was in my junk...) and the one in my Tripadvisor account was not the right one...I spent 24 euros more to enter...

title: Very confusing instructions and not worth it
text: The instructions for picking up the tickets were very confusing. We thought we were being scammed. After waiting 20 mins a guy showed up, didn‚Äôt apologise for his lateness and didn‚Äôt listen to our feedback. Then we had to line up for 45 minutes to finally get on the tram. It‚Äôs cheaper and better if you buy the ticket directly in the tourist shop. Not worth it. Then we were sent a link for the audio in the tram and it never worked. The tour company never answered my phone calls when I wanted to complain. Don‚Äôt buy this. Save yourself some money and go to the ticket area of the tram directly.

title: This is a scam, just book your tickets at Pena Palace
text:
This is a scam. You can buy the same audio guide for 1 Euro at the palace. The only thing this ‚Äútour‚Äù gets you is you are able to skip the entrance line into the palace. However if you go early, there won‚Äôt be a line.

We booked this months in advance for a 10:30am entry time and the night before (at 9pm) we got a call that rescheduled us to 11am with no explanation. Even at 11 am the line ‚Äúwe were privileged to skip‚Äù was not very long. If we had come at 10:30 like we originally scheduled there would have been no line and we would have paid $64 for a $1 audio guide. Not to mention the description doesn‚Äôt mention you have to download an app and bring headphones.

Save your money and don‚Äôt book through this company.

title: NIce tour but old bikes were not up to current standards
text:
The e-bikes were old, and the torque sensor on my bike was unsafe. When I stopped and put both feet on the ground, the bike still wanted to go - it surged ahead until I slammed on the brakes. As a very experienced rider, I thought that under different circumstances, this could cause an accident with a less capable rider.

Lisbon E-Bike - it is time to upgrade your equipment to 2025 safe standards

title: Denied due to pregnancy but no refund
text: I had purchased tickets for my family and myself for a bike tour in Lisbon, but I was denied participation because I‚Äôm pregnant (even though my reservation mentioned my (early) pregnancy, and it was accepted the day before). I was also not allowed to join a walking tour or a tuk-tuk tour... When I subsequently requested a refund, that request was also denied. I‚Äôve now exchanged over 20 emails with their customer service and have received, as an ‚Äúexceptional concession,‚Äù only one-third of the amount back. I am still extremely dissatisfied and believe it‚Äôs unacceptable that I still paid ‚Ç¨100 for a tour that never even took place.

title: DOES NOT CANCEL EVEN IN HEAVY RAIN - Choose another tour
text: ***** READ THE FINE PRINT *****. The tour is different than most in as much as it runs EVEN in the rain. It was pouring on our reservation date with the weather described as 'heavy rain'. No cancellation. No refund. Who knows if the tour even went as specified because we cannot imagine how it was possible given that it would be incredibly unpleasant, dangeous, and the rain was so heavy you'd not be able to 'hear' the tour. This footnote in the information section (says tour operates even in rain) is obviously bad faith to avoid refunds, since the operator likely knows that almost all of these outdoor tours usually have rain cancellation. This tour might be great in the sun, but FIND ANOTHER TOUR that offers a reasonable rain cancellation policy.

title: Without an escort Beno√Æt a great experience!
text: In itself a nice bike ride. Batteries of the e-bikes run out very quickly despite flat terrain. Tasty pastel de nata... BUT the accompanist Beno√Æt (Dutchman) was a real horror. Arrogant, far too confident, ... . A job in kindergarten would suit him better. We were a group of 35 people (adults) and wish to be treated correctly. The included coffee or water we did not get. Other supervisor Willem was fortunately a winner! Conclusion: 5* if Beno√Æt was not there... something for the organization to think about!

title: Never again pure rip-off no goodwill
text:
Because the weather was very mixed and cold , so the roads very wet and greasy the tour would have become very wet for everyone we wanted to rebook. In my opinion, safety comes first. It was not an accommodating one, we would have had to pay 50 euros for it. What I call cheekiness.
50 euros for a change of booking.
For me, this organizer is no longer an option. Sheer rip-off.
The local guys were very friendly and endeavoured. But their hands are tied too.
The provider has no customer service.

title: I do not recommend
text: The only two photos the driver managed to take mine! Because it was the only two points he stopped. I hired the daily service for one person and during the tour, for two times (lunch and wine tasting) the driver said q had q to pick up other people. I waited and then I still had to pick up an Uber to go until my last appointment which was scheduled p at 17:30 and at 17:10 the driver had not yet arrived. Do not recommend! It's going angry! If it was done well, I'd pay! But it's not!

title: Fujam do Cleiton
text:
Run from Cleiton. You can use the company in a good but, Fujam of Cleiton, please. Cleiton out...all of bad
Look, think of a stressed, lazy boy

title: Recomendo empresas portuguesas profissionais
text: Recomendo guias e empresas portuguesas uma vez que esta empresa n√£o tem guias e sim motoristas. Mal sabem sobre hist√≥ria,bairros e cultura portuguesa. Como motoristas s√£o bons pq o GPS funciona bem.Sao cuidadosos e pontuais por√©m n√£o dominam Lisboa em si pois s√£o aprendizes ainda. Se o dono tem conhecimento ou experi√™ncia,eu respeito porem, seus auxiliares s√£o free-lancer e fazem bico com brasileiros. N√£o √© verdadeiro que podemos usar nosso hor√°rio como gostar√≠amos pois deve ser feito o que o motorista acha bom para ele...sugiro que os motoristas andem junto com guias para ficar algo mais cultural senao e mais f√°cil alugar um carro com um bom sistema GPS.O dono da empresa n√£o nos monitorou e nem perguntou se est√°vamos bem e os passeios como contratado porem o tema do site em que fala Sobre o carinho e calor humano que s√≥ n√≥s brasileiros temos n√£o ocorreu comigo. A frota n√£o √© de carros Mercedes assim como n√£o recebemos nenhum chip para celular como dito no site...n√£o querendo ser injusto mas comigo o prometido n√£o aconteceu e o meu motorista era um mission√°rio que apesar de excelente motorista e pontual ,deixou a desejar no quesito conhecimento basico de hist√≥ria onde as informa√ß√µes eram err√¥neas,singelas e desencontradas. Nos sentirmos seguros porem ficou a desejar. O Custo comparado as outras empresas e bem competitivo porem os roteiros s√£o de certa forma insuficientes.Meu objetivo jamais e de difamar a empresa mas sim de ajudar a novos clientes que n√£o s√£o uma Ana Rikman ou Sabrina Sato e sim um viajante comuns como eu.

title: Rather than go back there I become abstemious.
text:
Bad staff, seems to bother him.
Even in English they do not understand (or more likely pretend).
Absurd prices, 14 euros for two beers without half a chip.
In the bathroom all broken, decadent.
That's bad!
Only positive note: good choice of beers.

title: Most rude experience
text:
We came to this bar to watch a soccer match, but our experience was terrible. The manager refused to play the match audio because he preferred to have music on, despite the fact that over 80% of the patrons were there for the game. They switched our glass cups to plastic ones, which seemed unnecessary and cheapened the experience. The manager‚Äôs rude behavior most of the time did not help either, especially given the late closing time of 4 AM. This is definitely not a place we would come back to or recommend to others.

We came to this bar to watch a football game, but our experience was terrible. The manager refused to play the audio of the game because he preferred to have music, even though more than 80% of the customers were there to watch the game. They exchanged our glass cups for plastic cups, which seemed unnecessary and made the experience worse. The manager‚Äôs rude behavior most of the time didn‚Äôt help either, especially given the closing hours at 4 AM. Definitely not a place we would go back to or recommend to others.

We come to this bar to attend a game of football, but nossa experience foi terr√≠vel.
