My partner and I were excited to explore Lisbon with a Hop-On Hop-Off tour, expecting a seamless experience to discover the city's highlights. Unfortunately, our experience fell short of our expectations.

Firstly, the ticketing process was needlessly cumbersome. Despite downloading our tickets, we were required to visit a kiosk to have them printed, without any forewarning about the consequences of losing them. It was frustrating to discover that the QR code on the app wasn't utilized for boarding, leading to unnecessary complications when we misplaced our printed tickets.

Furthermore, the tour's equipment left much to be desired. The headphones provided were non-functional on both the first and second buses we boarded, depriving us of the audio commentary vital for understanding the sites we were passing. This equipment failure significantly detracted from the tour experience.

Additionally, we were disappointed by the attitude of the drivers, who displayed rudeness throughout the journey. This was not an isolated incident, as fellow passengers also voiced their dissatisfaction with the drivers' demeanor.

In summary, our Hop-On Hop-Off tour was marred by logistical inefficiencies, equipment malfunctions, and poor customer service. We hope that the company addresses these issues to provide future customers with a more enjoyable and hassle-free experience.

title: too much money for a bad service
text:
Waste of money. If you buy an online ticket you can not use the digital ticket you get. It should be changed to a paper one (printed on thermo paper). After two days the QR code was not readable anymore and they could not give me a new tickets.

The public transport is great in Lissabon. For 6,80 per day you travel (including tram 28) to everywhere!

title: Rudeness from Cascais Line driver
text: One star, but considering ZERO STARS for the driver Ant√¥nio da Linha de Cascais, he was extremely rude and rude. When greeting him, I asked him a question: *Good morning, - sir, to get to Boca do Inferno, do I get off at point 9 or 10? and what time will you return? .... Simply, he responded in a loud tone of voice rudely and pointing his finger in my face he said: - to begin with I'm not young, call me driver or Ant√¥nio which is my name, then he put the earphone in my hand where I was holding the pamphlet about this company's lines and he told me to put the phone in the spot on the bus seat that explained where I should get off... I was perplexed by this reaction, but in a tone of In a low voice I said that when I called him *young man it was out of pure politeness, out of respect for him, I didn't know his name, at that moment he spoke to me in a very loud tone of voice - What if I called you ma'am* The girl, girl, girl (he repeated the word three times)... I was shocked by such an unnecessary and aggressive attitude and I said that I would respect him if he called me girl because I understand that it is a word that comes from the culture of his country, At that moment I simply left this sad person with the pitiful expression of voice and gestures and went to the bus seat. I noticed in this individual a great dissatisfaction with the work he does, without empathy and sympathy for customers, tourists.

title: Not worth the cost, hire a local taxi
text: The staff were disinterested and like other reviewers mention, the commentary does not link with the ride and there is no information beofre the stop to tell you what to see and encourage you to get off. The timings are erratic, we waited 45 minutes at one stop, gave up and took a cab to the next stop, then waited there, with a lot of other people who had been there for ages, and still no bus. So 44 euros for one half hour trip as we abandoned.

title: Be careful
text:
We took 3 of the trips over 4 days and can honestly say that the Red Line is the only one that covered most of what we were hoping to see.
The ladies in the ticket office were multilingual and helpful. However the drivers were unfriendly, unhelpful and one was downright rude! He drove through 3 red traffic lights whilst playing games on his mobile phone! Ourselves and a number of other passengers got off without completing the tour, purely because we felt unsafe. We then took further trips by train.

title: Miserable and unhelpful driver
text: Today on the blue line leaving at stop 1 at 11.45, sitting up top at the front, the windscreen wipers were off and it's raining heavily so we can hardly see out. Another passenger asks the driver to put the wipers on and they came on for 3 seconds then stayed off again. Spoiled our trip not seeing out properly. Another passenger tells the driver there's a leak in the front upstairs, the driver makes a face and says that's normal. We needed a more friendly and helpful driver, he wasn't one of them.

title: Cascais Tour
text:
Terrible! The driver didn't know how to give information and was extremely rude!
The company also refused to provide help!

title: Never take GreyLine!
text: The bus departed late from the beginning. I was told the wrong line. Waited for an hour and forty-five minutes for the next one. The sellers on the street were rude. The Wi-Fi on one bus did not work. I reported all the issues and nothing was done.

title: Don‚Äôt waste your time
text: I purchased my ticket online, so did not receive any direction. I couldn‚Äôt find a bus stop for hours on my first day. Website is glitchy. The live schedule doesn‚Äôt work. One day I couldn‚Äôt see my location, the next day I couldn‚Äôt see the buses. No bus timetable online. I called them several times for information and was always given incorrect information. Purchase tickets for the red hop on hop off bus. Ive waited 50 minutes for a bus because I was given incorrect information and I saw no less that 12 red buses go by. Dont waste your time and ruin your trip by booking the yellow bus.

title: Take the other one
text: Terrible, a shame, buses always late, hours of waiting, equipment to follow the tours not working, unprofessional guides, the other company is much better. DON'T BE FOOLED, they are always red buses.

title: Pick another hop on hop off linr
text: Sitting at stop 13 in Lisbon‚ÄîRed line‚Äîwhere bus driver would not open the door even though we had tickets. So now we wait for the next one and hope the driver is not near so rude and unaccommodating. It was a total disregard for the customer and by far our most callous experience in all of Europe that we visited. Guess he needed to get the route done and get to a bar or something. It has soured me on this service and any future hop on hop off will be with another line and I will avoid and search NOT to ride with a Grayline bus hoping a competitor is available.

title: Do not book this tour! Maria Theresa is a terrible guide! You will not see what you paid to see!
text:
We booked this tour, and were very excited to see the largest waves and the best surfers in the world at Sitio in Nazare. Our tour description states " ...enjoy the panoramic views of the surrounding scenery from the village's highest point, Sitio."

Our guide was Maria Theresa.

However, Maria Theresa dropped us off at a tourist trap little beach in Nazare with waves as high as an ice skating rink, and no surfers at all. There, I looked through my monocular and could see huge waves and surfers at Sitio about two miles away almost hidden behind a cliff. When I went back to the bus and asked Maria Theresa if we were going to see the surfers at Sitio, she responded that there were no waves or surfers today due to the weather. I offered her my monocular to see Sitio and the surfers about two miles away at which point she got very mad, and refused to look. If you don't have a monocular and didn't know what you were looking for, you might indeed believe that there were no waves due to the weather based on what our guide told us.

I asked Maria Theresa if we were going to Sitio, and she got even more mad, and said that if we wanted to see Sitio, then we should have hired a private driver; we were not going to Sitio, period. I showed her the written tour description stating we were going to the "highest point, Sitio," and she became furious. She stated that Nazare is a fishing village, there was no surfing today due to the weather, and that she knows this because she is from Portugal, and I am not. She then refused to answer any more of my questions, and began very loudly talking to the bus driver in Portuguese. I asked her to speak English so I could understand her, and she refused.

This tour was a rip off, our guide was arrogant, rude, untruthful, and the written tour description if false. There were many other issues with the tour as well, but really too much to write about.

Lesson leaned; do not tour with Cityrama Gray Line, and especially with tour guide Maria Theresa.

title: A true disaster, what is offered does not correspond to reality. waste of time and money
text:
It is a disaster and completely inadvisable.
They give you a map with the different stops that the two lines have, the blue and the orange. And it turns out that they do not coincide at all with reality, but no one informs you (neither at the sales stands nor the driver), so if you plan to get off to take the other line, you may find that it does not go there. But not every line complies with the route of the plane.
If there are works and the stops change, they must update the plans, or make provisional plans, or at least notify them.
A disaster that only wastes your time and money

title: Absolute Waste of Time and Money
text: Joined the bus at the cruise port . On entering the bus the driver never asked to see the tickets and made no effort to communicate. Went upstairs only to find that you needed to have collected your individual ear pieces from the driver . Returned down stairs and helped myself from a box on the windscreen. The fun then started getting the audio system to work . When it eventually started it was nay on next to useless. Crackling noises and over loud Fauda music and little or know information. Tried following the route designated on the map and coordinating it with the reference points . I‚Äôm not sure the bus even followed the designated route. Spent the first hour in crawling traffic in what can only be described as urban sprawl and no indication as to what was relevant in the area apart from Cortes Ingles department store ! I won‚Äôt bore you with any more information as the tour was a complete rip off and a waste of time . Been on many city tours of this type all over the world and this one was the absolute pits . At the first opportunity got of the bus near to the entrance to the city and enjoyed a afternoon on foot. Don‚Äôt waste 27 euros on the tour get a Tuk Tuk or a taxi instead .

title: Awful
text: It was awful Recording rarely mentioned any of the high lights Sort a driver do you had to wait forever for next bus I would never use again

title: Very poor customer service!!!!
text: Very rude and disrespectful ticket agent. Afterward threw her hand up smiling when she saw me taking her picture. Very insulting. Notified bus driver that the portal for the earphone was inoperable. There were no more seats. She said oh well sorry. Thus, I had no tour information for which I paid. Use one of the competitors stay away from this company.

title: Avoid in winter
text:
Whilst we had no problems with the bus when we were on them, the major issue is that in winter the times between bus gets very long (45 minutes for red line and 60 minutes for blue line). This wouldn't be an issue if there was any live bus tracking feature, but there isn't (Android and iOS apps mentioned in the booklet don't seem supported on any modern device).

This means that we avoided getting off the bus as we would not be sure when we could get back on it. So definitely avoid in winter, especially if you have young children (use the metro instead).

title: Sitting on the stairs instead of a seat.
text:
Half way round the tour we got off on the understanding that the next bus would be along in half an hour. It wasn't. We stood for a full hour and when the bus came it was full. I had to sit on the stairs, totally unable to see anything and with nowhere to plug in the commentary phones.
Complaining was a total waste and even writing to complain evoked a "Sincerest apologies for the inconvenience caused"!!
A waste of the afternoon. Travel with someone else.

title: Buyer be aware, broken technology and map is not clear or helpful
text: We bought tickets for the Gray Line Cityrama Portugal Red line and Blue line hop on hop off bus tours. We tried to download the app so we could see the stops but the app is broken. The map provided is not clear. We immediately requested a refund at the ticket office where we purchased the tickets but no refunds are provided.

title: The worst city tour ever !!!
text: This was a very disappointing experience from the beginning. The earphones would not connect into the plugs and staff was unable to help. The bus was packed (we came from a cruise ship and another one was docked right next to us) so we could not change seats. We changed buses to get on another route and none of the staff was able to tell us when next bus would come. Finally it came and the tour on the new route was short lived as the bus broke down and we had to wait for another bus. Again no help from staff. When we reached out to customer service afterwards in writing we were brushed off. It‚Äôs mind boggling that an international company like gray line operates like that in Lisbon. We should have listened to the independent destination adviser on our cruise ship and have gone with the yellow buses ( who did not have a booth in the cruise terminal). I learned my lesson : NEVER ever Gray Line.

title: Cityrama, NO WAY.
text:
On 11/14 at the Marqu√™s de Pombal stop (Lisbon) I booked a tour package covering 2 lines for 48 hours for ‚Ç¨26. Tickets for three adults. (78‚Ç¨). When hiring, the company representative informed me that it would be a Red Line plus Blue, Green or Yellow. She never asked me to define the 2nd line that I intended to use. Because of her, she defined the Green line on the ticket. I repeat, she did not ask us to define the 2nd line. When we arrived the next day (15/11) at the same stop to take the Blue line, which was our desire, we were prevented from getting on the bus and if we wanted to go we would have to pay extra. The girl who sold the tickets before requesting it showed her dislike and stated that there was nothing she could do. We went to the company's kiosk already irritated by this situation that we did not create and the attendant stated that that was it, that there was nothing she could do, that we were rude and stated that she would call the police. If this is your company's policy, I would like to be informed because other Brazilians need to know these details.
I would like to add that the attendant did not even suggest returning the payment for the 2nd day that we would no longer use. In Brazil we would say: ‚ÄúYou lost Man√©‚Äù That was the feeling I had, the feeling of having been deceived.
We contacted the company but the person responsible is advised to respond with evasions.

title: No interest ! Services to avoid at all costs!!!
text:
Almost no comments in the audio guide! Nothing justifies paying 22
‚Ç¨!to tour the city's bus stops!

title: Avoid Graybar HOHO in Lisbon!
text:
We stopped in Lisbon on a cruise and decided to do a HOHO bud tour around Lisbon to get a feel for what we wanted to see. We bought tickets at the cruise terminal from Graybar and went to the bus. The upper level seats were dirty and the bud looked like it hadn‚Äôt been cleaned in a while. We were on the red line but when the bus left they took us on the blue line (much less desirable, mainly working class apt neighborhoods) for an hour and then they finally switched to the red line itinerary. The audio portion was so bad we couldn‚Äôt use it, it was garbled and full of distortion that you couldn‚Äôt understand a word! Even trying other plugs didn‚Äôt help. There were many complaints from other passengers but no one did anything! The bus didn‚Äôt stop at some of the stops and the first opportunity to actually hop off was almost an hour into the drive.

We have done several HOHO tours but this one was the worst. Save your money and book one of the other tour buses!

title: Don‚Äôt use this service
text:
I wish I had read reviews before we bought tickets. We bought the ticket and were given a map showing three routes of different colours. Once the journey started there was no announcement to say what route we were on and when announcements were made the English was so bad it was hard to tell when the speaker was speaking Portuguese and when he was speaking English. We were on a cruise and only had four or five hours in Lisbon but the first hour of this trip was spent driving to the outskirts of the city and back again where there was nothing worth seeing. When the bus stopped in a central place, there was nothing to help us decide whether it was a good place to get off and then we set off on another route without knowing which one it was. Eventually we ended up back in town, got off the bus and never got on again.
The bus didn‚Äôt explore any of the main part of Lisbon because it is not allowed to as they have small lanes and it is mostly pedestrianised.
We then discovered that the port was only five minutes walk from the edge of the centre. I have given it one star because it did take us along to the Magellan monument but we could have got a tram there for two euros. We wasted 25 euros and an hour of our precious time in Lisbon :(

title: Don't buy it!
text: Just appalling, we boarded from the port, have been going for 2 hours and still waiting for the start! Dirty vehicles, audio broken, unscheduled stops for no reasons and hopeless staff who ignore your complaints. Don't be conned like us, save your money. Chaos

title: Lack of driver information
text: Why doesn't the driver know where the casino is? Is there a lack of training or is there another reason?

title: Very poor information about the bus route frequencies and where to get tockets.
text:
We chose the Lisbon hop on hop off tour, as they had four different routes and we thought this would give good coverage of Lisbon. We bought the tickets online and went to board a bus on a route which passed near our hotel. The driver told us that the ‚Äòvoucher‚Äô bought online had to be exchanged at the place where all the routes start from. So we had to get a taxi there to get our actual tickets.

The brochures and web site advertising the routes and ticket prices don‚Äôt mention that tickets are only available at the central point.

Bus frequencies were poor. On some of the routes, if we were to have got off the bus, it would be more than an hour before another bus comes along. On some routes there appeared to be only one bus running. So, not really hop on hop off. More of a series of bus tours.

On some of the tours we went round, there were long queues of passengers at some of the stops and not all waiting passengers were able to board the buses that we were on.

title: Total waste of time
text: The 1/2 day Lisbon Grayline tour was part of the Air Canada Vacations Portugal North/South tour. It was a total waste of time. The guide was difficult to understand in English. She would not get off the bus to explain the historic site. There was no air on the bus and only after many tourists on the bus complained did the guide say ‚Äúwe have to check with the agency to see if we can turn on the air‚Äù‚Ä¶what a farce! We wish we would have booked the Sintra tour with a different tour company instead of wasting our time on this tour! Hope this is helpful! October 24 2023 morning tour!

title: Don‚Äôt waste your money!!!
text: Awful commentary with no history or significant details. Seemed like a bored afterthought. More than 3/4ths of the time we had to listen to awful music which was loud and painful. Very disappointing audio commentary. Take Uber‚Äôs instead and go exactly where you want with a good travel book for details!

title: Skip this in Lisbon
text:
I have been on hop on hop off buses in many cities around the world and thought they were fantastic. But the Lisbon cityrama bus is the absolute worst. I had to switch seats 5 times until I found an audio jack that actually worked. They do not provide very much historical, or interesting narrative. Many areas within the routes were not very attractive or interesting and a complete waste of time. Instead you are inundated with a loop of Portuguese elevator music piped through in poor quality audio. I used a Bose noise cancelling headset instead of the free orange ones provided so it should not have a constant hissing sound in the background.

I bought the ticket through the tourism office and was instructed that I needed to board the bus at stop # 1 instead of jumping on at any one of the stops close by. There isn‚Äôt an assistant selling or processing tickets on the bus. Or, to answer questions regarding historical sites or routes. Stop #1 was a huge hike from where I purchased the ticket. Being elderly with physical challenges this was quite an issue. I would advise, skipping the hop on hop hop bus in the city. Unfortunately, I purchased a 72 hour pass and it‚Äôs nonrefundable.

title: Unfriendly staff
text:
I inform the flight attendant Joana that my audio guide does not work and not only does she not pay any attention to me but she also answers me rudely.
The treatment with the staff has been terrible.
I think that to work in front of the public, people with a friendlier profile should be hired.

title: Terrible service
text: Terrible service, infrequent, drivers without customer service, poorly labeled stops. Headphones don't work

title: Hop-on, Hop-of tour bus
text: The city is small and it is much cheaper to use the train, subway and public buses. Cityrama employees, both ground staff (on the defensive) and drivers, super edge. There are no notices of the stops and the signs they have invite confusion. If you make a mistake they don't give you any option. At the Bethlehem tower, it was pouring rain, the driver made us get off the bus to look for the tickets. In Cascais he stopped in double row, was half a second and told us that we could no longer get off. We did it 1/2 hour later. To return to Lisbon we had to take the train and metro (much cheaper and with the certainty that you know where you are going) because they canceled a stop after having scheduled an Iron Man for months. At the stop there was no sign and as a consequence we either used the public transport service or we had a wait of 3 hours and a journey of one. In short, even if I was sick of wine, I would not contract services with this company again. A real scam, expensive and on top of that it seems like they are sparing your life.

title: Avoid at all cost
text: Absolutely shocking Really poor commentary. Started raining and even though we were undercover upstairs every section of the roof leaked with pouring rain coming through. Side windows also leaked. Avoid at all costs not worth the money at all

title: Avoid avoid avoid
text: Furious with this company. Bought ticket in the day for ¬£85 for 4 people. Specifically chose this due to proximity to our hotel as we had one of our group with mobility issues and struggles to walk or stand for long. The office near Palace de Bolsa pointed us to a bus stop in easy walking distance. Waited an hour with about 50 other people to only find out that stop/route was closed. Was told to walk to another stop which was way to far for our disabled group member. Tried to get a refund as even the local office near the stop did not know that bus was not running that morning. So far they have refused. I will remove this review if they change their mind. Totally unacceptable business behaviour to treat people with disabilities with so much contempt. AVOID AVOID AVOID AVOID AVOID. Use the Yellow bus instead.

title: Do Not Hop On These Whatever You Do
text:
We had one day to see Lisbon so bought a city hop on/off bus tickets for 26 euros each at 10am. Waited 50 minutes for 1st available bus. This ground through 1960s concrete suburbs for 30 minutes then kicked us off at a bus terminal for another 50 minutes. The next bus trawled us back down and up a boulevard which we had already come by. Stuck in central city traffic for another hour, no commentary, no sights, eventually going past our cruise ship again where we started from. Along the waterfront we went, no sights to see and stopped at the Belem Tower and told we were going straight back into the central gridlock of Lisbon so got off and paid 15 euros for a taxi back to the ship, just had time for a beer before ship sailed.
What an absolute disgrace. A complete waste of a day which cost 68 euros to see bugger all with unhelpful staff to boot.
Not a good tourist experience or advert for Lisbon as these look like an officially approved bus company.

title: Trashy company
text:
Trash company
Not many buses, so long waiting times
Not very clear where you can hop on.
Not worth your money! Waiting 45‚Äô for a bus is way to long

title: Disorganized Time Waster
text: this is silly disorganized and a massive waste of time waiting around - we waited for the green line it came 2x was full - we gave up went back to the hotel - what a waste of time and money - I get how non-customer service oriented Portugal is - but damn this is next level IDNGAF. At the main terminal at the park - there is no organization it is mayhem no one directs you and there is no clear markings so ??? waste of time complete and total -

title: Uncomfortable and not worth the money.
text: Bus would not start at cruise port. Eventually got going, suspension was bad on cobbled roads. Driver did not stop at points 1, 2 and 3 at all. Went through derelict streets with people sleeping in tents on the pavement - scary! Finally stopped at point 4 after a row with the driver. He began to shut the rear door before I got off and hurt my hand. ‚Ç¨26 each was a rip off! Commentary was useless via earphones. After wandering around we found a nice restaurant fortunately and took a taxi back to the port for ‚Ç¨5!!!! Don't know how many people he left behind by not stopping at the first 3 points. Nightmare!

title: Why drive a tour bus when nothing works
text: The guides didn't work, the driver was very unfriendly and we had to wait 40 minutes in the blazing sun until we finally got going.

title: Don‚Äôt waste your money
text: I have been on man city hop on hop off tours, but this one was awful. Although we‚Äôd booked on line, you couldn‚Äôt use the QR code unless you exchanged it at their office. That involved a tram ride to get there followed by a very long queue in the full sun of already dissatisfied customers. Bus stopping places weren‚Äôt clear, no earphones, but for those that had them, the commentary wasn‚Äôt working or out of sync. We took just one ride. My advice is don‚Äôt waste your money on this bunch of cowboys!!!!

title: AVOID AVOID AVOID
text: AVOID its total pants. We booked through an online option. Despite having a QR code you can‚Äôt use this to get in the bus. You have to go the the ticket office miles from the waterfront area . Get their paper ticket with a QR code oh and wait in the general line as if you don‚Äôt have a ticket. So you can only board at the start. Utter rubbish, totally disorganised and no communication or signage for the buses, routes, times, stops etc. Not hop on and off total waste of money. We gave up waiting for a bus that runs when it wants so wasted ‚Ç¨22. We got the general public transport back for ‚Ç¨2 all the way from Bel√©m to the main square. I suggest you just use the ordinary bus.

title: Crap tour
text:
Do NOT waste your time or money.
Bloody aweful.
Late. Slow. Poor commentary. Walking is quicker, nicer and Wikipedia more informative.

title: Bad experience
text:
We miss the day of the tour due to confusion of the day that we have our tour.We were late in checking in at our hotel that we were not able to come.
We notified viator and we requested a refund but we were denied.So I felt bad that we lost the payment and unable to go to Fatima.We came all the way from Canada and missed our tour and money as you did not give any co sideration.

title: Not recommended GRAYLIME LISBOA bad service
text: Bad service, buses always full, frequency of passage greater than 30 minutes, unfriendly staff. Much better by taxi or bus‚Ä¶. AND ON TOP EXPENSIVE

title: Terrible Awful service
text: AVOID- terrible, terrible service. Very infrequent buses. Buses frequently full so you can‚Äôt get on when they do come so please save your money and either go on a private tour or use public transport.

title: Tour Guide was rude
text: The trip itself was not bad but the tour guide was extremely rude. Time was not well distributed among places. 2 hours in Fatima and 20 minutes at the Batalha. Batalha is huge and beautiful, when I mentioned to her that only 20 mins was not enough she said to stsy and get a hotel. I think the experience would be much better with another tour guide.

title: Do not go - save your money
text:
Cruise visit? Save your money.!
Bought a ticket in terminal. Was told it wouldbe a 2 hour trip - lasted 3!! Had no time to hop off and info incorrect and/or out of sync. Very disapointing route and a total easte of money.

title: Disappointing experience
text:
We have been on several hop on, hop off bus tours and this one was extremely poor. There are 4 routes, green, blue and red and purple (red and purple are the same route, but in reverse direction). What you are not told when you book is the buses are one an hour. Bus timings at stops are unreliable, so we arrived at stop for Mostario dos Jaronimos, on time, without realising that we must have just missed a bus, which came early. Waited an hour! In other locations (Cadiz), it is possible to track the buses.
The interchange for all routes is bus stop one, but times are not particularly well co-ordinated, so you can arrive on a red route bus, and then have to wait 45 minutes for a blue route bus to leave.
Narrative on headphones not particularly good. Lots of music!

title: Go only Nazare & Obidos..Dont go Fatima & Batalha
text:
Go only Nazare & Obidos
Dont go Fatima & Batalha

Tour company doesnt give phone numbers of their staff for coordination for pick up nor they share number during trip

They took break of 30 mins before reaching Fatima which was unnecessary

Dont go Fatima at all unless you are religious person
Dont go Batalha if u r not fond of church

Spend more time at Nazare..Tour company gives only 30 mins but you can spend more than 1 hour at Nazare viewpoint. You can also go down to beach which tour company doesnt take us

Tour company gave only 45 mins at Obidos. It is beautiful place where u can spend 1.5-2 hours‚Ä¶

Tour company dropped us at Rossio but they didnt give us pick up from rossio . They called us far place which was away from our apartment

Tour company wasted 30 mins as they started bus late just because the staff didnt have proper coordination or number/ count of passengers. Bus should leave on time even if other passengers are late

Tour company wasted another 15 mins at loo break for waiting couple who came late.

Tour company should adhere to timings. They need to have proper planning & coordination

title: Horrible, Not worth the money spent.
text: Horrible!! Bus got stuck on a side street. The bus was packed, had a hard time finding a seat. We spent more time sitting going nowhere than seeing the sights. This was not worth the money spent. DON'T DO IT!!

title: Bloody awful
text: 27 euro each for absolutely NO COMMENTARY or idea where in Lisbon we might be‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.have NEVER experienced any hop on/off this bad, been to 48 countries, says a lot!!!! DO NOT BOTHER‚Ä¶..

title: SERVICE SUCKS
text:
Service Sucks!! Buses are extremely infrequent!
We waited the blue line for 2 hrs on points 11 and 12, and the bus never came. Information about stations is also full of errors. A total waste of money!!

title: SERVICE SUCKS
text:
This service really sucks!!! Lines are EXTREMELY infrequent as a consequence you can waste hours and hours of valuable time waiting for a bus to come. They have an app with bus stops but indications about stops are full of errors.
A TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY!!!

title: CITYRAMA GREYLINE - TERRIBLE!!!
text:
CITYRAMA GRAYLINE (blue bus) : ESPARRO!
Very polite employees both at the sales counter and in the call center. HOWEVER, make no mistake! TERRIBLE service!!!!!! Orange line takes more than 1 hour to pass each point; Blue line, theoretically more frequent, however, it takes more than 40 minutes to stop at the stop, with an unattractive route (long way to stop at a tourist spot). It was extremely IRRITATING to see the yellow Bus and the CitySightseein (red bus) stop NUMEROUS times at our stop and the blue bus (GRAYLINE) didn't show up. Finally, we lost the money because we started to travel by other means. Part of the city of Porto is under construction due to the metro and some stopping points have been suspended. In addition to not notifying us, the application has not been updated. In short, the physical map says one thing, the app another and the website another. Maybe it makes up for the other companies (from what we saw, the yellow bus and red bus stops are very frequent), but GREYLINE, NEVER AGAIN!!!!

title: Failed to stop
text: The bus failed to stop & we got a taxi instead. We had a day at the beach & when we decided to return we waited at the pick up point. The bus came along & sailed right passed. Very annoying, as they‚Äôre only every 30 minutes. We complained at the point where we bought the ticket, but this fell on deaf ears. Choose one of the other two, red / yellow lines instead.

title: There are better tour bus companies in Lisbon
text:
iPhone app kept crashing.
Location of buses on the app spotty.
Some stations were not properly marked (am I waiting for a bus that will never show up?)

Went to Caiscai and got stranded because no buses were on line at 5:30 pm on a Tuesday. There are no schedules anywhere. Online or elsewhere.

Was never able to validate my ticket. Driver always had to look at the receipt.
Some drivers drove like they were angry. Jack-Rabbit starts. Slamming on the brakes. Constantly honking the horn.
20% of the fuided tour devices on buses were non-functional.
Long waits to ‚Äúhop-on‚Äù

Route do cover a lot of ground.

Yellowbus is better transportation . Ran much more frequently

title: Avoid - explore other tours
text: Explore your options first. Got on at cruise terminal. 40 minutes before we set off. Did tour but didn't get off. Got to final stop (number 1) but needed at stay on until stop 2 to be in centre and near shuttle pick up point. Too far to walk (half an hour) with elderly relative. Headset said we could stay on. Unbeknown to us red line changed to blue line and we were stuck on bus for another hour straight back to cruise terminal. No option to explore centre. Driver not helpful. Said colleague had explained but no-one had informed the upstairs passengers. Lots of other passenger complaints showed that we weren't the ones to have made a mistake. So many options for tours - look at other options. Driver said he was hot, tired and hungry!!! Aren't we all.

title: Complete waste of money
text: Total waste of money on the green line. Very few buses and when they finally arrive they are full. Rip off moneywise as well, 22 euros for a trip which will cost you 8 euros by your own driver with an Uber for example. No office or place to complain.

title: This tour is pretty bad, I don‚Äôt recommend.
text:
We got the Sintra deluxe tour through Grey Line. They were suppose to pickup and drop off at hotel. They dropped us up at the bus square (not hotel) and told everybody on the bus that they are on their own. We took a Uber back to hotel. Second issue, they talked in Portuguese but other languages are weak and skipped. Sometime they speak so fast no one understand the guide. The guide is useless and not helpful, we can‚Äôt ask questions inside the bus, guide does not seem to care about the tourists. When they drop us to a site, we have to figure out everything on our own.
We did tons of tours around the world, but this one is a big no no! Chose another group!

title: To forget, money wasted
text:
Bus without air conditioning, in August! Downstairs or on the front seats upstairs we were dying of heat without air, the seats in the sun to be cooked. A lady felt sick from the heat during a stop and the driver didn't even move.
Terrible audio quality, completely useless audio explanation because the bus travels too fast and it is not clear what the description refers to.
They advertised a bus every 20 minutes, we waited even 1 hour for one to arrive.
To forget, money wasted.

title: A not so guided tour‚Ä¶
text:
The places we visited were beautiful but the guided tour wasn‚Äôt that guided, as our tour guide left us alone in the various places of the Sintra deluxe (green) tour. Literally told us to go alone and meet her again at the pick-up spot X time later.

The guide was supposed to speak French and English but she spoke well only Portuguese and French, her English was acceptable at best , and that reflected on the quality and quantity of the information given (very poor in English).

All of that could have been better with a tour guide that wasn‚Äôt so obnoxious; It literally transpired that she couldn‚Äôt stand any of us, and we were in the way between her and her home.

So don‚Äôt expect a guided tour, but just a transport from Lisbon to Cascais, Sintra and the Castle of Pena, and back. A little pricey if you ask me :-)

The driver was a pro, though, navigating through every situation like a piece of cake. Thanks George!

title: Not as advertised
text:
Only half of the headphone connections worked on the first two buses we used.
No commentary on the 6 bridges boat tour.
Currently watching the blue route bus tracker from the stop at Serralves, but the bus just rerouted by continuing along Av de Boavista rather than following advertised route.

title: TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE
text: More than 1 hour waiting with my children for the bus. The application it's useless. Very difficult to download and impossbile to get information about the buuses. After one hour and half waiting with a hot day, we had to take a taxi. Conclusion: we paid 100 euros for all of us and were able to use it only for some stops.

title: Commentary: Terrible audio, many seats just did not work and out of sync.
text: The driver was quite unfriendly. The audio on the headphones was poor. The commentary was not synchronized. Stopped working altogether halfway through. Tried to fix it and missed whatever we were to see. We asked the driver if a certain stop was a certain number and he responded ‚ÄúYes‚Äù. It turned out it was a wrong stop. Don‚Äôt waste your money. Just do some research and make a list of places and learn about them and then just get a taxi or Uber to take you around. You can download info about any city on Vox City for a few dollars and it will give you a similar commentary as you drive along. Or just pin various places on Google maps.

title: Inadequate commentary
text: Definitely the worst hop on hop off bus trip I‚Äôve ever done. The commentary was sparing and totally inadequate. Some of the inner city stop numbers were incorrect. No air conditioning.

title: Avoid
text:
Avoid. Avoid. Avoid. There are other bus tours in town. On the first bus the audio did not work at all. After several passengers complained they sent another bus. On this bus some of the audio connections worked but at least half did not.

Only use Gray Line in Portugal if you want a guided tour with no guide.

title: Beware of Scammer, Cityrama in Lisbon
text:
Cityrama & Holiday Inn Continental (Rua Laura Alvis) sold us the tour tickets, only to find out that Cathedral was closed and one cannot go inside Belem. I was categorically advised that we could see all the places with the purchased tickets.

I complained and followed up with a few messages, but nothing doing. We were scammed. Avoid these two places, as I feel both parties are guilty and taking no accountability for the fiasco.

title: Worst experience ever - Don‚Äòt use this Bus Line - You will regret it immediately
text: Worst experience ever! Entertainment System mostly broken! NO German Language on bord - they promised they should be! Asked to get our Money back immediately - don‚Äôt give a F*k! Thanks for absolutely nothing!

title: Waste of time and money!!!
text: Shocking tour! Bought voucher in a shop. ‚Ç¨30 each, total ‚Ç¨60 for a 3 line tour. Had to wait an hour to start as the first bus was full. Used red line to get off at stop 11 where the driver told us we needed to wait for the orange line bus to get to Cascais. We waited two and a half hours, no orange line bus!! Waited another 30mins to get a red line bus back to where we started so spent the whole day on a bus or waiting. The commentary was terrible too. We really wanted to visit Cascais but never got there as we were only staying for 2 nights in Lisbon! Spent most of this tour sat on pavements waiting for buses!!! Stay away from this tour! Total waste of time and money!!!

title: Lisbon sightseeing (gray line cityrama) - p√©ssima experi√™ncia
text: P√©ssima empresa de hop on hop off. √înibus com pouca frequ√™ncia. Funcion√°rios mal humorados. Fazem os turistas aguardarem em fila no sol!!!! As duas outras empresas tem frequ√™ncia e estruturas melhores (citysightseeing e os √¥nibus amarelos).

title: Daylight robbery
text:
Booked this whilst on a cruise. No information given. Audio guide not working properly (and was very poor anyway).
One of the main stops was blocked off for the day, the company must have known.
So a 25 minute detour to get back on track. This meant that arrival at change over point was delayed and there wasn‚Äôt enough time to do the second half. As it was every hour impossible to get off and get back to the shop on time.
None of this was explained. Daylight robbery.

title: Bad. Save your money. Walk, take a tuk tuk or public transport
text:
We should have read the reviews and saved our money. This was the worst Hop on bus we have been on. Very confusing as the narration didn't tell you what stop you are coming to and no announcement from the driver. Ofen, he just did not stop . It was very hard to follow and no information when the bus would return. The app was no help
Narration was limited and boring. Mostly filled with annoying music.
The driver was unhelpful and couldn't understand English.
In the end, we got off and walked.
SAVE YOUR MONEY ..take a tuk tuk or tour.

title: Appalling, disgraceful Hop on Hop off Bus Tour!
text: My family and I were on a cruise ship and Lisbon was our port of call in June 2023.We queued for about 30 mins waiting on the next bus. There was a lot of people waiting to board the bus in a very disorganised way. Two girls were selling tickets. The bus turned up with very limited seating one of the ticket sellers checked if there was seating. We were sold tickets ‚Ç¨108 for the 4 of us. We tried to board the bus and it soon became obvious that there were no seats. We were told to get on the bus by the ticket seller and we‚Äôre told seats would become available as soon as people disembarked. The driver was a very rude ignorant man and shouted for us to board we were apprehensive as no seats. We boarded reluctantly and went to the back of the bus. We were offered no headphones or maps. The driver proceeded to drive recklessly clearly angry his bus was full.I was standing at the double back doors unaware they would open at some stage. I was trying to steady myself. After about 15 minutes the bus stopped and the doors opened catching my right thigh causing me extreme pain and leaving my leg very red and bruised. I reported this to Customer Services on my return home from our cruise requesting a full refund as we did not get the experience of hop off hop on. My email was answered in an unhelpful way I have since sent another 2 emails and no reply. This tour company should not be selling tours for buses that have no seating. My experience was terrible and for that reason I will be pursuing my refund through other means.

title: Don‚Äôt waste your money on this!!
text: Totally waste of money and time. You will very limited information about what you pass on your 2 hour trip around the city. Book a tuk tuk instead.

title: Do NOT book with Cityrama
text:
Do NOT book with Cityrama Gray Line.
They are a SCAM.

My hotel booked a day tour with them.

They gave me the incorrect pick up location.

I arrived at the location they told me, and I quickly realized no one was there and called the company.

They told me that they gave me the incorrect pick up location and I should go to their main office to join the tour 15 minutes away. They said that they would wait for me.

I paid for a car to take me to the new location. When I got there, the office said the tour left, and they didn‚Äôt wait for me, and they can NOT help me.

I missed my tour to Sintra and had the worse day because of it. I had to pay for transportation back to my hotel.

I contacted customer service, and they said it was not their fault that they gave me the WRONG information and they can‚Äôt do anything to compensate me or do anything for them giving me FALSE information. They ruined my trip.

Cityrama has NO customer service, abd LIARS, and a scam.

There are other tour companies. Be smart and do NOT travel with them.

title: Rubbish Tour
text:
We took this tour without reading the reviews.
It was a waste of time and money. The commentary was out of sync with the buildings/monuments we passed and it stopped working for the entire second half of the trip. It was so disappointing. Shame on Gray Line for this bad service and lazy effort at producing a decent, insightful commentary. The red route was really poor, we saw as much from the train line as we arrived into Lisbon from Cascais. Most of the audio was made up of bland commentary. Definitely wouldn‚Äôt recommend this tour.

title: Tr√®s mitig√©
text:
Tr√®s d√©√ßu par cette exp√©rience. Nous avons pris en famille le ticket pour 48h. Les bus sont trop peu fr√©quents. Heure d‚Äôattente en chaque rotation, ce qui fait perdre √©norm√©ment de temps entre chaque visite. De plus l‚Äôaudio guide ne passe que de la musique donc aucun int√©r√™t pas de commentaire sur les monuments
Le circuit propos√© dessert trop de passage sans int√©r√™t culturel. La num√©risation n‚Äôa aucun dans logique et le site en ligne pour voir les stations n‚Äôest pas mis √† jour. Nous avons attendu une heure √† la station qui devait √™tre la 24 pour voir notre bus passer devant nous sans s‚Äôarr√™ter et avons d√ª marcher vers une autre station pour refaire le tour des monuments d√©j√† vu avant de repartir dans la bonne direction. Vraiment l‚Äôorganisation est √† revoir. Seul point positif le ticket 48h donne acc√®s √† une balade en bateau sur le Douro et √† la cave de Porto √† villa de gaia

title: Bus Cityrama da evitare
text: Pessima esperienza, come le altre 2 compagnie concorrenti in citt√† offre ad un prezzo di ben 26 euro il giro in pullman di 2 percorsi ( potendo salire e scendere quando si vuole ) cittadini ascoltando ( in teoria) le informazioni storiche e turistiche di Lisbona. Avendo usufruitoin altre occasioni di altre compagnie posso dire che Cityrama √® la peggiore in quanto l'audio sul pullman non sempre funziona ( altri viaggiatori si lamentavano) e il personale sempre scocciato e indisponente. Consiglio di rivolgersi alle compagnie concorrenti tanto il prezzo √® uguale

title: Waste of time and money
text: Respect frequency. Out of 3 times we took the bus, 2 of them waited almost an hour. As I'm writing this review I have already waited more than anhour for the boat at Belem. No signs of it.

title: Not for us
text:
The tour guide was really nice and gave us a lot of information during the day which we enjoyed!
But: from the tour itself we imagined something differently. From the Living Tours tour description we had the impression that the time would be equally divided with the four stops. Unfortunately it was mainly a tour to Fatima, with a (from our point of view waste of time) stop of 30 mins at a tourist shop. We left Lisbon at 9 am, and left Fatima (which was the first stop) at 2.15 pm. Therefore there was not much time left to explore the other villages. If your main interest is to the see Fatima then this tour is for you, otherwise we can not recommend it.

title: hop hop hop somarello...!!
text: male...molto male. aria condizionata assente a luglio... orari inprecisi e non indicati in nessuna fermata. se guardi la app ti fanno capire che puoi fare i bilgietti on line...falso: ti fanno una prenotazione che poi devi convertire in biglietto ad un chiosco sperduto... salvo poi scoprire che i biglietti puoi farli anche nel bus con l'operatore... le altre compagnie hanno bus pi√π frequenti e si vedevano passare molto pi√π spesso

title: Terrible Experience
text: Do not use this bus line. Poor customer service, poor audio equipment, and very poor signage on where to catch the bus. The signage and location did not always match the info in the brochure, especially for the orange line. A bus driver drove right past us while we were standing at the spot designated on the map and wagged his finger at us. There was no Grayline sign there, but it showed the location on the map. We walked to another so called Grayline bus stop, according to the map, again no bus sign. The only way we figured it was a stop was someone else was also there. Luckily a bus arrived after a very long wait. Save your money and go with one of the other bus companies in Porto to be guaranteed a better experience.

title: Z√©√©r slecht
text: Hop-on hop-off bus ticket, met Burmeister port tour en de bruggen tocht over de Douro belandde letterlijk in het water. De port tour wad uitstekend echter onze boottocht om 18.30 uur ging niet door. Bij de valreep werd dit door de kapitein medegedeeld. Alle ticket Offices gesloten en onze laatste dag. Gelukkig op het nippertje een boottocht reserveren via een andere organisatie.

title: Een zeer vervelende trip
text: Het enige compleet geef ik de minibus chauffeur. Tour begeleidster Annabelle een onvriendelijke en bazige vrouw. Airco functioneerde niet goed. Wat een mooie Trip moest zijn, werd voor veel passagiers een ongezonde ervaring.

title: Diese Unternehmen zu w√§hlen war ein grosser Fehler
text: Einfach mies! Hop-on hop-off tour mit der red line in lissabon war schrecklich. Nach dem halben Tag entschied das Unternehmen nicht mehr bis ans Ende der Strecke zu fahren. Bei 33 Grad haben wir 2 Std auf den Bus gewartet,der nicht kam. Ende vom Lied: mit taxi zum Hotel.. wer also gern f√ºr veraltete Busse mit Musik anstatt Infos √ºber die Stadt doppelt zahlt, ist hier richtig!

title: Do not use this Hop on - Hop off service
text: The worst hop on - hop off service we‚Äôve ever used. Aggressive driver who shouted and gesticulated at passengers when they asked to get off whilst failing to stop at numerous points on the so called tour. No information from the person we bought the tickets from so no idea what route we were on and at one point, having downloaded the app, it looked like we weren‚Äôt on either the Red or Blue route‚Ä¶slightly worrying. First stop was approximately an hour after we set off from the cruise terminal at which point we escaped and decided to walk back. Complete waste of ‚Ç¨27 each, which in itself was expensive. On returning to the cruise terminal, guess what, all of their staff had vanished. DO NOT USE!!

title: Underwhelming
text: Pretty underwhelming experience. The information on the bus via earphones wasn't very rich in content. It was also very limited. An hour long bus ride you could've done by spending the day just walking.

title: Avoid this tour
text:
We sat on the bus for about 20 mins with no head phone commentary most of the head phone connections did not work. Then found a couple that did. After about 50 mins my partner did not feel well ( we think a bit of dehydration. We saw an area with lots of cafes and thought we could get off to get some water. ( after all it is a hop on hop off service ) We were sitting stationary in traffic for about 5 mins and said we need to get off. The driver was very curt and told us we could not and need to move backward behind the red line. I tried to explain we need to get off to get some water as my partner was feeling unwell. still no positive response. By this time my partner was quite unwell and feeling faint. She sat and was holding on to the support bar looking very unwell. I tried to explain we need to get off to get some water still no get behind the red line. My partner sat a little way back to get some support from the upright bar and was now looking quite pale I stayed looking for a cafe that was near a stop where we could get some water. Without walking too far. Our driver was on another planet. Just no regard for us or any other passengers for that matter. While he nonchalantly drove the bus for the next 15 / 20 mins continually chatting away to someone at the other end of his iPhone. His earphone was plugged in to his smart phone and he did not once stop chatting to the person at the other end for at least 20 mons or so. Other people getting on and off asking questions like what time is the last bus here, just a shrug of the shoulders. I was sitting next to him while my partner was feeling faint and I was looking out for a close by cafe to get some water.
I took this picture though his read view mirror. He was so engaged in his conversation on his phone he didn‚Äôt even notice that I was taking picture of him My suggestion to any traveler to Porto

Porto is a fantastic place and well worth a visit. The people are so friendly and the variety of culture is amazing this place have something for everyone. But please don‚Äôt waste your money on this trip it was awful.

Go to Porto and enjoy one of the best cities to visit in the world but please do not use this bus service particular if it‚Äôs driven by this man I really do not think he represents the generosity of the people of Porto.
Taken June 22nd 2023 orange route around 16.45.
We have done loads of open top bus tours around the world and they have all been good, except this one 1 out of 10 is being generous let along 1 out of 5

title: Stay away!
text: Stay away! We paid the tickets with debit card and the sales person Julia Castro said that the payment didn‚Äôt work, so we paid cash. Later we found out in our bank statement that we were double charged and the company refuses to acknowledge and to refund us, although I sent proof of both payments.

title: No service at all
text: Having waited for 45mins at the correct tour bus stop, the bus arrived and went straight past us and stopped 400 metres down the road to let passengers off. Although the driver knew we were at the correct stop he did not wait for us!! The bus was not full!!!

title: Better to walk and take public transportation
text: Incorrect information, untrained staff that did the correct information on where to purchase tickets. To make matters worse traffic was hell, the audio narration was completely obvious. If you‚Äôre willing to just money away for what you could get on a city bus, don‚Äôt waste your time or money. I have taken these types of bus tours all over the world, this is by far the worst experience.

title: Worst experience ever
text: If I could have gave them a zero I would have done this. Worst experience ever on this tour. The places to visit are not interesting except for few ones, they have buses every one hour while other companies have it every 10-20 minutes maximum. The drivers are in general impolite and not helpful. They were late even for the one hour wait we had. The earphones on some seats had just one language. This is not a serious company. Trust me do not take it! They convinced us to take the 24 hours tour. But with a bus passing every one hour believe me you need much more than the double to be able to see everything. Finally the comments in the earphones are uninteresting, very concise and not really useful. It‚Äôs not about money you will be loosing but something much more precious when you are visiting a new country! It‚Äôs about loosing time‚Ä¶

title: Not Hop on Hop Off Unless you want to wait an hour + for the next bus
text: Disappointing! They should not call this hop on hop off. The busses run too infrequent to hop off to see a sight unless you are willing to wait a very long time for the next bus. They do not run in the 15-20 minute spaces as put in their literature. There were other HOHO busses that seemed to run much more frequent, wish we had chosen them. Also had to hop seats to find ones where audio worked. The red City Sightseeing Bus appeared to run much more often.

title: Good tour but difficult to be on alert when guide switched from one language to other.
text: We booked this tour through Shore Excursion group for May 16,2023 and Cityrama Gray Line was the local provider. The bus audio system failed and bus departure was delayed for 30 min. The comments were in four languages. English speakers were minority group and comments in English were the last when bus already passed the points of interests. English speakers should look English only tours even if they are more expensive.

title: Orange route / Gray line tours Porto
text: Five of us, all adults, took the Orange route tour from this company. This is the worst bus tour we‚Äôve ever taken. The route turned out to be 50% uninteresting and the audio description was almost non existent. This route goes through the port warehouse district but failed to include any audio history about the area. The actual time in the warehouse area was only about 10% of the time in Gaia. The rest was through uninteresting apartment buildings. I would discourage anyone from taking this tour route. Better to walk across the bridge and walk up into the port warehouse area.

title: Awful, boring tour.
text: Worst tour I have ever taken. The tour guide lacked any enthusiasm at all and I had a tough time understanding her. It was so boring. I ended up not paying attention because she was so low energy. And not enough time was spent in Sinatra. Avoid this company.

title: Awful, never on time and a waste of money
text:
Never on time where it says on the timetable ended up waiting for over an hour for 1 bus.
When on the bus tkmings for the information are always delayed and saying them at the wrong times. Majority of the time it's music you can barely hear. The red and yellow bus went past about 3 times before a blue bus arrived.
Better of using public transportation or users to get where you want to go cheaper and more reliable. I would like a refund?!

title: Terrible experience
text:
Had a terrible experience on this tour bus. There was a group of unacceptably obnoxious students about 40 of them who made the entire experience horrid!
Then our driver came to an abrupt stop where a few passengers, including my family members suffered minor injuries. They were not attentive nor supportive to anyone. Would no recommend going on this tour or using this bus company.

title: N√£o caia nessa Furada!!!
text:
A maior "Furada" !!! Os √¥nibus passam com muitas demoras e n√£o tem hor√°rio certo !!
O audio sem muita informa√ß√£o e fora do tempo. Chegamos a desistir v√°rias vezes pra n√£o perder o dia !!!T√≠nhamos feito em Barcelona e Madrid e tudo foi perfeito!! Em Lisboa n√£o funciona !!!Optamos por App BOLT .

title: Bad experience
text: Bad experience- wasted time. We bought 48 hour tickets in Lisbon and this is the worst experience ever. The map we got from the company doesn't match reality, and we spent a lot of time finding where to get on the cramped buses. On board almost no information to get, and mostly music to hear the whole way. ridiculous

title: Wasted time
text: wasted time! We bought 48 hour tickets in Lisbon and this is the worst experience. the map we got from the company doesn't match reality, and we spent a lot of time finding where to hop On the cramped buses. Almost no information to get from the audio guide, and mostly music to hear the whole way. ridiculous

title: Awful
text: Steer clear of the Red Bus tours. There‚Äôs a reason why the Yellow buses are busier. We used the Belem line today and we were unsure how to get back to where we got on. I asked one of the ticket agents for assistance and boy was that a mistake. She was rude and disrespectful to a paying customer who obviously needed help. She was obviously more interested in chatting with her colleagues than providing assistance as per your recorded message on the bus. Buyers beware if you need help.

title: Nie mehr grey-line
text: Schlechteste hopp-on-hopp-Linie, die wir jemals hatten. Viel zu wenig Busse unterwegs. Wartezeit bis fast 1 h. Die kleinen Busse f√ºr das Castell sind oft voll und bis dann der n√§chste kommt.........

title: Awful. Do not use.
text: Was in Lisbon for two days and having had previous experience of the hop on hop off buses in other countries previously, I thought the 'Grey Line' bus would be an ideal way to see Lisbon, paying for a two day pass. First off, the paper map you are given is rubbish and the stops do not correspond with thise listed on the map. Secondly, the buses are infrequent and utterly out of sync with advertised times: most of the buses didn't turn up. I even downloaded the app hoping that this would give me a better idea when a bus would arrive. On the first day, I waited for the last bus to arrive for over a hour and a half, nearly giving up and getting a taxi. Eventually, the bus arrived but it was overpacked and so late in the day that we were driven straight to the bus terminal (I didnt even complete the red line) and then driven straight to the cruuse terminal. By the end of day, I had spent so much time waiting for the bus I gave up not bothering to use my pass for the second day. Total waste of money and time. Do not bother.

title: Das Geld ist es nicht wert
text:
Leider nicht zu empfehlen. Wir hatten uns ein 48 Stunden Ticket f√ºr 2 Linien mit der Greyline in Lissabon gebucht. Es war nicht m√∂glich herauszufinden wann der n√§chste Bus kommt, so dass wir teilweise mehr als 30 Minuten warten mussten und dann fuhr der Bus auch noch an unserer Station vorbei obwohl wir genau davor standen und dem Busfahrer zuwinkten. Die App gab lediglich Auskunft dar√ºber, wo die Stationen sind. Wenn man oben im offenen Bereich sa√ü, waren die displays f√ºr das Audio so schlecht zu erkennen, um sich die richtige Sprache auszusuchen und nicht √ºberall war deutsch dabei. Geschichtlich hat man nur sehr wenig erfahren. Schade, denn wir haben schon andere Hop on hop off Busse genutzt und gute Erfahrungen gemacht.
Da h√§tten wir uns lieber ein Ticket f√ºr 6‚Ç¨ f√ºr alle Busse, Metros und Bahnen geholt.

title: La pire exp√©rience √† surtout ne pas faire
text:
Voil√† plus de 45 minutes que nous attendons avec plusieurs personnes √† 7n arr√™ts aucun bus en approche aucune information la pire que nous ayons faite en exp√©rience avec city tour

A NE PAS FAIRE

si vous ne voulez pas perdre votre temps et votre argent

title: Terrible company! (Citirama)
text: Lousy bus service. Driver was wreck less. The stops were not where the maps indicated. Couldn't see anything. Traffic there is beyond terrible. Never again.

title: Awful Tour Avoid at all costs
text:
Awful Bus Tour , Doesn't actually stop.
Got on this bus to go out to the Aquarium on the blue route, somehow ended up waiting for 30mins where the cruise ships dock which is on the red and purple route.
Then headed towards the aquarium but the driver didn't stop at any stops, he just kept driving. Worst bus tour we've ever been on.
Can barely hear the headphones which was mostly random music anyway.
Disaster , avoid avoid avoid

title: Disappointing and Often Oversold
text:
I took Gray Line tours in Porto, Portugal and it was quite good, so when I later went to Lisbon I thought would be easy choice to use same tours in Lisbon.

Was wrong. Firstly there seems to be very few worthwhile stops in Lisbon compared to Porto. Plus it is more expensive, as there are more lines.

It gets way oversold, where busses come not often enough and they are full so people end up having to stand.

Lisbon gets hotter than Porto, so it can be very uncomfortable on the busses. Up top with no cover = sunburn on head. Downstairs no air conditioning so also very warm.

Just won't recommend them, would suggest just taking Lisbon's decent public transit to the places you want to see. Its also air conditioned while you get there.

title: Terrible Waste of Money
text:
I thought the Porto tour was poor until i got to Lisbon.
The waiting times were overlong and the commentary was awful bearing no relationship to the sights or stops and little or no effort to impact information.
The tour routes were not as shown and the original ticket purchased was not accepted by the driver requiring us to go to the terminus before we could start
and wasted 2 hours.
Also the green route was not operating at all on the first day we tried thus wasting even more time as no-one had given any information.
I have used my trip advisor account to give this report because i cannot find a way to
complain directly to Gray Line.

title: Not to recommend
text:
Keep your hands off the Gray line busses.
Routes in the flyer incorrect.
Waited 1 1/2 hours for a bus which did not show up.
German couple had the same experience.
Service line not responding.
In the morning they just want to sell tickets then they are gone. Info points closed in the afternoon.
Not recommended at all!!!!

title: Don‚Äôt Waste Your Money
text: I have taken hop-on, hop-off bus tours in many countries. This one was THE WORST! The numbers on the map did not correspond with the numbers on the signs for the stops. The driver made very few stops. I had to change seats 5 times before I found audio with English (No, it was not on channel 6). There was almost no narration, only music. When the driver finally stopped the bus, everyone got off and agreed it was a terrible excuse for a tour bus. It was wasted money (27 euros).

title: La peor elecci√≥n
text: Realmente no gaste dinero y tiempo en este autobus. Hay otras compa√±ias mejores. Los conductores son muy agresivos, no dan ayuda, las paradas est√°n mal anunciadas. La espera es de 1 hora m√≠nimo.... Realmente no vale la pena. No deberian permitir personas mal educadas, y agresivas para trabajar en turismo.

title: Don‚Äôt buy tickets on line
text: Don‚Äôt waste time buying tickets on line. You still have to stand in line at the very small, very slow ticket line. The employees that stand around at the bus stops cannot print your ticket like what happens in other cities.

title: Don't Do It!
text: Terrible experience, the bus was crowded, too hot and the pre recording didn't match the stops. Tried to get off several times during the trip and the bus driver would not stop long enough, nearly fell over when trying to get down the stairs to leave at a stop, when the driver gunned the engine. Also we were told our ticket was 24 hours long, but after going for lunch and coming back later that afternoon when the weather was cooler to get back on, there were no busses in operation and they were all gone. Staff was rude, agressive unfriendly and unorganized. Take our advice, negotiate and rent a tuk tuk instead, it will change your entire experience.

title: Evite
text:
Fui recebida com a m√° disposi√ß√£o e completo desinteresse pelo motorista da empresa Gray Line.
Grosseiro e imprest√°vel.

title: Das Geld nicht wert.
text:
Teilweise zu √ºberf√ºllte Busse. App empfehlenswert f√ºr die buszeiten funktioniert aber nicht immer. Ohne App ist einiges an Wartezeit vorprogrammiert.
Die Informationen sind d√ºrftig. Ich glaub ich hab mehr Musik geh√∂rt als Infos. Wenn man ein alten Bus erwischt ist dir qualit√§t der audioausgabe mangelhaft.
Ich fand Oriente Tour besser als die belem Tour. Belem f√ºr ich empfehlen zu Fu√ü zu erkunden.

title: Worst hop on hop off bus experience
text: We took the red line tour which cost 22‚Ç¨ per person, what a complete waste of time and money. Had to stand in a queue for at least half an hour at each stop to board the bus as they seemed to be very infrequent. We had to stand on most occasions as the bus was so full which meant we couldn‚Äôt really see anything, they had ran out of headphones which would have been no use anyway as there was no where to plug them in while standing. We complained to one of the gray line employees but they weren‚Äôt interested once they had your money. We gave up half way round and ended up walking over an hour back to the centre. We have done a hop on hop off bus in many cities we have visited and this by far the worst I have ever been on. Saw nothing heard nothing and very hot and uncomfortable having to stand, not a relaxing experience in the slightest. Take my advice and take a Tuk Tuk a much more personal relaxing experience. Lisbon is such a lovely city but this tour is certainly not worth your time or effort, I would have given it no stars if I could.

title: Pior city
text: Pior city tour P√©ssima experi√™ncia, n√£o recomendo nunca. O pior hop on hop off que j√° fiz. Comprei o pacote completo, para as 3 linhas em 2 dias. No primeiro dia, a linha verde fez um caminho diferente para o castelo. Voltando ao ponto de partida, perguntei se os outras linhas estavam com o percurso correto e garantiram que sim. Embarquei para descer na pra√ßa do Com√©rcio e n√£o parou l√°, foi direto p o parque das na√ß√µes. Fui questionar o motorista e ele, MUITO GROSSO disse que a culpa era do tr√¢nsito que estava congestionado. No segundo dia, que faria a linha vermelha foi bem pior, fiquei por mais de uma hora no ponto, passaram √¥nibus de outras empresas e nada da gray line. Depois de tanto esperar, fui para a Torre de Belem de metr√¥ e √¥nibus. Se souber que era t√£o ruim esse city nunca teria gasto meus 60 euros, pois comprei para 2 pessoas. HORR√çVEL

title: Don't waste your valuable tourist time and money
text: This bus tour was a complete waste of time and money. Bought a 2 line trip from hotel. Then had to line up in a long queue to exchange receipt for ticket at their office box. One line not operating so after some discussion got changed to another line. Had to line up in the heat for at least 20mins waiting for a bus - need shelter from sun and rain. The commentary didn't match the upcoming stops and very limited in information. The music was depressing. The bus was hot. We didn't use the second line as this operator is boring. We will go back to the original Hop On Hop Off bus - never disappoints.

title: Terrible service
text: Horrible. Drivers don‚Äôt announce stops or even stop at them some of the times. Busses claim to pick you up every 30-40 minutes but frequently late. Audo on bus with headphones work less than half the time, and so much static you cannot understand the narrative. Don‚Äôt waste your money. Uber is your best option.

title: NO RECOMENDABLE
text: Al comprar el ticket esta ma√±ana no te dicen que no se corresponde con las rutas del triplic√≥ y solo subir te dicen que las rutas est√°n cambiadas por causas ajenas. Cuando bajas como quieras encontrar de nuevo una parada misi√≥n imposible porque no se corresponden los papeles con la realidad.

title: Not worth it
text: I honestly don't think the bus ride is worth it. If I had to do it again I'd take regular transportation or a tuck tuck to the sites of Belem, the monastery or the park. It's an overpriced regular bus service. Take the tram.

title: M√° experi√™ncia!
text:
1.) Na minha opini√£o, os locais para apanhar autocarros n√£o foram claramente indicados.
2.) Os tamp√µes n√£o funcionariam em v√°rios lugares, parecia que algo estava preso em pontos de venda.
3.) A Wi-Fi n√£o trabalhava no autocarro como anunciado, em todos!
Recomendo esta linha de turn√™ sobre o livro outra vez com esta empresa? N√£o!

title: Do not take it if you wish to use audioguide!
text: Do not count on audioguide included. Buses are so old that audio system is not working. You will only hear some creaking sounds. As opposite to other cities, no phone download option exists.

title: Un aut√©ntico desastre. Una timada.
text: No hay espacio para todo lo que hay que mejorar: la gu√≠a no nos inform√≥ de casi nada, fue casi todo el viaje callada; nos cobraron los 14 euros de la visita al Palacio da Pena y no lo pudimos ver ni de lejos. No nos informaron de los motivos por los que no pudimos efectuar la visita al exterior del Palacio da Pena (el interior ya sab√≠amos que no √≠bamos a poder verlo, por causas "ajenas a la compa√±√≠a", seg√∫n reza su p√°gina web. Tanto en Estoril, como en Cascais, como en Sintra, la gu√≠a no nos acompa√±√≥ casi nada. Simplemente nos dec√≠a la hora de vuelta y desaparec√≠a. De todos modos, reclamaremos el importe correspondiente a la entrada al Palacio da Pena, que nos la cobraron.

title: Servicio terriblemente abandonado
text: El 80% de los auriculares/ salidas de audio, no funcionan. No se respetan los horarios y es muy com√∫n que haya paradas donde te dejen esperando arriba del bus m√°s de 30 minutos. El personal de la empresa parece estar en un conflicto sindical, pues no dan absolutamente ninguna explicaci√≥n tras las demoras constantes. Muy muy mala experiencia.

title: Perhaps worth a one day activity.
text:
We opted for a one day hop on hop off Porto ( HOHO) red bus tour. It is good for either the red or blue routes. It was poor. The red bus HOHO was very confusing. They used both red and blue buses had multiple color named options for different routes. What made it confusing is that the red painted buses could be for the orange or blue routes , instead of red . You had to be sure to read the placard In The widow to know which route it. In other words a red bus Did not mean it was a red route. We errantly got on a red bus assuming it was a red route,but it was not ( it had a blue route placard I the window). I think there is a psychological term for this brain mismatch process that we fell victim to. The stops were not announced, had to focus on that which should not have been necessary.
If you do opt for a HOHO tour, I would suggest considering the yellow bus company, based only on the poor performance of the red bus HOHO. Also,only consider it to get a one day feel/overview of the city. It is not a good transportation option. Use Uber/taxi/bus,metro instead. If buying tickets plan to do so at the bus location/ stop; not a vendor as vendors can be problematic with ; cash only, up selling, misinformation, language, etc.

title: Disappointing red bus hop on hop off.
text: Poor experience. We went on the Lisbon red bus hop on hop off. Traffic jams resulted in idle time. If you go, consider going later at nonpeak traffic times- but that is not a good use of time. The scripted narrative was not timed to match locations. Had a 30 minute wait at stop 1 when route was completed before the route continued. If you purchase tickets I recommend doing it at/on the bus. Other vendors can be problematic ( cash only, difficult in understanding options, etc. ). Only use hop-on hop off as a once thru overview of the city. It is not worthwhile to consider it as a second day transportation option, use metro/tram/bus/taxi/Uber instead. There are other hop on hop off type sightseeing busses which offer the same service, perhaps try a different one.

title: Tjonge, wat slecht
text:
Altijd leuk om een hop-on hop-off bus te nemen, voor een eerste indruk van een stad. Helaas niet bij Gray Line. Dat de oortjes maar half werkten is iets wat in dit soort bussen meer regel dan uitzondering is, dus dat is nog tot daar aan toe. Maar dat er vooral gedacht wordt aan het verkopen van tickets, zonder dat je er iets fatsoenlijks voor terugkrijgt, is toch echt d√©ze vervoerder aan te rekenen. Hop-on hop-off op de Cascais-route? ,,Helaas, de bus is net weg, en er rijdt er maar √©√©n per dag heen en terug." Dat noem ik geen hop-on hop-off, dat noem ik een excursie. Op een ander moment, bij √©√©n van de andere routes (ze hebben er vijf in totaal) zeker drie kwartier staan te wachten tot er eentje voorbijkwam. Helaas is er geen dienstregeling te vinden, ook niet iets simpels als wanneer de eerste en laatste bus van een lijn vertrekt. W√©l is er een app die aangeeft waar de bus zich realtime bevindt (enige positieve dat ik kan noemen), maar het duurt soms een eeuwigheid voor die bus dichterbij komt. Dat komt misschien door verkeersdrukte, zei u? Nou, niet altijd. Hoe gaat het er dan aan toe op zo'n bus? We zaten in een Gray Line-bus die stopte om tickets te verkopen op een busbaan op een plek waar dat niet kon / mocht. Gevolg: een rij wachtende bussen achter ons, maar vooral wachten, wachten en nog eens wachten. Het duurde en duurde maar. Maar ook als er w√©l een halte is, duurt het soms √©rg lang bij de ticketverkoop op de bus. Kortom, meef stilstaan dan rijden.
Nee, Gray Line hop-on hop-off raad ik niemand aan. Zelfs zonder uitzicht (in een metrotunnel) kun je meer genieten dan van deze hop-on hop-off-ervaring. Vreselijk slecht, ergerlijk, gewoon niks. Wil je ergens komen en niet te veel tijd en geld verspillen, pak dan gewoon de metro, de tram of een reguliere buslijn.

title: Very disappointed
text: We paid a lot of money for the Gray Line Hop on Hop off bus tour in Lisbon and were very disappointed. To begin with they didn‚Äôt complete a good third of the route which we were looking forward to. But the most disappointing part was the great lack of commentary. We spent most of the time listening to music rather than being informed about Lisbon. While there is time driving from point to point, the commentary could have easily continued to give us a broader knowledge of Lisbon and/or Portugal. Instead we had long stretches of just listening to music. This was not worth the 44 euros we spent.

title: Bad
text:
Very slow. Taking more than 5 minutes in some stops with no reason.
The system audio in the bus doesn‚Äôt work well. When it does: just a vey little explanation.

title: Very bad customer service
text: Stops are not where its shown on the map, where taking a block away. My partner and I realised this and ran to get the bus, the bus stopped and when we were literally 2 meters from the bus they took off, despite de driver seeing us. The bus was NOT full. Buses are every 30 mins or more, much more. Poor customer service at the vending place and at the bus stop, definitely feels like the staff really do not want to be there! Eyes rolling at EVERY QUESTION!!!!! Very appaled and for anyone wondering why we got tickets if the service was this bad, we had unfortunately pre bought them at our hotel (Marriot Lisbon), this is the tour they sell, if staying there, defo do not buy from them.

title: Greyline, absoluut geen aanrader in Lissabon
text:
We hadden een ticket voor 3 dagen, oortjes werkten maar voor 50% van de tijd, arrogante mensen aan het onthaal, lieten ons staan aan een halte in Cascais, hun reden:'carnavalstoet en andere route genomen', geloven hun eigen leugens want de chauffeur kwam die avond voorbij in de andere richting en zag ons staan, gevolg trein en metro nemen, schadevergoeding niks.
