The stop was not marked at all and after an hour there was still no bus. Back to the cruise center, red bus was right in front of us, after 45 minutes there was still no red bus. The next day there was no chance of getting the bus. We wrote to them and were fobbed off with blabla, NEVER AGAIN!!!

title: Do not use this company
text:
Beware of scam! The bus looks like the ‚ÄúLisbon Sightseeing‚Äù company that the tourist office told us about. We positioned ourselves on a stop (which for the most part are the same as the competing company) we were fooled by a tout who sold us ‚ÄúCitySightseeing Lisboa‚Äù as identical and 2‚Ç¨ cheaper
We understood over the 2 days that they are not quite the same stops and that in terms of timetable nothing is respected.
On several occasions we saw 2 competing buses pass on the blue line and still not ours!! i.e. 45min late
Headphone jacks for audio guides on most buses work poorly or not at all
I strongly advise against this company, maybe the others don't respect schedules well, but at least it wasn't within those deadlines.

title: Avoid the Red Buses
text: Experienced travellers, we usually take a hop on hop off tour early after our arrival to get our bearings and get around the city. We‚Äôve even enjoyed a tour at home, in Toronto, to experience being a tourist in the city. However, our experience yesterday in Lisbon with Worldwide City Sightseeing red buses (not to be confused with the Yellow Bus Tours or the Gray Line‚Äôs red buses) was terrible. Pre-booking online was the best part of the experience, as we already had our QR code on my cell phone while we awaited the bus. However, we had to wait the better part of an hour for a bus; by contrast three yellow buses and two Gray Line buses arrived in the interim. We wished we had not prebooked. Our bus when it arrived was of course packed and the driver grumpy. She had trouble with her scanner and manually input our QR code. Other passengers were annoyed with us at the delay; if looks could kill. The commentary via the headset was poor. It primarily played music with very, very little info about what we were seeing. It did not even announce stops, so we had trouble knowing where we were on the tour or where we could get off. It really was a waste of time and money. We tried to be good travellers and make the most of it, but eventually we just gave up and hopped off when others on the bus did at a major stop. We walked from there. Don‚Äôt waste your time or money with Worldwide City Sightseeing‚Äôs red buses.

title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
text: Waste of time and money. Red route - meant to start at 9.30. Driver 20 minutes late and no company rep to field the questions and concerns. Blue route afterwards - commentary failed after 10 minutes so it was nothing more than a bus ride. Would have been better to spend Euro1.60 on a metropolitan bus -we would have got as much out of it. Spoke with the rep when we got back who tested one socket and said it works fine (with a shrug of the shoulders). E mailed the company head office and got a similar, but written, sorry but not sorry in response. Do not waste time or money with this company - you have been warned. Go with Lisbon Sightseeing or the Yellow Bus (or indeed the numerous Tuk Tuk tours) instead.

title: Red line is fine, avoid the blue. Needs updating.
text:
I wish I had seen these reviews before booking!

I got a pair of tickets for the red & blue line.
Overall the red line was alright. The audio in both lines are dreadful, maybe 1-2 sentences every 10-15 minutes. We passed so many beautiful locations with little to no commentary. There also (at times) wasn‚Äôt enough time to get off the bus - there was one stop we tried to get off but the bus took off again before we could get out! Some of the stops are in very random locations, and the signs are not easy to identify. No timetable to be found on signage or online, which is a shame as other city tours with the same company do provide this. Buses themselves are old and could do with some attention.

The red line mostly ran to time, but the blue line is painful. We ended up getting an Uber after a stop in the evening, as we were running out of time to get to the next attraction! Even if on time, 1 hour intervals are crazy! We also did make note that the City Sightseeing bus is the last to arrive at stop 1 Marques de Pombal at 9:30am.

Overall, red line is fine, I would absolutely avoid the blue line. But maybe use another company instead.

title: Absolute waste of money. Be warned
text:
PLEASE SAVE YOUR MONEY! This was a totally dreadful experience which was the only blot on an otherwise amazing visit to Lisbon. If only I had read these reviews first! Unfortunately for us we picked up the company leaflet in our hotel and trusted that it would be a worthwhile experience. It so wasn‚Äôt. Please believe all reviews that say the wait for each bus was painful. We waited over 45 minutes at the tours biggest attraction and were not surprised to see the driver we had on our first journey. I wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if they only have one bus!!
We got stung ‚Ç¨30 because we were sold two routes which we thought we would do over two days. The next morning we again waited for the ‚ÄòGreen route‚Äô bus‚Ä¶ I genuinely believe I‚Äôd still be waiting.
The other Lisbon bus company with the yellow buses maybe better as we saw more of their buses.
I shall be writing to the company to ask for a refund!!

title: Yellow bus. Sightseeing Portugal red line.
text: Bus did not stop in front of the stop. Make sure you are ready for the exit on time. The driver let us drive an extra stop.

title: JUST DONT DO IT!
text: Please read the other reviews, it's not a coincidence that there are so many complaints! I wish we had done our homework. We had to wait for over an hour and were later told that there were no delays at that moment. To make things worse we were denied entry with a baby, this after we had already purchased our tickets. When we complained we were laughed at in the face.

title: Don't bother
text: Ridiculously infrequent (we waited 70 minutes) to the point that you didn't want to get off the bus because you weren't sure when the next bus would come. The audio announcements were extremely limited, and offered no pre notification of the upcoming stops, or any attractions best served by that stop. The printed maps they give you are such poor quality, that some stops are impossible to locate.

title: DONT DO IT
text: If you want to waste a whole day get on this bus. Worst experience ever. Uber is way faster and more reliable. Do not fall for this scam. DONT DO IT

title: Never again
text:
If I could leave a rating if zero, I'd leave a rating of zero.
We were rained on severely with no accommodation whatsoever from the bus staff to keep us dry and comfortable, some staff members were very rude, nine of the drivers have microphones so if you're not sitting directly behind the driver you could rarely hear what stop you're at or when you should get off, and the schedule is a joke that's just not funny. We spent a much bigger part of our one day in Sintra waiting for these stupid busses and we got so wet from all the rain (both while waiting for the bus that was always running late and on some of the busses which only had the first couple of rows shielded from the elements) that it became a thoroughly miserable experience.

title: Take the other line
text: Go with the yellow bus or Grayline. This one takes forever to arrive. By the time it came the other companies had 2 busses already gone.

title: DISCARD THIS OPTION!
text: DISCARD THIS OPTION! 22 euros thrown in the trash! We only managed to catch the bus at the train station at the beginning and the one from the Palacio da Pena back, after an hour of waiting. We had to desperately pay for a tuk tuk to get there because we couldn't find the stop, which is not at all clear and where it is, it is not clear what the schedule is. The map directs you to a page of times that do not work. The public bus 434 meanwhile, passing constantly. The audio guides do not match what you see, or most of them do not work. Totally wasted money and time!!!!

title: The tour is not worth the money
text: The tour is not worth the money! We waited for the bus for an hour at the Park of Nations in Lisbon. During this time, we drove 2 other buses from other companies. There is no schedule anywhere, just stand and wait. The audio guide is terrible. Portuguese music plays on headphones 90% of the time on the route. In the remaining 5%, when the voice says something, it is an absolutely unrelated and not interesting story in 2 sentences. As a result, we drove and read everything on Wikipedia. The impressions were bad. It costs a maximum of 5 euros for the red and blue route.

title: Waste of time
text:
Bus taken from the port which supposedly stops regularly but ultimately almost never stops... The comments in the headphones are minimal and we have fado on repeat.
To get back on the bus you have to be able to find the stop (very poorly marked).
We spent more than two hours on the bus so as not to see much, in short, to escape!

title: HORRIBLE
text: Scam no commentary on bus sit on bus for extended time not moving. Random streets. BUYER BEWARE!!!!!!!! Other companies to choose from when stopped by someone selling tickets ask which company

title: A TOTAL SCAM. AVOID.
text:
Buyer beware!

I bought four single line (green) tickets for 20‚Ç¨ each for me and my family members and we got on the bus.

NONE of the 16 Channels available worked, you only heard static or faint but somehow overblown music. The four of us tried multiple seats, we could find no plug that deliverd intelligble audio.

The driving was horrible, the bus just speeds through town, robbing us of the time needed to look around and at least enjoy the view.

We hopped off the bus on the next stop and were so aggrivated by the experience that we never boarded another bus again.

As if that wasn't bad enough, i contacted the company immediatly with a request for a refund, 80‚Ç¨ for the above mentioned torture is nothing to sneeze at.

As of now it's been over a week and over 5 emails and they are not willing to offer me a full refund. in none of the emails was there an excuse or even an apology. This seems to be the modus operandi of this company.

in short, this is a tourist scam, must avoid!

title: Blue route is Random!!
text: Blue route is a joke, we sat on the bus for nearly two hours and everyone was bored! The green route was good but could have done with a personal commentary. We asked three times what was the last bus from the castle and was told 5.30 p.m. so we duly arrived at 5.10 and when the bus came we couldn't board it as there was no room so had to get a taxi back to the hotel! When we approached the lady who sold us the tickets she told us it wasn't even high season and there was nothing she could do , so no offer of a partial refund. We watched the Gray line buses come and go and all round seemed a better company but as we didn't use them couldn't say for definite.

title: Buyers beware‚Ä¶
text:
Bad Experience. We did the ‚ÄúIconic‚Äù (Green Line). For starters, the audio doesn‚Äôt work. In none of the 2 buses we were able to hop the audio worked in multiple seats we tried. And they know because when we mentioned it to the driver he told us he knew. Too bad, your problem Mr. Tourist.
Second: your online voucher is ONLY good to hop in your FIRST leg. Do not lose it! The first driver will not explain this and then the subsequent drivers will not let you get in. I didn‚Äôt cave and went to the back of the bus. When I call customer service, they told me : you need to buy another trip!!
Third: Some people in the bus wanted to report our driver. She drove like crazy in the narrow streets of Lisbon sometimes getting too close to kids and pedestrians in general.

Dear Management: we are tourist trying to enjoy the few day and dollars we have. Do not scam us!..you need us. Just be smart.

title: Terrible experience, no support.
text: I was not able to find the stops. Their website functions so poorly, the map was hard to use. I had ubers take me to two stops. Eventually, I gave up. I emailed their customer service asking for a refund. They sent me back several questions (which stops did you try, what time etc. etc.) through SEVERAL rounds of emails, only to let me know they would not refund me. Terrible service. I never even saw a bus go by the whole weekend i was there.

title: Choose a different company!
text:
Chose City Sightseeing as used them a few times before with excellent experiences... although NOT in Lisbon, and never would again.

Smooth service at the port - 4 tickets bought, with ease, smooth transaction, good start. 3/4 seats in our rows didn't work (sound).. and lots of others saying the same. Earphones are awful - hard, uncomfortable and tinny.

Was assured we could stay on the bus for a round trip from/to cruise terminal. 1st lie. We're on 'red route' and needed to swap to 'blue route' to get back to terminal. So hopped off for lunch at the same stop we'd pick up the blue.

Went to blue stop at 3pm - was told it wouldn't be there until 4pm now (was a 30m trip to port, and needed to be on board by 5.30pm max).4pm came and went, no bus. 4.10pm, 4.20pm.. was told it's delayed due to traffic and should be there by 4.30pm. That would have been a 90 min wait (was told at the port they're every 40 mins). At 4.25pm with no bus in sight, I flagged a cab.. and was on the boat within 30 mins.

Lots of people were waiting by this stage.. perhaps 50-70. If the bus was full, then what?! I wasn't going to risk it. All the while, there was a bus there "out of service" with the driver taking a nap in the back. And the reo just shrugged her shoulders, smiled and said it'd be all OK... very stressful, and frustrating.

Choose a different company - saw SO MANY buses from Sightseeing Lisbon, Greyline and Tuk Tuks, constantly pucking up and dropping off.. v rare to see a City Sightseeing one... not worth the stress.

‚Ç¨95 ish spent to not even do a full route. No working speakers. Severe lack of buses and resources. Awful experience.

title: City sight seeing you are very posturing
text: Bad experience, money wasted. We went to the sad palace and waited 1 hour and 30 minutes for a bus that never arrived. Since we opted to take a taxi. That 1 hour 30 minutes it was raining, very windy and very cold. They only want the money. Lea, people don't care! I am not going to allow anyone around me to take one of these buses, at least in Sintra.

title: ‚ÄúHop Off‚Äù This One!
text:
TLDR: ‚ÄúHop off‚Äù City Sightseeing Lisbon before you ‚Äúhop on‚Äù!

City Sightseeing Lisbon (CSL) runs too many routes with too few resources, resulting in long wait times once one ‚Äúhops off‚Äù someplace. We noted that THREE competing Yellow Buses arrived at our stop in Belem, for ex., on the CSL Red Route, for each CSL bus that showed up.

Once aboard, we discovered that a surprising number of speaker jacks were either disabled or so worn as to be intermittent. Three sets of cheaply-made CSL headphones also failed on us. The sound was only monaural, anyway, so there was no need to put jacks in each ear! The (recorded) English narration was quite sparse, and no more than three sentences were provided about any given point of interest. The intervals between narrations were filled with long, long stretches of repetitive, sleepy-sad Portuguese guitar music and singing.

CSL route selection shows a distinct lack of strategic planning. The
nonsensical Blue Route, for instance, highlights for tourists the disheveled port area, including many crumbling, graffiti-scarred warehouses, car repair shops, shipping insurers, alleys, and 100 blocks of lookalike residential high rises. In our judgment this Route could be eliminated or at least vastly tightened up, with the bus transit-time saved devoted to running this or other routes more often (to reduce the waits).

CSL tries to do too much with too little, but this ambition doesn‚Äôt add value for the rider. We note that hop-on/off tour bus lines even in Paris have only about 15 stops, but each stop is richly covered by an engaging, enthusiastic narration in dialogue between multiple characters, with plenty of general city facts and ‚ÄúDid You Know‚Äù-type quizzes filling the gaps between stops. They also call out each stop and bid the departing passengers adieu. CSL‚Äôs current narration is clunky and strictly amateur by comparison. To provide value for money, CSL should hire a scriptwriter and audio production team, and should re-baseline all its routes with a view toward simplification.

Finally, CSL‚Äôs claim to be environment-friendly is belied by the fact that our diesel-powered bus idled for *40 minutes*, in nice weather, before we finally departed on the Blue Route. It‚Äôs possible that no CSL bus is ever shut off during the working day ‚Äî not only making for an air quality disaster, but dissipating the company‚Äôs own profits.

title: Terrible. Don‚Äôt bother.
text:
The worst hop on, hop off bus tour that we have experienced - and we went for City Sightseeing as we‚Äôve used them before.
The buses are infrequent (green line is every 2 hours, for example). Purple and red lines are almost identical routes but in reverse.
The commentary was terrible: it either repeated itself, stopped mid-sentence or was out of synch. There was very little information given when it did work, with long periods of silence. An absolute joke.
The driver of the green route bus spent most of the journey on his phone driving one-handed.
The Gray Line hop on / hop off tours seemed far more frequent and better organised. We should‚Äôve done more research before we chose City Sightseeing. Lesson learned because we completely wasted our money this time.

title: Avoid, tourist rip-off
text:
Writing this whilst experiencing the 'blue route', 50 mins into the trip. Little to no information of surroundings. This is so boring, what a waste of a morning.

Did the 'red route' yesterday - same, we couldn't find a seat that the ear phones would work in and so no information. Based on today's experience, we didn't miss much.

Will be requesting a refund when we eventually find somewhere suitable to get off.....shame we can request a refund for the 2 half days wasted on what is no more than a boring, uncomfortable bus ride!

title: No spots on the bus.....terrible customer service!!!!
text:
TERRIBLE!!!! We waited 40 minutes for the bus (totally normal and to be expected). We had a pass for the green line...the purple and red line buses showed up basically empty. When our Green Line bus showed up, it was a tiny van and it was completely full. We were told it would be a 2-hour wait for the next Green Line bus with no guarantee that we would have a spot on the bus. We asked to be put on one of the other buses but were told we would have to purchase tickets for those buses.

We decided to pass on the bus and just walk around the city. When we returned home, I explained the situation to the company and requested a refund, but they refused. When I asked to speak to a supervisor, they stopped emailing me. I have since sent 2 other requests to the company, none of which have even been replied to.

TERRIBLE!!!!!! TERRIBLE!!!!! TERRIBLE!!!!!!

title: The worst CSS I have used in Europe
text:
Endless stops without time coordination between them. You wait 15-20 minutes in each one so the journey becomes endless.
The audio guide is more like background music because the explanations are very brief and fill in the rest with minutes and minutes of music.
I've been waiting in Pombal for 20 minutes for the bus to start. And yesterday it was the same tone.
Avoid this company in Lisbon even though it works very well in Athens, Paris and other destinations I have visited.

title: Terrible, and I was generous
text:
Terrible!
Things that are wrong:
- Absurd hours
-buses that stop in out of the way places
- audio that didn't work in 3 of the 6 seats tested and in the others it crackled or had an unbearable volume
-it's raining inside the lower deck of the bus
-driver incapable of starting in a timely manner at traffic lights and driving in a minimally smooth manner: better that he change jobs
-high cost
Tip: use public transport!

title: Better walk or take the metro/ Tram/ train
text: This company has only old busses and goes in low frequency which means long waiting. Headphones are cheap make and often don't work, or the plug 8ns on the seats are broken. And if you re lucky and both works, we got to listen to music. Explanation and guidance is very scarce. I recommend to choose another way of getting around. For that 30 EUR its a ripp- off. Can imagine the countless private TukTtuks are a better choice.

title: Punctuality not being maintained and the trip is different for going and coming
text: The yellow bus was not on time and the worst thing was that the return trip, we had to sit from the same spot we got down. We wasted lot of time on our return and today because of the traffic we had to be in the bus for more than 2 1/2 hrs instead of 1 1/2 hr

title: DO NOT GO ON ANY OF THESE LISBON SIGHTSEEING BUSES
text:
Awful. DO NOT go on the Lisbon City Sightseeing tour unless you want to spend three and a half hours being stuck on a bus in slow moving trafficon city ring roads whilst seeing no actual sights. A complete rip for ‚Ç¨27.

- We were told by the vendor selling the tickets outside the bus that the duration was two hours - we were on for over three and a half hours
- We weren't given earphones when boarding the bus
- The "sightseeing" tour had very little sights to see, and spent all of the journey stuck in traffic on main roads for three hours

- When we became concerned we would not make it back to our cruise ship in time for departure, the driver said we would be back at cruise port in 25 mins, but it actually took more than an hour to get there

- The driver was taking a telephone call for the whole journey, and was rude to ourselves and several other passengers who were also worried about getting back to their cruise ship

- After we got back to the cruise terminal, there were no remaining City Sightseeing staff left to complain to and request a refund from.

title: Avoid city SIGHTSEEING in Lisbon
text:
Worst experience ever.
Few trips and few vehicles always full, not adequate for the tickets sold and in terrible condition.
All the other competing companies have new vehicles, staff everywhere and continuous runs worthy of the hop on hop off concept.
Expensive prices for a non-existent service.
ABSOLUTELY AVOID

title: Disappointed
text: Indulgently unacceptable, we are in Lisbon waiting an inordinate amount of time to catch the blue line bus without any information about the multiple delays. The staff kindly try to transfer us another color line but that is not our wish. I draw attention to those who wish to avail themselves of this service. Here, where we wait, the buses of another competing company perfectly serve their audience. Unfortunately it was a tragic experience for us and all this under heavy rain. Be careful with your choices. I refer to the date Saturday, October 28, 2023.

title: Don‚Äôt bother with this!
text: A waste of money! Very bad signage. Couldn‚Äôt see where we had to stand. Long waits. We are in our 70‚Äôs and are well travelled. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this way of getting around Sintra at all. There are many much better alternatives. The only positive thing that we can say, is that the drivers were very good.

title: Avoid. Use someone else.
text:
Utter crap.

No buses available at the cruise terminal unless you wanted to wait 1hr+ for the blue route (and apparently the blue route is good if you like to see an industrial estate covered in graffiti). We were instructed to walk to "Red-route" as this would be more frequent and easier to get on. This is a 20 minute walk away. They were wrong. We walked to Cais do Sodre and waited nearly 1 hour for a bus. Went to Belem and waited nearly 1 hour again for a bus. Meanwhile, "Lisbon Sightseeing" and "Yellow Buses" turned up like clockwork every 10-15 minutes. Audio guide also completely non-functional. We tried multiple sockets on multiple buses and got nothing but silence. So either broken on not switched on.

Its just a really poor service. Don't bother with it. Especially if you are coming off a Cruise, these guys are front and centre in the port building as you get off. Just walk on by and see one of the other companies. We know it will be busy on port days with multiple ships in, but you know... put more buses on or don't over-sell what you have. Its not difficult.

And of course, by the time we'd made it back to the terminal, these guys have scarpered (and it was still within what I would call "normal working hours" on a weekday). I suspect they know full well they'd get a load of angry customers facing them and that is why they don't hang around.

Currently trying to get a refund off them but whilst they are replying promptly, of course they're fobbing me off with "bus frequency is posted at the kiosk" and "we check all the audio systems daily".

Well... for the avoidance of doubt their own website says Lisbon buses will run up to every 30 minutes (not our experience) and if you just look at any one of many reviews on here and other sites, you'll see lack of audio commentary is a regular complaint. So they're either lying or the people in the office simply do not know what is going on on the ground and think everything is hunky dory. It isn't. It needs to be a lot better than this for the money.

title: Don‚Äôt waste your money
text: There was less than 1 minute of commentary on a 1 hour & 45 minute tour. Many of the earphone jacks didn‚Äôt work. We went by numerous key sites with zero commentary. Truly embarrassing for a city tour.

title: A pure scam.
text: We were aiming for the blue line. No timetable displayed and the attendant gave us the wrong time. We miss the bus. We continue on foot and take a visit. At the exit, we wait for the bus for 1h30. In vain. Still no info, no timetable. We finally take a taxi. From the so-called hop on hop off for 54 euros. If you have the chance to get on a bus, don't get off. The chances of getting back there are almost zero... In short, run away...

title: BUS DEPARTURE FROM THE PORT
text:
We took the bus from the port towards the city center passing by the B√©lem tower. Journey time 1h30
Then for the return Blue Line We waited 1 hour without seeing a bus
We went to the terminus on foot and challenged the announced times
We were around twenty people, the company arranged a bus to return directly to the port
We did not see the blue circuit duration from the terminal 40 mins
Lisbon assessment we only saw the bus in 4 hours on site
Strongly not recommended
September 2023

title: More than entertaining it ends up being torture
text: The tourist bus is a scam, a line saturated with people who don't get off for fear of not being able to get on the next one. The bus was packed at the stops and couldn't pick up anyone else. The tour starts out entertaining and ends up being torture with so many turns and uninteresting places, a waste of money but above all of time, especially for those of us who are going on a cruise.

title: Timo
text: It's a real scam. Very expensive for what the tour offers. There is no coordination of schedules between one line and another. The condition of the bus is terrible, it was raining and there were leaks everywhere, all the seats inside were wet. The headphone jacks do not work for the most part, and those that do work have little explanation and bad sound. The only thing that is spared is the driver.

title: WORTHLESS
text: The bus takes the route it promises but it is absurd to pay ‚Ç¨22 per person since you cannot see any monuments from the bus. The audio guide did not work in Spanish and the driver was not responsible for the incident, he was not friendly at all. Sintra is beautiful but the important monuments are pure business for them, you cannot see them even from the outside without paying. The bus is not worth it at all, you only get dizzy and waste time.

title: Biggest scam of my life
text:
We bought Red, purple and blue route.
In the morning, we did Roja, a lot of music and little explanation. In the afternoon, the blue, total waste of time, route through suburbs without any tourist interest and with the audio in total silence 90% of the time. Tremendous lack of respect for the time spent by tourists.

title: Very bad
text: Got the ticket for 2 days for 3 lines. On the way to Belem everything was ok. The problem was the return. The stops are not clearly marked on the maps. Buses run once an hour. The biggest problem is finding the stops and it takes about half an hour of walking. Lisbon is best visited by public transport or, if you are a walker, on foot.

title: I feel ripped off as a tourist
text: üö´ Don't fall into the trap, they tell you that you have 24 hours to enjoy the tours but the traffic is chaos, schedules are not met... terrible management and a shame for money, it is necessary to make an immediate change and a lesson

title: AVOID CITYSIGHTSEEING PORTUGAL!!!
text: There are 2 companies that do tours with Rossi buses. Absolutely avoid the one that says CITY SIGHTSEEING PORTUGAL!!! Old buses from 1970, noisy, the audio doesn't work, and when it does they make you hear the fado. The timetables are obscene: the buses run every hour or every hour and a half!!! Take the other partner!!! I forgot: the prices! Out of place for the service that does not exist.

title: Unfriendly and terrible service!
text:
Terrible service, we were running 1 min late because my 80 year old mom got stuck at the
light walking across and they wouldn't wait for us on a line that runs every hour!

Our 1st line of the day ran 10 mins late, when they were waiting for more people to buy tickets.

title: Une honte
text:
Bonjour √† tous les voyageurs
Nous avons √©t√© tr√®s m√©content du service.
En deux jours, nous avons pu faire qu‚Äôune partie des lignes car le nombre de bus propos√©s toutes les heures, nous oblige √† attendre au moins 45 minutes √† chaque fois.
Ces attentes nous ont oblig√© √† prendre un taxi pour rentrer!!!!
√âtat des bus pitoyable : si√®ges cass√©s , √©couteurs qui ne fonctionne pas‚Ä¶
Les concurrents proposent des bus toutes les 30 minutes pour le m√™me prix.
Superbe ville!
Bon voyage √† tous.

title: Auf keinen Fall wieder!!!
text:
Diese Gesellschaft ist eine absolute Abzocke, kaum Busse, falsche Haltestellen, keine M√∂glichkeiten die angegebene Routen, die auch noch falsch ausgeschildert sind, zu nutzen. Haben den halben Tag damit verbracht auf den Bus zu warten.
In Lissabon besser den Yellow Bus oder die Grey Line nutzen, die fuhren √ºberall rum.

title: P√©rdida de tiempo!
text:
Horroroso!!! No lo coj√°is
Horas esperando. No hay frecuencias. Muy Caro y sin servicio. Te hace perder todo el d√≠a!!!!!

title: Blo√ü nicht
text: Pro Linie gibt es nur einen Bus, somit viel zu lange Wartezeiten, wenn man mal aussteigt um etwas anzusehen. In der Zeit die wir nun auf einen Bus warten (bereits 45 Minuten) kam der Bus eines anderen Anbieters schon 3 mal vorbei. Absolut nicht empfehlenswert und das Geld nicht wert!

title: The service is very infrequent
text:
Got the 1st bus on the red route.. no problem. Later the Green route must have stopped at 3pm as nothing past us.
A refund will be sought.

title: Hop blo√ü nicht mit!
text: Blo√ü nicht aussteigen, der kommt nicht regelm√§√üig, kaum jemand akzeptiert das Ticket und ein n√§chster Bus kam 30 Minuten lang nicht. Am besten gar nicht erst einsteigen.

title: Viel zu teuer f√ºr Mist.
text: Leider war die Lautst√§rke nicht ausreichend, die Eins√§tze kamen, nachdem man am jeweiligen Geb√§ude vorbeigefahren war und um den verst√§ndlichen Worten folgen zu k√∂nnen, braucht man einen Kompass. Daf√ºr 30‚Ç¨ pro Person zu zahlen ist eine Frechheit. Zus√§tzlich wurden mehrfach Menschen mit Rollst√ºhlen abgewiesen obwohl explizit das Rollstuhlfahrersymbol √ºberall zu sehen war. Achja, und bei manchen B√§umen klatschten einem die √Ñste oben auf den Kopf. Schade, dass man auf nichts hingewiesen wurde.

title: Horrible y aburrido
text: Los peores recorridos en autob√∫s tur√≠stico de mi vida, que horror, completamente desacompasado con el audio, cogimos la l√≠nea roja y la azul. No la cojan por favor es una estafa, caro y feo.

title: D√©√ßus par la diff√©rence entre le produit vendu et la prestation r√©alis√©e
text:
Sur le principe tr√®s sympathique de visiter la ville en hauteur surtout avec beau temps

Par contre, nous avons fait les 3 parcours et aucun n‚Äôa √©t√© respect√© (tr√®s raccourcis sans que l‚Äôon soit pr√©venu ) du coup les 3 parcours sont quasiment similaires et le prix de la prestation est donc trop ch√®re

Les arr√™ts sont tr√®s mal identifi√©s et on perd beaucoup de temps √† les chercher.

Les vendeurs sont bien l√† pour vous vendre les tickets mais plus personne quand il y a un souci ou une r√©clamation

title: Horrible
text: Si j'avais pu mettre z√©ro en note je n'aurai pas h√©sit√© ! Une honte !! Le centre de Lisbonne en travaux (ok pas leur faute) sauf que personne ne vous pr√©vient bien √©videmment et du coup nous avons visit√© uniquement les zones industrielles et le cot√© moche des c√¥tes. Impossible de prendre le pass pour une journ√©e deux journ√©es obligatoires. 57 ‚Ç¨ pour voir des bidonvilles et zones industrielles. Super.... Finalement oblig√© de rentrer en taxi. Bref une exp√©rience horrible !!! Fuyez !!!!!

title: Very disappointing
text: Most disappointing experience of our holiday. This is a rip off! The bus was late leaving the station and once we had visited the Moorish castle and the Pe√±a palace we waited half an hour and no bus came. There was no signage about where to get the bus and no timetable displayed. We ended up catching the local bus for an extra cost to get to the National palace and then walked back to the station. Will be advising our many friends to choose alternatives when in Sintra!

title: STAY AWAY
text: ***OMG*** save yourself the bother, hardship & listening to non-stop Fado music, VERY LITTLE CONTENT!!!, bus drivers doing their own thing/route

title: Da non ripetere
text: Abbiamo usufruito di questo bus turistico per la nostra vacanza a Lisbona . Ci sono stati diversi disservizi , fermate cancellate senza avviso ,attese lunghe alle fermate ,ma soprattutto ci √® capitato diverse volte che la postazione audio non funzionasse ,perci√≤ restavamo senza spiegazione sulla storia dei siti turistici visitati .

title: Pas √† la hauteur
text:
Soci√©t√© de transport touristique, les plus c‚Äôest un pass 48heures qui donne acc√®s √† trois ligne de bus et d√©couvrir les monuments de Lisbonne. Les moins : les bus sont tr√®s inconfortables attention √† l√† douleurs du dos !!! Ils vont tr√®s vite en raison de la contrainte des horaires et parfois on a m√™me pas le temps de prendre une photo, c‚Äôest dommage pour les souvenirs. Attention aux freinages brutaux en raison de la vitesse et mauvaise conduite. Les arr√™ts ne sont pas toujours signal√©s ou pas √† la bonne place (ex : arr√™t, Mercado da Ribeira, la plaque a disparu et le bus ne s‚Äôarr√™te pas √† l‚Äôendroit indiqu√©) l‚Äôattente est en effet longue.suggestions: indiquez les arr√™ts par panneaux lumineux √† l‚Äôint√©rieur du bus pour orienter les touristes et meilleure signalisation sur le circuit.
Sinon, excellent s√©jour √† Lisbonne avec un temps tr√®s agr√©able.

title: Mal, muy mal.
text: Mal, estresante, atestado, sin informaci√≥n, mucho calor, impuntual y dando muchos rodeos. Pague 60 euros dos personas Doss d√≠as e hicimos solo un viaje.

title: Nulle
text: Pas fiable du tout, tres mauvaise experience, attente tres longue, le personnel repond n'importe quoi...arnaque

title: Hop on Hop off Bustour roter Bus (nicht greyline): sehr schlecht!
text:
Hop on Hop off Bustour 27,- Euro
Roter Bus: vermeiden!!
Es war nicht greyline (leider auch rot) und es war nicht der yellow Bus.
Die Fahrt nach Bellem war gut, da kommt man aber auch anders raus. Ansonsten nimmt man doch so eine Tour, um was erz√§hlt zu bekommen. Alle Viertelstunde ein Satz mehr nicht. Zweite Tour ins Industriegel√§nde, nichts zu sehen. V√∂llig √ºberteuert daf√ºr. √úberhaupt nichts interessantes, sehr √§rgerlich. Wenn man nur einen Tag Zeit hat dann lieber so in der Stadt rumlaufen.

title: Inaffidabile
text: Purtroppo non hanno rispettato gli orari, e nemneno la corsa ultima della sera √® stata effettuata quindi siamo stati costretti a rientrare in taxi

title: Ne prenez surtout pas cette compagnie
text: Horrible je ne recommande absolument pas cette compagnie de bus. Ils vendent un passage toutes les 10minutes, j‚Äôai attendu 1h apr√®s avoir mis du temps √† trouver leurs arr√™ts. Aucun horaire disponible. J‚Äôai fais signe plusieurs fois aux chauffeurs mais soit ils vous ignorent soit ils sont sur leur t√©l√©phone. C'est honteux ne vous faites pas avoir. Prenez plut√¥t Grayline. Je les voyait passer tout le temps. Les bus en bon √©tat. Un bien meilleur service.

title: Don‚Äôt bother
text: No information on timetable. Buttons to stop are broken. Sitting waiting for next bus with no information at all!!! Waste of money and time. Walking is faster.

title: Very Bad.
text: I usually use the city tour buses but this one was extraordinary. The worse I have ever been to. We were 3 people, paid 25 euro each so total 75 euros for NOTHING. They told us that we can take the bus every 30 minutes from each place but at the end it was more than hour. We waited for a long time in every stop we made. We were so angry at the end. Didn't worth a penny I swear. It's a shame...

title: P√©simo tour, no es recomendable ya que tarda mucho para que vuelva a pasar y pierdes todo el d√≠a en una sola parada
text: Muy mal, no lo recomiendo , tardas medio d√≠a esperando un cami√≥n, atenci√≥n p√©sima de las personas encargadas.

title: Waste of money
text: Shambolic timetable information. Website blocked by my iPhone and no timetable at bus stops. Hopping back on very difficult. Hard to find and identify the bus stops, very long waits. Not clear which buses serve which colour routes. Too many empty buses polluting the city. Front of bus says ticket valid for 24 hours, staff said 48 hours. Use a small electric vehicle instead, many tuktuks available.

title: Ce n‚Äô√® di meglio
text:
I punti della fermata non sono chiari, quindi ti ritrovi a girare per cercare il cartello. Ti fanno la cartina ma dovrebbero essere pi√π chiara
Pullman vecchi
La linea blu quasi inesistente, c‚Äô√® scritto che passano ogni mezz‚Äôora, ma questa linea passa ogni‚Ä¶boh!
Resta sempre un buon modo per visitare la citt√†

title: P√©sima, dinero tirado a la basura‚Ä¶.
text: Un grave error contratar con City Sightseeing Sintra. No tienen combinaci√≥n ninguna hay que esperar m√°s de hora y media, nada puntuales, hemos tenido finalmente que coger el p√∫blico tras contratar con ellos, vaya 40 euros tirados a la basura‚Ä¶ UN ENGA√ëO!!!!!!!!

title: je ne recommande pas
text:
Je ne recommande pas du tout, en hiver les bus passent toutes les heures ou jamais.
Les arr√™ts sont compliqu√©es √† trouver, ce n'est pas du tout rentable !

title: Avoid if you value your safety
text: Avoid if you value your safety . We boarded the bus on 4/1 in Lisbon . Within 10 minutes our driver who thought he was on a F1 circuit had hit a tree . Fortunately we were the only people on the top deck . The bus was covered in glass . I hit my head . No one gave a damm . The driver was laughing with his mates back at the terminal where we returned. No offer of refund. I left my name and address nothing. All emails to their support desk get returned. Absolutely b disgusting!!!!

title: English speaking guide?
text: Very nice but English needed to be much better for us to understand. There are so many operators. Would pick another‚Ä¶‚Ä¶we had fun still.

title: Disappointing!
text: It was very disappointing. Nobody showed up for the tuk tuk tour. We were left standing on the street waiting! We finally made a phone call and the provider told us they were unable to make it. This is the second time we have used Viator through TripAdvisor and nobody has showed up. We previously booked a tour in Venice, Italy, and another one in Istanbul and both times neither one of those tour guys showed up. We will never use this service again.

title: GetYourGuide and CityTuk 3-hour tour of Lisbon was the worst!
text: First, the driver (Andres) was 40 minutes late picking me up at the meeting point. I had to contact both his company (CityTuk) and the booking company (GetYourGuide) to find out where he was. I was told he thought my tour was supposed to be later in the day. Secondly, his English skills were terrible and the information he provided about the city was minimal. I finally gave up trying to understand him and just looked at the scenery. I've seen many other tuktuks equipped with microphones for the driver. That might have made a little difference as he mumbled most of the time. Thirdly, I understand driving in Lisbon is challenging at best, but even when we were on back streets with no traffic, he was speeding then slamming on the brakes every few feet. Since the streets were wet from a recent rainshower, we skidded down several hills. I finally started looking for seat belts, but they weren't functional. I cut the tour short by 40 minutes and asked him to drop me off near my hotel.

title: Just a drive around the city
text: I do not recommend this tuk tuk company. I booked the 3 hour city tour which lists multiple stops along the itinerary for durations of 10-15 minutes. We did not make the stops, all that we did was "pass by". We just drove past the Mosteiro dos Jeronimos that lists a 15 minute stop, not even enough time to take a picture! When we showed the driver the Itinerary she said that she had never sen this itinerary! The driver spoke to the office on our behalf, feeling bad that we did not get what we expected, they would not lower the price of the tour. After returning home from our trip, I reach out to the head office concerning my complaint and did not hear back from them at all. If all that you want is a drive around, any tuk tuk company can do that for you.I expected more for 170 Euros!

title: Forgot us
text: Lost our reservation so left us standing on the hot sidewalk across from the cruise ship. Called them using our international hotspot. They finally found the reservation but said they had no drivers. They called 20 minutes later and said they had a driver. Buy this time over 90 minutes had passed and we found someone who's group cancelled on him. Glad I didn't pay in advance. Don't pay in advance, wait to see if they actually show up.

title: A very bad day in Sintra
text: I paid 714 euro for a private daily tour with an Italian guide but what I got was what a rasta not-very-clean girl that only spoke Portuguese and some Spanish, not even English. She just drove and left us alone to visit every place and did not say a single word throughout the entire day. During visits, we listened to other groups‚Äô guides and read info on the internet. She picked us late in the morning at the hotel and continued the whole day, having no idea of where to park, no plans for the day, skipped half of the locations expected when I bought the trip. During the day I talked on the phone with the local agency and Viator but they did not help, they just wanted to sell me a trip knowing that they had not a guide available and no refund was provided. Unfortunately our day was totally spoilt and that is not refundable.

title: Tours civitatis lousy service
text: 4 tours that cancel us, today to go to auschwitz ...cancel it the same day. that did not open, terrible service, they must have information of the holidays , do not hire civitatis, besides that the only tours that gave us the one day and another at night were wrong, we repeated tour.always contracted with them , never again

title: Horrifying ordeal
text:
We introduce ourselves to five friends in the Obelisk Square and assign a Guide: Manolito.
He starts to look at us badly and then, he asks us to come very close, to which a person of the group, they tell him that he is heard well, that it is not necessary.
Then he starts talking about his country, Colombia, so we look at each other, as if not understanding anything. Which he doesn't like.
When the tour starts, and the list passes, they say it is mandatory to answer: Manolito here, making a hand sign as if we were clowns. When it comes to my group's turn, the person who made the Reservation raises his hand and says: Here.
The Guide doesn't like this and he starts clowning around saying that's not the formula, that you have to clown around and say: Manolito here.
Since we're not willing to clown around, it drives us out of the Tour.
We travel muncho and always hire the Tours with Civitatis. Until yesterday the experiences were very good. Manolito's an unpresentable.

title: disappointing
text: The boy did not let us do the excursion because we were with another group that we met in port and we had squared to meet here and for them 4 and us 5 told me to go to another company for the first time this happens to me with this company and I always use it in all destinations

title: What a shame, they kicked us out for going on two reservations. CIVITATIS SCAM
text:
Incredible, we make two reservations for 6 and another for 5 with different names and emails, we show up at the agreed time and they kick us out rudely and without explanations, nor do they stop to reason saying that we are a group. We have done many freetours and we have never had any problems. CIVITATIS should look at how it manages these things.
TIP if you make a reservation with your friends/family, when you get there pretend you don't know each other.
I have no words to express the disappointment we felt.

title: Shameful
text: Shameful. We are 3 families that always travel together. The day before we did the Tour in Sintra xon Civitatis without any problem and very well. Today in Lisbon they refuse to accept us because there are more than 6 people despite having made 3 reservations. Very bad manners and without any coherent explanation, it seemed that we had done something illegal. It is the first time something like this has happened to us and we travel a lot. Thank God we were able to rejoin another Tour from another company despite not having a reservation. We naturally thank this other guide that has been compiled from us. We will never organize anything with Civitatus and we will never recommend it.

title: Disastrous experience with Take Free Tours (subcontracted by Civitatis)
text:
We go to the indicated meeting point and they do not allow us to access the tour because we are a group of 6 people and another of 3 people (with independent reservations), arguing that there are 9 of us and the maximum is 6.
We have tried to explain to them several times that at no time did the 9 of us intend to go together, but they have not even bothered to understand it.

The attitude of Mariana and Kike has been quite undesirable, showing an absolute lack of understanding and collaboration.

Now let's just hope that they don't charge us 5 euros per person for not taking the tour (because they haven't allowed us to)

title: Scam on a visit to Lisbon with Civitatis
text: The tour guides were very unpleasant to us for being Spanish and with a slight touch of homophobia. Never again a tour with them. They rejected people, at our time specifically 15 people. The guide says that the answer is Civitatis

title: Pesima consideraci√≥n frente a un pedido de cambio
text: P√©simo trato , pesima atenci√≥n al cliente. Desaconsejo contratar con CIVITATIS ! Hemos debido solicitar un cambio en medio de un viaje de vacacionesy no se nos otorg√≥ Una modo muy feo de aguarnos unas vacaciones. Han sido sumamente desconsiderados NO CONTRATAR con ellos!

title: Take a taxi from the Lisbon Airport
text: Be careful when booking your airport shuttle with this company since it sometimes takes a longer time to get through the Lisbon airport than the time that the shuttle company will wait for you. It took us almost 2 hours from the time our plane landed until the time that we finally had arrived at the airport lobby to meet our pre paid shuttle driver. We were bussed to the terminal from the plane, had lengthy lines at customs and waited an exceptionally long time for our luggage. By that time our driver had left. We did not have our Portuguese SIM cards to call in time to ask him to wait for us. When I borrowed a phone to call the company, we were told that they would be there in 5 minutes. When that didn't happen after another 30 minutes, I called back and spoke with a very rude woman who told me that in fact, we were not going to be picked up since the time that the driver would wait was an hour and a half and we would not be getting any refund. I have travelled throughout the world and have always ordered shuttles for convenience. This is the first time that the driver has left us stranded at the airport. I don't know what the solution is, since I understand that a driver cannot wait all day at the airport and the confirmation did stipulate that the driver would wait for only 1.5 hours. We ended up taking a taxi to downtown which ended up being cheaper than the shuttle, so that would probably be your best bet since you might get held up a very long time in the airport as we were.

title: Disappointed
text:
Disappointing, poorly maintained garden, dirty paths and benches (too many peacocks and ducks..)
Too bad because it is well located near the Bel√©m Tower.

title: Very nice store..great sellers..I bought for almost 100‚Ç¨ of soap and I was asked 1‚Ç¨20 for a paper bag.
text: Very nice store great sellers..I bought for nearly 100‚Ç¨ of soap I was asked 1‚Ç¨20 for a small bag .inadmissible...last time I buy these soaps..

title: Visiting the coach museum
text: It's a pitty how they take care of such precious vehicles. They should have much more protection from light and other agressions.

title: Too bad about the bathroom.
text: To go to the bathroom you need a drink ticket. But if you want to go again you have to submit ANOTHER ticket and so on. D right?. Illegal and mean. I'm not coming back.

title: AUDIO TOUR ON YOUR OWN PHONE - DIFFICULT TO NAVIGATE THE TECHNOLOGY
text: This is an awful tour and I have asked for a refund but none is forthcoming. You have to dowload an app and then download the tour, take headphones for your own phone - all of which was complicated and not made clear at the outset. When we got there it wasnt clear whether or not we had bought a ticket to get in and the tour or just the tour and needed then to buy an actual ticket to get in. No wifi so couldnt access any information and then the queue was 2.5 hours to get in. We did not queue up as it was hot and 2 of our party were in there 80's and it was too long... so it was just a complete waste of money. It wasnt clear when I booked it that you had to download stuff and take headphones.

title: St J
text: This was a huge monastery, with very large rooms and very interesting architecture, but we have seen so many different museums and things. This did not stand out and you had to wait in a huge line even with buying tickets online beforehand . there are too many people traveling it‚Äôs not fun when you have to wait in long lines so if you want to wait in line go see it but it‚Äôs huge place with a bunch of big empty rooms

title: Scam. Scam. Scam.
text: Scam‚Äîticket didn‚Äôt work. It had someone else name and another date. Total scam. Waste of time. Avoid this company at all costs. I‚Äôll be doing a chargeback.

title: no eticket received
text: the eticket was never received, only a pdf stating this is not your ticket. I folliowed the instructions to download ticket however the ticket was never emailed nor texted. I had to buy another ticket on site.

title: Too Long a Wait!
text: The lines at these two attractions are unbelievable. We arrived at the Belem Tower 15 minutes after opening and waited an hour and 40 minutes before we were able to enter the Tower. We had plans for the afternoon and were unable to visit the Monastery.

title: Unimpressive and overpriced
text:
Overpriced. Long queue. Outside looks impressive but when you get in very little to see.
Was quoted in Aus $ but charged in Euros and was unable to cancel.

title: Too long queue yet we got there at 9am.
text: We thought that purchasing electronic tickets would help us skip the line.....well no, we waited in line for 1 1/2 hours before returning.

title: Disappointed by this first experience
text: reserving the ticket was of no use to us given that we still had to stand in the single queue (more than an hour). We were not able to visit the church which was closed to visitors due to the celebration of a wedding.

title: Awful
text: Not as advertised, difficulty getting logged into the app, which is completely separate from Tripadvisor / Viator. Awful.

title: Would you like to wait 2 hours?
text:
It should be a Skip the Line ticket, but the only queue you can skip with this ticket is the ticket sales line. And there is no queue at all, because everyone buys online these days. So, since I wasn't looking forward to a 2 hour wait (times 2), I ended up viewing both attractions from the outside only.
Worthless scam, this ticket!

title: Not worth it
text: The ques at the monastery were so long we didn't even bother (at least 5 hours). Very impressive from the outside. Next Belem tower excitement back, no another 3 hour que. My youngest daughter persisted and was not bowled over enough to say the wait was worth while. Do this at a time when Lisbon is not busy.

title: Awful experience
text:
It was an hour wait for entry even with this ticket
Such a complicated system of down loading app to acsess the guide ‚Ä¶ once in Lisbon it used so much data & it only was only available 24 hours before
I DIDNT EVEN GO IN
TERRIBLE WASTE OF Time & money

title: bad phone service
text: The phones are useless, 2 of them do not work and are out of service, they do not respond to emails and it is as if the property only existed in photos, maybe fake.

title: Venue great - but E-Tickets did not were possible scam
text: The tickets were not accepted at the venue- the security guard said it was a scam. Thankfully he took pity on us and granted us access. However the tickets did not work.

title: No audio and difficulty getting tickets
text:
Booked the ticket and ‚Äòget tickets‚Äô link doesn‚Äôt work. Work around was to go to trip advisor and email ticket to myself. No link to download audio. Hoping the operator will respond to my text.
Hoping the actual visit tomorrow goes well.

title: Waste of my time and my money! Is a NO go!
text: Save your money and time . This place is not worth it your time or your money. Some walls and nothing else. Get few beers instead and you‚Äôll be happier.

title: Waiting time for entry / price / visit
text:
The monastery is nice, it has very beautiful architecture.

However, the 40 min queue for entry knowing that we were already there before the site opened, as well as the price of the visit are not worth the visit to the monastery which is short and with little information in my opinion

It‚Äôs up to everyone to have their own experience now!

title: Not worth of it! Don‚Äôt buy this!
text: Castle ticket is only 15 euro each and 2 tickets are only 30 euro. The charges to me from it is 62 euro which bundles useless Service like city audio. It is to me a deceive. The only good thing was that the customer service from Greece was nice. Other than that, this service is highly un recommended! Don‚Äôt take it, you will be regretted paying double for nothing!

title: Une honte ! A √©viter absolument !
text: 62‚Ç¨ pay√©s pour visiter le ch√¢teau embl√©matique de Lisbonne et pas de possibilit√© de t√©l√©charger malgr√© mes e-mails et mes relances au tour op√©rateur c‚Äôest un scandal! Grosse arnaque! A fuir absolument! (Pour info l‚Äôentr√©e au Chateau ne co√ªte que 15‚Ç¨, j‚Äô¬¥aurais donc du payer seulement 30‚Ä¶). Ils vendaient aussi un audio guide pour visiter la ville impossible √©galement √† t√©l√©charger. A √©viter √† tout prix

title: Waste of time
text:
Don‚Äôt bother visiting here. Only good for the views of Lisbon which you can get for free from churches etc.
Complete tourist rip off.

title: N√£o fui atendido, experiencia p√©ssima
text:
Acessei o link enviado para o meu e mail, assim como o.voicher disponibilizado aqui e n√£o abria os ingressos, somente um voucher e n√£o valia como entrada, nenhum.funcionario reconheceu ou sabia de algo, refrigerante a isso no local, entao tive que comprar novamente os ingressos no local para entrar. Falei com a operadora, aqui pelo trip e informaram que v√£o reembolsar,por√©m n√£o disseram como nem quando ser√° feito, gostaria destas informa√ß√µes
Inclusive guardei os canhotos dos ingressos comprado no local.

title: Fado music was lovely; the dinner was not
text: We went at the suggestion of friends (she grew up in Portugal). After my wife informed the wait staff that she was a pescatarian, we ordered soup -- and after consuming most of it, she found pieces of meat in it! Then she ordered a fish meal but it also came with pieces of meat!!! I ordered veal and they brought me chunks of beef (taste was ok but nothing memorable). At least they "comped" us on our glasses of wine.

title: Not worth it
text:
Fado, good. Food, average. Service, poor.

We arrived and quickly the reception area started to fill up with people. We had booked for 8pm and got there in plenty of time. We were seated and then the wait started. 15 minutes before we were given water another 15 before our order was taken. We ordered a bottle of wine which was poured but then stored in a wine cooler 2 tables over. As the waiter never came back to serve us the wine we ended up getting it ourselves (disturbing another couple). We were offered bread about 45 mins in but no butter or anything else to go with it. Just before the Fado started we got our starter. 15 mins of Fado which was excellent. We then waited 15 mins after Fado for our main. My companion had Octopus which was a little tough, I had cod which was good. 15 more minutes of Fado. We then left.

For what we were told is a high end restaurant, the service was poor. We fed back to the hotel (as we booked it through their recommendation. Many famous people have visited there and I am sure they got better service than we did. Not made to feel special, just a number. We both felt we were forgotten about. The waiter advised us service was not included in the bill however we did not feel the service was there so did not leave a tip. Normally I am a good tipper for great service but not on this occasion. I would suggest there are better places to go who would value your custom more.

title: nicht zu empfehlen, Touristenfalle
text:
Clube de Fado - das klingt nach ein paar kalten Getr√§nken und guter Musik. Leider ist es das nicht. Es handelt sich hier um ein Restaurant, das m√∂ge man beachten.
Unsere Nachfrage, ob es m√∂glich sei, lediglich etwas zu trinken und die Musik zu genie√üen, wurde sofort vom Herrn am Empfang bejaht. Nachdem er uns dann schnell im Saal platzierte, fielen mir als erstes die schon auf dem Tisch stehenden und j√§mmerlich mit Folie abgedeckten Couverts auf. Diese bestanden aus recht trockenem Brot, irgendeiner Art von Fisch und Butter (ungek√ºhlt!?) und alten Oliven. Allein das ist schon indiskutabel und nicht hygienisch. Schnell kam ein Kellner, wir bestellten eine Flasche Wein, die nie ankam und erkl√§rten 20 Minuten sp√§ter auf Nachfrage erneut, dass wir nicht zum Essen sondern zur Musik gekommen waren. Wir wurden dann sofort von zwei Personen, unter denen der Mann vom Empfang, unh√∂flich hinaus komplementiert.
Ich bewerte diesen vermeintlichen Club als Touristenfalle mit √ºberheblichem und unfreundlichem Personal. Keinesfalls zu empfehlen.

title: See another fado show!
text:
Horrible food but ok music. No vegan options.
Advise anyone to see another fado show! The staff was rude and the manager unable to handle most simple tasks

title: Potential far from objective.
text:
A Club with enormous potential, but still far from achieving all its objectives, a very well set up reception, but with an entrance that is all abandoned, dark, with zero lighting.

Just go down the stairs and understand that what we pay is far from delivery and compared to good clubs around the world.

Gym with equipment in poor condition, old and dirty.

Old men's bathroom, dirty and very poorly maintained and installed.

Installation of the children's pool, depressing.

Kids Space, with broken, dirty toys, with zero structure for children. Just as positive and very well educated, the monitor who stays with the children.

WIFI does not exist! Something impossible, it simply doesn't work.

It can be seen from afar that good management goes a long way, unfortunately.

As I live opposite, I end up going there, as nothing good is nearby.

Something in such a noble part of the city of Lisbon, in this state, is unbelievable.

Potentially lost.

title: Thieves
text: Do NOT give this gym your banking info. They love to scam expats. They will agree to cancel your membership and then keep debiting your account and then they will ignore you. Portugal is filled with great businesses and lovely people, but this gym is a vipers nest of pure scum.

title: P√©ssimo servi√ßo
text:
P√©ssimo! Dizem que s√£o um clube de excel√™ncia, mas depois o servi√ßo que prestam √© do mais baixo que existe.
As aulas de tenis s√£o caras e m√°s.

title: All in the sauce and faith in God
text: We waited hours in line for a good place (there were 4 parallel queues), until the security team decided to make all the people in at once, generating a crowd trying to pass through the same door. It was so aggressive that there were no security reviews, if there were knives etc, in the premises... no one knows. There is no point in complaining because they blame people (customers).

title: Interesting building with very bad acoustic quality. Not acceptable for classic music performances
text: We have listened to a performance of Nabucco of Giuseppe Verdi. The building is quite interesting. However the acoustic in the building is bad. Singers and orchestra sound was passed through amplifiers and loudspeakers of at best mediocre quality. Very, very disappointing. We had seats J2 and J4, which should be amongst the best.

title: Coliseu Recreios terrible experience
text: Unbearable heat and uncomfortable chairs, the Coliseum does not offer the minimum conditions to see a show, only the ticket prices seem to be up to date given that the entire venue has stopped in time!

title: Coliseu despe√ßa o engenheiro de som
text: Sei que por ‚Ç¨30 para assentos laterais n√£o me d√° direitos a vis√£o perfeita mas acho que me d√° direito a ouvir a m√∫sica para qual paguei. A pior experi√™ncia de som que jamais ouvi. Martinho da vila n√£o merece rebaixar-se actuar em t√£o pobres condi√ß√µes. Jamais irei ao coliseu novamente

title: Disappointing Collette Experience
text:
The Collette tour of Portugal was my first with that company. My travel partner had never been with them before and she wanted to try them out. What a disappointment. We wanted to go in the fall of 2024 but they refused to tell us how many they could handle and how many openings there were. Friday after Thanksgiving rolls around and they had a special deal running. But when our travel advisor contacted them early in the morning there were no openings. I think they held out for a large group .
Then we went to the June trip and again they would not reveal any information to us.
We did not know how many until we arrived in Porto and found out there would be 39 on the trip. I never received an itinerary which is unheard of as of I have been on tours to 30 countries. We spent on day riding on a bus to various Catholic churches where we just walked ourselves around the inside and went back to the bus for the next church. We expected to see Roman ruins, Jewish sites, and information on the Moors
but did not. Food was disappointing. Choices were mainly lots of pork for lunch and dinner and then some fish.
I could go on but you get the picture and I would never go on another Collette tour again and do not recommend them.

title: Terrible TukTuk Tour!
text: Our experience was disappointing. Our driver was 1/2 an hour late. She did not know where we were supposed to go. We said the historic district. She was not very knowledgeable and did not give us the overview of the city. This was our first Tuk Tuk tour. I would not recommend this- I think a tour bus would have been better and more informative.

title: Compadre not Compassionate
text: We were very disappointed that we had to end our trip to Lisbon due to an emergency. We were even more disappointed that Compadre Cooking School showed no compassion whatsoever and despite our rescheduled class being 2 weeks after we were forced to cancel, Compadre Cooking School had a ‚Äútoo bad, so sad, we‚Äôre keeping your money anyway‚Äù attitude. Personally, I wouldn‚Äôt choose to do business with anyone that lacks empathy and compassion. You shouldn‚Äôt either.

title: Disgusting and too bad I can't get a refund
text: I came two days ago. I bought ‚Ç¨60 worth of products. You should know that a box costs around ‚Ç¨9 to ‚Ç¨12. The octopus is absolutely disgusting. I'll let you go to the final point on the other side of the Tagus and you will taste quality for less money. In this store, you pay for marketing and not for quality and appetizer.

title: It‚Äôs empty!
text: Empty on Friday. Although the music is good the crowd is very unpleasant. We arrived early by 5 minutes but they refused to let us in although it was raining outside.

title: Bad online and face-to-face experience
text:
Those who take care of the profile of the disco should know how to deal with the public or at least have professionalism, since they supposedly exercise this profession.
They were holding a party where there was a stories informing about bracelets and I sent a message asking about and was blocked by the page profile.

Already at the club a good part of the team was rude not to say anything worse.
Environment totally unprepared to visit.

title: Avoid like the plague
text: Absolutely horrendous place. Rude staff from door staff, security and bar staff. Stinks and looks dirty. Looks like it looks a very good cleaning and buckets of bleach. The bar staff treat you like they‚Äôre doing you a favour and gang up on you when you mention it. Absolute appalling.

title: I trash this place
text: Very bad nightclub.. everything was of poor quality, the music, the dirt, the service! I'll never go back, plus it's very expensive for what it offers! Low level

title: Does not comply with official opening hours
text: We would have liked to have visited, but we did not catch a single moment during a week of Lisbon during several attempts, when the museum would have been open! And this despite the fact that we had previously checked the homepage! At the main entrance there is a plaque with the opening hours, which says that is open daily with the exception of e.g. 25.12. and 1.1. There is expressly no mention of New Year's Eve there and yet we found the doors locked on 31.12.24 around 2 pm! We weren't the only ones who were puzzled by it. Very poorly organized!!

title: Disappointed
text: The church is famous because it has no roof then there is a small museum with archaeological finds 7 euros is the ticket price I was disappointed

title: Peu de choses √† voir. Bof...
text: Nous avons visit√© le covento do carmo lors de notre s√©jour. Il y a peu de choses √† voir. Des colonnes au milieu des ruines de cette ancienne √©glise qui avait √©t√© d√©truite lors du tremblement de Lisbonne. Attention il faut savoir qu'au moment de notre visite : Avril 2023, il y avait des travaux de r√©novation avec des b√¢ches ce qui ne permet des photos que sur une partie du monument. √Ä l'int√©rieur quelques expositions de tombes et 2 momies p√©ruviennes. On a eu l'impression de perdre notre temps. A moins d'√™tre passionn√© d'arch√©ologie je ne vois aucun int√©r√™t √† cette visite.

title: D√©cevant..
text: Nous sommes d√©√ßus de ce couvent car nous avons √©t√© surpris des travaux en cours en rentrant √† l'int√©rieur.. (non signal√© √† l'accueil au moment de payer)... Les travaux prennent une bonne partie du couvent (celle que l'on voit d'ailleurs sur toute les photos sur internet..). Nous n'avons pas pu profiter de la beaut√© de ce lieu.. Dommage... Pensez √† demander o√π en sont les travaux avant de le visiter !

title: Cancelled class
text: Cooking Lisbon cannot be trusted. I booked a cooking class and then days before the class, Cooking Lisbon informed me the class had been moved from Tuesday to Wednesday. Then on Monday, Cooking Lisbon informed me the class had been cancelled. I contacted Cooking Lisbon and was told that since I had not confirmed the class on Wednesday, the class had been cancelled. I informed Cooking Lisbon I had received an email stating my reservation for the class on Wednesday was confirmed. I asked why I needed to confirm the class when their email stated my reservation was confirmed. I also asked where in their email it stated I needed to confirm the class. Cooking Lisbon could not show it to me. So typical. Blame the customer. I had rearranged my visit to Lisbon so that I could take the class on Wednesday. I spent the next day contacting other cooking classes. I explained my situation that Cooking Lisbon had cancelled at the last moment and could they please add 1 more to their class. Unfortunately, they were all full. Some did say they were not surprised Cooking Lisbon had cancelled the class. Do yourself a favor. Find a more reliable and professional cooking class than Cooking Lisbon to avoid having your class cancelled.

title: Skip this one unless you are a meat lover and do this for fun
text:
I love to cook. I attended many cooking class and I was recommended this one by my client. They were a big group and had a lot of dishes.
I read that the class is not recommend for vegetarians. I believe we always find sth to eat. Our group was very small and I believe that is the reason why there were less dishes. To my surprise there were 2 chicken dishes. I left hungry even though there was an aperitif in the begining which I liked. Our chef Felipa was super friendly I just felt I did not learn really any cooking hacks. The kitchen was amazing. I hope everyone washed their hands before class‚Ä¶
I would skip this since I left hungry and really did not learn sth exciting.

title: Skip this one!
text: Tour was a big disappointment. I have done many other cooking classes in other cities, and they usually give me a feel for the culture and people. This chef was uninspiring and had a flat affect. He was unable to illicit any energy from the group, was not engaging and mostly people stood around waiting. The wine was scarce with two bottles opened for 12- people. Had us stand around while one person fried literally 52 cod fritters (for 10 people). This took forever and most were not even touched. The sous chef just stood there and stared at us. Not sure he could speak English. The group was very friendly and nice but everyone was disappointed. Skip this one!

title: CHEF NO SHOWED
text: The chef didn‚Äôt show up and we were not notified. We took an Uber across town, was left standing outside in the rain, and had to take an Uber back. It was our last day in Lisbon and a cooking class was a number one goal of our vacation. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTING and poorly handled.

title: Disappointment
text: I notified the company of my seafood allergy when I booked the event (months in advance). When I showed up, there was no acknowledgement of this. I gave the class a short, but I had to leave after 30 minutes. In the end, I wasted $80.

title: Cakes
text:
Very rude! They treat you like sheep. It is quite expensive compared to others right there.
I will not come back

title: I had food poisoning & vomited everything I ate from this class‚Ä¶
text: I took numerous cooking class on & off for over a decade in US. They‚Äôre either cooking by yourself or 4 people in a group. As for this class, when there are approximately 20 people were involved & as for my sensitive GI, I have food poisoning. I was in an early flight next day & I emptied out my stomach by vomited 5 times. I had diarrhea 3 times after the flight & had dizziness throughout the day. NOT a great experience for me‚Ä¶ My suggestion is instead of letting the people use their bare hands to mash the potato & picked the bones out from the codfish, it‚Äôs best to use disposable gloves or the kitchen tools such as potato masher & fish bone tweezer can get the job done. It‚Äôs much more hygiene than with their own hands.

title: Caution before booking if you have food restrictions
text:
I attended a cooking class at "Cooking Lisbon" with specific dietary requirements in mind (celiac disease), having communicated these needs in advance and received confirmation. Unfortunately, these requirements were not met on the day. When I addressed this with the instructor, her response was dismissive, suggesting that unless I had a severe reaction, it shouldn't be an issue.

Upon discussing my concerns with the manager post-class, I was met not only with skepticism but also with an inappropriate comment suggesting that people with my condition would only be seriously affected if they were to die from exposure. While the cooking class itself had potential to be enjoyable, the handling of dietary concerns and the subsequent interaction with management deeply affected my experience. For those with allergies or dietary needs, I'd advise caution before booking.

title: Disappointed by the cost compared to the amount of participants, wouldn‚Äôt recommend this program in the currently format
text:
12 people to complete 6 dishes on one working space. Not everyone got to work, there was no recipes and even in the download sent after not all the recipes were given.
It‚Äôs definitely an experience but more an introduction to the products they sell and having a taste of the different dishes.
Not worth the money spent to attend but if the asked half the price or included had half the participants I can imagine it is good.

title: COOLTRA colocou as motas de qualquer maneira
text: O colaborador da cooltra colocou as motas de qualquer maneira no park de motas e danificou a minha capa de prote√ß√£o que l√° estava para proteger a mota. Em contacto com a cooltra, informaram para eu procurar minha seguradora.

title: Turned away paying customers
text:
Last night in Lisbon and this place came recommended by friends and we were excited to give it a try. Got to the establishment, rang the doorbell and a guy opened the curtains and door and asked us how many people. We mentioned 4 and he told us to come back in 30 minutes and drink at the bar next door -- what, who does that to paying guests? AND The place was empty!
Great way to turn away customers.
And that's exactly what we did, gave our business to 1868, a Great cocktail bar, very happening and welcoming and just up the street.

title: Tax-free procedures don't work.
text:
It's quite expensive compared to other similar cork shops, but it's attractive because there are items that you can use everyday, not souvenirs. He gave me a lot of explanations and advice while I was shopping. I chose the item with good feeling.
What surprised me was that I was denied tax-free procedures. He said he was too busy because he was alone, but there were no other customers. I think it's just a hassle because it's not in your best interest.
It seems that I make so much money at this store that I have time to brag about being jealous of everyone. Therefore, this assessment.

title: Very small, very expensive, good quality but you can do better
text: I will never understand some of the reviews people give. One lady from Texas said she was overwhelmed with the selection. If you could spend more than 10 minutes in this store I'd be surprised. It is very small. No doubt good quality and certainly 1000% better than all the junk stores. However, they are overpriced. We did a lot of research before we came to Lisbon. We wound up getting better quality handbags at less than 50% of the cost at a market which was only open on Saturday and Sunday. The family of the lady we purchased them from actually makes the bag. Of note, the salesperson at Cork & Co. said they buy their products from individual makers as opposed to one source. BTW she was very helpful and nice.

title: Absolutely unprofessional!!!
text:
Tripadvisor QR code was not accepted!
Booked with Tripadvisor Timeslot at 9:30. Still queue - tickets are valid all day! After waiting 45 minutes, we were told before entering that the Tripadvisor QR code was invalid - although we presented the payment confirmation to Tripadvisor (over 75 R for 3 people!!) and all email traffic with Tripadvisor. Nobody took off from Tripadvisor's hotline. In the end we were not let into the Jeronimo Monestry, although we paid 75 ‚Ç¨ and were on time!!
Wasted money!!
Unfortunately absolutely not recommended!!!

title: Terrible ticketing
text: We had a lot of issues using our ticket to get into this attraction. The emails sent to us were not straightforward and after much effort, I managed to add an Apple wallet ticket to my phone. However, at the ticket point, they refuse to honor this. They sent me to the ticket office across the street. The very kind lady. figured this out for us even though she wasn‚Äôt obligated to. She found a QR code, but this QR code could not be resized to be scanned - in the end the woman at the gate of this attraction just let us through in frustration.

title: VIATOR tickets were fraud. False advertisement. Unusable. No refund. Wasted money
text: Horrible tickets! Don't buy this tour. We bought this ticket the day before the tour thinking we should not miss out on this beautiful monastery. However, after arriving at the monastery, there was a huge line (ticket holder) that took an hour to get to the entrance. When we got to the ticket check point, our vouchers did not work. I panicked but there were nobody who could help me. The staff almost sent us away but I decided to go ahead and purchase four more new tickets online right there right then (good thinking!). We went in and realized that there was no audio guide available. Wasted our money buying the entry tickets with audio guide. Once we were inside, we walked around the main Cloister. That was it. No access to the church unless you buy a separate entrance ticket and had to be at a certain open time. The architecture was beautiful but we were so frustrated by the experience with tickets. We came back to the US and contacted VIATOR requesting refund on unused vouchers but they absolutely did nothing to help me. Bad customer service. Recommending buying tickets from the official site.

title: Terrible ticket experience.
text: The website TripAdvisor sold the tickets on was NOT valid. They did not take our tickets. Plus the website over charged each ticket by almost 20.00 dollars. Do not use TripAdvisors website. Terrible.

title: No need to buy tickets in advance.
text:
No need to buy tickets in advance.
