title: Racist experience with ticket teller
text: A terrible experience with a teller left our family feeling upset and angry. Portugal - and its people - have been amazing so far. A man asked my husband for his passport, rejected his ID and insisted he walk back to our hotel and get his documents. This was just to board a quick train to Sintra. We did not see anyone else being asked for their IDs. Upsetting but not representative of the people as a whole.

title: A scandal.
text: Monday in the middle of August all city attractions closed. How do you do it? A city that also lives on tourism... Speechless really.

title: Nonsense rules
text:
The persecution they do to freelance photographers is a shame. They can't see anyone with a machine bigger than a cell phone who is already trying to come and reprimand the person. As if the photographs took some away from the plants. It would be quality advertising at zero value but the greed of asking ‚Ç¨140 plus VAT per hour to photograph in the greenhouses is greater.
I do not recommend.

title: BAD.
text: Bad...... escape this attraction ... we bought in advance by the site .. and when we arrived at the visitation without any email or prior notice of the points to be visited only 2 were visited because of an event that they were going to make.... a lack of respect and total neglect when we sent the email talking about the occurred.....

title: Tour long, rude and disrespectful.
text: Earlier in the day we visited sporting Lisbon and went on to benfica stadium after that. Sporting Lisbon tour was great they divided groups into English and Portuguese which was great. Unfortunately benfica didn‚Äôt do the same. This was its downfall! The tour took way too long because of this, we were in there for over 2 and a half hours! We were part of a massive group being led around the stadium the tour spoke in Portuguese first then repeated in English. The majority of the group were Portuguese and to be very honest extremely rude! After the guide had explained everything in Portuguese he then explained in English and because the majority of people had understood the first time they then proceeded to have their own conversations and chat amongst themselves while the tour guide was speaking in English making it extremely difficult for us to hear the tour guide throughout the tour. We had been nothing but respectful throughout and listened when he spoke in Portuguese even though we didn‚Äôt understand only to then have the majority of the tour to be very rude and disrespectful to us when he spoke in English. The tour guide did nothing to calm them down or quieten them which only added to our frustration. The pitch was under construction but we went out of season so this was on the cards so not their fault. But overall very long, exhausting, couldn‚Äôt hear anything and a little pointless. They need to follow sporting Lisbon clubs lead when it comes to their tours as their tour was miles better and suited everyone involved. This tour at benfica was a shambles. Glad I did it but would never go again.

title: Excellent visit ruined by the scheme of the photographs
text: A spectacular visit to the final moment... at the beginning they took photos with parents and children to the end presented 2 products, one book with only the family photo and another with only the child. The goal, make us spend 60‚Ç¨ on 2 photos

title: Revised organisation
text: When I arrived at the register, I was told that visits reopened at 5pm. Back at 5pm, I was informed that there were no visits scheduled for that day. No communication on site, very disappointed with the organization. Visited the next day, but one day late due to a lack of communication, although the stadium is very nice

title: Poor conduct, Animals abused, Overpriced photos
text:
The tour was unfortunately really disappointing.. Real eagles were chained up in the stadium that just can't be done anymore..
At the beginning we took photos which are already sold printed out at totally overpriced prices at the end of the tour.

title: Unmotivated guide, museum theme missed
text: Entry to the stadium tour is very poorly organized, visitors had to wait in the pouring rain and then spend another half hour in a drafty room. The guide was completely unmotivated and spoke his text like a robot in two languages. Otherwise, the stations are similar to other stadium tours. The museum is designed quite off topic. The chronological classification with other events in the world takes up a lot of space, just like other sports. The best thing is the great animated film on the 2nd floor, which is really well made.

title: RELEASE THE POOR EAGLES!
text:
It was an awful experience. The tour itself was poor, and the turist guide was mean and boring.
But the worst part of all was the unnecessary cruelty to the eagles that are displayed on the field. What a nightmare to watch and hear them scream becuade they aren‚Äôt happy chained on that place. This made me hate everything about the team and the stadium.

title: Disappointing
text: We have been on several stadium tours: Madrid, Barcelona... This one at Benfica was the worst. A herd of 50 tourists is first carelessly herded through the stadium and then into the Benfica shop. The tour was supposed to be in English, but ended up being in both Portuguese and English. It just wasn't good.

title: Terrible staff, cool stadium.
text:
Believe me when I say I am not a complainer, this is my first ever time writing a review but I felt I had to. Myself and a group of friends did the tour (partly) last weekend. Firstly for context we had a boat trip organized at 12PM so we arrived at the stadium at 10:20 to take the "1 hour" tour to leave us enough time.

Tours allegedly leave every 15minutes. Problem number 1, you buy tickets in a completely separate building, when we went to buy the tickets despite there being an abundance of staff it took them 15minutes and no other customers to print our tickets (I kid you not). Then we walked back to the tour entrance where there was a queue of around 10 people. it took this queue another 15minutes to pass because none of the incompetent staff where operating the barrier to let people in. Then the tour didn't start for another 10minutes. So we mentioned to the tour guide that the tour started late so we would need to leave early, could we go and see the pitch and really the only important things any football fans want to see but they ignored us.

Around 30 minutes later when we realized the tour was going to take way to long we asked to have someone take us back to the entrance so we could leave having seen nothing that we wanted to. The female guide was very rude and made it seem like it was our fault that they had wasted 40minuts of our time.

Stadium is cool, staff are truly dreadful.

title: Ridiculous
text:
In my small way I visited Madison Square Garden and the football stadiums of Barcelona, of
Corinthians, Palmeiras, S√£o Paulo: they all allowed you to visit the home team's changing rooms, but not here!
Why??
I agree with all those who condemn the fact of keeping three eagles miserably prisoners, which they only release for two quick flights before each match.
The "museum" is an American nonsense without rhyme or reason: they attempted to mimic the giants of the Stars and Stripes species, simulating the spectator's participation in a match.
You stand on a platform that slowly rises (why?) in front of videos of witty fans.
Pathetic

title: Long wait, badly organised, poor content, cruelty to animals. Need I say more?
text:
So, decided to do the Benfica Stadium tour for my son's birthday whilst on holiday in Lisbon. Not a good experience. Paid for our tickets and then had to wait 1 hour and 20 mins in blazing sun with no shade to get in.
The tour itself was very poor. I've done a lot of European stadium tours with my football mad sons. In terms of content this was easily the worst. Normally the organisers have thought it through and the script for the tour is full of interesting facts about the stadium, its history and the club in general. Not this one - it was just boring. And once you've paid your money and waited in line they explain that you cant look at the home dressing room (too much of a security risk apparently!) and the pitch side dugouts are boarded up. But my biggest issue is the eagles that permanently live chained up next to the pitch. Seems like the only times they move is to fly about the stadium for the amusement of fans on match day - or to be taken to the club shop for photo opportunities with visitors (for a fee of course). Staggering that this is going on in a major city/club in 2023!

title: Bad organisation plus animal cruelty
text: Badly organised at the start of the tour, too many people trying to get in and the staff didn‚Äôt seem to know what they were doing. We had pre booked a ‚Äòjump the queue‚Äô ticket but there was no way to access other than queuing in the English or Portuguese line. After nearly 45 mins wait we eventually got on a tour with a guide who seemed pretty disinterested. The real low point was the poor eagles chained up on the pitch which just seemed pointless animal cruelty. The guide made no reference why they were there. Couldn‚Äôt wait to leave. I highly recommend skipping the tour and just do the excellent museum if you are a football fan.

title: Stadium tour
text:
Very quick tour . Not allowed in home team changing room. Staff overall not friendly. Wanted us in and out quickly ,
Felt like we were an inconvenience.

title: COMPRA ENTRADAS EN LAS M√ÅQUINAS
text: Muy mal trato, compramos entradas para ver el campo de f√∫tbol + museo en la tienda de f√∫tbol como nos indicaron y al salir de la tienda, hab√≠a una m√°quina donde pod√≠as comprar las entradas 5 euros m√°s barato, fui a la tienda a comentar y me dijeron que no ten√≠an nada que ver y que no iban a hacer nada, vergonzoso!

title: 1 ESTRELA
text: gostei muito do est√°dio e das suas instala√ß√µes. definitivamente um dos melhores est√°dios a que j√° fui. #BENFICAPARASEMPRE

title: Una filosof√≠a que atrasa
text: Fui con toda la emoci√≥n de visitar un estadio que observaba por televisi√≥n y alucinaba conocer y al promediar el estadio tour y ver a un costado del campo de juego a tres √Åguilas atadas pr√°cticamente sumergidas es sus desperdicios y en su plumas ca√≠das, bajo el sol y el fr√≠o, me dio asco. Entiendo que son los animales representativos de la instituci√≥n pero tenerlos de esa manera atrasa y no hace m√°s que querer comentarles a conocidos y amigos que no visiten un club que, a mi opini√≥n, qued√≥ en el tiempo y maltrata as√≠ a una especie salvaje que merece estar en condiciones libres.

title: But why?
text: Among the Lisbon derby we had chosen the stadium of Sporting L. A little for ease, a little because more intriguing by the team. It went wrong, I explain: the Stadium is currently a construction site (around) and the reception does not exist, half an hour in a row at the only open counter to discover that the access to the museum and stadium was on the other side, obviously no sign. Line up for your ticket to discover that tours are guided in time blocks only. So we had to wait 3 hours... Too bad because apart from the club shop everything appears left there... So we headed to Benfica Stadium (but that's another story)

title: Weak
text: Very weak and short exposition, with many texts in Brazilian Portuguese, and with spelling errors. ‚Ç¨10 is expensive for the experience

title: Don't go, read an anatomy book
text: Poor exposition, with a lack of explanations, with subtitles that they forgot to translate into Portuguese. Most of the organs on display only have the name of the organ, they are often a group of organs and anyone who doesn't know them doesn't know what they are looking at. It's better to buy a good anatomy book, the results are much better. This exhibition is just a 3D anatomy book. I saw the same exhibition about 15 or 16 years ago and it was much better. Larger, it presented sections of the organs with an explanation of what was being seen, comparing the healthy organ with a diseased organ. In the current exhibition we have the organs with just their name and explanation on a board. There you go, you might as well read an anatomy book. I do not recommend. Not worth the ticket price. Unless you really want to see real bodies (which, after the necessary treatment so they don't get damaged, don't even look real, so it's easy for people to forget that)

title: Not work the cheaper price. Get a direct flight and a better tour guide from somev other company.
text:
The price of the tour is cheaper because the fight are horrendous. 3 flights is too much, and the layovers were brutally short. Terrible setup.
Our guide for the coastal cities must have been very new at his job as he was not very good at it. A terrible story teller with no real point to his stories. He didn't check on people at the back half of the bus. I think he hoped most people were tired and wanted to sleep in the bus trips. The country is great. The tour guide was not.

title: One more frustration to add
text:
Just meant to add to my previous reviews:
Imagine you have prepaid events or excursions and, you have NO idea about the start time or duration !! Tell me how can you plan any limited daily remaining time!!
we traveled as far as Australia..
NEVER seen any services as such..

title: Are they in business?
text: I don't believe they are still in business as there was no communication from them when I tried several forms of contact.

title: Scam
text:
We paid in full via the company's website, but after starting the trip, the driver started asking for more money. I don't know if that's only him or his company trying to scam people, but that was a very poor experience.
He threatened to go get his manager, we told him to do so, and he finally relented and everything was "good".

title: Unreliable
text: Very disappointed! They canceled the day before the tour because they did not plan ahead properly for Carnival in Portugal.

title: There was no show
text: We were really excited for the fado show and had made a confirmed reservation via email. Upon arrival the place was closed and multiple other people were waiting outside for the show. Nobody answered when ringing the bell, and when calling the phone number they only told us that "there is no fado in the box". We would have appreciated a simple notification for a cancellation of the show. It ruined our evening.

title: Fado un chiado
text: It's not worth the detour for a 45-minute show in an auditorium. There were 4 of them, the show was in a shopping center. I don't recommend it

title: Nice place but weak singers
text: The location and place is nice. Guitarist are good, but the singers are very weak. Both singers lack passion and could not connect with us/audience. Some people left before the show ended including us. I heard Fado is all about the singer passion and how they make you feel the lyrics. We didn‚Äôt experience that, for that reason I don‚Äôt recommend it.

title: Not the spirit of real Fado
text: Unfortunately the artists change it like an American musical. There is none of the spirit and emotion of Fado at all. We were very disappointed.

title: Go to the Alfama neighborhood for an authentic experience...
text: Despite the singers being very talented, the experience as a whole felt very fabricated and inauthentic. If you want a more authentic Fado experience ‚Äì go to the Alfama neighborhood and choose a Fado restaurant where you will pay the same price (or less) and have your dinner included.

title: Disappointing
text: This is the second time I came here - when I visited in 2022 it was beautiful. This time there were too many damages caused by tagging and by a lack of maintenance. I didn‚Äôt bother to take a photo this year because the damage was too extensive.

title: Restaurant visit instead of described food tour
text:
The tour does not match the description and we advise against booking it. You only visit one restaurant where you can get 3 tapas and 3 wines. So you sit at the table with the guide and chat. The so-called tour lasts a good hour.
It was not carried out by the booked provider, but was apparently passed on to the provider Discover Lisbon. On their website the tour is also described as carried out and is offered at a 20% discount.
One positive thing to note is that the guide was very friendly and informative. The food was very good and the restaurant owner told us a lot of interesting information about Portuguese winemaking.

title: A bewildering array of tat
text:
A long trek up a hill to what can best be described as a very low end car boot sale. On one stall we spotted some dusty packets of condoms alongside a very old computer keyboard and on another what appeared to be lots of old photos of random people and on another lots of half empty shower gels and sun tan lotion.
Solves the mystery of where that stuff that gets left behind in villas and hotels ends up‚Ä¶‚Ä¶
Just utter rubbish - save your energy and visit one of the very many local boutiques dotted around instead.

title: Hot, crowded, not much to discover!
text: Very disappointing -- mostly junk, crowded and not worth it. Also scalding hot in June! Visit local boutiques around the city, instead.

title: More like a car boot
text:
Don‚Äôt bother climbing up the hills to get to this flea market. It‚Äôs more or less a car boot sale and a very poor one at that.
The only positive about this flea market is they have public toilets available

title: Fair
text: We have gone to several fairs within Portugal and Europe and this does not reach the level of them. It measures about two blocks and the prices are quite high compared to others.

title: As a kid, he often went here to sell what he no longer used.
text:
Once again I went back to Feira da Ladra, as a kid I often went here to sell what I no longer used.
Nothing to do with the traditional thief fair of Lisbon from old and that is now much better.
Remember that movement very early to set up the tent, I do not agree with the fact that I have finished with those occasional sales (where I included myself rsrsr).Now we see mostly people looking for pechinches. One or another buys an item that you may miss (this is what happened to me this time), also collectors and antiques dealers
The market in the middle of it, which used to be...
It was nice to remember but at the same time I came with a bitterness and sadness, because it has nothing to do with Fair of the thief of old.

title: It's no longer the same thing
text: It's no longer the same thing... A few years ago, we had such a variety...choice of unusual items, rarities...we managed to buy good items for almost nothing. Today we find store prices for items from a garage sale..

title: trinket fair
text:
Traditional Flea Market in Lisbon.
Easy access from Santa Apol√¥nia station.
I went on a Tuesday.
Many products are used and old. I won't be back.

title: Don‚Äôt bother going
text: What a waste of time going to this place. Looked like everyone was selling their long dead relatives stuff from the loft, or tacky souvenirs. Do not bother going. Went mid week if that makes a difference.

title: Dusty and Gross
text: Dump out your dead neighborhood hoarders junk drawer i went here my first morning and whew not worth the walk I saw a real market in Belem outside the mosteiro de jeronimo

title: Nice to see once but no desire to return.
text: Weather very nice, architecture mainly unremarkable but endless very narrow streets were quaint and enjoyable. Trams were a lovely experience but very disappointing due to being put off by the driver several times, e.g. accidents blocking the route ahead and journey over; HUGE queues at start of route 28; 1 1/4 hour wait and then put off after 5 minutes, or tram not arriving at all; or put off soon after boarding as we boarded unknowingly near the terminus where you must disembark again, and then join yet another queue... New tram out to Belem etc fine but not as nice. Lot of young men (18-40yrs aprx) hanging around day and night with little to do, sometimes intimidating when they stare at you (thankfully we had no crime issues). All unemployed? Footpaths and steps (of which there are many) poorly maintained and frequently dangerous. Endless graffiti lowers the tone. Openly offered cocaine etc on Avenue da Liberdade by some of the aforementioned males with no sign of police. Metro and buses worked well, especially to/from airport. We took a tuktuk tour on last day which turned out excellent. Glad to have visited but in no hurry to return.

title: Terrible Experience ‚Äì Avoid at All Costs!
text:
If I could give zero stars, I would. This company left us stranded at the airport with four small children after a long 10 hour flight, despite having booked our transfer weeks in advance.

The night before our arrival, I received a sudden message from Booking.com stating there was an "unexpected problem with the transfer." This company was the supplier of booking.com for our transfer. With no time to make alternative arrangements, we landed hoping the issue could be resolved. I called the company, but they claimed nothing could be done since transfers must be booked at least 8 hours in advance.

To my surprise, the driver and his boss were actually at the airport. The boss called Booking.com, pretending to investigate, but I later confirmed that they were the ones who canceled the ride themselves. When I asked if they could still take us, they said yes‚Äîbut only if we paid an extra 20‚Ç¨ in cash. While I went to withdraw the money, my wife stayed with them. When she pointed out that by taking cash, they could avoid paying commission, the boss became angry and refused to take us at all, leaving us completely stranded.

This was beyond unprofessional‚Äîit was a deliberate scam. Instead of honoring the booking, they canceled last minute to force us into a direct cash deal, and when confronted, they simply abandoned us.

Do yourself a favor and avoid this company and their shady supplier, Filipe Mateus Tours in Lisbon. Absolutely unacceptable.

title: Great tour cost but make sure you define your tour agenda.
text: They made a wrong assumption and elected not to take us to a location we paid for. Enjoyed the driver and the locations we did visit but when a contract states the cities we will visit, an assumption was made and we didn‚Äôt visit one location.

The worst bus line by far. Second time I try flixbus, second issue.

Apparently the bus broke down, they changed to a different one, different brand (gypsy bus) different location in the bus station.

Neither the website nor the app notified this. We were in the bus station, but we missed the bus.

title: Most impolite drivers ever who are even willing to run over your children with their bus!
text: I really think Flixbus only hires you as a driver if you have no sense of customer service at all and are just rude and impolite. Not even a hello from the driver, no help at all. And when I reached my destination and got out of the bus I was getting my suitcase out of the bus with my 4 year old and 8 year old. Another bus came up and apparantely my kids were standing at the end of the parking spot where the bus had to park. Ok sir, my bad, but how the hell dare you to drive your bus forward while honking and making hand movements with a mad face without giving the kids a moment to go stand somewhere else! Still very upset and mad about the experience and I really cannot understand why Flixbus doesn't do anything about the behavior of their drivers! Especially since there are so many bad reviews online.

title: A DISASTER!!!! NO LO COJAIS
text: A FLYBUS disaster!!!!! I took it to travel to the night of the Intermodal from Bilbao to Lisbon. I'm 2 hours late and we weren't told anything. I was alone at 2:00 in the morning not knowing what to do but the worst came later. I had paid for a seat to go more comfortable and found a man lying sleeping in my square. The driver did nothing, there were even people sleeping in the hallway. All dirty, there was vomit everywhere, Third World.

title: Bad trip Paris/ Viseu
text:
I do not recommend. The experience was terrible.
The trip from Paris to Viseu started 1h late because there is no organization or coordination
No check in. We were told that the bathroom of the bus was broken down, we had to subject it to the stops.
At the stop of the city of Guarda (previously Celorico da Beira) the new driver warned that he should only leave the same person who was going to change bus, (he spoke only in Portuguese). A foreign gentleman left because he wanted to go to the bathroom. Despite the warnings of some passengers, the driver ran off and left this gentleman to his luck, saying it was for him to learn. It was a very boring and difficult to understand situation. Next we made a stop in Celorico da Beira for lunch, 40 minutes.
A foreign passenger gets abandoned to his luck because the bus was late (this delay was from the company). After a lot of our insistence, they communicated to the company and said that they would resolve the situation of such a passenger. Let's believe it. Finally, in Celorico da Beira we were told that the bathroom of the bus was working.
Cheap comes expensive, medium service.

title: Driver using mobile phone
text: We felt very unsafe! The driver was on his mobile phone on and off throughout the trip. Answering calls, texting, at times his hands were not even on the wheel while using his phone, so very dangerous and illegal. I will never use flu bus again and will advise anyone who asks me not to use. I put on a complaint and have had no reply. I‚Äôm afraid a terrible tragedy will happen if these drivers are not reprimanded.

title: Flixbus is a scam!
text: We booked a return ticket from Lisboa Oriente to Caldas and arrived 20 min ahead, at line 1017, quai 37. We talked to all bus drivers who stopped there, they told us to wait. Other passengers also waited. The bus didn't come, all of us contacted help line, all of us were cut down arrogantly and told we were wrong. A mix of foreigners and Portuguese complained. Non of us got reimbursed, some of the passengers were very poor. May flixbus go to hell!

title: Poor maintenance, cleaning, stressed drivers, no eating, no drinking
text:
The overall impression of Flix Bus is poor, you would like to pay 20% more if the quality were right.

Dirty, unfriendly, poorly maintained, and the drivers have a very unpleasant, stressful driving style due to their negative energy.

The train stations and bus stops in Portugal are also littered and smell of urine, but Flixbus is not solely to blame.

- No food and no drinking allowed, even no nuts etc.

- countless cracks and stone chips in the windshield - there is a lack of maintenance and repair.

- Expired inspection of fire extinguishers 05/25 in June.

-

title: Elderly couple left behind at rest stop
text:
We travelled by Flixbus from Lisbon Airport to Porto with a rest stop along the way. The driver did not speak any English, he was shouting and yelling right from the start and the only thing I heard was "10 minutes" and some kind of stern warning. I took that to mean I had to be fast at the rest stop.
We did stop and then quickly got back on board when about ten minutes down the road I noticed the elderly couple to my left had not got back on the bus. All their belongings were on their seat but not them. I went up to the front of the bus to tell the driver please turn around or call the Colibri stop where we left them. He was abusive, there were a few people at the front who translated as the driver spoke no English. I felt quite distraught at the thought of leaving those elderly folks behind and all their belongings and suitcases still on the bus. Could he even call back to make sure they were OK? The driver basically told me to shut up and get off the bus in Porto, when I again pleaded with him. What if they needed medication or their phones, and how will they get to Porto? It was by far the worst experience I have ever had, the most uncaring driver I have ever encountered and it took days not to feel that I had abandoned two elderly people. My only hope was that having since met many lovely and kind people in Portugal someone must have helped them. I have a sense this driver may not have been Portuguese. Be warned the abuse of this particular driver and his uncaring attitude has continued to stay with me long after my trip to Portugal is over.

title: Passenger comfort is replaced by profit for the company
text: Bad experience in terms of comfort. The number of seats in the bus is increased in order to increase the profit of the company, proportionately reducing the comfort of passengers who are limited to places with no leg space, especially when some passenger with little concern for the comfort of others decides to tilt their backbone backwards. The low price does not compensate for the lack of comfort on long trips. I do not recommend.

title: Misinformation
text:
I had to take the bus from Faro to Lisbon, and although I informed that I had to take it at the Faro bus station, the exit of it did not appear on any screen, and where they sell the tickets do not give information about Flixbus (they have a sign where they expressly clarify)...I ended up being helped by the girl who attends the cafeteria of the stations, who pointed out that somewhere where the buses park before departure, I was going to find it. Luckily, I had arrived in advance of the departure time of the bus to Lisbon, otherwise while searching the entire terminal from where the Flix buses were leaving, I would have missed it SURE!!!!
In this case the problem is both the terminal and Flix that do not clearly report the irregular situation in the same...
To top it off, I then had to deal with the bad modes of the driver, who had trouble for 3 seconds trying to read the QR code, and not register it. Very bad experience that could have ended worse!!!

title: Pretty bad
text: The drivers are very arrogant and does not respect him nobody did the trip trucks they just want to stop and have some business with the cafes very bad

title: Long haul with Flixbus, never again !!!!
text: We booked Flixbus from Torres Vedras (Portugal) to Lisbon (Oriente) and then connected with Flixbus from Lisbon (Oriente) to Madrid. The bus from Torres Vedras to Lisbon (1 hour) was great. HOWEVER, the bus from Lisbon to Madrid (8 hours) on 5 June was terrible. Legroom worse than the cheapest airline economy seat. Broken aircon vents, broken overhead bins, people drinking alcohol on bus, disinterested driver. We booked a return with Flixbus but opted to book a flight back to Lisbon with Easyjet. Long haul with Flixbus, never again !!!

title: Double payment without tickets
text: I made the payment in the respective application, made a mistake but the payment was debited, twice. I await feedback as they make the return, considering that there is no customer support phone contact, the same is done via a chat platform. I have already written via chat with 4 people and so far have not solved anything.

title: Worst Bus Ride of My Life
text:
One of the worst experiences I've ever been through while traveling. I did research ahead of time and saw that Flixbuses had restrooms, allowed food, and/or sold food on the bus. Sadly, I did not read the reviews.

We got our tickets for a 6 hour bus ride from Coimbra to Lagos. When we got to the bus, it was chaos. The bus drivers weren't helpful when we were loading our suitcases and were not friendly at all, and gave little direction on where to put them.

When we got on the bus, we saw a sign that said no eating or drinking, and when asked if there were restrooms on the bus, we were told no. The bus drivers even joked in Portuguese saying "what, next they will ask if there are beds, too." They didn't know that my husband could understand them.

Our 1st stop was to pick up more passengers (this was 30 minutes after we left). We asked to get off the bus to use the restroom and were told no that there was no time, that we'd only be there for a few minutes and that the next stop would be in an hour. Although they said it would be quick, they ended up taking 30 minutes to pick up the passengers. We could have quickly went to the restrooms but weren't permitted.

Once we left, about 30 minutes passed and we desperately had to use the restrooms. The driver's assistant was rude and said it would be a half an hour more. I told him I was going to be sick and had to use the restroom urgently. He told the driver, who stopped 10 minutes later to allow just those in our party to go to the restroom (noone else was allowed to get off the bus).

Once we got back on the bus, we didn't stop again until 1.5 hours later, even though we were originally told it would be an hour for our 1st stop (it ended up being 2 hours!).

The bus driver had his phone discreetly hidden on his left side so he could watch the football game during the drive. I have video and photos to prove this.

We made the BIG mistake of not reading reviews before we took this bus trip.
NEVER AGAIN!

title: Ruined
text: Wish I could give 0 stars. I‚Äôve used this service multiple times and had good experiences but the drivers I had on Friday May 30 from Lagos to Lisbon at about midday has absolutely made sure I will never give my money to this company ever again. These boys should be fired, that‚Äôs the end of it. Entitlement. Mistreatment if I‚Äôve ever seen it

title: AC not working
text:
we took a bus from lisbon to porto
at 9:30 am till 12:30 on May 30 friday

The AC wasnt working properly ..only hot air
it was very hot
everyone was sweating
smell was bad
no rest
we were suffocating
worst experience ever

title: AVOID FLIXBUS IF YOU CAN
text: I took the bus Lisbon to A Coru√±a, we had to swap busses in Porto. The bus got there a bit late so we only had 20 or 25 minutes to change. I decided against going to the bathroom because it's on the top floor and there's usually a queue, just so I wouldnt miss the bus. I stayed for the entire time at the platform the screen was saying my bus would leave from. It never showed up. All of the sudden a few muntes after the time the screen started to show a different destination from the same platform. I then went to information and they said the bus left without me, from that platform. The wouldn't believe me when I said it didn't, I was there the entire time, the bus is bright green, there's no way I would had missed that. I had to buy a new trip and wait for 2 hours. The never took responsability.

title: Worst bus experience
text:
5 booked trips none was possible to go in shame on this Flixbus ‚Ä¶
Assistance is horrible and with this guys impossible to have your money back if something goes wrong üëéüëéüëé

title: Don't waste your money & upfront seats
text:
payed for front row seat . Then another Flixbus driver sat next to me & continually talked to the driver . Rows 2ab&3ab were empty. Why should I pay for a front row seat to have another person who hasn't payed for the front row seat & Flixbus employee. I asked the driver to move to the other empty seats as he was distracted driver because he was continually talking to the driver. He refused so I had to move to an empty row so I could have a RELAXING trip .
Cost be ‚Ç¨4.95 , save your money

title: Just stay away from FLIXBUS.
text: Just stay away from this miserable transportation company, traveling from Lisboa to Lagos, first of all the bus was late one hour then two buses üöå cam at the same time. Full time chaos when people was not directed to the correct bus and loaded their bags in the wrong one. When entering the bus the toilet was out of order imagine a three hour long ride without a chance to to on the toilet.

title: Delayed without notice
text:
Very complicated if something goes out of schedule! I have traveled more times in this company and never had problems. This time, they delayed the journey an hour, they notified by message. When we arrived at the new scheduled time the bus had already left half an hour ago, we were not warned nor even compensated for it! We had q wait more than 4 hours during the dawn and pay new tickets.
Without any kind of care with the customer

title: With great ease they abandon their passengers on the highway
text:
Lisbon port of 27/04/2025 at 10:45 am line 1004, Bus full. The toilet, according to the driver, was out of order and locked. At 10:40 a passenger who had an urge found the toilet door closed, asked the driver if, given the disruption, he could go to the terminal toilet possibly delaying the departure by a few minutes in case he could not get back by 10.45. The driver with intransigence said no. The passenger remained in the car with his discomfort. In the end, however, the bus left 10 minutes late.

At 2/3 of the way, after numerous requests from other passengers, the bus made a stop at the motorway.
Some passengers stayed in the car, others like me and my wife got out to stretch a little 'but remaining in the immediate vicinity of the vehicle, others reached the services of the Grill car.
After a few minutes while getting back in the car my wife screamed because the door was closing and had to back off. I pushed the door from the inside with my foot, managing to open it and let my wife back in. Then the door closed again. The other passengers still on the ground who witnessed the scene ran towards the bus agitating to have the doors reopened. After a few moments of hesitation the driver reopened the doors and let them in. then closed again and left. Two other passengers left on the ground ran to cross the bus route and scrambled to make it stop. The driver accelerated and passed the two boys who had arrived less than five from the bus leaving them in the motorway without their luggage.
I counted the empty seats and there were more than 10.

Once on the highway one person went to complain to the driver because his fellow travelers had been left on the ground. Then the driver stopped in the emergency lane where he abandoned that person who got out with his and other backpacks
The bus started again as if everything were normal.

Once they arrived in Porto and got off all clearly several checked bags were not collected.

title: Refund after 1h30 delay
text: If you have scheduled or appointment do not go with this company. They're not punctual. And only refunds after waiting 1h30

title: GREAT DISAPPOINTMENT AND CAUSE OF ANXIETY
text: I tried booking Lisbon to Evora 4 times before one of my credit cards was accepted. Flixbus advertised that there would be a toilet on the bus - but there was none. I tried to get SMS updates from Flixbus but found that my country (Israel) was not not recognized - so I could not get the service. To return, I tried many times to book a return ticket - but the Flixbus website did not work. So returned on a competitor's bus service.

title: Driver on his mobile phone without hands-free
text: We were appalled that the very unfriendly FlixBus driver from Lisbon to Porto was chatting on his mobile phone without using hands-free or Bluetooth whilst driving through the city - same again before reaching Porto. Not only is it illegal to do so, it also puts the safety of all the passengers at risk!!

title: No s√≥ good
text: Driver is very rude and agressive and main thing no toilet even if you are in an emergency you can do nothing.If you have any Health problem then dont travel from Flix bus

title: Don‚Äôt do it
text: Dismal incorrect advertising by Flix bus The bus itself was very good with good seats, decent legroom a small luggage rack for coats BUT the website states ALL flix bus have toilets and that you can eat on them I booked a return ticket to Lisbon from Armacao because of the toilet as I am on a chemotherapy drug meaning I MUST have access to a toilet in a reasonable time There was nothing wrong with the toilet on the bus it was locked because they don‚Äôt want to clean them This was both ways of our trip Our driver had to stop for me at a truck stop gas station to use a toilet that I barely made it to and then felt terrible he needed to stop This was supposed to be a treat to get out for me and why I booked this bus so please Do not book or check they actually have an OPEN toilet Also we purchased a small sandwich and drink and fruit to eat and were told nothing foodie on the bus but saw others just sneak it on and eat it anyways GRRRR Flix bus pull up your socks children, elderly and people shouldn‚Äôt need to wait three hours for a toilet

title: Flix lies
text: Flix bus advertises that their coaches have restrooms. That is not always true. My Portimao to Lisbon trip (3 hours 20 minutes) had no bathroom. Also Flix website says you can eat on the bus.... When I got on the bus I had a bag of nuts. The driver aggressively told me (zero politeness) that food was not permitted. So Flix gets the lowest possible rating for telling blatant lies in their online marketing. Also, their seating is cramped and uncomfortable. Recommendation to all, take the train.

title: Lousy.
text: Journey from Lisbon to Madrid, 9h, from the beginning they took our food they said that if we wanted to eat we would eat it in 5min or if we didn't have to leave it down where the bags, after this at no time of the trip made stop to eat something or to rest, abysmal service, all the hungry passengers and nothing did, I DON'T RECOMMEND

title: P√©ssimo
text: Muito insatisfeita com o servi√ßo da flixbus. Na viagem de ida (Lisboa ‚Äî> Porto) o motorista n√£o foi nada agrad√°vel, fic√°mos parados imenso tempo no aeroporto, e portanto, cheg√°mos ao destino 40min depois. Disse que a casa de banho do autocarro ia estar fechada, e que parar√≠amos em Leiria, no entanto, o wc do autocarro aparece como um servi√ßo inclu√≠do quando compramos o bilhete. Na viagem de volta, o motorista disse que n√£o ia haver nem uma √∫nica paragem, numa viagem de 3horas e 15min. Completamente rid√≠culo pensar que em 3 horas e 15min, mais uns minutos de atraso, ningu√©m vai ter vontade de ir ao wc, seja por que motivo for. S√≥ me restou aguentar a vontade durante este tempo todo. N√£o volto a utilizar mais este servi√ßo.

title: P√©ssimo servi√ßo
text:
Aproximei a plataforma 39D na Gare de Oriente, pois era a terminal para subir o meu autocarro at√© campanha. Fiz o scann do Bilhete o c√≥digo n√£o leu, o motorista disse que n√£o era o autocarro, perguntei com muito respeito se podia me ajudar, pq o bilhete indicava √† plataforma aonde o autocarro estava, ele disse n√£o sei o Senhor deve procurar o seu autocarro. Afastei-me para ver a informa√ß√£o do autocarro que passa encima do vidro frontal, era destino Porto-Campanha, voltei a fila lhe mostrei novamente o mesmo bilhete, para fazer o scann, Ele voltou a questionar se n√£o sabia ler, esse n√£o trabalho dele, come√ßou a exaltar a voz. No final diz o seu atutocarro, ia sair √†s 9:30 e o que estava ali era das 9h.
Depois de tanta estupidez.

Quer dizer n√≥s pagamos os servi√ßos da Flexibus, para sermos distratados ? Parecia que estava a fazer-me um favor dar me informa√ß√£o. Muito arrogante e estupido, logo pela manh√£ j√° atende as pessoas com essa estupidez e frieza e mau humor. A matr√≠cula do autocarro √© 76XA22, saiu do oriente com destino ao Porto(Campanha), as 9h de hoje dia 22.02 na plataforma 39D

Motorista com tatuagem no pesco√ßo, n√£o sei se era racismo ou ele mesmo √© estupido de natureza.
J√° apanhei v√°rias vezes o Flexibus e nunca tive problemas, mas esse vosso motoristas mal educado foi lament√°vel.

title: Never again!
text: The driver drove like a maniac; tailgating cars, speeding, flashing his lights so other drivers would get out of the way. On top of that, a guy who was clearly on s√≥mething, kept harassing other passengers, including us. Our two daughters ended up crying, they were that scared. Not recommended.

title: Lousy service,
text: I don't buy it again after 3 hours waiting they leave me at 3 a.m. on the ground by mistake on date. Early morning üò™üò™üò™üò™üò™üò™ at Porto airport.

title: POOR COMPANY
text:
On 28/12/2024, I arrived at the pick-up point indicated on the ticket (3220486451) at 02h00, 30 minutes before the scheduled departure time. However, the bus did not pick up passengers at the specified location. I, along with five other passengers, waited until 3:30 p.m., initially assuming it was a delay. After checking the location of the bus on the company‚Äôs website, we found that it was already on its way to Braga, completely ignoring the pickup at the point indicated. It is important to emphasize that the pick-up point is properly marked and indicated on the site (east gate), there is no room for errors about the location because everything is very well marked. Since the next bus to Braga would only depart at 07:00, I was forced to purchase another ticket to Porto at 04:00 (reserve 3220504338) with arrival at 07:25 and another ticket to Porto-Braga (reserve 3220508361) with departure at 08:45 and arrival at 09:55, incurring additional costs and waiting times. When I approached the driver of this bus for clarification, I was informed that the driver responsible for the pickup failure did not belong to Flixbus, having grossly cut the conversation indicating that the driver who should have stopped did not belong to the company since they are all subcontractors. Immediately during the trip I requested the refund through the company‚Äôs website (a form intentionally difficult to find to prevent customers from asking for refund) explaining what happened, including adding the name and email of 2 more passengers who were with me and who were in the same situation. Heis that on the same day 28/12 at 13:27 (incredibly quick to investigate the success but completely incompetent to solve) the company responds to me as follows:

Protocol N¬∞42411012
In analyzing the attached reservation, I was able to verify that no delays were reported and passengers embarked on the journey. So that we can begin the analysis of your case, we need evidence of the reporting delay. We await your reply!
With my best compliments,
DJHENYPHER da FlixBus

In the form I filled out to explain what happened, I never mentioned any "delay", the driver never passed through the pick-up point even.

When calling the company‚Äôs customer service line for the refund line, the assistant says they can do nothing. I called another assistant again and the conversation was the same. I asked to talk to your supervisor and she answers that it's not possible. I asked for your full name to make a complaint about your rough care and it didn't provide me. I requested the employee number or email and also did not provide.

It should be noted that all the employees with whom I had contact from this company, from telephone assistants and drivers, all have the same standard; they are all of Brazilian nationality, (nothing against even because I am Brazilian too) but were all without exception poorly educated, poorly trained, rude, all speak in a tone that more seems to be asleep and of such ignorance that makes any customer lose his calm.

This undertaking should be duly audited and supervised by the competent bodies.

I do not recommend this company to anyone. Even with 2 more witnesses in the same situation as me, with their name and email still need evidence of how the driver did not stop at the point indicated on the ticket. Fortunately I have audio recordings that show the total lack of professionalism of the customer service line. I advise all who use this line to record the conversation because although they also record, they will never provide the audio if requested.

I advise all those who are hurt by this company to preeencher the online complaint book and to initiate a trial in the Peace courts as I myself will do, it is free. Not just for the ‚Ç¨21 I lost, but for this company to be properly monitored, as well as all its employees. And as it is obvious I will demand compensation for all the trouble and extra expenses I have had.

title: Poor customer service
text: I recently purchased a round-trip ticket on Flixbus to leave from Lisbon Oriente to Fatima and back. I arrived at the stated platform on my ticket 30 minutes before the bus departure intentionally to navigate my way around the station and the platforms since it was my 1st time in Lisbon and 1st time using Flixbus. I found the designated platform and waited there during this time. The slot at the designated platform was also unoccupied. I noticed there was no bus at departure time. I found another Flixbus driver who informed me I had just missed my bus and that it left from a different platform. I attempted to get assistance from the Flixbus chat on my phone which was not very helpful. I ended up purchasing another ticket for the next bus (person on chat advised that bus was sold out when it wasn't). I've written to Flixbus customer service requesting a refund for the new ticket I ended up purchasing since now I had basically bought 2 tickets from Lisbon Oriente to Fatima and only used one. Their response was basically that the bus left on time and from the designated platform, so I'm not entitled to a refund. Not sure how they can insist on that when I was actually there, and another bus driver confirmed the different platform. Don't appreciate that Flixbus customer service is implying that I am lying. Will definitely be looking at other bus options in the future. Everything else about my trip was great - just that it is now overshadowed by this experience with Flixbus poor customer service.

title: Very poor
text:
I went from Cascais to Porto and back. Bus on time and up here ok.

On the way driver very rude, no wifi, seats smashed, bathroom out of service so stop after two hours of travel.

On the return same situation, but working bathroom (and disgustingly dirty) so I travel more than four hours nonstop

I don't think they'll see me again.

title: Watch your suitcase!!!
text:

The driver has no helper and when validating all tickets the area of the bus where the bags are located is completely open from side to side. We noticed when we got to Porto.
The person from flixbus showed 0 empathy just told us filled out the form, here we are still waiting for some response ü§° We went to the police to report and were told that there are several cases and apparently it is common in orient. Please only 1 person can not have control of that.

title: Worst Bus Company I've Dealt With
text: I had to cancel my trip from Porto to London and fly instead. I did so within the time period to receive a 50% refund. Instead of refunding me however they gave me a voucher. When I cancelled my trip their website didn't give me the option of a refund, only a voucher so I had to select this to cancel my trip. You have to then apply for a refund instead of a voucher which they declined since "we cannot provide a cashback refund for any balance on a voucher." I explained in an email that their website didn't give me the option for a cashback refund. They clearly didn't even read my email since they replied with the same nonsense. Keeping in mind I lost 140 euros to this company, 70 being the 50% refund that I am owed. I live on the other side of the world where we don't have flixbus so this voucher is useless to me. I highly advise you use another bus company or just fly. Utterly disgusted in the "service" I've received from flixbus.

title: DUTY COMPANY
text: I lost two buses from Faro to Lisbon due to the poor location of the departure point, difficult access, the maps do not recognize the place and there is no one to inform.. The company does NOT reimburse tickets that I did not use and is not responsible for my loss. FLIXBUS IS A VERY DUBIOUS COMPANY AND WITHOUT ANY TRANSPARENCY AVOID USING ITS SERVICES!

title: Very very very Unreliable
text: This is the most unreliable and dishonest bus service provider ever. I have recently booked a trip from Lisbon to Porto on 16 Sep 2024 at 1.20pm. At 1.20 pm sharp only did the company texted me to inform about the bus cancellation. I proceeded with rescheduling the trip for a later time on the same day and was cancelled again 30 minutes later. When I finally got another schedule at 5.30pm, this too was cancelled last minute at 4.51pm. When I asked for a refund, I could only get a voucher for the same company. I contacted the customer service. I was told that I couldn't get a monetary refund as the cancellation was done from my side ( I requested for a refund on the website but I also had return tickets in the same booking which have to be cancelled). The customer service is also less than helpful. How am I to trust the this company again for such a dishonest service? Not only is my money wasted but my precious time is all down the drain. I had to make last minute arrangement for my travel to Porto which was extremely inconvenient and pricey. Please, for your own mental health and time sake, do not engage with Flixbus for any of your travel needs.

title: Missed bus

title: Albuferia to Lisbon.
text: Booked 1a 1b and a total waste of money as your feet were against a panel and minimal legroom. Going out marginally better with good ac but coming back horrendous and the driver held a social conversation for 45 minutes travelling at 100kmh not hands free .Would never use again as their is an accident waiting to happen. Toilets not working sign displayed which I suspect is a lie as the driver doesn't want to clean them out .Bus station is 5k from scenic Lisbon so you need to get a bolt or uber .

title: Not very nice

title: Flixibus Lisbone - Porto do not use it!!!
text:
We buy tickets from Lisbon to Porto direct departing from the Oriente terminal.
When we bought the ticket it said the bus had wc, wifi and air conditioning.
1 hour before the trip we received an email saying that due to "technical problems" the bus had no toilet.
Once on the bus, the air conditioning never worked properly. Personally and other travelers went to ask the driver to please turn on the air conditioning as the bus is closed airtight and without air the atmosphere was not only heavy but very hot, the driver seemed not to understand the request of the travelers.
Wi-fi service: never had internet.
In short, do not take this bus line. It is false what they announce.
If you have the opportunity I used another service.
This Flixibus service I do not recommend.

title: FALSE IN SERVICE- DISCONSULTS THE FLIXBUS SERVICE
text:
On August 17, 2024, in Castelo Branco, Portugal, at 16:05 the bus simply did not show up
On this day, a group of passengers, including several children, were waiting for the bus scheduled for 16.05. However, he did not show up at the road station, leaving us exposed to extreme weather conditions, with temperatures above 35 degrees Celsius. The bus arrived only at 5:43, but this was the vehicle scheduled for 5:25. The driver refused to give priority to the passengers who had been waiting for almost two hours and informed us that the driver of the bus at 16:05 had felt bad but that he would be coming soon.
Unfortunately, that didn't happen. After more than two hours of waiting and without any kind of support or guidance from FlixBus, we were forced to look for alternatives to continue with our journey. I also point out that the Portuguese customer support line was not available to provide any assistance, as it only works Monday to Friday, from 9am to 5pm.
I believe that FlixBus has failed seriously in providing a minimally decent service, not only because of the absence of the bus, but also because of the lack of alternatives or assistance to passengers, especially in such adverse weather conditions. This situation caused me great discomfort and discomfort, as well as exposing children to inappropriate conditions for a long period of time.
The photo corresponds to the bus of 17:25 arrived at 17:43

title: Horse Sh*t
text: Utter sh*t currently still on it even tho advertised on the website saying all passengers are able to eat and drink on the bus the as we were getting on the bus the driver took our food off of us saying we were not allowed to eat on a 3 hour bus journey from lisbon to porto from 6 until 9 so litterally all throughout dinner time me and my girlfriend havent eaten since mid day we are starving the driver was also rude throughout the journey aswell as for some reason around the start of the journey he just randomly stopped the bus on the side of the road got out no one knows why then 5 mjnutes later got back in and drove off oh and tried asking customer servuce if this was normal and if the websites just wrong or something and its been an hour now and still havent gotten a message back he also for some reason diddnt even scan our tickets at the start oh and im not even gunna meantion the 0 legroom issue as another review already has done that so a suggestion to everyonr dont try save money if you want a vhill rude with good views get the train do not and i mean this DO NOT take flixbus

title: Worst experience of my life
text:
I went with FlixBus from Lagos to Porto, or at least that is what I booked. At the second rest stop I was left behind. The bus driver did not do a count to see how many passengers were aboard, just drove off without me, taking all my luggage with him.
I lodged a lost luggage form and called customer service. I could see with my AirTag that my luggage had gone back down to the Algarve. I was told by customer service they couldn‚Äôt put me through to the lost and found team; I‚Äôd just have to wait for an email and that it could take up to 14 days to locate my luggage. I don‚Äôt understand why it would possibly take so long when I have the address on my AirTag. I called again, to ask for the lost and found email and the customer service officer was so rude. He said they did not have the email address for lost and found and kept talking over the top of me before hanging up. Currently stuck in a foreign country with nothing but a phone and the outfit I was wearing on the bus.

title: Absolute True Experience. No one deserves this! Âú®Ê¨ßÊ¥≤ÈÅ≠ÈÅáÁßçÊóèÊ≠ßËßÜ
text:
Absolutely the WORST PART during my whole approximate 10-day stay in Portugal. Booked two buses for my trips in and out Lisbon, and met rude and indifferent drivers for both of the rides. Seems like none of the drivers at their company have the basic capability to at least say ‚ÄúHi‚Äù or ‚ÄúBye‚Äù to their customers, or give a basic helping hand for luggages. The first driver was on her phone speaking at a 100db voice for at least 1.5hr. The second driver just spoke one sentence to me ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt eat on my bus‚Äù at the very first second, whilst I was NEITHER holding any food on my hands, NOR i look like a gluttonous pig or something.

For the second ride, I paid extra money for the most front row seat in order to get some personal space. And the madame next to me just could not stop talking loudly on her phone for 3 hours straight, and rudely sticking her FAT leg (not exaggerating) into my space from the very first second. I gave her a gaze, trying not to arouse any possible disputes, and she started to spit out a string of Portuguese to me, and still refused to move an inch of her fat leg, so i have to lean myself into the aisle for the whole 3.5hr trip. Though i couldn‚Äôt understand a single word she was saying, but i could tell it was definitely something impolite, and somehow RACISM. And a bunch of passengers were playing videos or tiktoks out loud in the whole bus, so the whole space was incredibly noisy and unbearable, more like a marketplace. When i got off the bus, I never felt such a strong salvation and relief in my life.üòá

My whole journey in Europe and in Portugal had been great and have met loads of nice people along the way, until I rode this HELL of a ride on Flixbus. However, i still wanna believe in that most of Portuguese people are friendly, well-behaved, and are NOT racists. Thanks to Flixbus, whom left an indelible STAIN in my memory of Portugal. Will Never Ever ride a Flixbus again in my life time, and will definitely try my best to STOP any friends or family members from booking a Flixbus. People come for vacays, which should be comfortable and stress-less, and absolute NO ONE should deserve this kind of treatment.

title: Extra seat con!
text: I bought a ticket and reserved a seat and an extra seat which was my right and paid for both. A few days later they changed my ticket and canceled my extra seat which I needed. I wrote to their customer care service chat stating that I have a leg condition and I need two seats and they couldn‚Äôt resolve and they said there are some priority passengers buying ticket and taking my already paid next seat! So I canceled the ticket and bought another ticket again with second seat selection. In a few hours they canceled my extra seat again without asking me! So I canceled my ticket and bought 2 tickets with different names this time because I needed that seat because of my leg condition. They didn‚Äôt cancel of course. When we took of half of the bus. Was empty and there were a lot of empty seats!!!! So they are just making things harder just for you to buy 2 tickets instead of buying extra seat! If you don‚Äôt want people to buy extra seats you just don‚Äôt give them the right to buy an extra seat not mislead them with your priority passenger lies! I guess I will never use Flixbus again!

title: Poor service

title: Total Rip Off

title: The dirtiest and most disgusting bus I've ever seen
text:
I'm on the Flixbus bus going from Madrid to Lisbon, on February 9, 2024. I had already taken other trips with the same company and they were always great. But this time I couldn't believe it when I got on board. I asked the employee if it was really that vehicle.
It was very disgusting, dirt everywhere, unhealthy! bags of snacks, coffee cups spilled on the seats, on the floor, toilet paper between the seats, all the baskets on the seats were dirty and it smelled really bad. Even the curtains were filthy. I didn't imagine it would be possible to make a trip in this condition, this bus should be banned.

title: Vigaristas, bad experience

title: RELAX TURNED TO TERROR
text:
IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE AN AFTERNOON OF RELAXATION...

I found out the hard way that the water in the float tub is the same water that dozens of people pass through.
I think this should be informed to the consumer before purchasing.
The room where the bathtub is located is dark, the floor is wet and slippery.
To top off the experience, when I was in the shower, the lights turned off, leaving me in the pitch black.

I had to feel around the walls until I found the door and opened it, even though I was naked, to be able to find the robe.
There was no power outage.
No one could explain the reason for the "blackout"
I noticed that the water in the bathtub had not been drained and the employees told me that all customers use the same water but that it was "purified" between one customer and another.

I bought a package for 290 euros, called a trip to the East, because of the Ayurvedic massage.

A few hours before, I was informed by SMS that there was no professional qualified to do this type of massage and that it would be replaced by another.

The exfoliation is made with a grain of raw salt, which is condemned by dermatological medicine, as it causes microlesions in the epidermis, due to the sharp edges it has.

I felt pain and asked to see what was being "rubbed" into my skin and it was raw salt.

Skin exfoliation is only permitted clinically with microspheres.

A Spa of this size should be aware of this.

The professionals Aisha and Simone were impeccable.

As for the company, I felt deceived in several aspects and I make this long statement so that other people can be aware of the risks of contamination when paying dearly for a float in waters that may contain sperm, menstruation, urine and feces from countless people. customers who passed by.

title: Worst

text:
