title: Costs much without the reward
text: I started planning to book this tour when seeing the Initiation Well was part of it. No longer an option but cost is the same! The guide kept saying she wanted to do what we wanted but she did not want us to stop for pictures or sights where there was no traffic on the mountain pass road that was beautiful but we had to stay at turbo speed and if I lagged by 15 seconds she was upset even though I verbalized I enjoyed going slower to appreciate the surroundings and wanted to stop at the boulders and views that ere shown other tours did stop at. At the end we had 40 extra minutes at the train station with only tourist trap area to see; No beauty that we had just sped through on the mountain and rugged beach coast. Lunch was good but longer than needed. And I appreciated the small group I was with. Good for knowing there are beautiful mountain roads on Sintra.

title: Not a tour. Just a bike ride.
text: I am so sorry to have to write a negative review but I have to give honest feedback. The tour- was not a tour as others said but rather a bike ride. You will not learn much. We did not visit the beach. We blazed through a crowded Sintra. The chosen route was often very crowded with cars and pedestrians. Lunch was way too long- which was because of the other guests who wanted to eat a lot but it is up to the guide to keep us on schedule. Maya drank a lot at lunch (2 bottles) and sorry that is not acceptable from a tour guide. Her objective was to keep us safe but her tone got increasingly angry and hostile. In the end, no one tipped which was painful for us. Maya is sweet but this tour needs to be improved.

title: Dangerous ride! Would not Recommend!
text:
I'd like to recount my dangerous experience on April 22, 2024:

1) The tour description proved highly misleading and inaccurate.

1.1 -- Despite claiming suitability for all age groups from 14 to 99 in the bike tour description (Picture 1), the reality was quite different. The trip encompassed numerous challenging climbs and covered a considerable distance of about 60 km (45 miles). While I managed to complete the journey, it's improbable that most individuals in their 50s, 60s, or 70s could undertake such a demanding ride in a single day, not to mention those in their 80s or 90s.
1.2 -- The trip was advertised as an 8-hour excursion, with a start time of 9:30 am, suggesting a return around 5:30 pm. However, we didn't return until approximately 6:30 pm

2) The safety of this trip is highly questionable.
In our group of seven, including the guide, three individuals, including myself and the guide, experienced falls (that is 3/7 chance of fall). The guide, Maya, fell and injured herself while attempting to avoid a car on a narrow road, highlighting the inherent dangers of the journey. The route included traversing very narrow, bumpy, and heavily trafficked streets, hardly the serene countryside tour promised in the tour description.

3) Lack of consideration for slower participants was evident throughout the trip.
Despite encountering issues with two members with their e-bike and falling behind, the guides did not stay with us. Instead, they rode ahead, leaving us to navigate the route alone until another participant, Ben, kindly offered his assistance for the remainder of the journey.

4) Poor time management compromises safety.
Excessive time spent at lunch, including the consumption of three bottles of wine by the guide and other participants, contributed to delays. Furthermore, mishandling of meeting times resulted in additional complications, including missed trains and hurried efforts to get back. This ultimately caused an accident as I navigated a sharp turn on a bustling street. Thank God, I did not break my arm or leg!

I would advise strongly against booking this tour.

title: Did not live up to description of tour
text: This bike tour did NOT live up to the description for the tour. We did NOT "visit some wonderful beaches" nor see "fantastic castles and palaces". Was terrible negotiating on the busy roads to avoid the buses and cars. Plus you had to ride and avoid tons of pedestrians to get to the train station. Also not impressed by the consumption of 3 bottles of wine at lunch by Maia and 3 other people. Would not recommend this tour. Totally disappointing.

title: Disappointing Tour! Would not Recommend
text: Did not follow the itinerary that was on the website! We expected to stop at 1-2 beaches as stated on the website. Very few stops to take pictures. Did not visit the palace. The tour guide was way in front of the group. The description of the tour did not come close to our experience, We were on very busy roads, around a lot people and cars and did not feel safe. Would mot recommend!

title: Dangerous ride
text: Bike ride is for very experienced riders. I do spin every day but this ride was something very different. It was ok physically but you need to be very agile to handle the mountain bike part of it. A lot of the ride You are riding on VERY BUSY streets with lots of cars and buses and lots of sharp turns. The guides did not stay with us and rode up far ahead of the group. Not recommended unless you are a very experienced bike rider who also doe‚Äôs mountain biking.

title: Abgesagt
text: Tour wurde vom Veranstalter abgesagt - habe ich TripAdvisor schon 10 Mal mitgeteilt - aber ich werde immer wieder aufgefordert eine Bewertung abzugeben - daher nun eine Ungen√ºgend f√ºr Trip Advisor! Alles klar?

title: Kike palabras desafortunadas...
text: Hicimos el free tour con Kike de chile! Lo que nos cont√≥ fue interesante pero al inicio casi del tour empez√≥ a perseguirnos un se√±or con malas pintas y estaba el grupo nervioso....Kike nos dijo que o est√°bamos atentos al tour o lo paraba...me pareci√≥ totalmente fuera de lugar ese comentario...claro que estamos para escuchar el tour pero si alguien nos persigue y encima con una mala pinta que no veas lo normal es que estemos atentos por si nos robaba. en otra parada nos dio dos minutos para ver una iglesia y a la vuelta faltaba una chica a lo que √©l respondi√≥ que le importaba un huevo ( literalmente) creo que o ese d√≠a ten√≠a un mal d√≠a o es un antip√°tico.

title: Choose Another Company - No Show
text:
I visited Lisbon with my family and we were excited to learn about the city. We arrived at the meeting point early to meet our guide, however he never showed up! We waited an extra 30 mins after the meeting time in the square, but he never came.

I wrote to the guide but he never responded on the Guru messaging platform.

There were many other Tour guides in the square from other companies, would recommend others choosing a different company instead

title: GuruWalk - The Secrets of Lisbon
text: We had booked the 7:00 p.m. tour with Julia in German. At lunchtime we received a call asking if we would also take part in the 5:00 p.m. tour in English, as the 7:00 p.m. tour could not take place. We confirmed this and also received the new dates via WhatsApp. At 5:00 p.m. there was no one at the agreed meeting point. After we had waited another 10 minutes and tried to call the guide (without success) and wrote to him, the excuse was that he had had a bicycle accident and could not come. We later received an email saying that there were not enough bookings. We are more than disappointed and can only advise against using this provider.

title: Utterly Disappointing
text: First of all, the establishment was difficult to find as signage was obscured by trees and cars parked in front. Host seemed distracted and indifferent as if this tasting was an obligation. We pointed out that the other couple who appeared to be looking for the place may have been lost; he said "they'll figure it out" and then told them they'd have to catch up because they were late. Host took "breaks" between tastings and left, no interactions other than brief explanations about the products. The tasting was supposed to be an hour; we finished in 30 minutes. Stale corn nuts and some olives as snacks. All in all, this was a process, not the enjoyable learning experience we had hoped it would be.

title: Absolutely terrible experience
text: Our ‚Äúhost‚Äù (if you can even call him that) was incredibly rude from the start. I tried being polite multiple times, but he was just mean and dismissive in return. It completely ruined the atmosphere. The port wine might have been fine, but it‚Äôs hard to enjoy anything when the person hosting makes you feel unwelcome. Would not recommend this place to anyone ‚Äî there are plenty of better and friendlier tastings elsewhere.

title: Not very nice..
text: It was not a nice experience. Our host Riccardo was very unwelcome and arrogant‚Ä¶ It could be a very nice experience, but sadly it was a bommer. Maybe with a different host it could be very nice, the wine was good.

title: Not worth it
text:
not worth it at all. 3 cups of wine which equal to 10 euros
weird experience to say the least
it wasn‚Äôt enjoyable and there‚Äôs probably way better options than this

title: Forgettable
text: The experience was pretty forgettable, mostly because of the host Ricardo. It was not a very engaging or energetic conversation. The host‚Äôs tone was borderline condescending, the environment was not inviting enough to feel comfortable to ask questions ‚Äî even asking to take a picture of the bottle of wines felt like a big ask.

title: Disappointed
text: Extremely loud and crowded. Average wines. Not for the connoisseur. Great for stag and stagette parties and people who like to party.

title: Disappointing experience!!
text: Not sure why you‚Äôre requesting I review this as you cancelled on me 2 hours before scheduled time! Very disappointing to say the least.

title: Possible scam
text: The activity was cancelled on the day it was supposed to happen. I did not get a reimbursement. There was no explanation given. Terrible experience

title: There are better options
text: We cancelled when no one showed up to do the tour. There were over 20 people standing in the rain outside the locked building. We called to be told he was running late and would be 10-15 mins. Still didn‚Äôt arrive and we called again - further delay. We cancelled as didn‚Äôt think the event would be up to much if one guy was going to try to serve over 20 people meats, cheeses, wines. The only positive was we did receive the refund and found a wonderful wine bar - Wine Lover, Bairro Alto where the owner provided a private tasting.

title: Running Late - From The Vine
text: Was asked to arrive 15 minutes early so we ran from one reservation to the next, in the pouring rain, to only have our host not show. Thankfully TripAdvisor refunded our money, but it definitely was a waste of time. On a side note, we ended up at El Clan and felt like it was a blessing in disguise!!

title: Ripping you off as mugs
text: This business is unreliable. Stood for 30 minutes in the rain and the place was closed . No show. They are a rip-off run by amateurs - avoid at all costs. If you have booked - cancel. I am going to the place tomorrow to try to get a refund ü§û

title: Late cancellation
text: Didn‚Äôt happen! Cancellation was emailed to me 1 hour before experience should have taken place, by this time we were already at the destination. Although we were told that there was an extenuating circumstance, I still feel an hours notice was unacceptable as we were on a tight schedule.

title: Disappointing
text: One our before the wine tasting we got an Whatsapp message that the experience is cancelled. It was a gift to my friend and we planned the day around that experience on the evening. If we had been informed earlier, we would.have planned the day different. All together ist was very disappointing and we.missed half a day of exploring the city of Lisbon.

title: Under delivered
text: So, Andre was a lovely host and there‚Äôs no doubting the passion and vision here, but our wine tasting was actually only half an hour long and we had very small servings of three Portuguese wines, so I really sorry but I can‚Äôt see that this is anything like good value, I‚Äôm afraid.

title: Very Disappointing experience
text:
I always like to do a wine tasting when I visit a new place, and found this the worst value for money wine tasting experience I have done.
We did the Aperitif wine tasting at ‚Ç¨27 per person and stated lasts one hour 6:30-7:30.
By 6:50 the experience was finished.
3 tiny amounts of wine to try with minimal information explained about the wines. Almost as if it was just read off the back of the bottle.
Maybe the lunchtime one is better, but me and my partner felt fully ripped off having spent ‚Ç¨54 to have about 150ml of wine each in total and be in and out in 20 minutes (and that‚Äôs no exaggeration)! A poor experience and no value for money.

title: Wouldn't recommend
text: The snacks that were included were a tiny bowl of peanuts & olives and when I told him I was allergic all he did was separate the two and didn't offer anything else. My pre-dinner wine tasting was actually combined with the wine tasting lunch since it was cancelled that day. There were two parties there for the lunch and 2 parties (one other including my party) there for the pre-dinner wine tasting. The 'lunch" looked nothing like the photo they provided on tripadvisor. And, the other party doing the pre-dinner wine tasting asked to be served the "lunch" that the other two parties were being served and he didn't offer the same to my party, and he didn't charge them for it, which is quite unfair to the 2 parties that paid way more for the "lunch". The tasting took about 30 minutes and we were served 3 glasses (small tasting size) but he said we could stay for a bit so we did. I asked him a few questions when he was on his phone (during down time) and although he answered my questions he was a bit reluctant to go into detail and made it seem like the questions I was asking had very obvious answers. He also asked the other two parties more wine (after they completed their entire tasting) and did not offer my party. Overall, it seems that he treated my party quite poorly. Not sure if it's because we were significantly younger than the rest of the parties but nonetheless we were definitely not treated with as much respect as them. Would not recommend.

title: Wasn‚Äôt even open
text: It was cancelled with no warning. Showed up and waited while the place looked completely closed. I called their phone number multiple times and no one answered. There were about 4 other people who showed up and none of us could understand why it was closed even though we all had a supposed reservation . Even a day later I‚Äôve received no contact or an explanation as to why they didn‚Äôt open.

title: Never again
text: I paid in advance and tasting was cancelled less than an hour before the start. I was told repeatedly I have to cancel within 24 hrs but the business can cancel 45 minutes before the tasting? Very unprofessional-beware!

title: Bad.
text: Highly discouraged because the stop in Belem turned out to be shorter than the directions given , so remained on the ground with many passengers without being able to continue the excursion

title: Average at best
text: The boat was ok, basic seating and picnic tables. The lack of bathroom facilities was very disappointing and not being told prior to boarding made for an uncomfortable ride for one our party.

title: Boring
text: A very grey day didn't help but the tour along the coast of abandoned, graffiti covered industry was not enjoyable. There was no wine at the bar on the boat & no food available to buy apart from crisps & a few chocolate bars.

title: Theft
text: I waited at the meeting point no one showed up, I tried to call the contact no one answered. I asked for a refund, they just said it wasn't possible

title: disappointment
text: Ship not nice, partially broken - red/white tape cordoned off. No information about where you are sailing past. Disappointment, would not recommend.

title: Disappointed
text: Unfortunately, what a disappointment this boat trip was, even though we were promised in advance that there was sufficient shade on the boat, this turned out not to be the case. The sunshade is broken. I am forced to sit indoors with my children, where the air conditioning does not work. They really did try to turn on the air conditioning at the start of the trip, but just feeling the loudspeaker to see if the air conditioning is working doesn't give you much confidence. Screens show where we are sailing past, but these are unreadable due to the sun. There is free WiFi, which is nice, but compensates for the ridiculous price for a bottle of water. I don't often write a review, but I am really disappointed in this trip. If they had just been honest that the sunshade was broken, we would have had a choice not to come along. Now we have nowhere to go.

title: Trip from hell
text: Horrific trip. No ventilation on boat and had to ask for roof to be open to let in fresh air otherwise we would have been roasted alive. The staff member rather reluctantly did what I requested, but shut roof for last thirty minutes of trip. My daughter and myself felt extremely unwell and I actually vomitted when I came off boat, due to the heat. Staff quite rude and no guide

title: Not worth the money at all!
text:
Tour lasted an hour and a half. Would of been good to know what we were going past as new to the city we had no idea what we were looking at which is why I booked a tour. By the end of it we were very bored. Not worth the money really.
The free drink was nuts were nice but considering we booked a tour there was no tour section we just sat there. I understand it‚Äôs a silent tour but either have something to say what you are going past or do come try through headphone or something. The tour (knowing) bit is lacking. It said written in English I didn‚Äôt see anything written anywhere!

title: First time at the Jos√© Saramago Foundation
text:
Not very interesting, although we were welcomed by very friendly people.
What a shame it's not more interactive or unsettling.

title: Horrible experience
text: Worst experience. I contacted them for three days. They never picked up the phone or respond to my trip advisor messages or WhatsApp. I waited for a hour and no one showed up.

title: Beach lounge
text:
We were assured that we were getting VIP treatment in a beach lounge with a welcome drink, and beach loungers to relax on. We were sent pictures of what the beach lounge would look like; this is NOT what was received.

We arrived and the beach club had not received any money from the company for our reservation, only a phone call to reserve a table for a large group of 25.

I called and asked Jorge to meet me at the venue, and instead he quickly paid the tab at the bar (lots of us hadn‚Äôt ordered a drink yet!) and then drove off. We didn‚Äôt meet anyone from the company, and we‚Äôre so shocked that‚Äôs how we were treated we rang again to reassure us that all of our drinks would be paid for. Once we ordered them and sent them a receipt, they then refused to pay.

We asked where the 35‚Ç¨ per person was spent, other than on an 3-8‚Ç¨ welcome drink‚Ä¶.and they said that the rest was used on securing the reservation in the beach lounge. The beach club had never received any money from them, and therefore 700‚Ç¨ was taken from us with nothing to show for it.

The tickets had been booked from early January 2024 and with just 1 week before our trip they couldn‚Äôt even confirm the name of the beach lounge and we‚Äôre unaware of our reservation, times and deposit paid.

We would never book with this company again, and we recommend all other hen and stag do‚Äôs stay well clear.

title: This company is a scam
text:
THIS IS A SCAM
We booked a beach party which included beach lounge and free drink, with loungers, VIP etc
We gave him 875‚Ç¨ and he snuck in and paid ‚Ç¨175 for 27 drinks (which included water) and ran off. The restaurant hadn‚Äôt received any money from him, just a call to say 25 people would be coming‚Ä¶
NO LOUNGE
NO FREE DRINKS
NO LOUNGERS
NO VIP

title: Bad experience. It just didn't happen
text: I am very indignant. I paid and the experience didn't happen. I simply waited 30 minutes at the meeting point and no one showed up. Even though you kept a record of my phone number, I didn't even receive a message. Nothing reliable. I feel sorry for Tripadvisor to record an experience like this. Because for me it was a reliable application. Disgusting, the delight and disrespect towards the consumer.

title: Scamming Incompetent thieves
text:
This is the WORST company and EXPERIENCE I‚Äôve ever had!
We paid for an ‚ÄúAirport Strip luxury limousine transfer‚Äù
This is certainly NOT what we got
Here is a summary of the key issues (keeping the duplicate and minor problems off this to save an essay)

21st April. Our query answered and agreed. Very forceful to take a deposit same day and made it very difficult for us to pay with anything other than a card/ bank transfer that would protect us from fraud etc. This was paid reluctantly by basic card transaction in the end on the same day.
We discussed the option of beach party service but was advised to sort it afterwards (the next day) and was promise a call back

24th April no word from these guys so we chased up for confirmation of the service ordered (limo airport transfer 3 strippers)
And the beach/pool party options. Advised ‚Äòbooked and sorted‚Äô! Nothing more no detail!

27 April: verbal call - nothing sorted
I sent a summary of discussion as they obviously don‚Äôt write anything down

3rd May still no response despite call requests and promises id receive 1
drafted in my colleague to support with their incompetence

4th May evening got a call, only to have to go over all the requirements again inc resending my email address for the confirmation id been waiting for since day 1 (21/04)
I resent all the requirements again in writing
These guys make you feel like they are doing you a favour even though we paid for it.
Abandoned ship on the Pool party stuff as they couldn‚Äôt even get the requirements of the strip transfer right

11th May
They contact us for hotel info
They then proceed to say they don‚Äôt have the limo or the girls to do the transfer and it will now be at our hotel!?!
We said we were specific about it being 3 girls and in a limo and during the transfer
We were told they will try to get what was agreed and paid for and will confirm back

23rd May - no response so we chased again
1 liner response from them as ‚Äúall sorted‚Äù
I sent another summary - which they confirmed

5th / 6th June
They ask for the remainder of the deposit
We reconfirm (now told a bus)
We are forced to agree and pay as no time to sort anything new

9th June transfer day
It‚Äôs a mini bus ( not a limo as per their website
No girls
No champagne on arrival (as per their website)

The entire transfer to our hotel no girls
We contact them the entire way to be told any minute and it‚Äôs a surprise
We get to the top of the road near our hotel and park outside a restaurant where families and children are dining
The bus blocks half the road causing traffic
The girls turn up 15 mins later
They do a show for 10 mins in front of the restaurant and then leave
We then had to walk the rest of the way to our hotel with our luggage

title: Beware - scam!
text:
We booked airport transfer from Faro to Albufeira and it was agreed in advance we were getting a party bus/limo in advance for 10 people. With 3 girls for strip show for the duration of the journey from airport. We paid 900‚Ç¨ for this (¬£800)
Conveniently they only accepted payment into their bank account as their machine didn‚Äôt recognise my credit card (should have been the first flag to us)
Anyway we didn‚Äôt get any strip show for the entire duration, we got a mini bus (100‚Ç¨ mini bus transfer) and no show for the entire journey.
The mini bus then pulled up outside of the hotel next to a restaurant where we waiting a fora further 10 mins for 3 back alley girls to get on the bus for 7 mins of dance.
Very expensive and not what we asked for.
David and Jorge are both scam artists so just be aware and don‚Äôt fall for it like we did!

title: Ikke pengene v√¶rd
text: En dyr tur som ikke er pengene v√¶rd. Vinsmagningen var udem√¶rket, men maden og servicen p√• spisestedet svarede slet ikke til prisen.

title: Dangerous and inappropriate place for children: Fun track alcantara
text: A dangerous and inappropriate place for children. My son of 9 years after we acquired the trampoline service was sitting on the floor and was attacked having been bitten in the head by the chao of the owner or staff member who did not intervene, nor apologized having transferred the responsibility to my son saying "your son is who excited the dog ". The dog was loose in the trampoline area and treated himself like a 5-month-old boxer. This place does not meet minimum safety conditions for children.

title: A place avoid
text: Careful, the owner is physically violent and rude. I have seen disturbing situations in this establishment.

title: 2 person
text: i will stay there 2 days with my cousin i very exited if i go there my cousin come from Germany i wish you please give me information how much price in your hotel room

title: Bilhetes inexistentes
text: Incr√≠vel... tenho estado super atenta para comprar bilhete, √†s 10he30 ainda n√£o havia nada... ausentei me 2h qdo volto j√° est√° esgotado. Acredito q qdo abriu j√° estava esgotado üò°

title: Disappointing experience in the Top Secret room
text: I did the Top Secret room with a group of friends and, unfortunately, it was a big disappointment. I've done more than 30 escape rooms and this was one of the worst experiences to date. The space is very small, the puzzles are almost all based on locks, without any kind of technological innovation or engaging narrative. To make it worse, the last challenge was not working and the game master entered the room saying that "we had already made it", with no sense of completion or satisfaction. We literally felt pushed out. For the price and reputation of Game Over, I expected far more.

title: Unfortunate experience
text: We came for the fourth, and probably the last time, to make an escape room to ‚ÄúGame Over,‚Äù the ‚ÄúHaunted Mansion,‚Äù and unfortunately we were the only team to have no tolerance. We finished the game at 16:30 without fear and were the only team in the waiting room, and there were several games going on at the same time.

title: Bad care with customers
text: The game is funny but the customer management is terrible. Each game master informs the promotions that he remembers and when talked to the responsible, the situation is not assumed remitting the blame to the customer who did not read the site. The specific situation is that the birthday player is entitled to an entrance if the game is between 7 days before or after the birthday. When we made the reservation, at the end of the last game, no one informed us of this promotion. When we asked for the same today, following the birthday of one of the participants, they refused to make the anniversary discount, because it was not asked when the match was marked. We had no way to do so, since we had not been informed. And then began an endless number of excuses but the fault was always the client and never the game master. Lament√°vel

title: Boring
text: Totally boring from start to finish. A complete waste of time and money. I will never go to another escape room as long as I live.

title: Disappointing
text: Not funny questions, hard to solve in group, not enough time to solve till the end. The help was in time, but takes all the fun

title: Disappointed with the gamemaster
text:
The game master was a little antipathetic. We arrived late because of the transit of the Christmas lights, they told us that they would discount 10 minutes of game, which we accepted without problems! However, when the gamemaster told us that the game was going to end there were 15 minutes left to play and not 10... the gamemaster constantly intervened and the only time we clicked the button did not answer us. He did not introduce us to the game and spoke to us as if he was bothered by our presence, even though we had arrived late (which we could not avoid at all), we were paying for a positive experience and not to be treated this way.
We have already made several escape rooms here and were all fantastic, this, unfortunately, was the opposite...

title: Total failure
text: Of many Escape Rooms I visited this was undoubtedly the worst of all. From lack of organization to lack of professionalism of employees. We made booking and when we arrived there was no Reservation. We have no solution. Not to repeat!!!

title: Game master inexp√©riment√©e
text: Accueil sympa mais game master d‚Äôaucune aide car ses instructions n‚Äô√©taient que le doublons des indices d√©j√† trouv√©s donc on n‚Äôavance pas. Dommage c‚Äôest une vrai d√©ception pourtant sommes des grand fans des escapes games. Tout le monde peut d√©buter mais avoir un game master senior aurait s√ªrement aid√©.

title: The Game Master was not good, which ruins the experience
text:
Today I went with a group of friends to Sala Oriente Express. The room itself was top notch, we liked the riddles and it's well done apart from the time factor, because it's clearly not a room that can only be done in 1 hour, personally 1h15min I think would be enough given the amount of clues in each room to find and what there is to do inside.
From my point of view, the experience comes largely from the Game Master that we have, and this time it wasn't the best. The one who came to us was Malu, and since it was the 4th time we went to Game Over, we think she didn't get into the character as much as the other Game Masters who came to us (Sena, Sergio and the others that I don't remember ). It was really bad. We get help every 10 minutes, and every help we ask for only makes us more confused! She was never clear in what she said, causing us to waste a lot of time. Mainly in the Dtr room. But anyway, I don't want to say too much so as not to give spoilers... I think that out of 4/5 of the help we asked for, adding them all up, she responded to 1.
Since we know that there are rooms that it is not possible to finish in 1h, we always schedule it for 11:30am because there is nothing afterwards, and normally if there is not much left they let us finish, and this time it was different, we asked her to let us finish. , and she said no because it was lunch time and at the limit we would be there but 10/15 me, which is not IMMENSE.
It was a bad experience with this Game Master.
Another subject, I think the discount was what attracted me to booking the next one. I know it still exists but it doesn't make sense for the following reasons:

1¬∞ During the week 90% of the population is employed, as they work and go to school.
2¬∞ Schedule for the same day? What if there is no vacancy?

As a customer, I think it's not smart of Game Over!

title: It didn't live up to my expectations of Game Over
text: We were taken out of 4 minutes of Escape Room time by Game Master Tatiana for going to the bathroom before entering the room (and this was not told to us in advance). For an experience that is expensive (100‚Ç¨ per hour) there should be more respect for the customer.

title: So much worse than other alternatives
text:
So we have done 40 plus escape rooms and Jack the Ripper and Top Secret were both within the lower five we have completed.

Top Secret had an issue where the puzzle to open the door into the final room was broken ruining the experience and cutting off the best element of the game. No discount offered considering the experience.

Thought we‚Äôd give it the benefit of the doubt and come back 18 months later‚Ä¶ This was equally disappointing in a different way‚Ä¶

Jack the Ripper was just completely unintuitive, no logic at all to the clues. Whilst the puzzle count was fairly low, the clues were completely random, basically impossible without clues which ruins the game. There is items in the room you don‚Äôt even use.

In honesty, sad to say but just avoid this place if you‚Äôre looking for a good escape experience, independents are generally much better, very disappointed.

title: Barely passable as an escape room, even for the most inexperienced
text: For anyone who has ever done more than a couple of escape rooms, they will quickly realise how poorly thought out and unintuitive the Jack the Ripper room is. After struggling with the randomness of this escape and asking the staff if anyone had ever done it unaided, they said no, not even close. How is that considered a well designed room that literally no one can do it without help. It was bland, boring and had no atmosphere or imagination. I strongly recommend people avoid these franchise branches of escape rooms, try the independent ones, the difference is insane.

title: Avoid the Forbidden Temple like the plague.
text:
My partner and I have done >100 escape rooms and we brought my dad to do his first room. We did Forbidden Temple of Montezuma and were incredibly disappointed. The first puzzle involves finding puzzle pieces hidden in a dark room. It took us 10 minutes to find the last piece to the first puzzle. ER puzzles should test your brain, not how well you see in the dark - a major pet peeve of mine so we were off to a bad start. We usually only need a few gentle hints in a typical room but this time we needed a lot of hints, even with hints we still struggled. The GM admitted that just about every team needs a hint for one puzzle - to me that means there is a problem with the puzzle! Overall the puzzle count was fairly low and didn't leave you with a feeling of success. On the whole the puzzles were incredibly obtuse. I wish we hadn't booked this room.
Overall the room was well maintained and the tech worked without any obvious issues. The GM was perfectly average but the puzzle flow was simply terrible. Judging from the screams we heard in the adjacent horror rooms, it seemed like people were having a good time so I wouldn't completely rule out Game Over Lisbon, but avoid the Forbidden Temple like the plague. The puzzles and game structure were simply terrible.

title: Bad service by the manager
text:
We played Top Agents and the room was kinda small but had a cool vibe, filled with some really awesome puzzles. Our host Miguel was top-notch; if it was up to me, I'd give him a full 5 stars.

So why the one-star review? Here's the deal: we hit a glitch that fast-tracked us to the final stage. We still had around 12 minutes to go, and honestly, not finishing wouldn't have been a biggie. But this bug was a real fun-killer. We asked if we could maybe switch rooms, and the manager offered us a 20% discount. But get this: that's their regular deal for anyone hopping into a second room the same day. Not cool, right? So we pushed for some of our money back since the glitch messed up a lot of the puzzles for us. Instead of dealing with us directly, the manager had Miguel say it wasn't possible‚Äîwhich we know isn't true. The guy didn't even have the guts to talk to us himself; he sent Miguel to do his dirty work.

5 stars for Miguel, our awesome host
3 stars for the room, pretty solid
1 star for the manager, not cool man

title: Glitch in our room, wasn't possible to get another room or at least some money in return by manager
text:
We played Top Agents and the room was kinda small but cool, with some really great puzzles. Our host Miguel was awesome; we loved the guy. If I could rate just him, he'd get a full 5 stars from me.

So why only two stars overall? Well, we hit a bug that sent us straight to the final stage. We still had like 12 minutes left and wouldn't have minded if we didn't finish everything. But this glitch kinda killed the vibe. We asked if we could switch rooms, the manager refused and instead offered us a 20% discount on another room (so we had to pay twice). Turns out, that's just their standard deal for anyone doing a second room the same day. We weren't happy with that, and asked if we could get jut 20% of our money back, because the bug ruined a bunch of puzzles for us. Carlos had Miguel tell us it wasn't possible‚Äîwhich isn't true, by the way. Carlos didn't even come out to talk to us himself, he just had Miguel do all the talking, even though we could see him.

5 stars for Miguel, our host
4 stars for the room itself
1 star for the professionalism of the manager.

title: Disappointing
text: Only played one game because playing more would be a waste of money. Uncreative and logically unconnected puzzles. Some puzzles were impossible to make sense of without the help of the game master. Would not recommend to anyone, especially if it is your first experience with escape rooms, it will ruin your impression of this awesome activity.

title: Zero effort to compensate customer
text:
I went with my team to play 2 games at this company. We arrived 20 minutes early and still confusion ensued. It started with forms that were registered by everyone but the second employee who appeared started shouting saying that we hadn't filled them all out yet, shouting each person's name into the space. If I didn't want to be identified, at this point all of this company's customers knew my name.
Even worse was that we chose a room and ‚Äúdue to a technical problem‚Äù it was not possible to do so. They informed us that we could choose another room (a lie as in reality we only had 2 more to choose from as the others were reserved) but they stated that in the end they would give us compensation. For suspension, at the end when they gave us the ‚Äúcompensation‚Äù, it was a 10% discount code like the ones they give to all customers who finish a game. Disgraceful customer support and management.
The game was ok, even though the staff said it was the most difficult, we didn't think so, we thought it was quite simple and straightforward.

title: not a good escape room
text: not creative at all. On top of it, it's almost impossible to perceive the logic of the game by yourself, only with the staff help

title: Abaixo das expetativas
text: N√£o era minimamente assustador. Apenas um jogo de enigmas e jogos. Era poss√≠vel retirar as algemas sem recorrer a qualquer chave, tinha um bot√£o para soltar, eh, eh..... Era poss√≠vel sair da sala sempre que se quisesse e entrar noutras salas.... Enfim, dinheiro mal gasto...

title: Disappointed
text: Magnificent store with lots of choices unfortunately the person who served us was pedantic made no effort to speak slowly in English. No smile. I think he was bored of selling us only three bottles. After reflection we should have left without buying.

title: Rude service... there are better options nearby
text: Rude service. Been here twice and neither visit was ideal. The first time the member of staff who served me could hardly be bothered to check whether they had the wine I wanted and on the second visit I was rudely told off for picking a bottle of wine to buy from the shelf, without asking them to take it off the shelf for me‚Ä¶ needless to say they didn‚Äôt apologise, just wanted to argue that they weren‚Äôt rude‚Ä¶ end result, no sale. There are many other places in the area to buy wine, several are both more helpful, knowledgable of their stock and polite.

title: Fast delivery... but terrible service
text:
Good thing first: the delivery of Garrafeira Nacional has always been impressively fast for me (I ordered five+ times from them). And the choice of wines is pretty good.

However, the trouble started when I received a bottle with a wine fault. I contacted customer service to ask what the policy was. I was told I needed to take a picture, which I did and sent. They then claimed to not have received the picture, so I had to send it again. They then said, I needed to return the bottle and that a pickup was arranged on Monday. However, nobody turned up (nor was anything arranged). Apparently, nothing was arranged, because I should send back *all* the bottles in the delivery (12 bottles), not just the faulty one. If I didn't send them all back... then any fault in the others was my problem (which I find both highly unethical and dubious legally!).
After replying that this was nonsense, they agreed to a pickup of the one bottle and scheduled that... and if I pass the test of their enologist (!?), then I may have my money returned for the wine (let's see if they actually will refund!)

I'm quite flabbergasted by their unhelpful service. It seems they are blocking every step of the way to avoid a refund for a faulty product. This shouldn't be such an issue - and other retailers have significantly better service in my experience. So, despite their fast delivery, I'll look elsewhere in future.

title: Bad service
text: What's going on with this store? I've been shopping for many years in the National bottle and always indicated to friends and family, but the service is deteriorating every day, in the last visit was the drop of water to rate it as bad! They do not know the products, the first answer is always "we do not have" to then insistently our verify that they have, a real failure , absolutely do not want to sell anything and the shop empty.

title: The service has changed a lot and for the WORSE!!
text: I've bought wines several times at Garrafeira, but today I received very poor service from 3 women. It started with one of them interrupting one of the salespeople, saying that the price of those wines were much more expensive than what was on the website. From then on it was just bad will! Terrible!!

title: Terrible attendance. It's changed a lot!
text: This was the tenth time I bought from Garrafeira Nacional and I received very poor service from 3 women. From the beginning they said that the 2 wines I saw on the website (which they had in the store) could not be sold and if I wanted them they would be much more expensive. With much reluctance, I continued to eat the seven bottles

title: Zero rating service.
text:
Today I tried to buy a liquor in this store, but it was impossible, not because it was full, on the contrary it was empty with lots of employees chatting. But the employees didn't pay much attention, even before leaving I said there was a bit of a rush, but I was still ignored by the employees.
I am a customer of this store and I make purchases for my restaurants, I was disappointed.

title: Big choice, little courtesy
text:
Great choice of wines, somewhat questionable customer service. I often travel for work and in the evening when I'm tired I speak English regardless of where I am, although I speak and understand many other languages, including Portuguese. After having approached in English, I was laughed at in Portuguese by the 2 clerks (Time Out Market point of sale) because I didn't remember the credit card pin. Not only are they rude, they are also not very smart.
I no longer want to drink the port I purchased.

title: Watch out for the exchange rate "trick" - always choose Euros!
text: Great service while in the Baxia store BUT when i checked my receipt they had charged my in USD instead of Euros - a classic "trick" used to rip off the tourist who isn't on guard. A 4% mark up and loust exchange rate. I will not be back.

title: Poor booking, unreliable
text: After multiple confirmation emails (probably automated), and us reaching out to contact 30 min prior to pick up, no response. They had no booking for us, no driver arranged. They scrambled at the last minute to find another, we started 1 hour late, negatively impacting later plans. Do not book. Plenty of tuk tuks waiting at square.

title: Find A Better Tour
text:
We were referred to this tour provider and were extremely disappointed. The guide was knowledgeable but we couldn‚Äôt hear him at all while the tuktuk, which was too small for us, was in motion. We could only hear him when the vehicle was stopped.

Then, the tuktuk broke down in Alfama. I tried to end the tour then, but he begged us to stay on. We agreed to continue on to Bel√©m. We waited over 30 minutes for a new tuktuk to arrive. And then the guide tried to get us to stop somewhere else on the way, when I was clear we only wanted Bel√©m. Then at Bel√©m he tried to get us to continue the tour. It was so bad.

Our five hour tour was now three hours. I understand the company was counting on that revenue, so they wouldn‚Äôt let us pay less than the $250. But to not even give us a discount for the 30 minutes we were waiting around is outrageous. So $250 for technically 2.5 hours on a tour we couldn‚Äôt hear anything on. This company and their tours are complete scams. Stay away.

title: No response and gesture
text:
We excitedly booked a guided tour through this platform, but unfortunately our experience turned out to be an absolute disaster. The guide who was supposed to accompany us never showed up, leaving us perplexed and frustrated.

After waiting patiently for two hours, our wait was rewarded with nothing but disappointment. We were really looking forward to seeing the local attractions and learning about the history of the area, but it all remained an unfulfilled dream due to the guide's absence.

title: Bad attention
text: Employed bad education, threatened me, increased his tone of voice by pronouncing threatening words. Bad service. There are better places in Lisbon to drink with better service.

title: They beat me with a dick
text:
Site well located but poor in kindness, poor education and level. I was treated extremely badly , they surrounded me with drinks , and they went to get a dick to beat me for asking questions .
And they sent me the receipt that I paid for the trash after they surrounded my drink . They were two girls. I do not recommend at all

title: Poor education and low level
text: Very bad service. People are extremely poorly educated and the ginja is not worth a cent . Worst place in Lisbon. I was badly treated , and I was almost kicked out of there for asking questions about the bottles .

title: Avoid terrible
text:
Terrible experience. The Registration took a long while and after 15 minutes answering a lot of questions, none of us could get it to work on an apple or android phone and there was no customer service and so we closed the account immediately and they never refunded the money which we deposited. Also, they never responded to our email asking for refund as it stated on the app before we closed the account.
Trust pilot reviews confirms this also.... so it's not a once off. My advice is to avoid unless you want to give away or lose your money.

title: Ma che pena
text: Uno schifo l'app gira non funziona non sono riuscita a registrarmi . Tutto in portoghese un vero disastro

title: THEY NEVER PICK ME UP AT MEETING POINT
text:
You don't have to pay to join this trip because they let stranger with out confirmation to join their tour. This company is not professional. you just wait to the meeting point they set and they would never come. you will not be picked up at the meeting point, no refund solution is offered. just be careful

They said a professional tour company but none could give solution

( they also delete my review in google for business reason to appeal good star review )

title: Worst thing I've ever lived, I'll make a claim since I have photos that backed up my complaint
text: Our tour was Fatima, Batalha, Nazar√© and Obidos and I have never had a more nefarious tour, the driver guide Paolo of the worst that I found in this magnificent profession, we were 8 people and 5 of them only went to accompany a private tour of the other 3 people. Driver with aggressive driving and high speeds, coming to address one of the people (travel agent) with very bad forms, when he made a simple comment. In Obidos we arrived at 17.37 and at 18 in the car, we could not even get close to the castle, the time that left us was just to go to half main street and back. Tour to forget,

title: Read up about this place and then decide if you want to visit or spend your time exploring somewhere that suits you
text: Would prefer to have visited another part of Portugal - we drove from Lisbon to Fatima with a tour guide. Took almost an hour and a half to get there - we were there for just over an hour learning about the reason for the new church that was built and the other buildings. Lit a candle, walked around the huge area and then drove to our next destination. Given we wanted to see as much as we could in our limited time in Portugal - this was not a great use of our time but was on the tour we chose. Unless you have a deep religious connection to visiting Fatima - I would use my time better visiting other places or spending more time eg at Obidos.

title: Cancelled trip at night
text: The tour was cancelled with a message at night and in the morning just saw it when i start to prepare for day tour. Thank you Go2Lisbon for nothing..

title: Complete waste of money.
text:
What a SCAM and waste of money! Our tour guide, Ruben, picked us up at a hotel just a few blocks away from where we were staying. The description was correct that it was a "small group"---the four in my group and 2 other women. Cannot fault our tour guide for the fact that it was a cloudy, foggy, drizzly morning, but the rest is on him: We drove up to the center of Sintra (I assume) and were told we would explore on our own. He took off, so there was no one to ask for suggestions/recommendations, etc.

We walked back to the car and were driven up to the Pena Palace and he let us out (in the drizzle) while he parked. We then followed him to a long line of tourists waiting for one of 2 small tour buses making the property loop to take us up to the Palace. He then told us that there were "too many people" there that day and there were no more slots for people to actually go into the Palace. THAT'S WHAT WE PRE-PAID FOR! He walked us through a little open area outside, but we couldn't even take any photos of "views" because of the fog. We were allowed to quickly walk into a small chapel, and out again, then back on the little bus down to the parking area. That was it. That's all we saw of Pena Palace! That was the reason why we booked this tour!

He then drove us to the Cabo da Roca, a monument marking the westernmost point on continental Europe. He pointed to the monument and never told us how much time we'd be able to stay there. While we walked over and took the obligatory photo in front of the marker, we couldn't see anything of the view because of the fog. My husband and sons went for a walk on the boardwalk area in hopes of catching a glimpse of the ocean further out, while I waited for them at the monument. 5 minutes later Ruben contacts me on What's App, obviously agitated that we weren't back yet! I texted my husband and they all hurried back to the parking lot.

The final stop was the waterfront city of Cascais. Ruben gave us the recommendation of a chicken restaurant (which we never found), and we were completely on our own again. Ruben took off, not to be seen again until the agreed to meeting time at the car. At least the sun peeked through the clouds for a bit of that visit.

Four adults cost just over $400...We could have done all the above for free just taking our rental car. Clearly, this operation is a SCAM and I strongly suggest you to either choose another tour group, or self direct.
By the way...I have thousands of followers on my Twitter/X account...and that will be the next place I alert people to this disgrace of a "tour."

title: God Level Quarterbreaker
text:
If you can avoid it better, scam, deceit and loot the castle of Sintra.
Terrible organization and information to access, if you get lost or lost it takes you at least half an hour to return to the starting point.
‚ÄúThey force you‚Äù to park in the town and take one of the taxis designed for that purpose (wagon, vintage, etc.), and here you start to spend money (7:50 per person), once you arrive near the castle A small bus awaits you to complete the climb of about 500 meters at ‚Ç¨3 per person (one way, if you want to get off by bus later, another ‚Ç¨3), oh if you're thirsty and don't bring water, wow 1.70 a 500 cl bottle.
In short, the castle is beautiful and picturesque, especially because of the location, but it is nothing out of this world and your wallet will thank you for it.

title: Guide did not follow the schedule
text:
Guide was not very informative at the stopping points, and did not follow the agreed times.
We should have stayed 40 minutes in Batalha and Nazar√©, but we only stayed for 20 minutes.

Apparently he was in a hurry to complete the journey.

title: Bummed
text: The driver wouldn't pick me up because I had a flight later. The trip was advertised as 8 hours but he said there was a chance the tour could run 10-11 hours, so I missed it and couldn't cancel or get a refund :(

title: Do not attend a tour with more than one language
text:
Do not attend a tour with more than one language. We had 3 languages constantly pouring over the bus. English by far was the most we all understood but the tour guide made English the last language.

It was a complete failure when trying to understand the sight with all 3 languages. Often by the time English came the site was gone.

This was with Diana Tours that obviously was bought out by Grey Line tours.

The beginning of the tour boarding the bus was very confusing.

title: Go2Lisbon ruined our vacation!
text: The tour company (Go2Lisbon) CANCELLED our tour without our knowledge even though it was already prepaid in advance. We were all dressed up for our 8:45 pick-up and when my wife called to confirm the time and place of pick-up, we were told it was previously cancelled by us. We were on a cruise ship and just arrived the day before so we did not have any direct contact with the tour company. We even received an e-mail and text message a day before that the tour is a go. The company could have reversed the cancellation as we still have over an hour before the pick-up time but they insisted it was cancelled. Accusing us of cancelling the tour ourselves was just too much of this company. Do not go to this company. They are no good.
The provider cancelled the tour just one day before it was supposed to happen. No without explanation was given.

title: Don‚Äôt use this company
text: Without any notice they cancelled the tour 2 hours before pick up. Not a reliable company. Don‚Äôt use this company when in Portugal.

title: Choose a different tour
text:
While our driver was congenial, and kind, he was not a guide in any sense of the word. He dropped us off at two different locations, we paid entrance fees, and he did not accompany us for the tour. He did not explain, unless asked, where we were in the city. Extremely disappointed.
He is a driver only! He should be listed as such- certainly not a guide.

title: Sintra and Cascais Private Tour Full Day
text:
We were extremely disappointed in this private full day tour for 4 people. The description indicated a driver and a private tour. There are currently 14 reviews of this tour on your site, all but one complimenting the wonderful tour guides their drivers were, so it was expected that our driver would be a guide as well. When we met the driver he did not introduce himself and said nothing about whether we had reserved our Pena Palace tickets in advance (we received a text at 9:30 the night before the tour indicating that we should purchase tickets on line for a certain time, but since it was so late we didn't see the information). Had he simply checked when we began the tour, we could have purchased them before we left.

Since there was basically silence in the car as we began our drive, we asked the driver to give us information about things. He made it clear that he would try to answer some of our questions but that we had only hired a driver, that he was not a guide, and if we had wanted a guide we should have booked another tour. Unfortunately, your only one star review echoed our sentiments "this is no more than a chauffeur service."

When we arrived at the Pena palace, he only then asked if we had our tickets. We spent over an hour and a half in the rain waiting to get an appointment to enter, and that affected the rest of the tour. From then on we were just dropped off at each of the other sites with literally no information and lost time for the other attractions.

With all due respect, if our driver was told he was only supposed to drive, he did an excellent job and the car was very nice and clean. We had a private Lisbon city tour the previous day with your company and had a wonderful driver/guide. We took several other similar private tours at other ports in Spain on our cruise and never had a similar problem.

title: Beware, do not book a trip for an elderly relative.
text: Having booked and paid for a trip for an elderly relative, Jet2 with 3 days to go altered the hotel to a lower rated property. But would not the allow myself the booking person to deal with the alteration, leaving a confused relative stressed and confused as to what was going on. Never again Jet2.

title: Guide was a no show and company has been unresponsive to all sorts of communication.
text: Tour was confirmed for Oct. 7. Was told the guide would get in touch the evening before. No phone call came, so we started reaching out - calling, messaging, emailing. No response. The guide was a no show and still no response from the company.

title: Guide was a no show AND cannot get ahold of anyone for explanation.
text:
Guide was a no show and no one it has been impossible to connect with anyone at Go and See.

The tour was confirmed by Jorge Garcia. No phone call was received the night before (as the email stated). Emails were sent, WhatsApp messages were sent, phone calls were made (the evening before and morning of) and still no communication about the no show. Very disappointed.

title: Lovely driver but poor tour
text:
There was a lack of detail shared regarding the history and significance of various buildings, sites and the city in general.

Driver was very pleasant but English was poor.

We were left disappointed and had actually spent a lot of money on the tour - we had one full day in Porto and felt this was the best we to see the city and learn about it.

title: Bad experience in Sintra with a Green Tours driver upping the price after the ride
text: I was in Sintra walking between palaces when a Green Tours driver, Marco, offered to pick me up for 10 euros. I accepted, and he proceeded to drive me 5 minutes before saying the rest of the road is one way so I had to walk, which is fine. But then he informed me the the "minimum" charge was 20 and was intimidating until I paid. He then started shouting at me. Overall recommend avoiding this company, the whole 20 euro minimum thing feels like an intentional way to scam tourists.

title: Below average
text: Tour booked for midday. No one turned up. Took lots of phone calls and chasing before someone arrived in a vintage car/tuktuk almost half an hour late. Wasn‚Äôt what we booked but we were happy to get going with Chris our guide. Chris wasn‚Äôt very communicative until we reached each of the viewpoints. He was pleasant enough and polite. However I would not recommend this company as we do tuk tuks in every city and this was not a great experience.

title: Wouldn‚Äôt recommend street art tour
text: Booked the street art tour requesting to see Bordelo 2 street art. Our driver wasn‚Äôt familiar with the locations and we saw 3 only in two hours plus a nice view point. The commentary was minimal seemed prepared to just do historical centre tour only. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this company for street art tour, our booking was only received by driver minutes before we were meant to depart so there was no preparation

title: Uma granda perda de tempo e Dinheiro, fujam desta empresa nivel 0 de educa√ß√£o. Uma grande mer%‚Ç¨@‚Ç¨
text: Estou completamente insatisfeito com o trabalho desta empresa , a Guia cujo nome Elssa, foi de uma extrema falta de educa√ß√£o sem prescendentes ate nota se que ela percebe alguma hist√≥ria da cidade, mas se fosse para possivel optar por um 0 estrela o faria. Joguei meu dinheiro literalmente no lixo. N√£o recomendo.

title: Fraude
text:
Good afternoon!
I come by this means to alert to a show that is being sold by Green Trekker: "Year Pass Green Trekker - International Douro" for the year 2024.
The walking guide is not from the region nor knows the trails of the same.
The program mentions "dinner and anniversary party", but when I informed myself, with the organizers of Green Trekker and with the venue of the mentioned dinner and party: "Casas de Campo de Cimo da Quinta", I noticed that there will be only a regular dinner and no year-end party is planned.
Carefully,
Gra√ßa Martinho

The only positive note of this residence is the crystal clear sea.
The cleaning of the rooms is very poor, the canteen would be better avoided. The nice waitress staff, the head of the room should change profession.
You save the animation, formed DA a trained and always kind staff!

title: Who saw the guide??? I don't have a shadow of the refund!
text: Bad experience. The Italian guide in Porto did not show up to the appointment after a month that we had booked and of course already paid and made an appointment via wa for day 18 this writes that he was mistaken and that he thought it was 2 days later. The agency offered to do the tour another day but we were not available since we were no longer in Porto. I asked the guydezz agency several times via email and live chat for a refund of 140 euros paid but they didn't even reply anymore. Da evitare!!!!

Service canceled and service non-existent

What can I say about this company?
To avoid !
We have contracted 5 services 1 month in advance for visits to Lisbon:
- 2 airport transfers: carried out by less expensive providers, one of them had to be changed because he was driving a Fiat 500...not easy for luggage.
- 1 private tour transported to Sintra, canceled on the day of the service. We are still waiting for the refund 2 weeks later.
- 2 private tours with guide for a half-day walking tour in Lisbon. The guide, although competent, looked more like a homeless person than a guide!

For the rest, all communications (connected with the guides) are made via WhatsApp at the last minute.
The service is pitiful.
Run away !

title: The worst place in any city on the planet.
text: It's the worst place on the planet. Pure trash. Unpaid American food for exorbitant prices. Tourist place with NO attractive. Ideal for idiots who buy one of their shirts at every place they visit. FUJA.

title: I would never return:(
text: The place well, the service good but the food very regulating. Burnt and bland burgers. :(expensive prices for quality.

title: Bad
text:
The service was good but the food was terrible. I ordered the mini Burger and I Asked for well done but they came out almost RAW at my first bite and blood in my plate. I returned them and they offered me free desert but I was not hungry anymore so they broth me the bill with no compensation , The manager told me he took the temperature after we returned the burgers (15 min later) and they were ok according to him . Finally they credited me the replacing Flatbread we ordered but I had
to argue with him . This was my 54th HardRock in the word and the worst one I've everbeen. I should had taken a picture of the burgers. He kept my bill of 50$ because he forgot to add my unity card.

La comida era mala(todos los platos que comimos no nos gustaron).El servicio muy lento y hacia mucho calor.No volver√© a este establecimiento.

text: Absolute Katastrophe, 3 Personen wurden gebucht √ºbermittelt nur 2, totaler Chaos beim Check in , erst wurde die normale Karte an den Tisch gebracht man wurde normal freundlich bedient, nach Nachfrage wir haben das Gold Men√º bestellt ging es los. Fragezeichen auf den Gesichtern die Karte wurde weggenommen , abgespeckte Version auf portugiesisch gebracht ,Auswahl an 2 burgern, chicken Sandwich und zum Nachtisch ein browni, super ein kaltgetr√§nk durften wir uns auch noch aussuchen. title: To avoid Harley-Davidson Lisbon Concession
text:
While the Concession HD of Algarve is excellent they helped us on a clutch problem of one of the 11 B√©canes of the RoadTrip Disassembly and Adjustment and 0 yes Zero Euro that of Lisbon with a lacerated tire they balked to make the change (30mn).We had to insist to have it only the next day at the end of the morning and invoice 480 Euros.At this price I change 2 tires of my SUV Lexus and in addition they remade the level of oil not necessary but invoiced while an upgrade should not be.
This is the beautiful image of Harley-Davidson Lisbon.
No commercial gestures, no troubleshooting almost had to pray for him to do it when it blocked Harley.
And an exorbitant bill.
You tarnish the image of the Brand and your Country.

title: Scam....Beware
text: This website is a scam.....Beware if you consider. Customer service is non existent.....they are terrible and would not recommend to anyone.

title: Headout Tickets Warning
text: Do Not Use This Company!!!! You will be scammed and not be able to use attraction tickets as expected online or via App. It is a third party vendor and difficult to get assistance.

title: Fraudulent sale of tickets to the Quinta da Regaleira, in Sintra - Portugal
text: Fraude. Golpe. We bought the tickets and we received a message (email) with a QR code with instructions to find a person who would accompany us to the entrance of Quinta. There was no one at the place/time set. We download the app, where the purchase confirmation appears, only. We photographed the empty place, waited for more than half an hour and headed to the gate of Quinta da Regaleira where an employee told us that the QR code had no ticket value, and that other people had been victims of the same blow. Police case, she says. We bought the tickets again at Quinta's box office. We entered an hour and a half after the scheduled time. This delay in programming hurt us very much, we left Lisbon early and intended to arrive in Porto in the late afternoon. It was not possible because, in fact, Quinta is beautiful and there is a lot to see. We recommend other travellers to check the Quinta da Regaleira website and, if possible, shop directly at the ticket office there. For some reason, which only this hacked world can explain, this company was the first of the list of search results that we made (subject: purchase of tickets for the Quinta da Regaleira) to buy the ticket, which led us to the "scheme" of the purchase to "avoid queues". I complained a lot, asked for the return of what I paid (more than forty euros for two tickets that cost me, at the Quinta ticket office, eighteen euros) and they, almost two months later, insist on the version that everything happened normally and we simply "did not see" the guide. It would be very good if some kind of supervision from a Portuguese government agency could punish this kind of coup.

title: Scam company - AVOID
text: Warning!!! Scam company! Go to the proper site for tickets üö©üö©üö©üö© I accidentally used them for Sintra and the guys at the door said there was a lot of problems w this company. They will charge you a lot extra for tickets and the I did not even get the audioguide ordered. Customer service is also terrible

title: Awful
text: Extremely poor service. They charge you credit card but doesn‚Äôt issue ticket or send them by email. A lot of hassle to get your money back. Big scam. Stay away and book directly!!

title: Few professionals, poorly educated, gyms with terrible conditions
text:
Avoid this gym at all costs. The experience was disgusting from beginning to end. The facilities are in a state of complete abandonment: dirty bathrooms, rusty and sewage-smelling showers, broken and dirty boxes, constantly wet flooring. It is unacceptable for a space dedicated to health to function at this level of loose.

The equipment is outdated, poorly preserved and often damaged. Obviously, there is no plan for their maintenance.

The worst of all? The people. Completely undereducated, arrogant and without any professional training. Talk to customers like they're doing a favor by being there. A true example of how not to treat customers.

The feeling with which you leave this gym is of frustration, anger and disgust. I never thought a place with this level of disrespect for customers and hygiene could be open to the public. A miserable experience and a screaming example of mismanagement.

Don‚Äôt waste your time (or money). Fiquem longe.

title: Manager of Viana do Castelo branch seems to be racist
text:
During our 3 years of living in Portugal, we have encountered very friendly and welcoming people, but a very unpleasant exception was the manager of the Solinca club in Viana do Castelo.

While my wife was exercising on the exercise machine, another client intervened (which is against the rules of the sports club) and created a conflict situation, in which I was forced to intervene. When trying to clarify the situation with the manager (I don‚Äôt remember the name) of the club, we encountered a very biased (not in our favor) attitude from the manager, who decided to terminate our membership in the club unilaterally, and this despite the fact that the instigators of the conflict were other clients.

But the most unpleasant experience for us was the mocking and contemptuous tone of the conversation from the manager, where she directly made it clear that she did not care at all who was the instigator of the conflict, and without even listening to us, she made a decision in favor of the other side of the conflict. Based on this, and the fact that we are from Ukraine, the conclusion suggests itself that the manager has racist views either towards Ukrainians or foreigners in general.

title: Disappointing
text: A Club that invites members to look for ‚Äúanother solution for their life‚Äù when faced with the impossibility of scheduling classes, blocking access to the App for those who arrive 2 or 3 minutes BEFORE a scheduled class. A Club that punishes members for arriving 2 or 3 minutes before a class, without even being late! Penalizing the partners with the inability to access the prior class marking by the App. It really is a good reason to look for another alternative even if this Club is next door. In a word only: Disappointing!!

title: Solinca Linda-a-Velha
text:
Solinca Linda-a-Velha, never answer the cell phone. App with errors and I am today without being able to book a class in the App.
Women's bathrooms still like they were when it was Calories. There are no banks near the cabins to sit, shower doors are to laugh and qd it is necessary to resolve something, just going physically there and receive the antipathy of some employees.

title: Just don't!!!
text:
Solinca Oeiras. I do not have any pleasure in writing this review, which is already late, but as I know more and more people with my opinion and then weave the same, here it goes. Do not expect me to be serious or serious in compliance with the contractual conditions. We can sign the contract on the day we meet the ginasio (in this case solinca oeiras), and there are few people, can do a workout... ok....

I've been there, or at least tried to train there for six months. The subscription is annual so reaching a limit of subscribers they should stop accepting people. On the contrary, promos are so many that after 10 days no one can train. There is queue for machines for 2 and 3 people !!!! To the banks, to the hoarders...

I bought a pack of 20 workouts with PT (the only sympathetic experience of Solinca but was not there to make friends and much less pay expensive to make them...) and didn't even have room to train, to the point that I couldn't do an exercise beyond climbing the stairs to get to the room, had to come away. Someone I told about the ginasio had to come away. I left PT classes for doing, because there were weeks when I went 3 times and went back without training. It's absurd. But be careful, don't be fooled. The conditions at the time of the contract (what is included and valid) will ‚Åá not be the same as you will encounter on a daily basis so the annual signature / contract is easily disassembled. Nothing else could be expected. It's literally cat by leopard. At the end of this everything remains the dishonesty of those who are deceiving the customer and do everything to ‚Åá too ambitious sales goals. They didn't answer me an email, a phone call or the respondents were always busy if I wanted to talk to them. It has long been known that some group classes are fully booked and filled with months in advance. What a lack of seriousness and frontality. A shame. It is not ginasio for those who want and like to train.

title: Horrible and unprofessional
text: This is absolutely terrible experience. Mostly because of unprofessional staff. We singed up a contract and asked if we want to break it how do we do it. They said you need a proof that you lost a job/ got sick, or changed address 50km away from the gym or just tell us 30 days in advance. With all the mess in immigration system in Portugal, our residencies expired and we couldn‚Äôt renew it, so we had to fly back home. I came to the receptionist in April and explained the situation, she said that they need a proof. We send our expired visas. Not enough. Email, after email, chasing us and trying to charge when we are not even in the country anymore. After a month, we received our bills in home country and sent it to Solinca. They are still trying to charge us! This is ridiculous. The gym itself isn‚Äôt worth it. The changing rooms are disgusting, equipment is crowded and staff is useless. 10 instructors walking around and checking if you have a towel-that all they know!

title: Yoga classes are often committed to the intensity of the music coming from the rooms on the same floor.
text: After a year of being away, I return to the Solinca do Lumiar gym and continue to struggle to recognize the logic with which Yoga classes are scheduled at the same time as extremely noisy classes in the rooms next door. I think there is a huge lack of respect towards clients who consider the activity a priority in their routine and also towards the excellence of Professor Jorge Neves. Here, Yoga is treated by management as an imported activity, to be marketed in a context completely denatured from its oriental and spiritual origin. Imposing himself in this approach to the subject, Professor Jorge, despite the absurd logistics to which he is subjected and in apparent polite silence towards this issue, is still an excellent communicator of the subject, even though he notices that sometimes the class is significantly disturbed. from the outside, and it is for this reason that I abandon my resistance to leaving a criticism of Solinca here, as I also praise the professor for accepting to work in these conditions and the stance he takes. I am happy that, having signed up at the gym again, I see that he still teaches here, but unfortunately I recognize that the conditions are still the same, even though I have noticed that many other customers have already criticized this management. If the gym does not respond to a recurring criticism from customers, I am now aware of what other criticisms it will not respond to as well. I value being in a place where the customer is not only heard, but also understood and, finally, where problems are resolved.

title: P√©ssima experi√™ncia
text: Clube p√©ssimo! O do Centro Comercial do Colombo n√£o tem espa√ßo adequado para um clube. Espa√ßos sem ventila√ß√£o adequada. Material de uso para os treinos velhos, gastos. Vendem pacotes de treinos que n√£o servem para nada. Personal training que s√≥ visam angariar clientes e prestam um mal servi√ßo. Espa√ßo reservado para treinos com personal p√©ssimo, sem equipamento adequado. Como √∫nico ponto positivo as aulas de Tai Chi, Yoga e um ou outro professor de Pilates. Desaconselho este clube.

title: P√©ssima gest√£o
text:
Servi√ßo muito fraco de avalia√ß√£o f√≠sica. Sem explica√ß√£o do plano de treino enviado. Plano de treino sem qualquer tipo de aten√ß√£o √†s les√µes em quest√£o.
V√°rios pedidos de consulta de nutri√ß√£o, nunca obtive resposta para agendamento.
Para rescis√£o de contrato, falta de rela√ß√£o humana para com os clientes.

Pelo menos com o Low cost sabemos com o que contar‚Ä¶

title: no guide showed up
text: We booked a private full day tour to Sintra and surounding areas including tickets and all. Guide just did not arrive at meeting point in the morning and 2,5 hours later we got an Email saying tour was cancelled.

title: 'Motorcycle Model Guaranteed' - don't believe it.
text: I chose the 'Motorcycle Model Guaranteed' option but did not get the model I ordered, even though I made the booking about 11 months ahead. I have emailed them three times since my return but have had no response.

title: Horrible
text: At home everything already arranged for the car rental. Once at the rental in Lisbon it took 2.5 hours together before we were finally in the car!! Terrible what a system!

title: rip off
text: I took out extra insurance (approx. ‚Ç¨70). ‚Ç¨200 was debited from me in advance to ensure that the money was secure. I was told that the account would not be debited, but that they would only check whether the money was there. I was then promised that the remaining amount would be refunded within 10 days. 1 month later, after several exchanges, I have received neither a response nor any money.

title: Didn‚Äôt deliver car on time
text: The worst experience ever ! I had a reservation at 1 pm and got there at 1:03 pm . They said they are going to have lunch and will be back at 2:30 pm . I kindly asked to give as a car now. The appointment was booked at 1 pm which means they booked me already at lunch time . The employees didn‚Äôt care at all about this situation. They closed the door and went for lunch for one and half hour. I had scheduled other things in Porto and and I will be late because of it. I‚Äôm with a young child which makes it more difficult to wait that long ‚Ä¶ do not recommend anyone this place !

title: Be careful with heart riding
text:
Be careful with Herzride! I wanted to pick up the BMW 1150 GS in Portugal - but they didn't give it to me.
I made the deposit with my Visa debit card for the motorcycle in Germany. The card was not accepted for the remaining payment in Portugal, not even cash. They were tough. I had to return home without having accomplished anything. I didn't get my deposit from Herzride back

title: Run away!
text:
Horrible customer experience.. horrible car service‚Ä¶ employe and manager with no intention to please paying customers.
They gave us a car with no condition to safely travel and took three hours to manage to give us a different yet older car that ‚Äúmagically‚Äù appeared in the garage, when before they wanted to insist on us just taking the same car even though it was making loud motor and breaking sounds and blinking an overdue oil change on the panel, then they wanted to down grade us to a smaller car when we were full of luggage‚Ä¶ even though the garage had plenty of parked cars‚Ä¶ Last time we spend a dime here for sure

title: Awful service
