text: We decided to do the HOHO sightseeing tour as it was too hot to walk around. We read the reviews (poor) but decided to give it a go as we had very little time in Lisbon. Big Mistake. Waste of time and money. Hardly any commentary and the timing was out of synch. The numbering of the stops was different to the map provided. My advice would be to use Uber which is very cheap in Lisbon.

title: Avoid the boat unless you want boredom/safety risks
text:
I‚Äôve used this company in multiple countries, I‚Äôve done hop on, hop off in about 30 cities. This may be the worst.
We moved seats 3 times to find working headphone ports, what little commentary there was repeated itself and was useless.
After struggling to stay awake through the red and green routes we did the bit route. No commentary, no interaction and the boat was shifting so much when they ‚Äòdocked‚Äô the was genuine concern as to how we would get off safely.
The boat shifted so much there must have been between an inch and a foot gap as it bobbed up and down.

title: Do NOT use this company-utter rubbish.
text:
Utter rubbish-do NOT do this tour.

Normally love these bus tours but never had such a rubbish explanation of a city,
The bus was falling apart, people had to move seats because the seats were so wobbly-the ear phone areas on some
Seats didn‚Äôt work. Bus driver drove too fast-how so I get my money back? 54 ‚Ç¨ utter waste.

title: By far the worst sightseeing ever
text:
Total scam.

They will charge you for lines that are not being served. Buses will run every two hours, they see you running to catch them and will close and leave. Worst investment ever, stay away from this tourist trap.

title: Disappointed to say the least
text: There are multiple sightseeing hop on hoo off buses and maybe we picked the wrong one. The head sets didn‚Äôt work on any of the buses we got on. There was nil commentary to know what stop we were at or when we could cross over to another route. The bus took us to the expo 98 site which was a nothing site and then we thought we timed it right to get the bus back and waited for another 40mins. The bus has highlights on the mal which it doesn‚Äôt stop at. The routes have changed and the maps not updated. The information guides just seem to tel you what you want to hear. I would look at using public transport or taxis before buying a ticket in this. The taxis are cheap and most of the drivers can speak English.

title: Bad, just bad
text: I am generally a fan of the hop on hop off bus in places I don‚Äôt know. But this one is just bad. The headphones barely work and then conk out. When they do work, it‚Äôs impossible to see what channel you are on - and many of the actual consoles are broken. If you can actually get the recorded guide, you will find she says very little - and even less of interest. And the bus just whizzes by most stops before you even realize they were there. Not worth it! Just get a transit pass.

title: Kathastophe
text:
Hab nichts verstanden, da die Audio viel zu leise war. Und es permanent gekratzt hatte. Habs nicht ausgehalten und hab die Kopfh√∂rer weggelassen. Wenn ich so um mich geschaut hab, scheine ich nicht die einzige gewesen zu sein mit dem Problem. Kaum einer hatte Kopfh√∂rer auf.
Haltestellen waren nach Lust und Laune des Fahrers ausgesucht. Teilweise ausgelassen oder n andern Orten gehalten.

title: Terrible service
text: Horrible. Drivers don‚Äôt announce stops or even stop at them some of the times. We were left several times on the side of the road when the bus literally pulled along side a stop, never came to a full stop or opened the doors. Just kept rolling along if you weren‚Äôt standing directly under the pickup sign. Passenger on the bus were yelling at the diver to stop for the elderly couple making their way from the shade 10‚Äô away to the pickup point, to no avail, bus took off. Busses claim to pick you up every 30-40 minutes but frequently late. Audo on bus with headphones work less than half the time, and so much static you cannot understand the narrative. Don‚Äôt waste your money. Uber is your best option.

title: Hugely disappointing‚Ä¶avoid
text: To get an initial feel and overview of a city, we‚Äôve taken Hop on, Hop off tours in many cities including London, Paris (perhaps the best), Sam Francisco and Buenos Aries with great satisfaction. This was the worst because the audio was horrid and incomprehensible. Also, it was mostly Fado music with little background of the sights in comparison with others. Most difficult to find where we‚Äôre were as I could not download the route on the app; it continually reverted to Porto where I wasn‚Äôt instead of allowing access to Lisbon where I was. Sadly, I should have read the reviews more carefully and advised the hotel staff who recommended this of my disappointment.

title: Nao admira que tenham tantas m√°s reviews
text:
Escolham condutores que realmente saibam conduzir. Nem sou cliente mas acabei de ter um motorista a parar na via em Alg√©s para me explicar tudo o fiz errado, apesar de o mesmo ter: ignorado completamente uma ced√™ncia de passagem, seguindo de fazer a rotunda por fora, para a seguir parar ao meu lado (com passageiros a bordo) para me explicar que eu √© que tou mal.

H√° muito portugu√™s por a√≠, n√£o faz sentido terem motoristas que n√£o sabem o que fazem

title: Terrible tour
text:
I got this tour years ago and was looking forward to using it to shoe family around the main sites during our cruise stop.
Actually thought someone had forgotten to turn on the commentary as we just had mournful favourite singing for 98%of the route. Really shocking to pay 25 euros for a bus with literally about 10 sentences of commentary in an 80 min route.

title: Bortkastede penger
text: Totalt bortkastet. Bussene er gamle og nedslitte, og det er null hjelp. Velg bussene fra Lisbon sightseeing i stedet, dexer ogs√• r√∏de, men er i rute og bussene er nye.

title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY WITH THEM!
text: The worst city sightseeing bus I ever got. Almost no coments about the places, route change without any information, don't stop or wait in the bus stops, don't wait for customers go up/down the stairs, long wait in the stops, old buses. In short words, DONT BUY TICKETS FOR THIS COMPANY! GET ANY OTHER BUT THIS! THEY ARE DREADFUL!

title: Avoid this company
text: This sightseeing bus is a total waste of money, we got on the bus at the Cruise terminal did a short tour & decided to get off & get on a later bus to continue, but we waited & waited & in the end just gave up, the streets of Lisbon are just so congested & to make matters worse there's another Red bus tour company operating ( Grey Line) so when you think your bus is coming it's the wrong company & they won't allow you on the bus!

title: A waste of time and mobet
text: We boarded a bus at the port at 10:50am and the bus moved off about 11:15. We meandered through streets but there was little or no commentary apart from the odd brief comment. We left the bus at 1:10 and we had not reached our boarding point. 2¬Ω hours of my life I will never get back! Total waste of time and money

title: NOT recommended. Just a ride, not a tour.
text: Information in the recordings were scarce, mostly Fado music. Lot of monuments, buildings and places where pass without any comments, but they include comments about shopping malls and repeated the same information many times. Buses are not very new.

title: Don't bother
text: They never showed up! Nor did they try in anyway to contact us. When booking, it shows hotels to be picked up from but if yours isn't listed then you there is a box to put your hotel in. Still no show. If they cannot pick you up from your hotel, they need to let you know. Now I have the hassle to get a refund.

title: I was a very bad experience
text: We never have been picked up at the Designated location. We Received the confirmation about pick up point and the time, No one showed up, Telephone did not answer. Half an hour laterwe received full refund on our trip, No apology or explanation provided!

title: The WORST!
text: Terrible, never answered my messages! Never answered the phone, never picked us up even though it was ‚Äúconfirmed‚Äù. And had the audacity to send me a completed message, terrible, they wasted my time. Never book with them.

title: Shop Around
text:
The pros: communication prior to the tour was great. Pick-up time and place were confirmed and ticket times and prices were suggested and subsequently purchased from web links that were provided. Diego, our tour guide, was enthusiastic and had a great attitude.

The cons: pick-up was late and the vehicle was substandard for tourism. It was not clean, parts of the door seal were falling apart, and we could smell exhaust fumes in the cabin. I think this is his personal vehicle as there are no tourism markings on the vehicle. There was no water provided even though it was advertised. Our guide told us the palace tickets we were told to purchase by his colleague were not good for an efficient tour. Because of this, we weren‚Äôt able to see much of what the tour had to offer due to the ticket times and location‚Ä¶ something you trust a tour company to consider.

I booked this through Chase experiences and couldn't be more disappointed. We've booked many tours through Chase experiences all over the world and this is by far the worst. It's like they started doing this tour right before he picked us up.

I want to be clear, this is not Diego‚Äôs company and as such, he said he had no choice in vehicle selection and he did not suggest tickets. However, there should be some quality control. Under no circumstances should anyone paying money be picked up in this vehicle nonetheless a tour company trying to make a first impression. We paid for a better vehicle experience considering we had to come out of pocket for everything else.

There were some fun parts‚Ä¶ the two palaces and lunch were great, but unfortunately the beginning of the tour started out so negatively that it left a sour taste in my mouth for the rest of the day no matter how much Diego tried to salvage it. I'm so disappointed. Weigh my words carefully and choose wisely as there are many other choices.

title: I would not count on this company.
text: Over the years I have had nothing but positives to say about the many tours I have booked through Viator‚Ä¶until today, The tour we booked started at 8h and the LisbonNative owner later confirmed that time.The night before the tour she moved the pickup time to an earlier. When i informed her that was not possible for us due to another commitment she was rigid and would not budge. There is no reason to do business with tour guides that will not stick to their contract and think so little of their client‚Äôs schedules.

title: Tour to forget
text:
Tour poor.luis can not speak Italian well, did not laugh not joke.
Every place we visited we had to correct because it gave us at most 10 minutes. Not recommended

title: Nice Driver, Poor Time Arrangement
text: Overall the trip was below my average expectation. I give 2 star because the driver is nice, but the trip was poorly planned ‚Äì when we went to Pena palace, the sun didn't even come out when we leave, making our photo dark and plain. The time we have at Roca Azenhas do Mar and Cabo da Roca is 15 min each, leaving really restricted time for photos. We had half an hour at Cascais, with nothing really interesting to do. When we get back, the sun is still high in the air.

title: A Trip Ruined by the Mad Self-centeredness of Guide
text:
I don't understand the positive reviews about this Sintra tour
with Guide A.Feldman... or our group met a double of his who imposed his off-topic ramblings. He never listened to our requests, he did what he wanted, he made us waste time intentionally, for the visit to the Pena palace, preventing us from lining up right away, to listen to his Infiniti sololoquies; he did not provide us with useful directions for the stop in Sintra and did not respect the scheduled times, stating that he generously gave us more time (but no one had asked for it), he always drove in a distracted and dangerous way, gesticulating, turning behind and taking his hands off the wheel to beat on the dashboard, screaming from the car and calling back the girls who passed; finally he offered us an endless sequence of clich√©s about Italians (probably the result of too many films) that could not be discussed... what can I say? our group of 8 people was patient hoping that so calmed down but it did not happen; we were happy to return safely given the way we drove... I strongly discourage this character who is really much beyond originality and extravagance ... I do not know how he can work with the public and even less understand the positive reviews I read and which I am sincerely amazed.

title: Beautiful Sintra, Stressful experience
text: Sintra was beautiful and the Pena Palace was uniquely interesting. Other stops in the afternoon were nice. The pick-up was on time. The guide was knowledgeable. However, we felt that the day was quite rushed, not enough time for lunch and strolling around Sintra, and too little time for each stop. The tour guide‚Äôs driving habits were very hot-tempered with phone usage here and there while driving, which felt unsafe, along with lots of mean words about other drivers we needed to hear from him. The van size was small, too tight for 8 people. Overall, a good place to visit but not great experience unfortunately.

title: NEGATIVE EXPERIENCE
text:
GUIDE IN ITALIAN DOES NOT MEAN MULTILINGUAL GUIDE.
WE WANTED A GUIDE WHO DOES HIS JOB, NOT THE ENTERTAINER OF A HOLIDAY VILLAGE, WHO IS ALSO ARROGANT, LOUD TOO MUCH AND ANNOYING, EVEN THOUGH PERHAPS HE SEEMS TO BE NICE.
NOT EVEN AMERICANS LIKE SUCH ARROGANCE. LACK OF PROFESSIONALISM ON THE PART OF THE AGENCY. YOU PAY LESS AND YOU GET LESS.

title: High hopes - old car
text:
Lisbon was the last leg of our trip and we were so excited about this tour given the awesome reviews and destinations, not just Sintra, but around coastal viewpoints. We had high hopes. I knew something was up because when I booked my reservations we had prompt communication from the get go via What's App. We had booked tickets for Sintra separately for the 10AM slot as advised.

I expected confirmation of time and pick up point after the first day being in Lisbon. However, a day before our tour we still hadn't heard anything. I checked in with TripAdvisor or Viator (same same) to reach out to a rep. I even called them directly with no response. Finally, in the afternoon someone had reached out through What's App, the afternoon prior to our tour - to confirm everything.

We were expecting a van. As mentioned, a luxury ride with AC. We got none of that. It all made sense. The business vans were in the shop and the van we got was a renter, which I later learned when we were stranded. It was quite old and dinged on the side of the car. Our driver/tour guide seemed a little frazzled upon meeting. For one, he was doing multiple pick up point with a guest that didn't show and then I noticed the AC never turned on. Basically, it all made sense why they didn't reach out sooner to confirm pick up point. I think they took the time to figure out what plan B was. So we got a crappy van and our driver was headed out with 7 guests for better or for worst. Did I mention we had 2 small children with us. I felt bad for the folks in the back - it smelled of gas/fuse and hot as hell in the car.

The van eventually overheated. Luckily, we weren't stranded on the freeway. A yellow jacket landed on the interior window and freaked my kid out so he had to pull over for that reason and that's when we all knew, we weren't going to make it up there. We'd be lucky if this thing made it back into Lisbon. The thing that bothered us the most as customers was that they tried to push it. To keep the reservations, to have us ride this van, to see the trip through when our lives were literally put in danger. And Lisbon was going through a heat wave in the middle of June. It was over 100 degrees! Had he turned on the AC in the beginning of the ride that thing would have overheated right away.

They cancelled the booking, refunded us for the tour + tickets. It could have been avoided, the unpleasantness of it, by simply saying look I checked out this rental and it's not great.. we apologize we need to cancel. Like didn't someone at least QA this old van before you put people in for a long ride? Anyway, given the opportunity to go back, I would give this tour company a second chance. This time I'd definitely be making sure it's a nice and shiny black van with AC from this decade. Aside them pushing the agenda, I appreciate their quick service in refund. We still made the best of Lisbon.

title: Sintra - on the day, a disappointment.
text:
In Portugal, my wife and I spent 4 days exploring the highlights of Lisbon - an exhausting but fulfilling visit. Our trip was for 5 days, one day being reserved for Sintra, a visit we were really looking forward to.
Come the day, we boarded the train to Sintra - a truly unexceptional trip, and arrived at Sintra station, along with hundreds of other tourists. We took a taxi - a 'gull-winged vehicle ( a 'Delorean' springs to mind) and headed for Pena Place. When we arrived, the gates were closed and many hundreds of tourists milling around (more arriving by the minute). We were told that pena Place, and 4 other Palaces in Sintra, were closed for the day, because of a national planned strike by those who worked in the Palaces. At no point in time did anyone in Lisbon or Sintra make the tourists aware of the strike, and subsequent closure of the tourist attractions.
As such, I can only comment on Sintra. A truly unremarkable place, with little to offer visitors other than some highly-rated restaurants. To cap off an eventful day, through entirely my own fault (likely tinged with some level of frustration), I took the wrong train back to Lisbon, and ended up with a 40 euro taxi ride back to our hotel.

title: Poor Experience
text:
Al principio muy bien me contactaron para ponerse de acuerdo conmigo para el tour. Pero despu√©s todo fue perdiendo control:
El lugar en el que nos hab√≠an citado era diferente al que ten√≠a el gu√≠a, as√≠ que llegamos tarde.
El gu√≠a muy descuidado al manejar, se meti√≥ en sentido contrario en una calle, cuando intentaba estacionarse golpe√≥ el auto.
No pudo entrar con nosotros al palacio da
Pena porque le dieron un ticket con una hora diferente
Pod√≠a haber sugerido en Sintra hacer la visita a lugares interesantes como la quinta do regaleiro en vez de eso nos dijo d√≥nde comer y caminar.
La cereza del pastel fue cuando se hizo en reversal le choc√≥ al auto que ven√≠a atr√°s
Creo que pudo haber sido una mejor experiencia.

title: Prepare for Lisbon
text:
Couple tips:
1- Uber everywhere. It‚Äôs cheap, reliable and fast.
2- Pra√ßa do Com√©rcio is a must. Go at night and enjoy the restaurants and great atmosphere. I recommend a place called Navega. Live music, beautiful people and affordable food.
3- if someone talks you into the TRAM 28, do not do it. It‚Äôs crowded, slow and pick pockets are all around.
4- There are a bunch of castles, monasteries, towers, etc. most of them require a ticket. Make sure to buy your ticket in advance. The lines are huge.
5- if you have time, go to Sintra and Cascais. Don‚Äôt hire a tour guide. It‚Äôs too expensive. You can UBER there or get a train. I recommend the Moorish castle in Sintra.
6- Have fun.

title: Ok tour with a good visit to Pena Palace and mediocre wine tasting
text: This private tour took us to Pena Palace, which was amazing, to an old winery in Colares, where wine tasting was mediocre, to Cabo de la Roca, which was just a viewing point and to our opinion not worth it the visit. We also went to Cascais for lunch and our driver Gonzalo choose a very good restaurant. Cascais was nice. Gonzalo was a pleasant company and driver. We had booked this tour because of excellent reviews given to a guide called Jos√©. Unfortunately even after confirmation that Jos√© was going to be our guide, we were informed two hours before our tour on April 17th that he could not make due to some health issues. Communication with the tour provider was not as smooth as with other providers. They did not answer to messages via trip advisor and I had to contact them via WhatsApp. Even v√≠a WhatsApp they answered with delay. Overall the tour was OK but taking into account the price and comparing to other private tours we are doing in Portugal it did not meet the expectations raised by previous reviews.

title: DO NOT BOOK HIM
text: He took my pictures over a month ago. I was looking forward to reviewing them. It has been over a month. No photo, no response, viator is unable to get in touch with him. Honestly viator has been less than helpful.

title: Communication is Horrible/NO PHOTOS
text:
Ruben took our engagement photos, from what he showed us on his camera the pictures were beautiful. Ruben told us it would take 4 to 5 business days to receive the photos back. We have reached out multiple times to him and he has NOT responded back with an update on our photos. Even if the pictures were not ready yet, he could COMMUNICATE that with us. I feel like WE got SCAMMED and Robbed of a great moment.
I wanted to announce my engagement using those photos but we never received them. I feel like if you struggle with communication or you really don‚Äôt feel like doing this then STOP taking peoples money and WASTING THEIR TIME!

I WOULD NOT BOOK with HIM!!!!!!!!!!!!

PICK SOMEONE ELSE TO CAPTURE YOUR MOMENTS!

title: Terrible. Didn‚Äôt show up.
text: Didn‚Äôt show up. Wouldn‚Äôt answer texts or calls via Skype. Terrible waste of time and absolutely enraging.

title: The tour guide never show up and never answered his cell phone
text:
I made a reservation for today and the photographer ghosted me. I reached out via cell phone, found their Instagram, and emailed them, whats App. I did everything I could think of and I even waited there.

Trip Advisor needs to monitor this account because it's not a good look. You also don't know who you're dealing with, so this isn't good press for your business.

The customer service could use a HUGE upgrade. I requested my refund naturally so I am waiting to receive that.

It sucks when you're traveling and want to do something cool and then THIS happens. My reservation was at 7 am too and I woke up so early to get ready for this only to be met with crickets. It's 8 pm in Lisbon and I still haven't heard back from them.

title: HE DID NOT GIVE ME PHOTOS FOR 2 MONTHS
text: He did not give me photos for 2months now and he just disappeared. I am worried that he is going to use my personal photos without my permission for any reasons. I was not comportable to shoot with him but he kept saying he is professional photographer, don't worry. but then when we were shooting photos, he fell down himself, he kept saying camera and memory card is broken but I was there it didn't break. he said he had to give his camera to canon service office then he said he is going to get back his camera soon then he got mad at me that happened with rude attitude. I wasted my time and money. he never replied ever since. I texted him happy christmas, happy new year. but he never gave me photos. He is using different name on the other website. he never gave me his info. this was totally scam. so disappointed. is he a photographer?

title: Portugal with Spainvision
text:
Travel NOT RECOMMENDED even for people with great Marian devotion who want to be in a hotel in Fatima every day. You have to have very good health and a lot of sacrifice spirit for the hundreds of km, the early mornings and the bad food.
But if you're looking for a cultural trip to what they announce "the best of Portugal," I'll tell you it's a FRAUD. Since the hotel is in Fatima, you have to do hundreds of km every day to go to Coimbra, Porto, Lisbon, etc. cities that show you superficially from the bus, leave you a scarce free time that gives nothing and running back to the bus. In the two monasteries that led us with great history, no guide.
Road stops for driver rest in crowded places where we queued long lines to pee and didn‚Äôt have time to drink coffee.
I could say a lot more negative things.
Lack of total information such as that on the sixth day, only the night before tell us that the bus leaves for Madrid at 3 am. We arrived in Atocha 9 and a half hours later and then took the AVE each to its destination. Total one travel NIGHTMARE.

title: Transfer
text:
2
The driver was late so we had to call multiple times since it went to voice mail and finally ask help from a local. Then the van showed up with no sign and the driver just standing by vehicle. Finally my husband had to ask if he was here to pick up 4 people and then we were on our way late.

title: A total scam! Avoid !
text: This card is a total SCAM!!! We are currently in Porto, we bought a Porto card (discount only) for 4 days, considering the places we wanted to visit. We arrived on Saturday and so far 2 of the museums we wanted to visit - and which were free with the Porto card - are currently closed! Anorher one (also free with the card) is also free every weekend. Yesterday we had lunch at Chez Lapin, which is supposed to offer a 10% discount. The man told us the discount coudn't work 1st because we didn't have a number on the card, 2nd because to get the discount we should have bought the card at their place... He was clearly inventing reasons. This is a total scandal!!! So far we have spent 18 euros each for almost nothing (-1‚Ç¨ for the cathedral and -3‚Ç¨ at the chamber of commerce)! The Porto card is a total fraud! I want my money back!!!

title: Expensive and useless
text: Useless for those over 65, the offers are much better. No information on this subject on the site.. Money wasted; especially do not buy.

title: Not profitable
text:
To begin with, if you are over 65, there is no point in taking the Portocard.
‚ÄúSenior‚Äù benefits are greater than those awarded by the Portocard.

The Porto card gives you free access to 6 attractions/monuments, including the cathedral which is not a paid monument. For the others, they were not on our to do list‚Ä¶
For other activities you will have 10 to 20%.
The porto card also allows you to benefit from discounts in food shops.
The only time I thought about taking out my porto card at a restaurant, the waitress took it from me to go do the bill, so I was happy to finally be able to recoup this investment! Then she came back and told me that the discount did not apply at lunchtime...maybe she said the opposite in the evening...

I also took the public transport option. You should know that the metro lines do not serve the historic center, so do not rely too much on it to organize your stay. You will need to rely on buses. There is no map with the routes of the different lines, you will have to use a Google map type application (not functional in Porto for Map Ô£ø).
The advantage is that it is unlimited, so you can allow yourself to get lost or make stops in your journeys and thus discover places that you would not have planned.

In short, I didn't do the math but I probably didn't make my porto card profitable over a 4-day stay.

title: NOT FOR DISABLED PEOPLE WHO NEED FULL DOOR OPENING ACCESS TO ALIGHT FROM THEIR VEHICLE
text: Intended to go to Polperro once more to see if the parking for disabled people was any better than last September when we found that disabled bays were exactly the same size as a normal car parking spot.Same as last year impractical to use one even if a space was available as it was impossible for me to get out. Coupled with the parking charges at ¬£6 for 3 hours even if the owner of the land had Nationally recognised size parking bays which they have not ,(could class it as discriminatory) It would take me more than 3 hours to take in the views by foot and get back to the car. Personally it is not a disabled customer friendly car park and I would not recommend any disabled visitor to Polperro for this reason as pretty as it may be.

title: Igreja lindissima
text: Igreja linda, por√©m o valor do ticket de entrada para olhar a igreja n√£o compensa se comprado ao tamanho da igreja.

title: Do not be fooled by the false niceness, Lisbon Soul Tours are unprofessional to the core
text: I booked Lisbon Soul Tours for a corporate event. At first she seemed helpful and professional however this is far from the case. First she quoted her price without IVA and then Lisbon Soul Tours thought it was appropiate to contact me on my personal number on a Sunday because she lacked the time management skills to manage her time and she thought it was appropiate to contact a customer out of office hours on a SUNDAY. She was doing her accounting and needed information from me. The lack of respect for my personal time was shocking and frankly I found it beyond rude that she thought contacting a customer on Sunday appropiate. Her response was " its the only day I have to take care of it". Her lack of time management skills is not my responsibily nor any other customers. Contacting out of office hours to discuss a non urgent work matter is beyond rude and outlines her complete lack of respect for her customers time. I was actually at a wedding trying to enjoy my day. I sent the basic information she requested, but she then continued to message me, expecting me to jump because she wanted me to jump. My messages were short because being reached out to on a Sunday is unprofessional and she is ruining my day. She then continued to expect me to answer her messages and I messaged her saying it was inappriopiate and rude to be contacting me on a SUNDAY and there is nothing tat cannot wait until Monday. SO SHE CANCELLED MY BOOKING. No apology because she was in the wrong, no undertstanding that I was at a wedding with my family and see was unsetting my day, no understanding that contacting a customer on a SUNDAY is out of order! NO IT WAS ALL ABOUT HER, she clearly thinks she is the most important person in the room. She is beyond unprofessional, do not fall for the fake niceness it is a front!

title: Reserve for experienced players
text:
An awfully hard golf course, to reserve for experienced players!!!! Very bad signage... lots of blind holes. To do absolutely by cart, because on foot it holds golf-hiking biathlon... very long links with high elevation, we thought we died ü§£
However, the greens, tees and fairways are correct.
What is certain is that we will not return to it.
Restaurant staff very friendly!!!!

title: Don‚Äôt waste your time and money on this ‚Äúgolf course‚Äù
text: This is the worst golf course in Portugal - poor layout and in absolutely appalling condition- the Belas course just next door has been completely renovated and is a much better course in infinitely better condition.

title: Management that sends messages to customers to delete comments made on different platforms
text:
Preparing for a wedding is not easy, whether big or small. For us, who had a relatively small wedding, less than 35 people, it was quite difficult to find a venue that accepted less than 50 guests.
After several disappointments, we found the Lisbon Club Restaurante, which offered us the possibility of holding a wedding with no minimum number of guests, with a perfect dinner space for our number of people and also an outdoor space where we held the civil ceremony.
Our wedding day was perfect, with ups and downs, but perfect due to the presence of everyone who was closest to us and who helped make the day more special.
Let's leave a small summary of our experience at Lisbon Club Restaurante.
For those looking for a place that does not require a minimum number of guests and in a location that offers privacy and an outdoor space surrounded by nature and at the same time looking for a place with good food and an affordable price, this could be the right choice .
We start by highlighting the positive aspects of choosing this space. The food was great, the menu we chose included starters, a fish dish, a meat dish and buffet desserts. All guests praised the food and also the fact that the option of another type of meat was provided for some of our guests who did not like the chosen dish. The table service was exceptional and, in our opinion, helped us relax from some of the lows that we will mention below. We also highlight Vanessa's exceptional service, without her the night would not have been the same. Not only for your empathy with people, but also for your animation and sincerity, thank you, Vanessa, who helped make our evening much more fun and made your presence known, several of our guests highlighted your good disposition and professionalism . Thanks.
We now move on to the negative aspects that are important to highlight, not only for those looking to hold a wedding in this space, but also so that management can take note and improve the service it provides for wedding events.
The Lisbon Club Restaurant is mainly used by members of the Golf club in which the restaurant is located. On the first visit we were informed that, since we wanted to hold the ceremony outside, it could only be held from 6:30 pm onwards, as until 6:00 pm all the indoor and outdoor space was for the use of regular customers.
Initially this small limitation did not cause us any constraint, as we managed to organize the civil ceremony to be held at 6:30 pm and the rest of the party was organized taking that time into account. However, as time went by, and in the various interactions we had with the people responsible for the restaurant, we noticed that the biggest focus was always on regular customers and not on the event we were planning.
The limited timetables ended up becoming the biggest problem in holding the wedding in this space and, in our opinion, what the management should change if they want to capture a larger audience of couples looking for spaces for smaller weddings.
Having the ceremony time imposed on us at 6:30 pm wouldn't have been a problem, if it weren't for the fact that, as time passed, they made us feel as if we were extra in space and wanted to ‚Äúdispatch‚Äù the matter quickly.
To give some context and as we mentioned before, our wedding had less than 35 people. Furthermore, we decided not to spend money on the extra services that the restaurant also offers, such as dining room decoration and exterior decoration, nor on DJ entertainment. Taking this into account, we ourselves tried to create some simple decorations for the dining room and the ceremony space.
It was during the week before the wedding that we noticed the biggest lack of interest and concern on the part of the restaurant.
In the various conversations we had with the management, we had organized and agreed everything we wanted to do for the decoration that we delivered to be placed in the dining room and ceremony space, as well as time to set up the sound system that we would use at the event. .
This is where the ‚Äútime‚Äù factor, or lack thereof, becomes a problem.
We had been given permission to leave the columns prepared and assembled in the dining room the day before the wedding. However, when we arrived the day before the wedding to deal with this situation, the employees seemed to have no information about this matter that we had already discussed with the management, and we ended up making a vain trip to the space, as after all the speakers were not they could be left assembled in the space as they would ‚Äúinterfere‚Äù with the club members‚Äô lunch.
When we asked what time on the wedding day we could have things ready, we were told only from 6pm (note that the ceremony was scheduled for 6:30pm). Before that we couldn't, as golf club members have all the indoor and outdoor space. Also highlighting that we were informed that all these people were informed that from 6pm the spaces were being used for a private event, however during the ceremony and photo session on the golf course, there were still customers outside our event circulating.
The limited time to organize the event, without hiring extra services from the restaurant, became worse when, on the wedding day, the groom arrives at 6:10 pm at the ceremony space to set up the columns outside, and what he finds is a space for half-mounted ceremony.
The petals had been placed on the floor to create the hallway, as we had requested, but in the middle was a tennis table that is usually there for regular customers. There were no chairs for the guests, there was a rubbish bin next to the ceremony table and next to the bar area, there was another rubbish bin and a ‚ÄúHello‚Äù ice cream sign. The table we had requested to place the columns was also missing, as well as the only decorative piece for the ceremony table.
We paid ‚Ç¨190 to be able to hold the civil ceremony outside. A value that had not been mentioned on the first visit to the space, however we accepted it, as the value supposedly included the preparation and assembly of the space's decoration. Highlighting that our decoration was minimal, just a small aisle of petals and a decorative piece for the ceremony table.
For those who pay ‚Ç¨190 to rent the space, we expected it to be clean and tidy, as we had been promised they would do from 4pm on the day of the wedding. What happened was that the cleaning and organization of the space was only done after the groom's arrival and with guests present, within 20 minutes, when it was discovered that things had not been done as we had previously agreed and organized with the management.
This reminder is so that you can improve your service if you really want to have more success and more wedding events. We understand that you already have your regular customer base, but, if you commit to holding these events, the least you should pay attention to is your customers, whether they want to do more elaborate or simpler things. Everyone has the right to your dedication and concern.
Contrary to what we have seen mentioned in previous comments on this platform about the ceremony space, perhaps if we had hired the extra decoration service, we would not have had all these limitations and stressful moments.
Our wedding day was perfect, we had fun and it will forever be unforgettable, however we couldn't help but share our experience in this space so that future couples know and also so that management takes note and seeks to improve the service for this type of events.

Update on 19/10/23 - The text written above was initially published on the Casamentos.pt platform, and right then we received a message from Mrs. Ana (management) shamelessly asking us to modify the score and the comment we made about the service they provided us, something unbelievable and completely unacceptable. 2 days ago, our comment was deleted from this platform, apparently at the request of the restaurant. If the revolt over the lack of professionalism was already great before, it has become worse. Don't trust this company for your wedding.

title: Inaccurate and false
text: I had to cancel a pickup and custom tour due to American Airlines‚Äô performance. I learned of the flight cancellation and notified my driver well in advance. I also notified the Welcome customer service team and sent all documents verifying issues outside my control. I asked for a refund. The rep reviewed the ask and declined saying they sent to the driver anyway and paid him and that I missed my flight. Both inaccurate and false. They have all evidence to the contrary. I don‚Äôt cancel due to whim or a changed mind. I don‚Äôt even get to Lisbon due to airline problems. Don‚Äôt punish the customer who acted in good faith. I wouldn‚Äôt use this company.

title: Never use Welcome Pickups
text: We scheduled a transfer with Welcome Pickups from our Lisbon hotel to the airport. I received an email that our driver was there at our hotel waiting for us. He wasn‚Äôt. Then I received a text from the driver asking us to meet him ‚Äúin front of the sardine store on main square.‚Äù We had NO IDEA where that was. The square near the hotel was Rossio Square, which is the largest square in Lisbon - many, many football fields could fit into it. We asked directions to the ‚Äúsardine store‚Äù but by the time we got there, which was less then 20 minutes from our original pickup time, we got an email saying the transfer was canceled and no refund was possible because the driver could not find us! We had to grab a cab and race to the airport for our flight! A very tense and frustrating experience!

title: Dont take the EXPENSIVE transfer. Go with uber or bolt
text: So expensive transfer and when u cancel after 24hours u dont have any refund. When the person cancel it is NOT explicity or even show up any msg warning. I paid with my internacional card that has been added fees. Terrible company. I tried to contact to have my money back, but without any success

title: Out $64 and feeling used
text: My friends and I booked Welcome Pickups to take us from the Lisbon airport to our AirBnB. As we were first time overseas travellers we had no previous information on how long it would take to get through customs. I booked the pick up for what I thought would be sufficient time to get through customs and pick up our luggage. I also provided my flight number so the driver would know if there were delays with my arrival. Going through customs ended up taking almost 2 hours because of the incredibly long lineup. By that time our drive had left and we were out the $64 paid in advance. When I inquired about a refund, I was denied. While I understand that the company cannot wait indefinitely, there was nothing on the website when I booked the drive giving us any indication of how long we should expect to wait to get through customs. If they had done this, as a first time traveller I would have booked the pick up for a later time. This was very disappointing as I feel that the company does not care about their customers enough to give them all the information needed to successfully book a pick up. I will not use their service again and would recommend others instead use Uber as we ended up doing, for a lower price.

title: 2 trips, 2 complete failures
text:
I booked this service for a pickup at the Lisbon airport, as well as a trip from our AirBnB to the airport. In both cases, the drivers canceled. Luckily Uber was available.

Full details: prior to my arrival in Lisbon, I had booked a transfer for 5 people with 5 bags. The day before the driver texted me and said that he did not think that his car (which the service reserved for me) would work. He offered to upgrade my car at a 50% increase in cost (or 3x what an Uber cost). I declined and asked them to cancel and refund my money. I did get a message that my cancelation did not merit a refund since it was within 24 hours, which I found humorous since their service caused the problem.

Similarly, on my return to the airport the driver thought the car was too small. I asked to cancel and refund, which they did. Then the drive said he misunderstood the number of bags and said he could take us. I tried to book again and after waiting 5 hours for a response they canceled. Luckily Uber
allowed me to prebook a car.

I will not use this service again.

title: NO SHOW and VERY unsatisfying reaction
text: Prepaid transfer that never happened, they claimed the driver was there till 20:52 - we could proof (with screenshots) that we tried to call the driver (who was NOT there) from 20:50 onwards - after we already looked for him 10 minutes - so clearly a lie........there was NO DRIVER and NO RESPONSE to our calls - we were left alone at the airport AFTER THE trip was paid already - now we need a lawyer to get our money back - leave alone the trouble and inconvenience..... BAD BUSINESS PRACTICE - STAY AWAY from (un)welcome tours in Porto at least....

title: A Scam. Don't be fooled.
text: Terrible experience with Welcome Pickups Lisbon. They are not legit. A total scam. They took my money without giving me the ride I requested. I paid over 200 dollars in advance, and even though they never gave me the ride, they refused to return it. Don't make the mistake I did. Don't trust them with your money.

title: No Driver showed
text: NEVER, NEVER, NEVER USE THIS COMPANY! We booked a transfer from the Lisbon airport to our hotel. No driver came to pick us up and when we called we were given the run around. They suggested that we just not go ahead with the booking that we already paid for. I demanded a refund and will hope and pray that I ever see it. NEVER NEVER NEVER!

title: Unprofessional
text: Organized a couple of days way in advance, and she cancelled on us. Yes, there were changes in our itinerary and number of days engaged, but to tell us another client got priority over us??? Very unprofessional and her dropping us has left us in a lurch during busy season.

title: Terrible itinerary
text: While the places we visited were all amazing we were very disappointed overall. The highlight of this day trip, and the reason we booked it, was to see Sintra. We left downtown Lisbon at 8:15 am and got to Sintra at 5:30 pm after spending most of the day riding in a van to and from the other destinations. By the time we got there we were all exhausted. I can not recommend this itinerary.

title: Not very good experience
text: Very amateur approach of guiding. Unfortunately we didn‚Äôt listen anything of what the guide explained. We were without headphones and the guide took us to the city and the train station which were too crowded for him to be heard. He blamed our group for making noise but they lactually lack professionalism. When we comment and complained that it wasn‚Äôt feasible for us to follow and listen he again blamed us. As soon as we realised that we wouldn‚Äôt be able to listen to him we gave up and just wandered around the city. Don‚Äôt hire this company unless you demand headphones!!!

title: Horrible Driving Experience / Severe Anxiety All Day / Driver Nodding Off
text:
The entire day, we were terrified since driver was swerving, nodding off, and driving recklessly. We almost got off the tour until we realized we were over 2 hours from Lisbon. Expecting a full refund due to the anxiety and feeling scared.
This driver should not have a license!

title: Fatima, Nazare and Pena Palace tour that I would Not recommend!
text: I am very disappointed in our tour. I did the research and thought that this would be an ideal tour. It was not! The group was small , 8 customers, 2 were Brazilian and the rest English speaking. We were put in a van that had 3 adults sitting in the back bench. It was very hot and cramped. I asked if the air could be cooler and was told no. The different areas of the tour were a distance apart from each other, which I knew. But in so many tours that I have taken, there is a consistent interaction and provision of info about the region, culture, etc. There were none of that during the ride to the location. I‚Äôm talking 90 minutes of nothing. It was only when we were either at the location or driving into the area that we got a little info. The guide had to translate into Portuguese then into English and drive. His English was not the best and you could tell that he was more comfortable engaging with the Brazilian couple. Once we got to Nazar√© and Fatima, we were left to wander on our own. The Pena palace the guide did accompany us and gave some details. This was not an ideal tour. I definitely would Not recommend this tour.

title: Rare
text: We arrived late to Sintra, from there straight to eat in Nazare where we lost an hour and a half alone in the lunch spot, from there 10 min to see the main Attraction, we did not know the center, we arrived super late to Fatima, we were given less than 50 min to tour without any explanation and no time to buy presents, everything was very weird. I would not repeat and regret taking the tour.

title: Wild and scary ride.
text: Tour guide was very nice but his driving was erratic on the gas and brake pedal. He drifted in and out of lanes, was speeding and easily distracted. It was scary and all 7 passengers that were not in the same party were concerned. He tried to be very informative but was hard to understand. We were all happy to be out of the van at the end of the day.

title: N√£o indico! P√©ssimo servi√ßo. Desrespeitoso.
text:
conheci a living tours em dois passeios que fiz saindo do Porto. Em Lisboa, decidi marcar um passeio para Sintra com a mesma empresa porque tinha tido boa experi√™ncia. Marquei na v√©spera, portanto entrei em contato via chat e whatsapp para garantir que havia vagas e estava tudo certo. Fechei o pacote, paguei na hora via cart√£o de cr√©dito. Chego na manh√£ seguinte ao local marcado com 10 minutos de anteced√™ncia e n√£o havia ningu√©m caracterizado com a marca da living tours, nenhuma indica√ß√£o. Havia guias da buendia, meu pai abordou um que buscou nosso nome numa lista, n√£o encontrou e disse de maneira grosseira que n√£o era com eles. Alguns minutos depois, abordamos outro guia da buendia que disse (de maneira simp√°tica) que dever√≠amos esperar o guia da living tours. O grupo grande sai e ficamos meu pai, minha m√£e e eu na pra√ßa. Ningu√©m da living tours. Tento contato via whatsapp mas era s√°bado √†s 8h30 e s√≥ respondem a partir de 9h. De imediato, jogam o erro em mim: sugerem que havia sido informafo por email que o passeio era da buendia e que a responsabilidade era minha. Observa√ß√£o: no email n√£o fica explicado explicitamente que o passeio seria realizado por outra empresa; apenas passam o contato da buendia. Se eu chego ao local e o guia da outra empresa diz que n√£o √© com eles, o que deveria fazer? Uma hora no whatsapp... Resolvo ir at√© o escrit√≥rio e a agente bem simp√°tica. A√≠ descobrimos que a buendia cometeu um erro e n√£o incluiu nossos nomes na lista. Destalhe: em nenhum momento a living tours assumiu qualquer erro; jogou a culpa para mim e jogou a culpa para a empresa terceirizada, mas nunca foi dela mesma ou de seus funcion√°rios. A agente tentou encontrar maneiras de compensar, mas olha o absurdo: depois de falar com a supervisora, nos ofereceu um passeio privado para ver um castelo de Sintra (n√≥s t√≠nhamos fechado um passeio para ver dois) e devolveria a diferen√ßa; mas n√£o fez nenhum desconto ter√≠amos que pagar o valor integral do passeio. N√£o houve nenhuma cortesia, nenhum pedido de desculpa pr√°tico. Eu acabaria tendo que contratar um servi√ßo particular, privado (que √© mais caro!!!) e ainda ver apenas metade do que eu desejava ver. Basicamente, eu estava sendo punido por um erro que n√£o era meu. Foram duas horas de enorme chatea√ß√£o e nenhuma mea culpa da living tours. A proatividade foi para substituir o passeio mas n√£o deram nenhum jeito de garantir o passeio que eu tinha contratado. No fim das contas, para n√£o perder o dia com meus pais j√° idosos, aceitamos um terceiro passeio a Sintra para ver um pal√°cio hist√≥rico (mas n√£o era o da Pena nem a Quinta da Regaleira como eu queria). E tive que me contentar. Essa experi√™ncia foi terr√≠vel, com a culpa sendo jogada de um lado para o outro, inclusive para o cliente, e ningu√©m corrigiu mesmo a situa√ß√£o para garantir os passeios que n√≥s desej√°vamos. Ou seja: no fim das contas foo s√≥ por dinheiro, n√£o para garantir uma boa experi√™ncia para n√≥s. Registre-se: a living tours n√£o opera em Lisboa, mas terceiriza os servi√ßos. Assim sendo, n√£o garante a boa qualidade. Na hora do problema, todos t√™m responsabilidade menos a empresa.
A bem da justi√ßa: a colega que nos atendeu no guich√™ de turismo em Lisboa (em nome da living tours) foi prestativa e acredito que tenha feito o melhor que p√¥de. A guia Catarina e o motorista (de √≥culos) que nos levaram a Sintra e Cascais tamb√©m foram competentes. Mas isso n√£o apagou em nada a enorme chatea√ß√£o de mais cedo. Foi meu √∫ltimo dia em Portugal e a lembran√ßa que trouxe foo de desrespeito e frustra√ß√£o.

title: Dogs not allowed
text: No dogs allowed. No reason whatsoever since it's a book shop... Just told me my dog couldn't enter. Does not fit with the whole LxFactory concept

title: Cancelled hours before
text: The man messaged me a few days before introducing himself and I replied saying how excited we were. He then asked us if we could book through him as tripadvisor takes too much commission. I would have but we had already purchased our tickets. He then didn‚Äôt respond for two days, and then the evening before (less than 12 hours before our booking) he cancelled it through the booking website and did not message to say he was going to do that. The money takes 3-5 days to return into the account so we couldn‚Äôt book with anyone else. It was disappointing as our kids were looking forward to a tuk tuk ride and I felt let down as he cancelled it without consulting me. I do not recommend this company as I don‚Äôt want anyone else to be disappointed by their unreliability.

title: Beautiful but terrible ending
text: 5 women took this tour from Lisbon. Driver was 20 minutes late picking us up and then had to stop at the store to pick up the water that was ‚Äúincluded‚Äù. It was advertised as a ‚Äúluxury‚Äù car and it was anything but luxury. Very uncomfortable and could hear nothing in the back seat. Our driver Vincent was very polite and tried his best to get the car very close to our destinations. Sadly we had a terrible car accident on the way home. Vincent called another car to take us the rest of the way back to Lisbon. We tried to get the tour company to pay for our medical supplies (bandages ice packs etc) and the lost night in Lisbon but no success. Thankfully we were not seriously hurt but bruised and shaken up. This company did not care. I would not recommend them because of their lack of concern and lack of compensation.

title: Tuktuk Lisbon
text: Be very careful with these. Know the cost up front. If you need a ride from one place to another, stay away from the tuktuk. Other options are cheaper like the hop on hop off and a lot more flexible for site seeing. It‚Äôs not worth the money!

title: Waste of time
text: Booked a tour. Travelled an hour to get to the meeting place, got there, just for them to cancel the tour 30 minutes before. Unprofessional.

title: Ride to hell.
text:
Try getting a modern Tuk Tuk with decent suspension. Five to ten minutes into my tour I was jolted in my seat by the vehicle running over a very deep pothole in the road which lifted me out of my seat, I hit my head on the shoddy canopy (which was already ripped and frequently tended to by the guide) and hurt my back triggering a sciatica attack and my Parkinson‚Äôs. Hoping this to be a one off incident, I continued with my journey. Little did I realise the incident will be repeated in lesser form throughout the trip. I could not concentrate on the guide‚Äôs dialogue because of the intermittent attacks of pain on my left, I could not take decent photos due to the right hand side was shaking because of Parkinson‚Äôs.
I had warned the tour operator that I had Parkinson‚Äôs and they assured me they had assigned a vehicle with easy access for the trip. Access was not easy. I did not see an appreciable difference between this Tuk Tuk and the other, younger, better maintained vehicles. Thankfully, I returned to my comfortable hotel to rest my back for the rest of the day after forfeiting the last hour of my trip due to pain.
The vehicle I was in was a disgrace. It was not fit for purpose. The ‚Äúsuspension‚Äù was useless, if the vehicle had any, and the bodywork is showing very many signs of wear.
It needs scrapping, and the parts recycled.
To get to the meeting point and to return to the hotel I took an Uber. Why is it that a well maintained car can drive over the potholes without being a problem to the passengers, whereas the Tuk Tuk cost me ten times the cost of one Uber ride? Are you charging extra for the discomfort?
I have given the trip one star, as ‚Äúno stars‚Äù is not an option.

title: Ottimo prodotto prezzo truffa
text:
Bellissimo negozio dove vemdono scatolette di Tonno, Sardine, sgombri ecc ecc.
Peccato che ti fanno pagare quasi il triplo gli stessi prodotti rispetto ai supermercati.
Guardatelo, fotografatelo, prendete nota dei prodotti che vi interessano poi andate al El Corte Ingles e spendete 3 volte meno. presa la fregatura una volta speriamo non dobbiate prenderla anche voi.

title: Extremely Disappointed ‚Äì Look4Portugal Failed to Deliver on Every Level
text:
My friends and I booked Exoticca‚Äôs Portugal & Spain escorted tour as a special birthday trip, expecting a guided cultural experience as advertised. What we received was a disorganized, unsupported experience ‚Äî largely due to the failures of Exoticca‚Äôs local partner, Look4Portugal (L4P).

From the outset, no tour guide was ever assigned to our group. This was sold as an escorted tour, yet we were left solely with a driver ‚Äî who was kind, professional, and did his best, but not trained or informed to act as a tour guide. There was no commentary, no structured itinerary, and no on-the-ground support. We were simply dropped off at sites with no context or explanation.

After we raised concerns, Look4Portugal misled Exoticca by claiming a guide had been provided ‚Äî referring to our driver. This was a clear misrepresentation. A driver is not a substitute for a licensed guide. We later learned that L4P had intentionally chosen not to assign a guide due to our group being small ‚Äî a decision that was never disclosed to us and completely undermined the product we paid for. Even worse, they fired the driver, who was not at fault and did his best under the circumstances. This felt incredibly unfair and deflective of real accountability.

We also tried to contact Look4Portugal multiple times using the WhatsApp and phone number provided in our welcome documents ‚Äî no one ever responded. We had zero local support, no daily communication, and no way to confirm what was happening with the itinerary or excursions.

One of the biggest disappointments was being denied entry to the Alhambra in Granada ‚Äî a major tour highlight ‚Äî because tickets were never secured in advance. Instead, we were walked around the exterior gardens and missed the full experience completely.

Each day began with stress and confusion, as we had no idea what the schedule was or what to expect. Optional excursions were never offered, and we missed out on experiences we would have gladly booked had they been presented.

In summary:

Look4Portugal failed to deliver the guided experience promised.

They misled Exoticca during the follow-up investigation.

They offered no local communication or support.

And they fired the only person who showed up ‚Äî our driver ‚Äî who was not at fault.

If you're considering a tour with Exoticca, and Look4Portugal is listed as the local operator, please reconsider. This provider takes no accountability, misrepresents facts, and left us with a trip that did not match what we paid for or were promised.

title: Nuno the Negative
text: Our Portugal trip was from 3/26/2024 to 4/3/2024 through Exoticca travel company headquartered in Spain. Exoticca has a tie up with a local travel agency in Portugal called Look4Portugal through whom we were assigned a tour guide called Nuno. Nuno is okay with young & able bodied tourists. But he has a long way to go to understand how to be sensitive & caring to people of color & specially to senior tourists in his group. We did not not have the best experience with him. He always sat at the front of the bus with his favorite people of the group who were white people. He would rarely come to the back of the bus where we were seated. Also, due to heavy rain during our Portugal visit we got separated from our group members on the very first day. We could not find the group since Nuno never gave anyone a meeting point & a fixed time to meet at that meeting point. He certainly did not share any number to call him in times of need or emergency. Not able to locate guide Nuno, our group folks, the tourist bus, & not able to reach a Look4Portugal staff on the phone, we took a taxi paying 25 Euros (which was certainly not refunded) to get back to the hotel in the middle of heavy rain to be safe in an unknown place as first time visitors. Called Look4Portugal again from our hotel's front desk for the second time again. This time we got to talk to Eric who sounded that it was all our fault. He suggested that we take a taxi again to meet the group at a different location, all in the middle of heavy rain in a new country as a first time female visitors (my senior mother & me). Only when I said that I will officially complain to Exoticca since he does not care about courtesy & goodwill, he came to the hotel to pick us up to take us back to the rest of the group. There was another tourist bus also who had Exoticca passengers. I checked with some of the tourists in that group as we were all staying in the same hotel. They said that their tour guide, Andre was very efficient & rescheduled the itinerary unlike Nuno to avoid the heavy rains to be flexible & accommodative. The white people tipped Nuno because they left some of their belongings in the hotel & Nuno took all of us back to get those items. I am 200% sure that he would not do this for his non-white group members like us. Without rain & Nuno, this can be a good trip.

title: The worst travel company ever!
text: This is an awful company to travel with. My husband had a heart attack on our flight to Portugal and was taken directly to Santa Maria Hospital in Lisbon. I called the 24/7 help line and they did NOTHING to assist us. We were alone, with a medical emergency, did not speak the language and the company did absolutely NOTHING to assist us. When I explained the situation to our tour guide the next day, she was unhelpful and could have cared less. After he was released I asked Exoticca for assistance getting us flights home, they wanted to charge us each $5000 for one way flights. Stay very far away. It maybe inexpensive to travel with them, but you get less than you paid for.

title: Look4Portugal is your enemy
text: Look4Portugal has been the worst host/guest service we have encountered in 25 years of international travel. Exoticca travel uses them in Portugal as an outsource provider. Multiple times on our anniversary trip they failed us. Very simple tasks such as changing our ride pickup time to the airport and giving us the phone number of our guide. Honestly it seems they are trained to provide obstacles and excuses rather than finding simple solutions. We got so frustrated that we just paid the $10 Uber to the airport than deal with these enemies.

title: Bad experience is an understatement. Don't go to this place.
text: Horrible! My friend suffered prejudice at the hands of the two security guards. One of them disoriented. For me, none of my friends who have been to the lounge ever go back there. There are several complaints about security. Someone will have to take some action. There are videos of the security guard pushing my friend.

title: Oh, bad.
text: Oh, bad. Both environment, food and above all reception staff. Always overcrowded and all attending badly

title: On the low end but does have a shower for extra ‚Ç¨
text: Not the worst lounge, but definitely on the lower end. Lots of seating with random charging outlets for European plugs, USB, and USB-C. Plenty of beverages. Sparse food. And the thing that costs additional money is the shower. Its an additional 16.5 euro charge for using the shower. The shower is pretty limited. No ventilation. No towel to stand on after the shower. Just one bath towel and a shower that has only hot or cold water. No warm water. One additional thing to keep in mind, if you are traveling internationally, is you still have to go through passport control after the lounge and that can take 30 to 45 minutes. That is crowded and hot and makes using the shower pointless.

title: Worst Lounge of all time !
text: Congratulations ANA Lounge at T1 Lisbon airport for winning my award of "Worst Airport Lounge of all Time ". I mean you have to go someway to beat some lounges in Asia and Africa but you really are the worst. From the warm white wines to the only food at 5pm being breakfast items, to the stale rolls, to the lack of USB ports, to the dirty tables left while cleaning staff stand and chat loudly, and who can forget the 'couldn't give a damn" reception staff. What a complete and utter garbage operation ! You let down your country !

title: Avoid at all costs
text:
I travel a lot and pay for Admiral's club access, which they claim to be a partner. The woman at the entrance (Silva Portway) is perhaps the rudest lounge entrance worker I've ever encountered. She denied me access, even though I clearly have a flight with American Airlines. She was mad that the ticket said they plane was operated by Aer Lingus (I mean, come on...)

I was completely professional, and she threatened to call the police on me. I don't know what she'd tell them?

Just don't go here.

title: crowded, but charged access can, priority pass not!
text:
I felt disrespected, I tried to access with my priority pass, and I was informed that at that time due to the super crowd it would not be possible to enter, but if I could, I could also enter by paying.
Hence comes the question, if it was crowded, how would paying that scenario change?
I found it disrespectful and immoral.
This happened two 27.05.25 around the 14hrs.

title: Terrible airport lounge
text: British Airways club class invite you to the delights of this airport lounge. There are no words to describe how awful it is.

title: Breakfast at 5pm
text:
Totally unreal lounge experience‚Ä¶
Arrived at 5pm to be met with breakfast foods still out for consumption as well as a small selection of rolls‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ that was it‚Ä¶.. no hot food, no salads, nothing.

The tables are filthy, the toilets are so dark it‚Äôs unbelievable‚Ä¶

If you get free access, eat in the food court and then use the lounge for somewhere relatively quiet.

If you‚Äôre paying, don‚Äôt‚Ä¶. Waste of money

title: Worst VIP room I've been to in Europe
text:
Poor VIP room. Few foods and drinks, placed anyway and takes time to be repaired. White wines and roses served at room temperature without being frozen. Delay in cleaning in dirty places.
The space is very large, but poorly prepared on the question of drinks and food

title: Rude front desk staff - shocked
text: Terrible experience, we had access to the lounge and were worried by the tone and attitude of the ladies at the front desk. Most notably the south Asian lady who called my partner and I a donkey in Portuguese and foolishly thought we don‚Äôt speak the language. This is a sackable offence and management should act.

title: Extremely bad
text:
What a shame...
Atmosphere was horrific, no music, agent / employees were all antipathetic...
Crowded, nothing hot to eat....A place to avoid absolutely...

title: Not great
text: Food was scarce and nothing special. Overall pretty small and happened to be very busy. Seating was fine but there were few spaces with privacy as they‚Äôre all displayed in a row. A couple families with babies and toddlers who were unfortunately fuzzy and made it noisy. Coffee was from a machine so it was pretty medium.

title: Catastrophic and often complete. Even if it is sometimes emptier than other times.
text:
Toilet: At first glance not bad but toilet paper is rarely seen. Ridiculous.
Tacos or other dishes that serve hot are served cold.
Access is sometimes at the head of the client.
3 or 4 people arrive with an access card. We let them in.
Besides, it should stop offering 2 accesses for a card.
And this lounge was finished to be renovated in 2024,
That being said, it is the entire airport that is a disaster with leaders who clearly never use passenger access.
Few jobs where Portuguese staff seem highly motivated even if there are good exceptions.
Vinci doesn't know how to run this airport.
Bus drivers who pick up passengers at the cut-off wait for the 3 buses to be full before leaving for the terminal. Result, expectations, expectations, expectations! It‚Äôs grossly lame.
One of the worst airports in the world. So lounges are necessarily the reflection of the whole.

title: A one star review is a stretch
text: Don‚Äôt even bother! And for those of you thinking perhaps life is grand in a private lounge, think again. This is no better than staying in the main terminal. No seats available, overcrowding, no thought to design and food quality subpar. An overcrowded hot mess. Shame on you ANA!

title: Serious capacity issues - avoid
text: Has major capacity issues, packed and turning people away (including people who had purchased access). Do not purchase access if you have an afternoon flight, they still refuse access between to 2 and 4 pm. When you get in it‚Äôs very mediocre.

title: Access denied
text:
VIP room that accepts lounge, priority and dragon cards... But every time in the last two Trips the access was impossible due to the crowding of the room
. Give preference to the passengers of the executive.. conclusion if you have a card in these programs the airport of Lisbon you get without a VIP room most of the times.. I have used the room really it is suitable but in the last two Trips I could not enter

title: Please avoid it...
text:
I left Lisbon 37 years ago but often visit my family.
I saw these lounge declining in quality over the years but recently heard of the refurbishment so I was quite excited to revisit it to find out that is gone from bad to worst to say the least.
The welcome is just not there.
The quality of the food has to be the worst I have seen in years from tinned fruit salad to incredibly cheap pasteis de nata, also the drinks are so basic that not even the cheapest hotel would feature them on their mini bar.
Don't try to use the WC as I tried four times over a period of two hours and they never been cleaned.
It has to be the worst airport lounge in the world and trust me I visited over thirty, even some in Africa would be better...
Just a small message to the operator being it..."Don't be so greedy, because you can't take it with you"
What a terrible place!!!

title: O pior Lounge da Europa.
text: Em termos de espa√ßo e mobili√°rio est√° ok. Para j√° na parte importante bebidas e comida. P√©ssima !! H√° cereais do mais barato e ruim, lanches frios e mal elaborados, pastelaria que d√° arrepios e afronta a iguaria Lusitana ,pastel de natas, que oferecem. Os caf√©s de m√°quina devem ser de gr√£os de arrast√£o, muito ruins. Enfim.uma fss piores salas da Europa que acaba por combinar com o aeroporto, o pior da Europa.

title: Dirty and incapable of providing a cup of coffee
text:
This lounge is staffed by people who don‚Äôt even try. They walk around like zombies collecting the dirties.

The coffee is via two machines which are poorly labelled. Only one machine has a milk option. When I tried it water came out because it was out of powder. After it was refilled I got a whole cup of milk. I then had to start pouring the milk into another cup of coffee. There are no stirrers so I had to use a knife! Dreadful experience.

The lounge is dirty and the toilets stink.

title: Worst customer service ever
text: Worst customer service ever. First you are told that you‚Äôre too early because your card allows only for a certain amount of time. I can understand this. Later you come again and they just deny your access (Priority Pass), because they can. They don‚Äôt need any reason. We have visited this lounge earlier (pre Covid) without any problems. It seems that nothing stays the same. Very rude and poor customer service. Probably will take my money somewhere else the next time.

title: Rudely rejected‚Ä¶ 2x within 4 weeks
text:
I was turned away twice within 4 weeks despite having a valid access card.

The Ana Lounge "LISBON" is unfortunately not a representative example of hospitable Portugal. It's just sad how miserably bad the quality of the staff at the entrance has become.

I was turned away twice already despite having paid for access. After I asked and pointed out that there were a lot of tables and seats free, I was rudely asked to leave and complain to my access provider.

Just pathetic and sad

title: Dull, depressing & truly awful.
text: The most depressing lounge in the worlds worst airport, truly dreadful place. Queues outside for 20 minutes to then try and find seats for 2 people in a dark depressing soulless room. Food and drink choices are comedy gold bad. AVOID

title: Vermijd de ana lounge op Lissabon AirPort
text: Slechte lounge. Met name de desinteresse van het personeel is enorm storend. Eten middelmatige kwaliteit. Veel te vol omdat iedereen toegang kan kopen

title: avoid as much as possible
text: although a large space, we have few food options, always crowded and impolite service. dirty bathrooms. To become a differentiated space, where you pay for it, there is a lot to modify. In summary: there is no reason to praise

title: Busy and very dark!
text:
This actually met expectations as we‚Äôd read the reviews before visiting! We concur with other reviewers that this is a far from a relaxing experience. At 11.00 on a Tuesday, the lounge was crowded necessitating a 10-15minute wait to get in. Once in, it was a game to spot the free seats!
There is one bench for cold food (sandwiches) and a bar area for spirits and pastries de nata which had to be requested from the barman! There are 2 stations for drinks but no local beer! My other half thinks a hot meal can be ordered from the barman but I saw no one do this.
A large part of the lounge is very dark resembling a night club.
On the positive side some of the sandwiches were tasty (serrano ham and cheeseveggie, pesto option). There are toilets and showers ( latter not used). Staff are prompt at removing used crockery/ cutlery. Plenty of alcogel stations too for the infection aware.
Its not our worse experience ( Gatwick South and Seville) but lots to improve on.

title: Avoid. Too crowded, not relaxing. Average food.
text: Avoid this lounge and stay in the main concourse where there is more comfortable seating, better food, fewer crowds. The staff working hard to keep it clean but it‚Äôs way to small for the number of people pushing to get in.

title: Absolutely awful!
text: Waited 25 minutes to get into lounge as shared with 28 other airlines. Once inside it was dirty and extremely tatty. Food was substandard with just a small selection of filled bread rolls and a small bowl of fresh fruit wrapped in clingfilm. Constant queuing for a drink whether that be a tea/coffee or alcohol beverage. Soft drinks and beer in the fridge was warm. This is not what I expect when flying Business class. This has to be the worst lounge I have ever used.

title: NO good
text:
We booked this VIP transfer through booking.com. The driver arrived 36 minuttes after arrival.

We arrived at 10:52 and got a text, that the driver was waiting for us, holding a sign with our name. 11:01 we started looking for the driver. He was not there!!!

11:11 the driver texted us, asking us to go to a place outside. We go there, but still no driver. We then phoned the driver asking where to find him. He arrived at 11:28.

After a few days we had to go to the airport again. We asked LR Portugal Tours to be picked up at 8:20. The driver came 10 minutes early, NO SMILING, and a bad attitude - and he was angry, that we couldn't drive right away.

We were ready at 8:20 and started driving 5 minuttes later 8;25. The driver Refused to talk to us during the whole trip. After days with the friendly portuguese people, this was a bad experience.

There are many taxis in Lisbon. NO waiting. All drivers are friendly - and a trip to - or from - the airport costs approximately 12 euros. Price for a trip with LR Portugal Tours is 30 euros.

title: Were hopeful, but went through a miscommunication from them, not through unfortunately.
text: I gave it 2 stars, because it didn't happen. We were waiting for the spot, but nobody came. One friendly man from the hotel, where you had to wait, helped us with calling, to the tour operator. The Guide was unable to do the tour and had indicated this to the organization. Only it hadn't been communicated to us. We then had a drink on the rooftop of the hotel and went for dinner at a restaurant nearby, which our tuk tuk Guide had recommended. Good food!

title: Horrible , retrograde , unacceptable
text: Horrible , they didn't let me in because I had tattoos on my face, in a world where out there is a lot more liberal about that, I've lived in another country where I involved all kinds of people styles , Portugal only shows how retrograde it is compared to the rest of the countries in Europe, not to mention that they still laugh at my face , when 500 meters on pink street I went to a completely different bar , much more friendly security , impeccable employees , from 8 to 80, finally.

title: Bad ballad!
text:
Bad experience on that ballad. Security has been extremely poorly educated from the start. Me and my friends were on the list with guaranteed admission until 1:30, and when we arrived, we confirmed with our own safety if the time was still this time ‚Äî he said it was. The queue was completely stalled, with over 100 people waiting without any organization.

When, finally, they began to release the entrance, it was a real push-push, totally out of control. My friend ended up falling ugly on the ground because of the mess. And, to make it worse, when we arrived at the entrance, they simply said the time was until 00:30 ‚Äì something completely different from what they had informed before.

In addition to the absurd disorganization, we were treated with grossness and disrespect. A disappointing experience from beginning to end. Total lack of respect for the public.

title: Waste of time and money
text: Mysoginist bouncers, charge 50 euros if youre a guy, dont waste your time trying to go there. Very very disappointing. N

Shameful
