title: Shameful.
text: From day to day they cut the route from Chiado to Campo de Ourique, making a route that in nothing serves the users who make daily this journey. It was no longer enough to be almost impossible to catch one who stopped, or who did not go with people scattered to the entrance door. Since the pandemic they cut and a lot in the number of electric vehicles in circulation and since then tourism has tripled since before that and never returned them again. An authentic attack not only on tourists but on people who work and need to catch daily. A shame!

title: Run away from it!! Naughty prank!!
text: Not worth it!!! It was the worst experience I've ever had!! There is absolutely NOTHING romantic, as some people say,!! There was a queue of more than 1:30 hours (and it was cloudy, imagine sunny!!) to catch tram 28 at Pra√ßa Martim Moniz. Extremely rude employee, doesn't care if there are children or elderly people. Only 16 people sitting and a few standing. Before boarding, there are some trams lined up waiting for God only knows what, before thinking about picking up passengers. Not worth the time and patience!! Tram 28 is just another public transport in the city and you can take it anywhere on your route, there is no need to stand for hours waiting. With the lisboa card you have free access without having to pay. I had seen a tip that said to take the opposite route (Ourique to Martim Moniz), there was less queue, but honestly I don't think it's worth any effort to take the tour that lasts more than 1 hour. Here's a tip, then don't say I didn't warn you!! LOL

title: Rude staff
text: Nice place, but the bartender is so rude I had to leave. Be carefully, the staff won't treat you right. It's disrespectful.

text: Mindless and price jacked for idiots. A can of sardines for $20 and up. They make employees dress up as circus ringmasters while treating customers like monkeys.

title: I ADVICE DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM THEM

CIALTRONI! DO NOT GO THERE

title: Unpleasant Sales associate was rude and condescending Attitude
text:
My recent visit was overshadowed by an unfortunate encounter with a sales representative who exhibited an unpleasant and disrespectful attitude! This individual consistently interrupted our conversation and went on to make assumptions about our knowledge and language skills.

At one point, we were examining a product, and although it did mention "chocolate" on one side, we were not solely focused on that aspect. Instead of patiently listening to our perspective, the sales representative abruptly interrupted, stating, "It literally says chocolate on the side!‚Äù This response was unnecessary and failed to understand that we were enjoying and appreciating the products in the store!

Moreover, when we attempted to explain our viewpoint, the sales representative dismissively stated, "It's okay; you don't understand because you don't speak the language." This response was not only condescending but also reinforced the stereotype of tourists as ignorant individuals.

As visitors, we appreciate being treated respectfully regardless of our level of familiarity with the language or product. It is disappointing that the sales representative did not uphold these basic principles of customer service.

title: Total tourist trap
text: It's one of those terrible tourist traps which spoiled our holiday. Fancy looking shop deco and packaging. For what? To fool tourists into buying canned seafood at twenty euros each when you can get these in better shops usually three to five euros for better tasting ones. Enter only if you have money to throw into the ditch. I do not understand why others give high reviews, must be too kind.

title: Guide wasn‚Äôt up to the job bearing in mind the cost
text: Saw interesting places with an inexperienced guide. Nice enough guy though. He did his best but wasn‚Äôt very forthcoming with details about the places we visited

title: Rip off
text: Says open bar but have to line up for an hour and it‚Äôs 1 tiny drink per person not worth the price. Way too much money for the price.

title: Boring Boat Ride
text: Went on a ‚Äúdolphin watching‚Äù tour mid-afternoon. Started with boat not being ready at the scheduled time. Waited around in the sun for almost an hour. No dolphins (I understand they are wild animals and can‚Äôt be controlled), but at least make the boat tour interesting! One staff member going from row to row to point out sights and give a brief description. We found this very boring!!! Should have just taken the yellow boat so we could ride closer to shore and get off to explore.

title: More info
text: Instructions unclear could not find the group to board. No number to call as well. More information is necessary ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..

title: to flee
text: Total scam, we were well over 100 crammed on a boat, full to bursting, the boat moves very slowly so we stay close to the sides which decreases the chance of seeing dolphins that we will never see, 3 hours of deep boredom

title: No engagement / Boring
text:
We had high hopes for this tour but were given no information from our tour guides once on board. The boat was full to the brim to the point one of the guides demanded 10/15 people who had rushed upstairs on a chance dolphin sighting to go downstairs.

The ‚Äòopen bar‚Äô is one choice of beer and Pepsi max from a 2L bottle. We caught a glimpse of some dolphins spotted by another tourist and not a crew member. No information given about monuments as we passed them and no information given about dolphins. Would not recommend this tour.

title: Wouldn‚Äôt do it again
text: The cruise is packed with people, so you spend quite a lot of the time just standing in a line. Secondly there are two floors and they only allow a certain amount of people upstairs (where you cannot get a drink). Think the information and pictures are really misleading, but we had a good time

title: Weak
text:

There was a biologist on the boat, but she didn't share any information about dolphins.
There was no experience or entertainment on the boat.

title: Easy to forget, not recommended
text:
I do not recommend, it was very boring and wasting our time and money
Well, we didn't see any dolphins at all

title: AVOID AVOID AVOID!!!
text: AVOID AVOID AVOID. Complete scam of a company. We booked our sunset cruise tickets for a 4:45 pm departure, arrived at 4:25 to a closed booth and no boats in sight. The booth opened at 4:50 and the representative told us that they don't give refunds or any exchanged compensation while smiling and laughing at the 5 of us. I've never been more disrespected. We ended up having to call the cops to resolve the continually escalating issue as she smiled and laughed at us

text:
Nous avions r√©serv√© 2 billets pour 90 mn sur un catamaran au coucher du soleil.

title: Bad experience overall
text:
I am very dissatisfied with the jewelcrafter's service. The service was simply rude, the lack of professionalism is glaring, and the judgmental attitude is unacceptable.
The mood and the experience overall was bad, and honestly, I wouldn't recommend. There are certainly better alternatives.

title: Monumental, but Italian sculpture is far superior
text:
This "Monument to the discoveries" (geographical), realized in its current version in 1960, intends to depict, albeit in a very schematic way, a caravel: the inclined lines that house the figures constitute the edges of the hull, while the sails are the three arches above.
The multiple characters represented on both sides are mostly Portuguese explorers of the golden age (1500/1600 AD).
The interior is hollow and would also be open to visitors, but not when we went there.
Not bad, because to me it did not convey any particular emotion.
Moreover, the sculptures are not stylistically pleasing nor shine for refinement: Michelangelo, Bernini and Canova are from another planet.

title: Save yourself 10 euros
text: This view only has to deal with the inside of the monument and the 10 euro entrance fee. The monument itself from the outside is gorgeous and can be viewed for free obviously there is absolutely no reason to spend 10 euros to take an elevator up to the top which is a very small viewing platform to see more of Lisbon. Five would have been fine save your 10 and eat a good lunch

title: Worth Visiting as Part of a Package With Other Nearby Attractions
text:
After visiting the Belem Tower, we headed east along the river to the Padr√£o dos Descobrimentos or Monument of the Discoveries.

The Monument was conceived in 1939 and opened in October 1960. The Monument is a 52 metre cement slab over a steel frame that commemorates the various Portuguese explorers during the Age of Discovery. The monument is shaped like the prow of a caravel, the most common type of ship used on these voyages from the 15th to 17th Centuries. There are 33 figures on the monument, 16 on each side with Henry the Navigator at the apex or prow of the ‚Äúship‚Äù overlooking the river.

The monument sits on a square of beige red and black limestone in the shape of a 50 metre in diameter compass rose. This was a gift from the South African Government. The monument is located just west of the Belem Marina and directly across from the Imperial Gardens that front the Jer√≥nimos Monastery.

Aside from the monument itself there is not much to see here, however a visit could be combined with one to either the Belem Tower to the west and/or the Monastery to the north as an outing from Lisbon.

The Monument is often included as part of tours of Belem with these other attractions. Conversely one can take either public transit to the Monastery and cross the highway and railway lines on the bridge, or the commuter train from Cais do Sodr√© to Belem station.

title: Outside wonderful, Inside not so much.
text: The Monument is incredible, the surroundings including the mosaic world map astounding. However... What should have been a museum about the monument, the artist, and explorers was an expensive lack of cohesive information. People come from all over the world to see the connection from Portugal to their home, to learn their history in place instead of from a textbook. Instead, the museum inside the monument had an exhibit, good I'm sure, but out of place and irrelevant to the monument. We had talked to our granddaughter about how she would be learning about these explorers in school someday. They aren't even identified. Poor judgement on the museum staff's part. This isn't a local museum that needs up to date changing exhibits. It needs to cater to all the tourist who come once to see and learn about the Discoverers.

title: Huge let down. History cancelled by new director
text: We went to this place to learn about the amazing period in Portuguese history when its brave navigators encountered new lands. But now there is no mention of these heroes. None! The new Director of the monument has cancelled these heroes, he has written them out of the monument's narrative. Clearly he is ashamed of his nation and determined to focus on a fashionable leftist ideology. Boycott this degraded space.

title: On the way but nothing more
text: People visit this monument because it is located on foot between the Bel√©m Tower and the Jeronimos Monastery. It's good for 2 photos but don't come just for that, it wouldn't be worth it. Personal impression, you be the judge.

title: Augmentation du prix de +50%
text:
Augmentation de + de 50%.
Pass√© de EUR 6.- √† EUR 10.- en 2023. Ils prennent vraiment les touristes pour des distributeurs d‚Äôargent. BOYCOTTONS !

title: N√£o perca dinheiro aqui
text: D√™ prefer√™ncia √† ao monumento por fora. √â bel√≠ssimo. Por dentro, achamos caro (tendo em vista outros locais que cobram menos e oferecem 10x mais) e sinceramente: desnecess√°rio. Voc√™ tem a mesma vista na Torre de Bel√©m. Pagamos 10 euros cada, para uma vista e uma exposi√ß√£o que nada tinha a ver com o monumento. Sa√≠mos chateados e com a sensa√ß√£o de que fomos enganados.

title: D√©√ßu de l'altitude
text:
Tout ce que vous devez voir. Se voit de l'ext√©rieur. Payer 10‚Ç¨ pour monter sur un mirador et voir juste une vue. Cher pour prendre un ascenseur et quelques marches.
Pour 3‚Ç¨ j'ai pr√©f√©r√© le mirador de l'arche de la place du commerce.

title: Worth walking to if you‚Äôre visiting area
text: We only viewed this from the outside as we'd already been in the Tower of Belem and we thought the views would be very similar. Very impressive structure.

title: Rudeness, dishonesty and bad cocktails
text: Bad place, very rude owner. We were dragged to this place with a scam telling us that they would offer us a drink to inaugurate the new place. At the exit we were chased like thieves.... we would have done without entering even xche 'the drinks are bad! Don't let them fool you! We tried better places.

title: PAGO EN EFECTIVO
text: Seguramente sea un buen sitio para escuchar jazz, pero el pago debe ser en efectivo. Como si estuvieramos en el siglo XIX. Y lo que es peor, no vimos ning√∫n letrero que avise de esta modalidad. Inaceptable.

title: Disappointing
text: Great place. Unfortunately closed terraces for private event. Not warned we were very disappointed and we are content to visit the garden... for the 3rd time. Why don't you tell the public?

title: Definitely too expensive
text: The price of 7 euros (no reductions for children) for visiting just the garden, whatever the age of the visitor, is really unjustified. Not only some parts of the small garden are unavailable, but the visitabile parts are largely under mantainance. No water in many fountains. The only real beautiful thing to see is the black swan in the little lake. I had to understand the situation from the fact that barely 10 people were inside, but I don't feel guilty for that... 3-4 euros would be the right price.

title: Beware not always open on Saturday - check first
text: We went on Saturday as that was advertised as the day it is open to visitors. BEWARE - if the president is in residence or there is something going on it is NOT always open on Saturday. It was very hard to see how to find out about entry. I tried talking to the guard but he gave me a hard stare! Nothing on the walls anywhere to tell you about visiting or where to go in. Anyway this is a review of a non-visit.

title: Depressing building and experience - what a neglected building and gardens ‚Ä¶. Better places to visit and go
text:
It‚Äôs ok for a palace.

You see some three nice rooms but overall a rather disappointing and perplexing experience. Quite a few parts of the building complex are just run down and in severe state of neglect. The gardens are in a rather neglected and poor state for a palace that is inhabited by ‚Äúsomebody‚Äù - its just poor when you look more closely - all neglected. The office of the president is just depressingly dark, and stuffy with severely used sofas. It‚Äôs probably not even a question of money ‚Ä¶. It‚Äôs just neglect and being careless. Seen a lot of presidential palaces in Europe and other countries and continents ‚Ä¶.. and this is one I liked the least.

The Museum is small and ok, specially if like and know the local personalities.

Overall a rather disappointing and depressing experience - one can not even believe it‚Äôs the President that lives and works there.

Cidadela in Cascais is well worth the visit but Bel√©m you should just depressingly bad.

title: Sinking Sun Experience
text: They sent me a text, 40 min prior departure, informing me that the they cancelled the trip; without any explanation. I guess they didn‚Äôt have enough passengers thus decided to not sail out as the costs did not weight against the benefits. In the meanwhile, they wasted our precious vacation time as it was too late to book another SUNSET trip with a competitor.

title: Terrible customer service
text: If I could give this a zero, I would. Never got the meeting time sent to me or additional instructions other than unclear directions on where to meet. Had an issue with a bolt driver causing us to miss the trip by 15 mins. Reached out to the tour guide who was unwilling to wait. Was really looking forward to this for our honeymoon.

title: Difficult entrance and experience
text: This is the only museum we had difficulty getting inside. We had to rent a locker for 1 Euro to deposit a compact umbrella that was in my purse that measured 5 inches. After a walk across the courtyard to do this transaction, I come back and then I am told I can not go in because I have nail clippers and that is also not admissible. These are items that made it it through TSA and went in the Louvre, and I am asking where exactly am I going that is more secure that those places? At this point they let us through. The only displays we saw were all behind glass from floor to ceiling. We never saw the rooms of the palace. I am still not sure what we paid to see. Not a good experiance.

title: Disorganized and rude
text: Disorganized and poorly educated. Although it appears on Google and TripAdvisor that all channels have opening hours of 10-17:30, we arrived at 12:30 and it was closed with a sign on the door. A super rude and rude attendant. Terrible

title: Das war dann wohl wiedermal nichts !!!!!!!!!¬°!!!!
text:
Eigentlich wollten wir nur ein ruhiges Wochenende in Lissabon verbringen als wir in unserem Hostel beim fr√ºhst√ºck von einem m√§dchen angesprochen und √ºberredet wurden an einer Citytour teilzunehmen.
Als wir dann am n√§chsten Morgen am vereinbarten Treffpunkt waren passierte nichts, als wir dann nach einer halben Stunde versuchten jemanden telefonisch zu erreichen klappte das auch nicht.
Im Hostel sagte man uns das erst wieder am Montag jemand von Pancho Tours vorbeikommen w√ºrde wir ja aber am Montag schon wieder abreisen w√ºrden.
Das geld f√ºr die Tour, dass wir im vorraus entrichtet haben, haben wir nicht wiedergesehen und auf die Kontaktversuche unsererseits haben wir nie eine Antwort erhalten.
Darum kann ich nur vor Pancho Tours warnen und gebt den blo√ü kein Geld im vorraus den das seht ihr wahrscheinlich nie wieder.
PS: liebe gr√ºsse an Daniel Castello branco, Graca Putagueiro und Iris Disruptiva ¬°!!!!!¬°!!!!!!

title: No Service given
text: I didn't receive any contact in mail or whatsapp to organize the tour, I went to the place in the description but no one was in the place, basically, I didn't receive the tour, and requested a refund.

title: Unpleasant welcome
text: It was terrible and I had barely gotten in yet. The door was open and we were considering whether we would pay and a lady working at the pantheon came and closed the door on us, still being rude to us. I find such behavior towards tourists unacceptable. Friendly advice (from those who are used to visiting) the doorman's job is to be pleasant and make us (tourists) want to come in to see, not the opposite. I am extremely sad that I have no desire to join the national pantheon. These attitudes must be corrected.

title: Beautiful but doesn't dance
text: The structure is beautiful, what it also represents, beautiful panorama from the dome but ‚Ç¨8 paid by purchasing the ticket directly at the ticket office seems exaggerated to me, if you consider that the pantheon in Rome was free until two months ago and it tells a lot of history after much more, it really seems like a theft to me.

title: Muito degradante Tres humiliant
text:
Visite samedi 25.mars.2023 vers 4 hrs NATIONAL PANTHEON lisbonne 3 persones dont une handicape a la caisse information ascenceur hors service 2 personnes save rentrer la personne handicape doit payer ‚Ç¨ 2 pour attendre en bas sinon sortir et attendre dehors debout comme un chien merci madame la caissiere.
Kass Nico tourist luxembourgeois.
Ps. on a toujours acceuilli les portugais avec respect a Luxembourg
Visite s√°bado, 25 de mar√ßo de 2023, por volta das 4h PANTE√ÉO NACIONAL lisboa 3 pessoas incluindo uma pessoa com defici√™ncia no balc√£o de informa√ß√µes elevador fora de servi√ßo 2 pessoas economizam para entrar a pessoa com defici√™ncia deve pagar ‚Ç¨ 2 para esperar no andar de baixo, caso contr√°rio, saia e espere do lado de fora em p√© como um cachorro obrigado senhora caixa.
Turista de Kass Nico Luxemburgo.
Ps. sempre acolhemos os portugueses com respeito no Luxemburgo

title: Offensive to the customer
text:
Seems like a nice shop but products do not meet the prices qualitatively.
The staff are mainly older, sour and downright rude women.
Was not a good experience...

title: Medium
text: Extremely unpleasant place, with no respect for the people around, dirty and expensive. Medium, cafeteria is not, for the smell of intragavel garbage

title: Long wait, incomplete order
text:
If you feel like waiting a very long time for your drinks, it is highly recommended!
Then you don't get your half order, you have to wait another half hour..
I'd skip this place

title: Bad service and really arrogant and rude girl
text: We ordered three beers (already at the time of ordering it seemed that the waitress was doing us a favor), after 30 minutes only 2 beers arrive, we request the third, but it never arrived. So after 50 minutes of waiting WITHOUT HAVING CONSUMED we leave. Arrived at the elevator we were blocked by the waitress who started screaming at us losing that we paid for the 3 beers (never arrived)

title: Terrible
text: Awful! Terrible bar, terrible staff. Don‚Äôt waste your time on the long walk down there. There are far better roof top bars.

title: Xenophobic security and terrible environment
text: It blocked my entrance and my friends simply because we were Brazilians, they were super xenophobic! They ruined our night

title: Turns away homosexuals
text: Went for a drink here as a group of ten. One of our group was refused entry as the bouncer said ‚Äúno gays‚Äù this was a disgusting backwards way of thinking, especially for a city like Lisbon we thought was more forward thinking. Imagine picking on someone because of their sexuality.

title: Awful. Wouldn‚Äôt let Gay friend in.
text: Horrible horrible place! We turned up as a group and they wouldn‚Äôt let our gay friend in due to his attire. Shocked to still see this in these modern times, especially in a city like Lisbon. Ruined birthday, please don‚Äôt support this place. #supportLGBTQ

title: Rude and disappointing: Vibe killer
text: Visited as part of a hen weekend. Venue is made to look like a casual bar with pallet type furniture and actually has great views and good aesthetics. Got there for a mid afternoon drink and just felt like they didn‚Äôt want us there (we were not loud or disrespectful, this was the second drink after a long walk). The bride was told to remove her ‚Äúbride to be ‚Äú head piece, the staff were rude, service ridiculously slow, unhelpful and when we asked where some of the drinks order was, we‚Äôre told we need to speak to the other waitress ourselves. One of the group was reprimanded for sitting with her feet up on the sill for the plants, and as a couple of the group took sandals off whilst we sat in the 24 degree sun with our drink also got told we needed to keep foot wear on. Honestly felt that we were inconveniencing their day at work! Toilets were utterly disgusting.

title: Super Overpriced
text:
The place is not as pretty as in the photos, the place is a informal bar with wood chair who serves typical drinks with a super expensive price. We ordered two London mules and we paid 38 euros, they didn‚Äôt serve any snacks to combine the cocktails and it was overpriced.
We didn‚Äôt like at all and we won‚Äôt be back for sure.

title: Went to check it out
text:
We been looking for this visit as photos are amazing, drinks looks ok. We had chips to snack on which are actually crisps cold and for 5 euro I mean sorry.
Music , not my cup of tea very rude songs on and on. This place has good potential but not this time.
Then asked for the bill, there was problem with system and nobody knows what‚Äôs going on.
Team need to be train much better and smile more as all look like they don‚Äôt won‚Äôt to be there at all!
We definitely won‚Äôt coming back.

title: Worse service ever experienced, stay away from that place
text:
We had the worse night ever in that bar.
Our time time started very badly as we were welcomed by a very aggressive waitress that yelled that us since the very beginning because we were taking to many chairs outside since we were a large group.
But that did not ended there, at the closing of the bar that same waitress was so agressive with us asking us to leave and always wanted to argue with everyone of us and talked to in an inacceptable tone. At the end she started an argument with us and yelled and insulted us as the other members of the staff like the bouncer were taking her side and yelled at us and pushed us to the exit very aggressively even though we were not done with our drinks.
We never experienced a level of service that bad even though we ordered a lot from them that night the way we were treated was unacceptable. Finally the worst part is that when we left the bar and were waiting in the street, the waitress threw a bucket of cold water on us from the rooftop.
Her behavior is not that of a waitress, her acts were so immature and we won‚Äôt accept being insulted like that. She should find an another job where she is not in contact of the public since she spoiled our whole night that was for our friend‚Äôs birthday.
Save your money for other rooftops in Lisbon we‚Äôre the staff is more respectful, it‚Äôs not worth it to come her and get insulted, stay away from that place at all cost.

title: Bad
text: AVOID !!! This bar was the worst night of my life. The waitresses were rude and liars, to a point I have never seen. The bouncer was violent. I denounce this bar: violence, insults and discrimination. The memmo rooftop is much nicer.

title: They charged a high price
text: The price of the drinks was a steal! They charged me ‚Ç¨15 for two draft Somersby ciders and a small flavorless rock water, and when the employee asked me if I wanted a receipt I said yes, and on top of that he only gave me the ATM receipt. Furthermore, I was the one who had to order drinks at the counter. I went to look at photos of the menu on the internet and after all the prices didn't match!!

title: Absolter Agrosecurity refuses entry without reason
text:
An extremely aggressive security guard turned us away as a friendly, good-looking group - for absolutely no reason.
The bar should hire staff who are interested in customers and not stress. Be careful.

title: Very rude and unhelpful staff
text:
Very disappointed! We had read in our guide book to try this place and we had high expectations.
Once we arrived staff were rude and service was extremely slow! we got our over priced drinks after a 30 minute wait and my aperol spritz was flat and my friends drink was very weak.

Cushions were disgusting and need replacing.
Such a shame as beautiful views from there but the staff and quality of drinks and furniture let it down. I definitely wouldn‚Äôt recommend.

title: Lack of interest, discrimination and lack of education among employees
text: We waited a long time, and we asked three employees to place our order and were completely ignored. We noticed that whenever they are Portuguese they don't pay attention to their customers. When we were finally served, we showed our displeasure and before being served, the employee who served us first said to the other employee "be careful, this one bites", in a total lack of respect, I won't be returning and I won't recommend it.

title: Terrible experience
text: Don‚Äôt go here. Extremely unfriendly staff. Not worth for the price, plenty of other bars that are much better. Wasn‚Äôt even allowed to play cards there when we sat all alone in a corner. Not even allowed to rotate chairs to watch the sun‚Ä¶

title: Betere rooftops te vinden in Lissabon
text: Mooi zicht eens je de akelige lift of 6 verdiepen met de trap hebt getrotseerd. "Cocktails" zonder proefbare alcohol (of geen?) en een rietje is er gewoon niet, zelfs niet als je er achter vraagt. De mooie plaatsen zijn schaars dus volgens mij niet de moeite noch het geld waard.

title: Bad service and overpriced!
text: Not recommended! Very poor service, waiters are just rude and demanding for some reason. Prices are high and the quality of furniture is low, it seems that this rooftop has existed for a couple of years and nobody has washed the pillows and seats. Although there is a beautiful view, I would suggest finding something else.

title: Je mettrais moins d‚Äôune √©toile si je pouvais
text:
Tr√®s d√©√ßue, mes amis et moi nous y sommes rendus √† 7 en √©tant tr√®s excit√© mais c‚Äô√©tait pas du tout √ßa. D√©j√† l‚Äôendroit est pas tr√®s grand, les tables des gens d‚Äôavant ne sont pas d√©barrass√©s, le service est tr√®s lent et si on veut commander directement au bar on se fait refouler et on nous dit d‚Äôattendre √† la table. Les verres sont chers pour √™tre si peu dos√©s, la sangria est une sorte de salade de fruit gazeuse. Et lorsqu‚Äôon a la chance de se faire servir mais que le verre de cocktail a 12‚Ç¨ est renvers√© sous les yeux du serveur √† cause d‚Äôune table instable on refuse de vous refaire le faire (ou de vous donner quoique que √ßa soit d‚Äôautre en √©change). Jamais vu un endroit si peu commercial.
Il y a m√™me pas particuli√®rement d‚Äôambiance. Il y a pas grand chose √† gagner √† aller √† ce rooftop, Lisbonne est rempli de meilleurs points de vues et meilleurs bars.

title: aller voir ailleurs
text:
Jolie rooftop donnant vu sur Lisbonne, mais tr√®s d√©√ßu. Plus d‚Äôune heure d‚Äôattente pour deux malheureux cocktails qui n‚Äôavaient pas de bulles. Terrasses pleine pour seulement un serveur. Quand j‚Äôai d√©cider de me lever pour aller commander au bar moi m√™me, le serveur qui avait prit ma commande m‚Äôa dit ¬´ le service se fait √† table ¬ª.
Tr√®s d√©√ßu je recommande pas.

title: Surcot√©
text: Pas de places assises le personnel pas sociable, super s√©lectif pour au final ne pas voir la vue, ch√®re pour le service m√©diocre !

title: Escolham outro lugar
text: Empregados muito pouco educados , bebidas com pre√ßo razo√°vel mas insisto a falar a de educa√ß√£o e pouco profissionalismo faz com que seja um lugar a evitar .

title: Vergonzoso
text: Una verg√ºenza de sitio, fuimos 6 amigos y no no dejaron entrar por ser hombres, una muestra m√°s del machismo de esta sociedad.

title: Contemporary Lisbon
text:
I insisted on visiting this very modern part of Lisbon, coinciding with the area that had hosted Expo 1998, intrigued above all by the cable car on the Tagus, but almost immediately regretted it. This infrastructure, unlike what I had imagined, runs along the right bank of the river rather than across it and has no use other than to offer an elevated vantage point.
I felt almost mortified to have induced my friends to follow me on this morning that turned out to be a waste.
For the rest, the district is characterized by modern architecture, among which the shopping center and a large indoor oval-shaped arena stand out, as well as some gigantic contemporary sculptures.

title: Not indispensable
text:
Not much to see around here around noon. This is very quiet. Quite pleasant walk along the water but aging park. Not very well maintained.
The only interest is to come and visit the oceanorium. Or the shopping center which is nice (with a food court).
It was certainly good in 98 for the Universal Exhibition but now it is no longer of much interest.

title: Include on your list of things to do if you have a special interest in gardens
text: This is a very nice garden with a fountain so if you have time on your hands, then I would recommend going. Otherwise, I really didn't see the need for a special stop here.

title: LACK OF MAINTENANCE
text:
Another park without maintenance, unmowed lawn, hedges that overflow the driveways and especially a lot of waste.
The view of the river the city and the statue of the Marquis de Pombal is spoiled by temporary structures not dismantled.
So not great.

title: Simpel park
text: The park is beautiful, however had a fairground placed so the view was not beautiful. It is a well-kept park.

title: A park
text: Fine as parks go. Why have an exceptionally large greenhouse that is not open to the public. Looks like a good playground if you have children. Clean and well maintained.

title: 100% for tourists...at a tourist price
text: Absolutely overrated. Focused 100% on tourists. Correct service, very normal quality of food, small and uncomfortable place, and between the first and the second there is about 1 hour of waiting time because they sing fados between the 2 dishes....when the second arrives (fish not very tasty) you have been digesting for a while....all this at about 75 euros per person

title: A bridge more useful than attractive
text: This bridge in Belem crosses Avenida de Brasilia, the railway and Avenida de India. It is a more useful than attractive structure. An underground passage a few hundred meters away also does the trick.

title: Concrete
text: There is too much concrete. Natural beauty of meandering riverfront is sadly lost forever in this area.

title: Catastrophic
text:
What a failed experiment!!
We do not understand the rating and comments read.
1 cocktail really not great and another one too strong in vodka, nothing refined or nice...
Really ugly presentation (see photo) worthy of a cocktail in a cheesy bar or a low-cost establishment.
Anyway, we came a long way on purpose, big disappointment, especially for the price

title: Bad treatment
text: That's bad! The owner is a very rude and I just call it that because otherwise they won‚Äôt let me publish the review: we kindly asked for a table for 6 they gave one for 5 we ask for another chair and my friend is pushed away and the owner pushes her putting his hands on her breasts, waiters worse still laughing like idiots. What a great shame

title: Care of poor quality
text: Poor entertainment staff. They treated clients badly, without any kind of sympathy, giving signs of homophobia.

title: Horrible staff
text:
Very rude and poorly educated
Service 0
We're not back there anymore
We were also abused by the boss. They can't serve the customer
I do not recommend

title: Dive bar quality cocktails, not worth the money
text: Came in with high expectations after reading other reviews. Ordered an old fashioned. First I was in a glass overflowing with ice, then they used rock guy Jim Beam to make it, then they throw in orange slices and a cheap cherry. This is what I would expect from a cheap dive bar that is known for beer. To say the least disappointing. On a good note, it is a really cool place.

title: Be warned this is a waste of time ! Don‚Äôt ruin your night!
text: After the excitement of ringing the bell we entered a hauntingly dead quiet place with no atmosphere and no smiles. A place lacking any sort of fun. All the staff were miserable which took away from the experience and made us feel unwelcome. The playlist (though it played tunes like MIB by will smith) did not fit the place at all. Though it is highly recommended I would warn everyone away from this place as it leaves you with an eery and uncomfortable experience that dampens the night.

title: Antipathic
text: Waiters very dry and very unfriendly, I have known the place for about 25 years and it has absolutely nothing to do with what it was. Imposition of table, unfriendly, and obligation to consume any person of the group without exception. I will not take visitors there again, nor recommend, sorry for what was and is no longer.

title: Mediocre
text: Portugal at its worst. One pretends. I don't even comment, I prefer to go outside. Instead of not having any fun going out to Lisbon on the weekends, I go to certain countries where partying is guaranteed even if it's just for a month.

title: A huge HUMILIATION and DISAPPOINTMENT!!!
text:
I've known this bar for over 30 years! Since I was a teenager, in the 90s, I really liked going here with friends or as a couple...
Yesterday, May 2nd, the way I was treated was AN ABSOLUTE SHAME!!! A totally humiliating, disrespectful and disregarded situation. It should be noted that for the employees or those responsible for this bar, what matters to them is their comfort and convenience, but never the customer's convenience. They are not at all empathetic, they don't listen to the customer, in fact the way they act shows that the customers, in fact, that we are the ones we pay (and not cheaply) do not matter to them at all.
Yesterday my friend and I wanted to stay at one of the more than 10 available tables, which we were never allowed to sit at with the excuse that they were reserved. They wanted to put us in corners where it felt like we were grounded, where we couldn't even appreciate the beauty of the bar, which is precisely what invites us to enter. Or, alternatively, they guided us to tiny tables next to groups of people where we couldn't even be intimate enough to talk. In other words, tremendous disrespect and humiliation. And to top it all off, they put us in the last room where 10 English people were playing just like an Irish bar, shouting emails as we couldn't even hear each other talking. Faced with all this, the response of the inconsiderate employees was the cold: these are house rules... Wow! House rules???!!! Placing "punishment" customers on a micro table at the entrance to the door or next to people without allowing a private moment to talk or in the last room transformed at that moment into an Irish tavern, is this the norm of the house???!!! Very good! We must applaud your business model where the customer is the least important. The most ironic thing of all is that after having a drink and leaving, the so-called or supposed reserved tables were still empty and managed to ruin what could have been a beautiful evening for 2 customers, one of whom was actually a former regular customer. Conclusion: If you don't want to have a disappointing night DON'T GO to Pavilhao Chines, or go in to see the decoration and leave without consuming anything, as it will be a cheaper and more pleasant night, without humiliation. DISAPPOINTING!!!

title: terrible
text: I give it 1 star because I can't give it 0. bad service, cocktails with unclear ingredients. not worth the price you pay

title: Terrible welcome
text:
I went yesterday, December 23rd, at the end of the afternoon. We were four people. The room had two occupied tables, one a group of five people, the other a couple.
They wanted us to sit at the same table next to the group of five people. We refused because it was a table located in a less comfortable place and because we were so close to other people.
We chose a table, but were told that we couldn't stay there as it was a table for five people.
If the room was almost full or if it was a busy time, it was understood. But none of that happened. We didn't stay and we won't go there again.

title: I didn't get it
text: Not for me this one. Perhaps it's because we were there early evening, but the atmosphere was a bit odd, the music was cheesy (for me, terrible). The cocktails were average. The quirky decor looks quite cool but that's about it. With so many nice places to take in Lisbons scenery I wouldnt recommend sitting in a dark, musty bar. One thing I would say is that the service was fine and the staff friendly, given some other reviews perhaps it's just a bit patchy.

title: Over-hyped, poor service and communication
text:
Cool visual identity but over-hyped and overpriced (like everything else in that area), with a poor service and communication.
I've been to Pavilhao Chines tonight, for the first and last time. I wanted to order a simple cheese sandwich, with 4 cheese options available. I briefly talked over those options with the waiter and he suggested me to have an open sandwich with 3 varieties of cheese displayed in the plate so that I could try them all out and serve myself with the bread slices. Suggestion accepted.
Then to my surprise, when I got the bill, I was charged 3x the price of the original sandwich I meant to order. What the waiter suggested was actually a different type of dish, with a different price and size, and he was not clear about it. He didn't call the dish by its name nor brought that detail to my attention.
I explained the situation to the manager but he washed his hands of it. The waiter insisted that he correctly described to me what I was gonna be served with, I insisted the price and dish category difference was unclear, and no one came up with a solution or at least an attempt of a service recovery. I ended up paying the triple-priced bill.
I value my money and the transparency of the services I use. The miscommunication might have been unintentional (still questionable since the waiter and I share the same mother tongue and nationality) but its management was poor and reckless. All I got was disregard.
I'm not coming back and I don't recommend this service. There are plenty of better places to explore in the city.

title: Rude service
text: Rude and very authoritarian service. They don't let you choose where to sit as there are many free tables.

title: A wasted opportunity
text: A friend recommended me this place. I found it to be a nice place ruined by bad lighting, typically insipid Portuguese service, and cheesy music

title: Desilus√£o
text: N√£o ia ao Pavilh√£o h√° uns 20 anos....desilus√£o....independentemente do s√≠tio em si que √© t√£o carism√°tico e o torna √∫nico com as diferentes salas, decoradas com v√°rios objetos, mas chegar, passado uns minutos j√° dentro do bar, perguntam o nr de pessoas, no caso 4, empregado pede para ser acompanhado, e volta costas, larga o grupo e come√ßa a anotar os pedidos de uma mesa. Fic√°mos especados √† aguardar e ningu√©m a orientar. Foi preciso chamar outro empregado sem grandes sorrisos, e dizer que est√°vamos a aguardar mesa. Enfim....sem falar no tempo de espera para pedir. Para sermos servidos. E para pagar! Tivemos que nos levantar e dirigirmo nos √† caixa. Experi√™ncia desagrad√°vel e desilus√£o para quem conheceu o Pavilh√£o Chin√™s de outros tempos e fazia quest√£o em levar amigos de fora a experienciar um bar diferente! N√£o voltarei! Lisboa tem mais bares, √∫nicos e tamb√©m com hist√≥ria....√© verdade!

title: Pretentious and overhyped
text: We were about as welcome as a hot dog turd. Tables reserved for ghosts that never appeared. Real bad

title: Cobrou 30 ‚Ç¨ para um percurso de 5km.
text: Cobrou incr√≠veis 30 ‚Ç¨ para um percurso de 5km, saindo da Avenida Parque rumo ao Aeroporto de Lisboa.

title: Dismal service
text: Lamentable! The promise of an atypical place with a kitch deco between the brothel and the cabaret, unfortunately the service is deplorable, we were sitting in the middle of the passage, at least 4 different waiters passed in front of us snubbing, service at the head of the customer? Know what! In any case two customers came in asking for 2 seats and the waiter did not have a word of apology when we had given up our seats in front of him without having been served after 15 minutes of waiting while other tables had been served around us. A lack of customer respect and a lack of professionalism, to be avoided absolutely!

title: Bad service
text:
No longer lend. And increasingly badly visited. Now even gangs come in.
No longer worth your while. Poor costumer service. Even gangs now get in

title: Don't bother, much nicer places to visit
text:
Unfortunately this failed to deliver.
The cocktails were not nice and we left ours.
We sat outside and then were told to move because the outside closes at 10pm.
Very underwhelming, and would not bother again

When you make a criticism do not let it publish why? Being great isn't just beautiful comments. But adults have nothing after the sadness they have done to people who have always visited your space in a cordial and respectful way. I sincerely hope that you will learn and choose the company that provides space safety! No doubt, not to come back again!

title: Noisy creepy clich√©.
text:
Hotel located in a night owl street (bar, nightclub at the foot of the hotel) itself having a very noisy bar on the first stage
Lovers of calm refrain.
Furthermore, the quietest room offered overlooks a low wall and is ultra dark, even a little gloomy. Nothing fancy...
Otherwise view of the street and its noise for a larger room.
We fled without even sleeping in the hotel, paying two nights for nothing.
In search of romance and charm, flee this hotel. For us, this was a mistake.

title: I think trash-ao
text: I think rubbish. Every other day the electricity or air conditioning (which they control and not you) didn't work. The mess on the street below which is the kingdom of piss and vomit is constant. Exorbitant cost for such a dirty facility. A white stain on the sofa was waiting for us in the room as soon as we arrived. The (otherwise fake) invention of the dating house only seems to relieve the responsibility of daily cleaning. The staff is kind but does little to resolve the more serious problems, which are of general management of the structure. The common areas are really dirty and checking in at 5pm basically steals half your day.

title: Un peligro!!!!
text: Un desastreeeeeee!!! Los patovicas de la entrada le pegaron una trompada a mi amigo y le rompieron la mand√≠bula en 3! Este lugar deber√≠a cerrar urgente!!!!

title: Racismo e xenofobia
text:
Seguran√ßas que liberam a entrada extremamente orientados a serem xenof√≥bicos e racistas.
Na minha primeira experi√™ncia, meu amigo estado unidense e um brit√¢nico (super b√™bado), foram liberados numa boa, enquanto que o meu √∫nico amigo brasileiro e alterado pelo alcohol da mesma forma que os demais foi o √∫nico que sofreu coment√°rios de que n√£o deveria entrar (debatemos at√© que fosse liberado).
Se a primeira experi√™ncia restou alguma d√∫vida, essa de hoje foi o estopim. Fui acompanhada de mais 3 amigos brasileiros e um deles (o √∫nico negro), foi acusado de estar vestindo cal√ßas inadequadas (cal√ßa esportiva da Nike, a mesma que outro amigo branco tamb√©m estava e n√£o foi acusado de estar vestido fora dos padr√µes exigidos). No mesmo instante apontei para outros europeus que foram liberados com cal√ßas de el√°stico na barra ainda mais curtas, questionando a decis√£o do seguran√ßa que me respondeu apenas "voc√™s n√£o ir√£o entrar".
A minha resposta de indigna√ß√£o foi e permanecer√° para todo e qualquer estabelecimento racista e xenof√≥bico como este, que "n√£o pisarei mais os meus p√©s"!

title: It's not an attraction, but a simple street with some local and some nightlife
text: Very small street full of bars, perfect for those who love this kind of activity. Too bad that it is presented DA many as a must-see stop in Lisbon, which is definitely not

title: M√âDIOCRE
text:
Videur ex√©crable! Quand on donne un peu de ¬´ pouvoir ¬ª a quelqu‚Äôun qui a le droit de dire oui ou non il en abuse! A la t√™te! Pas souriant!
Je ne recommande pas du tout!!!

title: Waste of time.
text: Checked the opening times on their website, turned up 1 hour after opening only to be told there were no English speaking tours until 3.00pm, a 4 hour wait..... apparently not worth entering if you don't speak Portuguese and don't or can't wait. Pity they failed to mention this before we travelled all the way out from the city centre,wasting lots of valuable time which could have been spent elsewhere.

title: Disappointed
text: We went in family with great enthusiasm to attend a planetarium session. We came many disappointed, we only saw 5 planets , constellations we only saw two with graphism , only talked about 3. The audio was terrible and I didn't always understand what you were saying. The explanations a little monotonous

title: Weak
text: The planetarium is in need of renovation and the price/performance ratio is pretty poor. The staff only play with their cell phones. If you don't want to listen to the show in Portuguese, you have to turn the headset up so loud that you go deaf. Our show lasted a total of 25 minutes, 10 of which included a general intro.

title: Bad experience at Plateu
text: I was inside Plateu nightclub dancing with my friends when a security guard came to pick me up from the dance floor and asked me to accompany him to the door. I didn't understand why. Apparently, another security guard mistook me for a girl who had been there the previous week (when I wasn't even in the country) and had started some trouble. After explaining to the security guard that it wasn't me and that I didn't know what he was talking about, he continued to be suspicious of me and said ‚Äúhmmmm, if it wasn't you, it was a very similar girl‚Äù. I decided to write in the complaints book about this incident and then not only could no one tell me the security guard's surname (I only know that his name was Carlos) but also the manager of the room (who only identified himself as ‚ÄúJoca‚Äù) spoke to me in an intimidating manner saying that if I made a complaint I would never be allowed to enter the club again. I don't think this is how you treat customers. it's sad, I don't intend to go back to this club and I recommend all people to avoid it.

title: Elevator closed!!!
text:
Lisbon card 24 hours:
Bridge elevator closed. (Bellem tower also closed!)
A big joke, this card.
The receptionist did not bother to take off his headphones to tell us that the elevator was broken and that we could go up to the top of the bridge on foot, 300 steps!!!

title: Pilar 7
text: I confirm the lift is not working, no explanation from the staff, we used the stairs, once you reach the top you can go out onto the glass terrace where it feels like you are on the motorway but you can see the view.

title: Disappointing visitor experience
text: The bridge is magnificent but the bridge experience/visitor centre was disappointing. The elevator was not working. We could have climbed the 300+ steps to the viewpoint but decided not to. Information on the bridge construction is detailed on iron plates outside. Very difficult to read and it was windy & raining when we visited. Not much to see inside. There's one room in the centre of which under a glass table top is a model of the bridge. Round the table there's a timeline/hisory of it's construction.

title: Pilar experience 7
text:
Elevator not working.
Early closing without notice.
Lack of staff availability.

Better to just spoil the view from the outside.
Not recommended.

title: Expensive, Any, Snack and Souvenir Shop
text: On the snack side, the other souvenir sale. Prices are higher than in the centre of Lisbon. Sitting dining tables. Sandwiches of any kind, dear. Located in the waiting area so well place.

title: Disappointment
text: A little disappointed with the cold welcome, no smile. The products are good but no effort to speak French. In addition excessive price quality ratio. It's a shame!

title: Disappointing welcome
text: Recommended by the backpacker's guide, we chose a tasting of three ports, the waiter gave us no explanation for commenting on these products. We bought two, he did not want to provide us with packaging suitable for transport in a suitcase...very disappointing reception.

title: French friend barred you
text:
We were well received after a 4 hour drive to get there.
We bought several large ports, unfortunately one bottle leaked. I wanted to contact the store in Paris and Lisbon but everyone feels crazy about a 98‚Ç¨ bottle in the trash.
Thanks to the great boss who doesn't even respond to the email.
My port budget of ‚Ç¨1500 per year you will no longer see it.

title: Wine NOT? Not worth it.
text:
The best parts of the tour were going to a place that made the handmade and painted tiles from Portugal and the market where they sell fresh fish, meats and cheeses.
We were expecting tours of large wineries that made port, verses the small ones from the Douro valley. They did not have the pastries they were supposed to have. There was lunch in a very small town that didn‚Äôt have anything to really look at if you didn‚Äôt want to eat.
They even ran out of wines for the wine tastings!

title: Never received tickets and no contact from them
text:
They never sent the tickets nor emailed or would answer phone or texts from what‚Äôs app . All we could
Do was walk around the outside of it .

title: DO NOT BUY 3rd PARTY TICKETS!
text: DO NOT BUY TICKETS FROM THIRD PARTNER. IMPOSSIBLE TO GET TICKETS AND THERE IS NO SUCH THING AS ‚ÄúSKIP THE LINE‚Äù AT LOCATION. False promises and unclear wording is misleading. I lost all my money and lots of time by buying online from third party vendor. Do your research on transportation as walking is not a viable option in the area.

title: Total scam.
text: Total scam. We never got our tickets. No one was at the pick up point to get our tickets. We reached out several times and never heard from the company. We missed our time slot and had to pay out of pocket to go later. Also, what you pay for a timed entrance is half the price of this ticket. I will be disputing the charge with credit card. This is anTOTAL SCAM DO NOT BOOK.

title: DO NOT BOOK
text: DO NOT BOOK. Tour operator is a dodgy setup. Meeting point is not where the ticket explains and we missed our time slot as a result. Operator then gave us a ‚Äòdodgy‚Äô ticket. Do not book.

title: We didn't go!
text: After booking on Viator(owned by TripAdvisor) we received information about the tickets that we had to pick them up in a cafe which sounded very odd. Did some research and there are a few reviews saying this was a scam so I contacted Viator who said it wasn't a scam, it's just where the local company they use choose. So why wasn't there a time on the information to meet Mallick then? Why were there reviews saying no-one at the cafe knew anything about this? And why, most importantly did Mallick not reply when I messaged on WhatsApp? I've complained to Viator who are investigating. On the morning we were to go we received a call from Lisbon tour company saying it was cancelled as there was a fire incident at the location(no-one hurt). I was told to contact Viator to get our money back but then got an email saying they would refund it. Why aren't Viator paying attention when in these days of scams the customer is saying they don't feel comfortable with a "pick tickets up from a cafe" arrangement? Especially when Mallick (the name I was given on the info) didn't respond and made the whole thing stressful? Please just book tickets direct from the venue. Hopefully we'll get our money back but not at all impressed with this this whole situation.

title: Don't bother with skip the line
text: Don't bother with skip the line ticket, you have to queue just like everyone else, infact the queue was longer! Totally disorganized and scammed but tourist info in Lisbon to buy skip the line ticket

title: Poorly organised, avoid!
text:
I booked this through Viator. Was sent a 'voucher' to download and instructions to show the voucher at a redemption point and exchange for my ticket.
Went to redemption point (a random cafe) and they had no idea what I was talking about.
Went to the venue and they also would not recognise or accept my voucher...
Unable to get a response from the tour provider..
Had to purchase another ticket and wait in line for an hour.
Please do not waste your money.

title: Terrible experience, disorganized and guide mistake
text: Do not recommend. The voucher provided is not a ticket. You have to meet a guide beforehand, it‚Äôs very confusing. We purchased a 3:30pm ticket but guide showed up late and we could only get a 4pm ticket. We weren‚Äôt allowed in and ended up waiting longer than it would take to have bought one.

title: Never again
text:
So call skip the line ticket is a scam. You still waiting the line. You still wait during the visit and because it‚Äôs true or group you can‚Äôt move really from one room to another
Finally, we got out of the Palace itself and went to a roll walk
The restroom smell worse than a military latrine and you have to wait for a line for 15 minutes to get in.
To get a cup of coffee, you have to wait for 30 minutes
Never ever order anything from Tripadvisor

title: Dont ever buy these tickets!!!
text: Dont ever buy these tickets! It is fraught! When I showet up at the pickup point, nobody knew anything about the tickets. So I had to buy new tickets.

title: Traffic and parking horrible
text:
We‚Äôve never made it there as traffic and parking were horrible. I booked the ticket a few hours before thinking that we‚Äôll definitely be there on time. We didn‚Äôt! On top of everything , I did not get the tickets refunded. So it was a big hassle for nothing.

It‚Äôs probably beautiful. I suggest going early morning and with a tour so they get you there for sure.

title: The park was great but the booking was a scam
text: This booking is not an actual ticket. They make you pick it up in town. They also charge 80% more than the actual ticket. Save money and effort and book through the parks website directly. I wasted ¬£80 because they didn‚Äôt tell me I had to go into town until AFTER I purchased my ticket

title: SCAM BEWARE - DO NOT BUY
text: SCAM!!! Do not go, just book directly through the Quinta da Regaleira website. You can‚Äôt actually get in prior to 10 anyways. We booked this and were told to meet at a croissant shop to get our tickets. We arrived at 9am and no one was there, no one showed up to give us our tickets. We had no other option than to buy tickets directly from the castles website and luckily they weren‚Äôt sold out. There is no benefit from actually buying this experience. We requested a refund and they wouldn‚Äôt give it to us clearly because they just scam people.

title: Sad but nice
text: we got ripped off for tickets from a guy so called operating our of a bakery/coffee shop, skip the line at 33 euros for each of the 4of us ,never got the tickets or could cancel ,.So we refought the tickets at the gate and they were really only 12 euros each, and no such thing as a skip the line.While inside we really did enjoy this palace and gardens, plus the cave tunnels.

title: A disaster
text: Not only do they charge more than 10 euros than the tickets, but you also HAVE to go and exchange them at a croissant place! It's ridiculous! If you buy tickets without a line, it is so that they give the tickets by email. Having to redeem them somewhere else takes more time! A real steal! Shameful!

title: Did not work as promised
text: The whole experience was like dealing with scammers. Nobody met us at meeting point. We didn‚Äôt receive tickets. Nobody answered on either of two provided phones. We ended up purchasing our own tickets. Very bad experience.

title: Do not book ! They did not show up
text:
Do not book this tour !!
We waited for 30 mins snd they didn‚Äôt turn up !
They are not answering their phone either
We contactedViator who also tried to contact them and they didn‚Äôt answer either

I hope nothing happened to them but someone should have contacted us to let us know

We have requested a refund as we paid ¬£260 for this trip

title: Portugal Farm Experience SCAM ALERT
text:
Here‚Äôs how the scam works
You book your tour.
They give you a date and time.. don‚Äôt be late there are NO REFUNDS.
A few days later you get a date and time change to your booking.
A few weeks later you get another change to your booking.
They send you one last time change the DAY BEFORE your tour starts.
When you show up at the time on the last email‚Ä¶They are closed or you missed your tour.
They say you should have ignored the last time change because it‚Äôs just automatically generated by the system.
NO REFUNDS.
This company sells you an experience, then change the date and time so often that you miss your tour and they keep all your money.
I complained to the tour operator and they say NO REFUNDS.
I alerted the Portuguese authorities of the SCAM but they offered no help.
I am putting together a class action law suit against these fraudsters. Post your story and add your name to the law suit (classactionsuitfarmexperience@gmail.com)

title: Heartless
text: A heartless business. We had pre booked and prepaid a tour, including the lunch option. Due to circumstances beyond our control, we were unable to attend the farm at the appointed time. Our rental car broke down and it took over five hours to get a replacement vehicle and get back on the road. We explained this to the operator. We were prepared to just do the farm visit, without the lunch option, latter that day or the next day. They flatly refused any alternative arrangements. Nor, did they even consider a refund. We were really looking forward to learning the cork business at a cost of $350.00 Canadian per couple. Very disappointed that this heartless operation would not want to assist us‚Ä¶customer service was terrible. Their attitude was , simply, tough luck!! Just greedy!!

title: Very disappointing company experience
text:
Poor customer service
We booked a tour with this company and due to our rental car having mechanical issues we‚Äôre unable to make the tour. I called and explained the situation early in the morning prior to the tour to the customer service rep. I asked if we could cancel and if we could attend the next day. They were unable to accommodate another tour they said due to being full and also refused to offer a refund. They said I agreed to their cancellation policy which only spoke of cancellation due to not wanting to attend or illness. Considering we could not attend due to our extenuating circumstances they would offer no refund. I would never book with this company. We are out of pocket $700 and after numerous requests to be given another tour or refund due to a situation not in our error they stoped responding to emails and offered nothing for compensation.

title: Cork Farm Experience felt unsafe
text: The tour was called Cork Farm Experience for ‚Ç¨59 per adult. My wife and I with our young child arrived at the permanently closed lot (according to Google) to find no one there except a 4 door pickup truck. This was the emailed meeting point. We traveled there via very narrow back roads and seemed to be in the middle of nowhere. I tried calling the contact number provided on the email several times without answer. Around 10 minutes after the scheduled tour start time a man walked out of the building and asked if we were there for a tour. Keeping in mind we were in the middle of nowhere at a permanently closed lot I asked the man what the name of the tour was. He didn't know but instructed us to get into his truck. I told him I didn't feel safe with that arrangement with my family. He said he was a farmer and someone convinced him to charge to give tours of his farm also stating that we could not follow him in our own car. My family and I left this tour situation because of feeling unsafe. Something to add is my wife and I have been on many tours in many different countries and never cancelled before because of feeling unsafe. This includes hiking up Mount Sinai starting at 2am for a sunrise tour with just my wife and the tour guide on a self arranged sightseeing trip throughout Egypt. The difference was there were other tourists in sight and the guide was knowledgeable about his tour.

title: False advertising
text: Would leave negative stars if I could. We purchased an experience that the winery did not even provide and the farm experience company refused to reimburse us for the full amount. The winery was embarrassed by these tour companies and how the continue to scam people. The winery tasting itself was amazing and we highly recommend going to pico wines but make sure you book with them directly!

title: They don't show up at meeting point
text: We booked a daily trip and they did not show up at the meeting point. They did not even answer the phone at the number provided with the reservation for more than half an hour, and when they did they were only able to say they didn't see it. I read from previous reviews this already happened with other customers in the past, which makes it even worse. Highly unprofessional.

title: Guide was not very good.
text: Our guide was not very good. He seemed preoccupied with something else the entire time. Not that knowledgeable about F√°tima.

title: Lacking in Professionalism
text:
My experience with Colleen from Portugal the Place was far from professional. From the start, she was often disagreeable and unresponsive. We had concerns early on about her ability to work with a couple like us‚Äîearly retirees from a diverse background. Despite expressing these concerns upfront, particularly regarding her limited experience with individuals from different ethnicities and life experiences, Colleen assured us that she could meet our needs.

Unfortunately, over the course of two months, there was little communication or progress. When we asked for updates, her responses were vague and centered around ‚Äúthe process,‚Äù without any tangible results. This was especially disappointing as we had a pending visit and no clarity on where we stood. Her unprofessional responses to our questions made the situation even more frustrating.

After switching companies, we immediately saw a difference. Within 24 hours, we had two house viewings booked, and the new company provided clear, prompt updates. They were not only more responsive but also more affordable‚Äîhalf the price of Colleen‚Äôs fees. They even assisted with our visa process, going above and beyond in a way that Colleen did not.

It seems Colleen may be more focused on tours than meeting client needs, possibly due to being overburdened. For anyone who has experience living in multiple countries or states, I would not recommend working with her. She does not seem to have the skill set or the professional responsiveness to support those with more complex needs.

title: Plus jamais
text:
Premi√®re fois, le chauffeur a r√¢l√© au t√©l√©phone avec son coll√®gue que le trajet ne valait pas le coup, qui faisait que gaspiller l‚Äôessence. Il parlait en br√©silien et croyais que je ne comprenais rien.

Deuxi√®me fois
Malheureusement Taxi jamais venu, mais cours d√©j√† en avance.

Remboursement pas possible.
Plus jamais je r√©serve si c‚Äôest Top Tour

title: Shameful
text:
I was a teacher in this school in September 2022 and I have proof of everything I mention here. Teachers here are paid under 10‚Ç¨/h without any legal assurance.
They were completely non-transparent about the real hourly fee earned, avoiding to talk about that.

When I had to leave the school because I had a better offer, they were completely resentful and never paid me for the week of lessons that I worked for.
I have proof of the emails from their lawyer refusing to pay me for the amount that I worked for.

If you are ethically concerned about the working conditions in Portugal, think twice.

title: AVOID: Classes cancelled without notice due to teachers (without contracts) leaving AND refund refused.
text:
I was a student at Portuguese Connection from June to October 2022. The school was superb during the summer, that is from level A1 to A2. Unfortunately they struggle to fill classes at level B1 and on two occasions they cancelled classes at the last minute. On one occasion I had flown in for two weeks especially to study. On the second occasion I told them that it was not good enough and asked for a full refund.

The school has recently lost a number of teachers; they seemingly work without contracts, so can give notice on a Friday and the next week‚Äôs classes are cancelled and the school seems to believe that students should just tolerate it, worse they fell back on grossly unfair T&Cs which permit them top cancel classes without notice.

Despite repeated appeals they have refused any refund. So I would suggest that you avoid this school if you want to be certain (1) to receive classes you have booked and paid for AND (2) receive a refund if you can‚Äôt adjust your schedule to theirs. It‚Äôs a real shame because the teachers are brilliant. Other schools in Lisbon, do offer guarantees, I suggest you shop around.

To cancel classes and refuse a refund (over ‚Ç¨600) amounts to fraud. Avoid.

title: Pena Palace - Not worth the long lines and overcrowding.
text: Pena Palace is a miserable experience. Whoever manages this place sells tickets for about 4 times the number of people who can fit comfortably and enjoy the visit. You are herded into a crushing line that feels like a death march. There is no opportunity to stop and look at things in detail. There is also very little information about the history of the palace and the people who lived there. What a missed opportunity.

title: Unreliable, cancelled without notice
text: Not reliable. Researched and booked this company months in advance based on reviews. Confirmation tour paid for received 2 days prior in July then next day received email just advising booking cancelled without notice and refunded without a reasonable explanation or assistance in other options. Noted vehicle issues. Due to late notice and only having 1 day left in Lisbon that we could visit Sintra with trains striking left as not many options and scrambling to visit. The company held our contact details a more personal approach and explanation as to why cancelled without notice and advice on other options given this was pre booked months in advance would have been appreciated. If vehicle issues isn‚Äôt there a contingency plan with a back up vehicle.

title: Tourist Office
text:
Could not reach the tourist station 3 days without answer. No info on the site.
No other place found in Lisbon

title: Be careful of the taxi
text:
Be careful of the taxi recommended by the tourist office. My mother-in-law and her cousins visited Lisbon with a taxi driver and he took them to several places.
During one of these visits, he suggested not bothering with the handbags and they went for a walk, leaving the bags and the driver in the car.
On their return, they found that ‚Ç¨900.00 had been stolen.
The driver denied the facts and they went to file a complaint with the police and complain to the tourist office.
Great ride and rent a car instead it will be less risky.

title: Pick-pocket
text:
Very nice place. Many tourists, I expected, probably naively.
I had to say goodbye to my wallet that left with a pickup pocket in a nearby street, with papers, credit card and cash.

This ruined the end of my trip, knowing that the registration of the complaint with the police station is only formal, no research, no stopping of this activity surely very lucrative.

title: Flavorless food
text: Good location, nice view, but tasteless pizza and salad for an Italian restaurant. Service more than one industrial company

title: Attractive but blighted by the drug dealers harassing you constantly
text: Remove the fake drug dealers and it would be lovely, all the way down rua Augusta (even in Avenida de Liberdade) and into the square you are constantly accosted by guys pushing cocaine, weed , hash offering to let you try the product.. mostly they will take the hint if you say no firmly but the odd one keeps pushing and you have to become a bit more aggressive to get rid of them. Sadly a complete blight on an otherwise lovely city with great people and because these dealers mostly only actually sell fake drugs like crushed paracetamol, crushed bay leaves etc the police cannot arrest and charge them with anything. It could be fixed if there was a will to do so , but I guess tourism in Lisbon is not valued very much. I imagine for some this would be a terrifying experience.... Just consider this carefully and be prepared if you decide to visit. Research it for yourself, quick search on Google..

title: Rien d'exceptionnel
text: Lors de notre visite de Lisbonne nous avons √©galement visit√© ce quartier. La pra√ßa do principe Real ne montre rien d'exceptionnel. Si vous ne r√©sidez pas dans ce quartier mon avis est que c'est une perte de temps que de s'y rendre.

title: Dal≈°√≠ z mnoha n√°mƒõst√≠ kde nab√≠zej fet
text: Tohle n√°mƒõst√≠ vypad√° u≈æ jako bych se pohyboval v nƒõjak√© pofidern√≠ ƒç√°sti mƒõsta. Nav√≠c mi tu nab√≠zeli za b√≠l√©ho dne drogy, p≈ô√≠mo mezi lidma, hnus. Jedna, dvƒõ fotky a rychle pryƒç. Bohu≈æel, tohle se mi nestalo v Lisabonu v√Ωjimeƒçnƒõ.

title: Pity about the Pickpockets
text: This plaza had wonderful interesting food and gift stalls dotted around the perimeter when we visited in late June '24 but we chose to eat at a curb side restaurant on the station side of the square. Food was unremarkable but the pickpocket that relieved me of my credit cards will remain in my memory of Lisbon forever.

title: Do not use this parking station
text: We booked online and made a typo with the number plate. I went to the office to ask them to assist. He said bad luck pay twice

title: Poor stay on site
text: The park itself is excellent, very well located, very well signposted, has great parking spaces, however they play music at high volume throughout the night, which makes staying there almost unbearable! I went to pianist Richard Clayderman's concert yesterday and I have a Berlingo Van that I usually sleep in to save money as I live in Guimar√£es and not in Lisbon. I spent a terrible night at this establishment due to the loud and non-stop sound. It is a situation of extreme lack of respect towards users.

title: Stay away!
text: Just returned from Lisbon. Our hotel was overlooking Martim Moniz square and it's full of groups of men hanging around all day, some trying to sell you drugs - all very intimidating. The whole area smells strongly of urine. There is also a 'cardboard city' at one end and always lots of beggars around. The whole of Lisbon was a complete let down - mostly dirty, scruffy and covered in horrid graffiti - nothing appealing here and will never return - once was enough.

title: V noci tu sami nechoƒète
text: Tady jsem se octnul, kdy≈æ jsem ≈°el pƒõ≈°ky z vyhl√≠dky Senhora do Monte zpƒõt do centra mƒõsta. U≈æ jak jsem proch√°zel tƒõmi uliƒçkami, no tady bych s√°m v noci ne≈°el. Na samotn√©m n√°mƒõst√≠ spousta pofidern√≠ch lid√≠. Tady jsem se nec√≠til p≈ô√≠jemnƒõ a u≈æ v≈Øbec ne bezpeƒçnƒõ. Hlavnƒõ, ≈æe tu stoj√≠ jeden z nejdra≈æ≈°√≠ch hotel≈Ø ve mƒõstƒõ, v√°≈ænƒõ √∫≈æasn√Ω.

title: Not worth it and scary
text: Except for the tram 28, and that near the castle of St. George, has nothing for which I would recommend to visit, we saw many people drugged and selling. We passed through streets that were scary and we didn't feel safe. Wouldn't recommend it especially late afternoon/night

title: Better avoid!
text: If you want to eat authentic Asian food during the day, this is certainly a great place to go. But this kind of multiculti of groups of men loitering around is frightening. Unfortunately, you can't get around it to get to the hospital S√£o Jos√© on foot, for example. At night I would definitely not go there and I feel sorry for tourists who have booked accommodation from provided there or even worse Above direction Intente/ Avenida Almirante Reis ! This is definitely not a poster child for Lisbon.

title: It's really scary coming here.
text: This square is very central. You have to come here to catch Tram 28. The atmosphere is really terrifying. People from early morning to evening sitting around doing nothing. You see the same people in the same place at 9 in the morning as at 9 at night. They call you, they tell you things, they offer you things. I felt absolutely not safe in this area to go 2 women. All full of shops and bars from other countries.

title: 99.9% migrants in flip flops loitering around
text: As the title suggests‚Ä¶ that and homeless people. Been through in the evening as well where you see migrants eating basmati rice out of carrier bags with their hands. Does not look like Portugal. It‚Äôs gone and abandoned by the locals. Gone.

title: Not what it used to be, skip this place at night
text: We had an appartement closeby so we walked here almost daily. Based on the reviews and description, I believe this place is not what it used to be. There were no markets and at night there were a lot of immigrants and homeless people. Since I was with my partner I still felt safe/at ease, but I think that I would've felt unsafe/not at ease with a female friend. There is a pretty decent supermarket for an easy breakfast/lunch.

title: Dirty and poorly cared for
text:
The square would not be ugly, but we found it poorly maintained and poorly attended.
The fountains were off, the flower beds left to themselves and in general it was not very clean.
To be avoided.

title: A hub for the homeless!
text: I wouldn‚Äôt recommend visiting this area, especially not at night, it‚Äôs a hub for the homeless and unsavoury types and we were even warned to be careful by our taxi driver. Safe to say we quickly got out of that area or at least tried to, we jumped into another taxi but the driver blatantly made things difficult for us and clearly didn‚Äôt want to take us anywhere and I‚Äôll admit I have slammed the door of a few taxis since being in Lisbon and by this time, in this area I had had enough. Please please don‚Äôt go to this area, it is not worth it!

title: Avoid
text: This is NOT a great place in Lisbon. Run down square full of trash and homeless people. There is really nothing to do here. There are wonderful squares just to the southwest. Much nicer with shops and cleaner.

title: Place without any charm
text: This place is no longer occupied by any stalls or businesses. Only status in the middle can be worth it. Place which may not be very busy depending on schedules

title: Be careful, great social degradation
text: A degraded and poorly frequented square. I saw people urinating in front of everyone as if nothing had happened at 5pm, people selling drugs without problems. Be careful if you end up in these parts for tram 28 and 12, stay away from the central part of the square

title: Unsafe!!!
text: Feels very unsafe at night. Didn‚Äôt see a single woman on the road around 11pm while I got home. The area was full of sketchy men staring at you and whistling/catcalling - I felt very unsafe. This isnt an exaggeration. I wouldnt recommend staying here if you‚Äôre female and travelling solo

title: Gathering of homeless people, drug addicts, illegals....
text: The square was filled with homeless people, drug addicts and illegals. The bushes at the park were used as a public toilet. No visible police.

title: Buyer beware
text: Prices for tours are much lower than competition. Now I know why - received an email requesting deposit by pay pal and then remainder of payment for 8 day tour of 2600 euro in CASH TO the driver. Probably how they keep their costs down, but I don't travel with that much cash and won't deal with a company that works that way. Buyer beware.

title: Worst tour ever
text:
This tour was far from being Premiere!!
Showed up in a 1990s Mercedes and the aircon was barely working when we got going. As the day heated up, the aircon stopped all together. Had to drive around with the windows down. Too hot for that. Asked the driver to abandon the tour after four hours of stinking heat. Rang the office and the only solution offered was to get another car and start again. Way too hot for that now.
Management flipped the blame to the customer. That I should have rung him and reported it. Thought that was the drivers job as the coolant light came on in the first hour. And he did report it.

Ruined one of our last days in Lisbon!
