A nossa capital, o nosso pa√≠s merece condi√ß√µes adequadas.

title: Autocarro leiria-aveiro que comorar por dizer que iria demorar menos que 2 h e demorou 2h30
text: Maior transpar√™ncia nos verdadeiros tempos de transporte de modo a que as pessoas possam organizar a sua vida e tempo de acordo com informa√ß√£o equivalente √† realidade. Demorei 2h30 a fazer uma viagem que diziam demorar menos de 2 horas. Vergonhoso

title: Customer Service non-existent
text: Terrible customer service. You can‚Äôt even ask the drivers simple questions such as ‚Äúis this the right ticket: location‚Äù they refuse to help, and also give snark remarks. I get it, maybe you‚Äôre tired, maybe you had a long day, but is there really a need to be rude? Out of all of our interactions with public transport, and tourism staff in Portugal this by far was the worst.

title: Hoffnung
text:
Bom dia, apanh√°mos o autocarro 78 de Aljezur para Lisboa a 27-04-2023.
Deixamos nossas jaquetas (1x jaqueta jeans azul, 1x jaqueta de moletom azul
escuro) na prateleira acima dos assentos 9/10. Voc√™ tem alguma informa√ß√£o sobre
o paradeiro das jaquetas? Nossa reserva em anexo! Infelizmente, s√≥ pudemos
contat√°-los hoje. Obrigado e cumprimentos D....... V........
Enviei este pedido √† Rede Expressos atrav√©s do meu registo. Resposta: ser√° encaminhado e entraremos em contato. Nenhuma resposta apesar de v√°rios pedidos! N√£o √© assim que voc√™ trata os clientes!

title: Horr√≠vel
text:
P√©ssimo o facto de ter que se pagar por uma casa de banho depois de uma grande viagem em Sete Rios. Que nem fatura passam na hora. A rede expresso deveria garantir o acesso a todos a um wc com condi√ß√µes m√≠nimas e de forma gratuita. Rid√≠culo.

Os autocarros est√£o sempre sujos.

title: Racist driver
text: The driver was very rude only with me ( black, Brazilian female) didn‚Äôt let me use the bathroom and scream at me when I asked for information.

title: Very bad customer service
text: Their customer service is the worst. 15 minutes long i waited for the guy to explain me how the lost & found works and he never did anything to help me. just said to translate the website to english? ridiculous

title: TERRIBLE
text: Terrible service, punctuality is out the window. The busses have no windows and smell like piss. They offer wifi in the bus that does not work AT ALL. And if you try to speak anything other than portuguese to anyone on the staff team, they are rude as hell. Absolutely horrid experience.

title: Never use that bus company!!!
text: When I was in Lisbon taking the bus to Nazare there was a problem with your system so I couldn‚Äôt change my ticket to another hour because your arrogant employee told me my ticket was already changed which indeed was not true. After all, I have never changed my ticket. After describing the issue to your employee and then going to the manager's office they didn‚Äôt help me and told me to buy another ticket so I had to do a formal written complaint at the operator manager's office. now, after more than 20 days, they told me that the ticket is not refundable and that‚Äôs all. They stole my money.

title: Overpriced nonsense
text: Overblown and very expensive for what it is, the bar person (in honour of people that can make cocktails that‚Äôs all they were) put a cocktail in a whisky glass with more ice than I have ever had to make the cocktail look bigger, when I asked to take the ice out and put the drink in a cocktail glass , I got it back minus the ice with a pitifully small about of drink, they can only make what is on the menu and even that beyond a simple mixer , appears beyond them, worst bar I have been to in over 20 years , there are far better in Lisbon. Overpriced nonsense , made us wait over 15 mins before our 2 hour slot and then wanted us to leave after only 1.5 hours.

title: Avoid these scammers
text: Tried contacting this place days in advance to cancel booking, and got no answer on the phone until the day of the booking over 3 hours in advance. They still charged a cancellation fee even though I had been trying to contact them over 48 hours in advance. What a scam!!!

title: Don't care about customer service / accessibility.
text:
Emailed the bar 11 days ago to see if they were accessible for wheelchair users - no reply.

Followed up and emailed again 4 days ago - again no reply.

Ignoring people who are asking for help to visit? Not ok.

title: 45 minutes of torture before bailing
text: Worst bar in Lisbon! Stay away. Super pretentious. Drinks are so bad they're almost funny. 4 of us went, none of us could believe how bad this place was. Will not return.

title: Not nice people
text:
Most unfriendly top 50 bar I have made contact with.
My hobby is to travel the world and try all the top 50‚Äôbars. Was excited to get a table. However suddenly it got cancelled 18 hours before with no explanation. Was asked to write to them. They never replied. A really unfriendly bunch. Avoid them if you can.
You are worth more.

title: Disappointing interaction
text: We weren‚Äôt able to book, which is understandable but the arrogance and rudeness was totally unnecessary. Seem to think their world 50 status gives them the right to be condescending

title: Misleading - benefits from tourists
text: Misleading communication. The seller indicated that they are very flexible and so 24h rental was a stretchable concept to 1-1.5h clearance. When we came back, there was immediate comment that we were an hour later. Directly also to pay extra, without discussion. Not friendly at all, once the sale was in.

title: Scooters lissabon
text: Initially very satisfied, fine moped, seller very flexible when booking and made it appear that we could be an hour later, but when we brought the scooters in (an hour late) he made a big hassle and we had to pay a fine. So be very careful when you book here!

title: Disappointing experience
text: We were a party of 4, and we booked the sunset sail and wine tour. We were the last to get on the boat and as a result we could only sit on the front of the sail boat which had a bean bag. The bean bag is big enough to accommodate 2 people, which meant 2 of us ended up on the floor. And that is how we spent the 2 hours, in the cold wind and nowhere else to go as none of the other passengers were willing to trade places. The only redeeming factor was the amazing crew who did their utmost to alleviate the situation. We have reached out to the tour company, and the excuse was that it‚Äôs what we booked. We do not believe that the sail boat can accommodate 12 people, and it was not clear that some passengers will need to be sitting on the floor.

title: Be aware - you don't get refund if rain out - even if voucher paperwork promises it!
text:
We cancelled two hours ahead of scheduled departure due rain. People in our hotel came running in with umbrellas canceling their outdoor tours as well. This tour stated it would refund in event of rain. However they did not hold to this agreement that was on our printed voucher. The local tour group said we had to get refund from Tripadvisor. Tripadvisor said they couldn't refund unless Local tour group admitted to rainout. It was not granted. Can't imagine a tour group going out in that rain! I would like to think Trip advisor would have refunded if Local group was honest with them.

Be aware that you can't trust you will get refund due to rain even if paperwork promises it!

title: Nice trip, terrible organization!
text: On 12/31/2023 we went to the indicated meeting point. It was a corner of a building that had nothing to do with the boat trip. Google's georeferencing was also rough. Luckily we were intrigued by a long queue beyond the fence, outside the square. No indications, no signs, no one who spoke at least English, just a doorman who only nodded yes. Thanks to the people we understood that it was also our boarding, but there was only one huge queue for two different ships and excursions and no one knew which one was the right one. The workers had neither a barcode reader nor a lamp to read the names. Only thanks to our cell phones, after 50 minutes we managed to get on the right boat.

title: Extremely Unsafe and Unprofessional Guide Shauna‚Äî A Serious Liability to the Company
text:
I‚Äôve joined over 80+ local experiences around the world, and this was by far the most dangerous and poorly handled one ‚Äî solely due to the guide, Shauna.

From the start, I informed her it was my first time riding an electric bike. Instead of offering basic safety instruction or ensuring beginners were supported, she gave a rushed introduction of under 2 minutes and immediately took off ‚Äî weaving through narrow, steep city-center roads shared by cars and pedestrians. I was left 3rd to last in a group of 10, unable to even see her tail light.

Within the first minute, I encountered a tourist who pretended to jump in front of my bike as a joke. I had to stop abruptly, unsure how to react. When I caught up, instead of asking if I was okay or what happened, Shauna loudly and sarcastically scolded me in front of the group: ‚ÄúYou need to stay really close, okay? R-E-A-L-L-Y close.‚Äù ‚Äî speaking to me like I didn‚Äôt understand English. Her lack of care or curiosity about a first-time rider‚Äôs safety was shocking.

But it got worse.

Mid-ride, my straight-leg pants got caught in the exposed bike chain. I nearly toppled sideways into a car lane ‚Äî a life-threatening moment. Thankfully, two other participants saved me from falling under the wheels of a passing car. Shauna, who was 8 riders ahead, came back after the fact and simply said, ‚ÄúOh, I didn‚Äôt see your pants! You should‚Äôve tied them up. These bikes catch stuff easily.‚Äù
No warning. No pre-checks. No emergency training. Just a flimsy excuse.

This wasn‚Äôt just a bad experience ‚Äî it was dangerous and deeply unprofessional.

To make matters worse, the tour overran by a full hour, ending at 7:55pm, mostly because Shauna wouldn‚Äôt stop talking about herself and her second master‚Äôs degree in sociology. Her self-absorption, lack of leadership, and disregard for safety protocols made the entire tour feel like a liability waiting to happen.

The bikes and the route were great. I have no issue with the company or its equipment. But Shauna should not be leading any tour involving traffic, equipment, or group coordination. She is inattentive, unsafe, and unfit for this role.

Avoid Shauna at all costs.

title: Frustrating
text: The tour company wasn't quite prepared...we got a late start by about 25 minutes and my bike seat wasn't adjusting properly. The tour guide's English wasn't quite as good as I would have liked! Had a hard time understanding him and it took him a long time to voice his thoughts. Lisbon is not an ideal place in my opinion for an e-bike tour. It is very very busy so there is a lot of stopping and starting and riding very slowly. Lots of people and traffic to navigate. Had to walk bike several times. I honestly think it would have been more fun to have a few places where we could just ride without stopping for more than a block.

title: Experienced Different Expectations
text:
This could be a fun and informative adventure. I have taken E-bike tours in Nice and Athens, both experiences memorable, which is why our family decided to do one in Lisbon.
The bikes were set out before we arrived, and everyone was friendly and enthusiastic. We got helmets and asked about our riding abilities. Unfortunately the women's bikes with easy leg passes shown on the website do not exist, so be prepared to pull leg over, which is fine except if you feel only comfortable with being about to get on and off easily.
No vests given either as picture shows. The guide was hasty at telling us about the gears and turbo option, maybe because we said we were familiar with ebikes. Unfortunately there was no riding around on flat surface to get oriented to bike or turbo, just right up a steep hill. All bikes are different, and it's essential and everyone prove to the guide responsible that the folks on the tour are proficient at riding, steering, changing the gears, using the turbo, and breaking. There were a few times that coming to a busy intersection, we came to a stop, but without keeping your hands on the breaks, the bike continues to lunge forward. Immediately I personally knew the turbo function was not going to be adequate for these hills. It has 3 levels, where the bikes I've had in the other experiences had 5. That level of power gives you the true confidence and support needed in steep hills like those in the Alfama neighborhood. My husband who rides everyday at home had difficulty on a few of the hills. I, being a large, but active woman, had challenges on almost every hill, which should not have been the case. Having to walk up the hill AND push the heavy bike, only made the experience much more difficult, and discouraging.
We passed areas that were attractive and would have liked to know more about, and stopped at areas too long that would have been better to pass up.
The guide was attentive to us all and encouraging to me to not give up, but with more information about the area, a 1/2 hour less, and more efficient e-bikes, I know we all would have enjoyed the experience so much better.

title: Waste of time
text: Absolutely overrated, empty interiors, very long queues not only to enter but also to get on and off from one floor to another, which are still empty.

title: Do not book with this company
text: After many attempts (instagram direct message, email, text, calling) I eventually managed to book a taxi ride with this company. At the indicated spot and on time, we waited for half an hour, but no-one showed up. They didn't pick up the phone or notify us in any way about a delay or cancellation. Because of this, we also missed our restaurant reservation. This was my birthday gift to my husband and I am gutted that it has been ruined. What a lack of respect. Do not book with this company.

title: VIP experience - avoid
text: Being my birthday, being my first time in this space. I decided to buy the VIP pass. I'd be far from guessing that VIP was for Very Ignorant Portier. When I entered, I decided to the distraction caused by the person in front of me by the advanced state of drunkenness, the doorman only gave me the VIP bracelet and not a card. Being the first time in space, I did not know the need for this card. I consumed my three waters and at the exit I was faced with a fine for losing a card that I was never given.The help was nonexistent, the staff was horrible, even being sober. Avoid.

title: SCAM, Charge without warning
text: Lousy record, they tell you free admission before 1:30 and reduced prices of consumption. We arrived for free before one and thirty so we went for free, WE DID NOT CONSUME and yet we were charged 12 euros. Which aren't worth it for the disk level they are. The guards are high-handed, they have a lousy deal.

title: Awful.
text: Don't go, people are scammed. They put extra drinks and extra drinks on your card and on the way out they charge you. The manager is a girl with glasses, came and said she was only going to speak in Portuguese because we are in Portugal. We're Spanish and we didn't understand. They'd have to change the staff, especially her. Money not returned, nothing solved, racist, impertinent and ill-mannered. Don't go, it's not worth it.

title: Nothing recommended
text: We were a group of Spaniards and they wanted to charge each one one one thing when we all consume the same, clearly they are not worth it and try to scam all the time, we were half an hour arguing so that we were not scammed and at least in the end we were not completely cheated but it was not profitable at all. The only good thing is that at least there was good music.

title: Full of slugs and con artists
text: If you're from outside they try to scam you at the door by overcharging you or without even explaining how it works as paid inside. It's also full of slugs that grope and touch you without your permission. I do not recommend it to anyone who comes to Lisbon.

title: Fake advertisement
text: They create fake advertisement about night with free entrance on social medias and then they ask you to pay at the entrance and if you don't want to pay, bouncers gets really unpleasants and violents. Horrible experience.

title: HORRIBLE
text: The worst night club in Lisbon. Body guards were super unpleasant and rude. They charged different prices according to your aspect, with no reason. DO NOT GO

title: Unsafe and violent towards women of color
text: Staff are extremely violent and racist. They (the bouncer) choked someone I was with. Especially if you are a woman of color, don‚Äôt party here and do not give this establishment your hard earned euros! We must condemn violence.

title: waste of time
text: This place is a joke. The staff are super rude and unprofessional. The place is very dirty. You won't enjoy it if you are in Lisbon. Don't try to visit it, it will be a waste of time

title: Terrible! Bad polite security
text:
I hated it. I went to space with my friends to dance and have fun but, unfortunately, it was just the opposite.
It was very tense, the security was feeling on us with a threatening air. The nightclub was almost empty, it had a maximum of 50 people (including the staff), and the security began to get involved with my group of friends because of some coats. You couldn't have your coats on the table, just a coat. I've always seen the security reprimand for everything and nothing, not just my group but the rest of the people.
In the end, this security (called Lino Almeida), grabbed my friend (a 27-year-old girl) and decided to expel her from the club for having a coat on a table. When he grabbed her he was super aggressive, to the point of grabbing her in the chest just to kick her out.
Terrible experience and I do not enter the establishment again!

title: WASTE of time...
text:
Drinks were terrible and prices were high.In mojito there was hardly any alcohol and there was no fresh mint. Worst experience in Lisbon...
DON'T WASTE TIME OR MONEY

title: Get a real doorman not security.
text: So After working in the nightlife for 15 years in NY for the best clubs in the world , worked in fashion , Dj , I went to Rive Rouge for a InterNations meaning private event and the door security though I was not dressed properly because of his ignorance of fashion . So what is said in supposedly high class club they don 't even have real door person like in NY who is the one creating the beautiful ambiance and creating the vibe by letting the right people in. Here is another boring crowd nothing original . Really sad for the owner of Lux . No funky people, look like an office party . Before to open a club I recommend to learn from steve rebel, kenny Kenny, Steve Louis ,Wass , real door people from studio 54 , Tunnel. Life ,Marquis . Get a real doorman not security, someone who has a sense of fashion, who knows to recognize cool people.

title: Discrimination and prejudice
text: Highly prejudiced workers. I was refused entry because I was gay. They treated me super rudely and a security guard even pushed me. I had never suffered a homophobic attack at the entrance to a bar/nightclub. Disgusting.

title: Abuse and assault
text: The worst experience of my life, I had it here today, when the ‚ÄúSECURITY‚Äù treated my friends and me like we were trash, they attacked me, suffocated me, when we tried to take out our cell phone to record what was happening, They took it away from us. As a Spaniard that I am, I recommend to everyone who reads this to never go. Obviously everything has been reported to the police, along with a medical report of the injuries and awaiting trial.

title: Terrible
text: I hated it. I went to relax, dance. It was very tense, with the security guard always looking threatening. You couldn't have your suitcase on the table, just a vest. I saw the security guard always scolding other people for everything and nothing, and he didn't make me feel at all relaxed. I was always in tension because of that. I've never been to entertainment spaces where I felt this way, and I'm 50 years old. I've been to many, and outside the country, and it was the first time I saw something so unusual.

title: Horrible
text: Xenophobic security guards, bad environment. After checking the guest list and informing the entrance fee, I was blocked because I was with two Mexican friends. After being stopped, I asked to speak to the manager and one of the security guards pushed me onto the public street! Disgusting attitudes! A criminal complaint was made to the police. These types of events are common in this place, disgusting!

title: Terrifying!!!!!!!!!!!
text:
They stopped two black people from entering because they were black and even called them "unwanted customers"! Super rude, rude and super hyper mega expensive. The music was terrible. If you have epilepsy, don't go and anyone who doesn't have epilepsy don't go either as they will almost certainly have a mini epileptic attack. The drinks are not good and come hot.
Furthermore, I felt watched by the constant security guards on top of us.

title: Run away !!!
text:
Run away !!!

There were 10 of us for a bachelor party we had booked to make sure we could get in. (In hindsight we would have preferred not to be there!)
At the entrance to the club they give you one card per person. This card does not give you any extra drinks or services, it simply serves to rip you off. How ? I will explain to you: they give you the cards at the entrance and explain that if you lose it you will have to pay ‚Ç¨50 per card. Except that we are not told at the entrance that this card is of no use to us inside the club. I wanted to use it for a drink. The waitress took it from me and asked me to pay for my drink but she didn't want to give me the card back. I had to argue to get it back! Their goal is to steal your card so they can scam you out of ‚Ç¨50 (how do I know? 2 regulars explained to me how this deception took place. We were 10 men so I won't explain the short story of this affair to you if we don't We weren't warned in time!
The receptionists are not pleasant, rude. I don't speak Portuguese but Spanish and English very well and I can tell you that they don't care about the customers.
We were told that the club was full to bursting, we ended up with 30 people including my group! Just desperate.

The club opens at 1am so we take 5 bottles with my friends, so far so good. But the highlight of the show! The club closed at 4am! The bartender came to take the remaining bottles (2 bottles still closed) and took them to her bar at 3:30 a.m.! I went and asked why? And she tells me that the club closes at 4 a.m. so I ask for a refund and she refuses it (the bottles have not been opened) I decide to elbow my way to recover our dues with great difficulty I manage to negotiate that the we transfer our bottles to plastic bottles!

If I have only one piece of advice to give you, it‚Äôs to avoid this club!!

title: Terrible
text:
I would give zero if possible. Security limited itself to explaining why our friend, a member of the group, could not enter. He began to be aggressive towards the other members of the group. If it were possible I would give -1. Terrible service and environmenT.
Terrible service.

DO NOT ENTER.

title: Absolutely horrible
text: Absolutely horrible club. A lot of bar crawls end here but save your time and go to pink street or bairro alto instead

title: Terrible. Avoid at all costs.
text:
ABOID AVOID. terrible club and they charged us 15euro on the way out after 3 mins inside. Called the police and wouldn‚Äôt let us out of the foyer.
This place is awful. Don‚Äôt go

title: Vergonhoso
text: √âramos 4 amigas, uma delas foi impedida de sair da discoteca pelo seguran√ßa Lu√≠s Tavares, pois alegava que a mesma n√£o tinha pago o que que consumiu, √† sa√≠da. Ap√≥s a minha amiga mostrar o comprovativo de pagamento, o recibo de multibanco, n√£o a deixaram sair. A funcion√°ria Patr√≠cia Lima, que efetuou esse mesmo pagamento, n√£o quis ajudar e descartou-se. Os seguran√ßas desadequados, a usarem a for√ßa f√≠sica sem raz√£o aparente. Recusaram-se a colaborar. Estabelecimento recusou-se a dar o livro de reclama√ß√µes, demorando 20 min para o dar. N√£o aconselho este estabelecimento a ningu√©m e deveria fechar. Vergonhoso.

title: DO NOT GO
text: We went on a Saturday night and NOBODY was there. Bought thousands of dollars of bottle service before we went and we were still treated terribly. Staff is horrible and annoying and petty. The whole club is just set up so bad and it just straight up sucks. Please do not waste your time here!

title: P√©ssima experi√™ncia
text: HORR√çVEL. Entramos √† 1:30 um grupo de 10 pessoas por 12 ‚Ç¨ consumiveis cada um. √Äs 2:30 vimos as luzes acesas e dizer que h√° um problema t√©cnico que arriscava a nossa sa√∫de pois supostamente n√£o cumpriam com uma norma de seguran√ßa e t√≠nhamos que sair. Claro que esse risco de sa√∫de n√£o os impediu de n√≥s cobrar o dinheiro, mas visto que havia muitas reclama√ß√µes decidiram cobrar o que cada pessoa consumiu mais o bengaleiro (rid√≠culo sendo que os 3‚Ç¨ de bengaleiro s√£o de uma noite inteira e n√£o supostamente de uma hora. Tinham ganho muito mais se n√£o nos tivessem cobrado nada visto que foi um problema deles. Assim todos os que l√° estavam de certeza que n√£o voltam mais, pois n√≥s somos os clientes e somos os √∫nicos que n√£o tiveram culpa de nada. Devido a esta situa√ß√£o as pessoas n√£o tiveram para onde ir visto n√£o haver transportes e √†quela hora ser um balurdio para entrar em qualquer lado. N√£o recomendo pois n√£o pensam nos clientes nem dos direitos do consumidor.

title: p√©ssimo
text:
M√° experi√™ncia, barraram dois amigos por serem estrangeiros ( nomeadamente brasileiro e peruano), e duas amigas portuguesas.
Extremamente desagrad√°vel, nunca mais l√° voltamos, n√£o aconselho, acho uma falta de respeito para com quem j√° tinha entrado, tivemos que pagar o dinheiro de entrada porque separaram o grupo.
Terr√≠vel, merece 0 em 10.
ps: dava 0 no trip advisor se tal fosse poss√≠vel.

title: P√©ssima experi√™ncia
text: Al√©m de ser obrigat√≥rio comprar os bilhetes para entrada previamente e de, ainda assim, ter estado mais de 1h30 minutos √† espera para entrar (venderam mais bilhetes do que o n√∫mero de pessoas que aceitam e tivemos que esperar que sa√≠ssem clientes para entrar), foram altamente rudes, n√£o nos esclarecendo as d√∫vidas que t√≠nhamos em rela√ß√£o ao funcionamento do bar.

title: Disappointed with Lisbon Tour
text: Boring mechanical presentation. A lot of driving without seeing much and rivets that didn't allow for many photo stops. Wouldn't recommend. Disappointed and a lot of money.

title: They cancelled last minute
text: Trip was cancelled the day before we were scheduled to go on the tour. It was too late to make alternate plans by the time we saw the email.

title: Do not order from them
text: Do not ordered from these guys they can even find the place then when they ask if you wanna cancel and say test they bad talk you to skip

title: I went to take a break for a glass as usual with friends
text: Everything is much more expensive than last year.They asked for a slice and put the slice in the account without the knowledge of the customer.When I went to get satisfactions the person in charge was rude and still wanted to put the blame on the employee.I said that the person in charge was him and not the employee.Here the question was not for the euro that he wanted to return but a matter of principle.Because in Portugal it is forbidden to put the slice in the customer's account.I could give it or not.I will not return here anymore and I will tell my friends not to return there...

title: Small space high prices
text:
A small christmas market
Very over priced for everything I don't believe there was any vegetarian friendly food stalls or not that I saw
I think it's designed around family's spending loads of money with there kids
But no real value for money
It has a great atmosphere
But huge crowds make it uncomfortable
I will say that who ever put it all together
Done a great job overall place looks greet at night
But that's what your paying high prices for
You can buy the same things in shops down the street for a lot less hats bags scarfs bracelets ect have a look around first
Maybe pop in to local super market before and buy sweets chocolate drinks for the kids before you arrive it will save you alot of money

title: Disappointing christmas market
text: This Christmas market was kind of disappointing. I thought it would be a lot bigger since it‚Äôs in the main square but Wonderland Lisboa was better than this. It‚Äôs your typical Christmas market selling over-priced souvenirs, bad food at a marked up price, and a few stalls selling alcohol. Thankfully, it was right by our hotel. I would have been mad if we went out of our way just to come here.

title: The worst
text:
A disappointment not to say anything else, the ridicule of the magazine made, men holding pq pants had to take off belts and suspenders and at the same time trying to take things inside the small backpacks or another is so dark there inside that there were children afraid.
IF THEY CLOSED, NOTHING WOULD BE LOST.

title: Bad service
text: The girl who serves at the cafeteria is very rude, the service is slow and does not help you with what you ask. Dull, dark place.

title: Lamentable and useless
text: Lamentable. 10‚Ç¨ to see the wealth accumulated on so much misery! And misleading when you want to visit the Palace of Ajuda which is on the other side of the building.... A state scam! To flee

title: Do not go see this museum just outside the Palacio
text:
what a scam
7 euros to enter an all-black maze with very little lighting, even the jewelry in the armored display cases is in the dark
my partner and I complained about this 10 min visit. seen the dark places
it's not worth 1 euro we paid 7 euros

title: Perhaps disappointed in expectations
text: We honestly thought the exhibition would be more engaging. To get in we had to go through a thousand checks, ... but that's okay. Very few people present.

title: What a disappointment...
text: Rich and quite interesting collection. However, from a museological point of view, the exhibition leaves something to be desired: an environment that is too (too, I repeat) dark to be able to observe some of the pieces in detail (the visitor is very far away from them and there is no magnification), glasses that are not adjusted for the purpose (a lot of reflection, which makes it difficult to correctly visualize the pieces found on lower levels), the background where the jewels are placed does not allow for a careful observation of the exhibition (in dark, choppy wood), a very cluttered arrangement of the collection, replicas placed without any criteria, very small and confusing captions... Having some knowledge of museology, I can say that this museum is the perfect example of what should not be done. Furthermore (family of four), we paid more than ‚Ç¨30, which is too high considering the purchasing power of most Portuguese people. Completely disappointed.

title: Disappointment
text:
The museum is interesting and well maintained
despite being a short visit for the price charged. The security check at the entrance is completely inadequate and completely ruined the visit. It is carried out by 2 inexperienced people who pass personal objects through screening n times as they do not understand what they are seeing. They ask to take cell phones, watches, keys, cosmetics (lipsticks and creams), liquids, everything from their pockets, coats... in front of us was a couple with a baby who had to test the entire range of baby creams on themselves and force the baby to drinking water in addition to passing their bags through the device several times asking each other what they were seeing on the screen. No words for the tremendous incompetence. Shameful

title: I hope you improve the way you display your beautiful pieces, even if only a few pieces
text: Not very interesting, little content and very dark and not coherent exposition, some pieces had a number to identify others not.

title: Skip it
text: Staff extremely rude. I was questioned about every item in my purse - from a metal pen I have (which I‚Äôve never had any questions about) to my hand sanitizer. But even worse, my friend who has had two hip replacements was taken to a separate room and asked to pull down her trousers so they could ensure she was not smuggling anything in. It was absurd. They think that a stern and annoyed visage equals being a professional - it does not. Yes, I‚Äôve been to the Tower of London where security is professional and the jewels more spectacular. This exhibit was nice but pricy ticket. Extremely low lighting. The descriptions of most of the items was minimal and there was very little historical context. Traffic was awful getting there from Baxia. Unless your love of jewels and silver out weighs being treated like a potential criminal - skip this.

title: H√° melhores museus em Lisboa
text: Caro e n√£o vale muito a pena. Concordo com a cr√≠tica anterior, a cataloga√ß√£o das pe√ßas √© confusa, para t√£o grande investimento n√£o se entende que essa parte tenha sido descurada.

title: Um excelente exemplo de como N√ÉO devem ser expostas pe√ßas de joalharia !
Commercial street to avoid
text: This street could have been highlighted by the authorities with a nice view of the Arco de Triunfo. It's not so. Shops catch tourists, bars and restaurants of very poor quality at exorbitant prices and beggars. The whole panoply of a street to avoid at all costs.

title: Skip this one! Loudest hotel ever
text:
You may have seen on their website that they claim to be soundproof. Throw that out the window. This is by far the loudest hotel I've ever been in.
You can hear external street noise (You're right next to the famous arch in Portugal so there's lots of street performers) but also the hotel itself is very loud. There's constant door alarms going off, door slamming, and we woke up to a bunch of drilling. The rooms are very small and the hotel doesn't have any amenities

title: Unpleasant
text: Street full of tourist traps of all kinds (restaurants, bars, souvenir shops made in China), beggars, street vendors, drug sellers and other touts. Too bad, this street offers a beautiful perspective on the arch, but the surrounding fauna makes wandering unpleasant.

title: Go your way
text: Street vendors, touts, beggars, scams, exorbitant prices, drugs, cripples... what more can I say. Go your way.

title: Go your way
text:
Avoid, not amazing.
Not much to see other than the main square and the arch. Lots of scams and restaurants trying to get you to come and rip you off

title: An unmissable street and yet‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs becoming catastrophic
text:
A must-see street in Lisbon to observe the arch of Pra√ßa do Com√©rcio, one of the best known in Lisbon and yet...
Restaurants are tourist traps, don‚Äôt go there.
Lots of street vendors who come to approach you.
Be careful of the parallel streets at night.. very poorly frequented... watch your belongings!

title: Disappointment
text:
The Portuguese are not as welcoming as I thought
If they want tourists to come or return, they need to stop raising prices and be more welcoming.

title: Van eten tot aan cannabis
text:
Leuke drukke winkelstraat waarin ook de nodige en restaurants zitten.
En waar je veel, heel veel aangesproken wordt door lui die je verdovende middelen willen verkopen. Van cannabis tot coca√Øne..je kunt het er allemaal kopen.
Dat doet echt afbreuk aan de omgeving waarin je bent.
Vandaar de twee sterren.

title: Cuidado com quem fica na rua oferecendo op√ß√£o para comer
text: A rua em si √© bem diversificada e movimentada, por√©m a nota ruim foi para alertar as pessoas que ficam te "pescando" nas esquinas oferecendo pratos com pre√ßos mais atrativos. No final, cobram um caixinha generoso e ainda querem o pagamento em dinheiro. Evite isso. Pergunte antes de entrar no estabelecimento (alguns nem tem nome na frente) e pergunte tudo que ser√° cobrada para evitar aborrecimentos.

title: Booking in advance is pointless and annoying
text: I actually would recommend this place, which I've visited several times, but the reason for the low stars is because they've introduced a ridiculous booking system where you can't just turn up and buy a ticket - as you could for years in the past - but have to book in advance. This is adding a layer of totally unnecessary complication and for people visiting from cruise ships, it's impossible. They need to go back to their original booking system of buying tickets on the door. Stop making things difficult.

title: Never Opened or Got In
text: I waited outside the site for it to open for 15 minutes and it never did. The door was locked but you could see staff inside. Either they did not open for the day or I needed to book well in advance. Still it seemed no one booked in advance for that time either since I was the only one waiting outside. Nowhere was anything explained and no one bothered to talk to me about how to get in. Very disappointing and unorganized way to run a site. Would not recommend.

title: Bad experience due to reckless and rude people
text: The worst boat tour I've done in my life, a boat without closed cabins and cold that got everywhere (4 of us got bronchitis) and without an audio guide to explain what we were seeing and without even anyone on the boat to do it. Horrible........not recommended

title: Disappointing
text: First they tried to cancel it when they reached the meeting point or suggested we join the tour in English, because it was just us. There is no indication that the implementation of the activity depends on the number of people who sign up. Finally we were 6 and made the tour. The slightly chaotic guide gave us brush strokes of things but without order or context. He mixed themes and we didn‚Äôt see all the ones indicated in the description of the activity. He recognized that he hadn‚Äôt done a tour for months....

title: MINIMUM TIP
text:
We tour with a Guide, Antonio of Spain. The explanations and the tour was fine. The problem came when he asked us for the tip for his work done at the end of the tour , we gave him 18 ‚Ç¨ and in front of the rest of participants he was outraged and made the derogatory comment that my family's tour was paying for him.
I don‚Äôt know the deals you have with the company that hired the free service and that is stated in the invoice without contracted charge.
According to the Antonio Guide we had to give him a minimum of ‚Ç¨40, why is that usually given.
If you had informed us before starting the tour about this forced tip we probably would not have gone.
The Pro part of his job was left under the shadow of his lack of education.

title: I will not repeat with this company
text: We did the visit with Cecilia and she left a lot to be desired and a lot to forget too, since her attitude was unprofessional at several times.

title: A real shame
text: The guide Cecilia knew about history, but she was rude and talked about money all the time, not at all empathetic. I haven't learned anything from Lisbon, except his opinion about not visiting St. George's Castle and that it had saved us money. Very bad experience

title: Primera decepci√≥n con los free tours de Sandeman
text: Primera decepci√≥n que tengo con Sandeman. No me gust√≥, me pareci√≥ una p√©rdida de tiempo y no me aport√≥ nada. No recomendar√≠a hacerlo con el gu√≠a que nos toc√≥ de nombre Vlado.

title: History lecture
text: I did the free walking tour with Jaime and initially it started well with a few key landmarks and interesting facts about Lisbon. As the tour carried on it become more of a history lecture on Portuguese invasion. Although informative the majority of people are here to find out about the local landmarks and any useful tips. Not a fun tour and it overan by 30mins !!!

title: Unprofessional behavior and poor customer treatment
text:
I experienced a disturbing situation in the face of this salon. After a previous treatment that did not give the desired effect, courteous and objective feedback was given shortly afterwards. The response from the therapist was that the effect could last several months. It was therefore expected in good faith, but unfortunately without any noticeable improvement.

Upon later contact to discuss a new treatment, as well as obtaining a professional assessment of why previous treatment did not work, I was met with aggressiveness and full rejection. Not only was the feedback ignored, but further treatment was also denied ‚Äì even by wanting to pay for a new hour. This appears to be unprofessional and very customer-friendly.

Based on this experience, it is recommended to assess other, more professional players who meet customers with respect and openness. Listening to the customer is a basic prerequisite in any serious treatment service.

title: Recommended noise-cancelling headphones
text:
The boat is very good.
The view of Lisbon at sunset too.
However, there is not enough table outside for everyone.

And the music has a dangerously high sound level. Even painful.

Service at the middle bar. Waiters who openly mock certain tourists
Too bad!

title: Boat is unsafe and bar tenders are not respectful
text:
Boat is unsafe and bar tenders are irrespectful

Security issues: the loud speaker is not attached can fall over you if you try to hang on to it when the boat is unstable

Irrespect from batmen: the sound of the music is far far too loud. You can Become deft. If you ask them to reduce they will laugh at you. They will not reduce the volume. And they look at you as if tou are crazy

Never come here.

title: Misadventure
text: Very disappointed.. catamaran cancelled the same morning. I was offered a similar service on a boat that had nothing and cost much less... And to compensate for the Award difference (no refund of differences) .I am told it will be open bar... Actually open bar on softs .. not even a cocktail offered... It really wasn't worth the Award Difference. Luckily the view was top..

title: The tour was canceled without prior notice
text: There was no tour, it was canceled without prior notice, we arrived at the place and everything was closed. Until now, without knowing what happened, it was paid on the card, without knowing how to go about requesting a refund. Bad experience!!!

title: "Special boat" - premium boat
text:
The experience was the worst I have,
I bought the ticket for special boat, that was what they said, and they present me a small catamaran with very bad conditions.
I don't recommended this trip.
It's my second time in Portugal and I recommend others companies to do this trip.

title: Not What We Booked
text:
While in Lisbon we booked a TukTuk of the old city. The individual we booked with said he would give us a 1 hour tour for 100 Euros. He met us at the specified time which was 6:30pm. After we got in he told us that it was a holiday (Corpus Kristie) and part of the tour was closed until 7:00 pm. That should have been my first red flag. For someone who provides tour should have known this and said we could have booked for 7:00. Instead he convinced us to take a different tour for $150 Euros. Said it was a much better. Well we seen 3 monuments. While our guide was extremely knowledgeable I believe he basically scammed us as there is no way that tour should have cost that amount. He then tried to convince us to take the old city tour the next. I was like Nope! Fool me once my bad as I will not
Be fooled a second time.
If you plan a TukTuk tour while in Lisbon do your REAEARCH!

title: Not Worth The Money
text: We were supposed to have a tour of the old city for an hour at 100 Euros. When we met our driver we were told that it was a holiday and a portion of the tour are was closed until 7:00pm and we could not access. We should have been told this when we booked. So he talked us into a different tour that was supposed to be better that would last 1.5 hours at a cost of 150 Euros. Since we had booked we felt obligated and it sounded good. While our tour guide was extremely knowledgeable we only went to 3 monuments. In our opinion we were scammed. Do your research before taking a Turk Tuk tours. This was our bad as we should have checked for reviews which we could not find. This had to be the most unpleasant of our 17 day Mediterranean vacation.

title: No visit due to Sintra sites constraints, no answer, no refund
text: Sintra sites were closed due to potential fire risk, all the tickets were refunded by the vendors, Scotturb is the only that neither answer to the refund request nor refunded tickets. Any further comment, terrible customer service. Not recommended at all.

title: Terrible experience ‚Äì dishonest pricing and overcrowded buses
text:
I took a Scotturb bus in Portugal and was extremely disappointed. The driver refused to sell the regular ‚Ç¨4 ticket, insisting that I buy the 24h pass for ‚Ç¨13.50. On their own website, this pass is listed at ‚Ç¨12, but the price on the bus is made to look like a discount (they cross out ‚Ç¨18 to make it seem like a deal ‚Äî it‚Äôs not).

To make things worse, the bus was completely packed, with people standing shoulder to shoulder for the entire ride. No comfort, no space, no respect for the advertised service.

A tourist trap on wheels. Avoid if you can ‚Äî especially if you expect fair pricing and basic travel conditions.

title: Unique and expensive offer
text: Going to Sintra know that you are captive! 1 fare now (13,5 ‚Ç¨ for unlimited 24 hours) but in itself, who makes the bus for 24 hours? We're all here to visit Pena. Unpleasant reception of controllers who placed themselves on the defensive immediately. All sheep!

title: Rather, if you can, go on foot
text:
One of the worst services I have ever used (so to speak) during a holiday.
The ticket office automatically issued the ‚Ç¨13.50 24h fare, without informing anyone of the possibility of making the single ticket.
The buses follow two different circuits dedicated to the two main attractions, so you can not go directly from one to the other (Palazzo de Pena and Quinta da Regaleira), but you should return to the base and take the other bus, wasting a lot of time and hoping that the bus will pass.
So a lot of us did it on foot.
In the early afternoon, after waiting in vain for 3 routes marked on the timetable, I ask for information and find that for that day the bus has stopped running.
Bottom line: I took advantage of only one ride for the "modest amount" of ‚Ç¨ 13,50!!!

title: DO NOT BUY.
text: The buses will not run if the parks are closed, we made it to Sintra in the morning, parks were closed due to overnight rain; there are no refunds. DO NOT BUY

title: Do not buy in advance
text: On March 13th, I bought two transport combos and tickets to the storehouse. They just didn't send me the tickets from the ranch. I called, advertised on the website, on Instagram, but it was not resolved. Don't buy. I bought in advance to enjoy my trip to Europe peacefully. But unfortunately because of this company I have to stay every day trying to solve without success. Absurd. Terrible disrespect to the consumer

title: DO NOT USE!!!
text: We bought tickets at the office. Caught the bus and got off at the first stop. We visited the castle & went back to the bus stop. Waited one and a half hours, no bus!!! Lovely Tuk tuk driver eventually took pity on us and drove us back to the train station, we‚Äôd wasted our day! Do not touch this company!

title: Avoid private alternatives
text:
A disastrous experiment. Frequency was not respected at all. Endless wait of over an hour. Driver pretending not to understand...
Avoid this service and even if it is more expensive, take a touk touk or use cars that offer the same service at the same price as a bus trip.

title: Onibus does not come every 5 min
text:
The buses don't go every 5 minutes, I'm more than 30 minutes in the rain and there's no bus coming.
Very bad experience, terrible!!!

title: Disappointing Experience in a Beautiful City
text:
I had high hopes for my visit to this stunning city, but unfortunately, my experience was marred by terrible transportation services. The drivers were rude and unhelpful, providing little to no assistance when we needed information.

To make matters worse, we purchased tickets to visit the palaces, only to find out that they were on strike that day. The staff sold us the tickets without informing us of this issue, which felt deceptive and dishonest.

I would advise others to be cautious when using this transportation service, as it seems to operate unethically. It's a shame that such a beautiful city is marred by such poor service

title: Just use local transportation
text: The 434 bus was fine, but only used it once. I did see quite a few of them. The 435 bus was near impossible to find. Waited about 25 minutes for it to show up. When it did, and after the people had exited the bus, an elderly man started getting on, at which point the driver shut the door on him, literally hitting the gentleman in the body and forcing him backwards. The driver then, without any interaction with the crowd waiting, got out of the bus and walked over to a group of other drivers and proceeded to have a conversation for about 10 minutes. Upon returning to the bus, he was unfriendly and unhelpful while he boarded the bus. He then proceeded to sit on the bus for another 5 minutes while he texted on his phone. We did get to our destination. Unfortunately, from that destination we simply could not find another 435 bus to continue our journey, and had to use a bolt. After completing that destination, we noticed the sign at the attraction informing us that the 435 was no longer in service to pick up from that location. This information would have been nice to know when we bought the tickets. So, again, had to use a bolt to get back to the train. All in all, for a 24-hour pass, we were only able to use the bus two times. I would not buy this ticket again and it would simply use the local transportation.

title: Combo ticket scam ‚ÄºÔ∏è
text: We bought a combo ticket online for a 24-hour hop-on, hop-off bus and entrance to Pena Palace. At first, everything seemed fine, but when we arrived at the palace, the staff wouldn‚Äôt let us in with those tickets. The tickets were sent as QR codes instead of barcodes, so security couldn‚Äôt scan them. Fortunately, there were still time slots available for the same day, so we were able to see the palace. However, we haven't received any response from the ScottURB team, not even saying about a partial refund‚Ä¶

title: Horrible!!!!!
text:
Bad, more than 1 hour waiting, bus 20 min to fill that not a can of tuna, bad service, bad price,
Horrible unthinkable an experience like this, I never imagined anything so bad

title: Horror!!! Terrible!!!
text:
Horror!!! Terrible!!! Horrible !! DO NOT GO!!
Bad experience long waiting , half an hour to fill the bus that not even a can of sardines !
Terrible, the worst experience worthy of a Steven King League

title: Ticket sellers are liars and lack any quality of usefulness.
text: Employees selling tickets lie through the teeth. They try to make you pay for the full day pass which is 4x the price of a normal bus ticket. The bus driver for the 434 line is in beds with the ticket sellers and just doesn‚Äôt do jack when asked a question. If anything just pay a fee with the individual taxi drivers cause it is still cheaper than the day pass.

title: Appalling
text:
Appalling service. Overcrowded buses.
Fictitious schedule. No bus for an hour then 3 show up.Complete waste of money. Simply not possible to hop on hop off. More like a hop on - rip off.

title: ABSOLUTE RUBBISH SAVE YOUR MONEY USE UBER
text: Well what can I say, I read a few reviews here and thought they can‚Äôt be that bad. How wrong I was. Absolute garbage apart from the odd decent driver. Don‚Äôt expect the 435 service to start until 10am from Sintra station. When you do get a bus like the 434 they are rammed full and you‚Äôll be standing, unless it‚Äôs the smaller 435 where it is ‚Äòillegal‚Äô to stand ü§î the services are few and far between, one bus drove past us empty and the driver just looked at us üò° had an argument with the 435 driver because we‚Äôd been waiting for ages and he wouldn‚Äôt let us stand on the smaller bus but it‚Äôs ok on the big ones. Save your money use UBER, it‚Äôs efficient and you know when and where they will come. Don‚Äôt pay the 13 euros for the day pass you‚Äôll use about two buses. Hopeless in every way, I really can‚Äôt stress how poor this service is, DONT BUY THEIR TICKETS YOU'LL REGRET IT.

title: Way too busy, Sintra completely overflowing, traffic infarction
text:
I arrived in Sintra by train from Lisbon. There was immediately a promotion team for the hop on hop off buses 434 and 435. But even though all alarms should have gone red (too many people, no coach but regular bus, completely flooded town, already stuck in traffic right after the station), I still fell for it. They offer a hop-on hop-off service, but since I was already 45 min on my way to the Pena castle in the morning and wanted to leave by 14:15 and had to wait 30 min for another bus and was only in Sintra city at 15:00, there is little interest left to get on again. There were so many people at the bus stop when I left Sintra that I just walked back to the train station.
I read somewhere that in the past there were 12000 visitors a day to the Pena castle, that is equivalent to 200 buses with 60 people, maybe even more. I would rather choose a tuk tuk oid next time, they drive around enough and are faster and more flexible.

title: Fraude
text:
1
Do not buy!!
They're doing a terrible service! Fraude

On 15/09/2024, all the monuments of Sintra were closed until 17/09 due to the risks of fire. The company also did not make the Trips by bus and I had bought the ticket over the internet! They refused to make the refund!
Absurd!!!

title: Ride faul
text: Absolute Trash, waited 30 minutes without a Bus comming. WhatsApp contact cant speak english. Do yourself a favor and skip this. Just use bolt or Uber to get to the castles

title: DISGUSTING
text: That sucks! Disorganized, unable to provide decent service, lines jumping all the time, 2 hours waiting for nothing. AVOID

title: Horrible experience worst service
text:
I don‚Äôt even know where to start, whether criticizing the poor condition of the buses or even worse customer service.

Buses as they sell them have 24h service and stop at the places of interest indicated on the map. Lie, the service ends at 18:30 and all they do is take a useless tour of Sintra, which with luck after more than 50 minutes and being locked up without air conditioning in the middle of August, takes you to the Castle of Pena. Sorry, I'm talking plural buses, when there's only one.

The driver could not be in the least interested in the stops he must respect, because in this experience even pressing the ‚Äòstop‚Äô button until we let him know that the bus stopped, he did not open the doors. Of course, I picked up people in lots that didn't fit in the vehicle because I guess money moves more than integrity.

Finally, of course we claim, which could not give more equal to the customer service since everything had an explanation and is that in the end it will be our fault that this service takes more than one negative reaction. Nothing to do with what they sell.

title: Don‚Äôt take these buses
text: The drivers are rude. Take a tuk-tuk. It's the best way to manage your time and money. The buses take too long to arrive and are a big waste of money for what they offer. Take whatever you want, just not these buses, you will regret it.

title: Scam
text:
The other comments describe well
Take the tac at 20 euros (you can negotiate at 10 or 15) the same price as the bus and you will arrive at your destination

title: Misleading advertising
text: It's supposed that line 434 ends at 7:00, with passes of 5 in 5', but that's not true. I waited at the stop next to the train station between 17:00 and 18:00, having stopped eight buses whose drivers informed me that they would be out of service. I moved to the services where they tried to convince me that at 17:25 a bus would have started the tour. If so, the driver lied to me because I questioned everyone who passed the mentioned stop.

title: Pessimo servizio costosissimo!
text: I do not recommend these means. Overpriced ticket(‚Ç¨13.50) to transport you from the station to the palaces! The town is tiny and there are Ubers and bolts much cheaper! Rude drivers on some rides. I absolutely advise against it. You can make a simple one-way ticket but as soon as you leave the station they block you and tell you there is only that chance. Ma non √® cos√¨! Sintra is one of the richest cities in Portugal thanks to the pockets of poor tourists!! Una vergogna! Avoid it

title: Sintra lovely, Scott Urb less so - explore other options for getting around
text:
after experiencing excellent public transport in Lisbon and the train to Sintra, I expected similar in Sintra. this was not the case. Booked Scott Urb Hop on , Hop off through expedia, and it was over crowded from the start. The services are massively over subscribed. Luckily it wasn't raining for us, but still had to wait a while for the bus, only for the driver to refuse us because he was already full. They need to sell less tickets and improve the service, not just keep selling capacity they are already well over.

Based on above, I would investigate other options, as the stress did ruin the experience.

title: Anscam
text: A word of advice, take a single ticket for 5 euros to go up to the Pena Palace and go back down on foot‚Ä¶ we paid 27 euros for two for an unlimited service and we could only take one bus because the 435 does not had only one vehicle and only passed every 40 minutes, we ended up walking because it was quicker. Avoid, catch tourists and everyone falls in, it's cheaper to take taxis if you don't want to walk there...

title: Terrible
text: Terrible, some tourists do not respect arrival order and cut line. Had to wait a lot, bus driver did not care to put order in the li ne

title: Don't use this bus
text:
Too bad, there are no buses they say they have, it takes more than an hour and is always full. It didn't stop for tourists at Quinta da Regaleira. Badly educated. Don't buy this ticket, use
Bolt or public bus.

title: WASTE OF TIME. DO NOT BOOK
text:
Give this a miss - Hop on hop off, more hop on and stand an wait ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ it took over 40 minutes to get from Sintra Station to Pena Palace on a crowded bus that didn‚Äôt leave at advertised time until it was crammed full. In fact it took so long to do one circular tour (434) - we never even had time to do the other (435)
Better off finding another way or just paying a single fare. WASTE OF TIME

title: Crappy service, cash grab, avoid at all costs
text:
If I could also give this a zero I would. All the previous reviews are correct in this being a tourist trap and crappy service. We ended up walking between at least 2 sites as 434 buses were constantly full. The bus schedule was not at all accurate, with us having to wait sometimes 30-40 min per bus.
The 435 line bus is basically the hunger games on wheels. It only seats 19, there was no bus rep so people just pushed and shoved to get on. Avoid!!! Avoid!!! AVOID!!!

title: I would look for another transport option
text:
Positive: polite drivers who showed care for passengers
As well as the ticket sales team, right outside the train station

Negatives:
-the value of 13.50 is too expensive, for lines 434 and 435, for the service delivered
-the map is wrong, with line 435 not passing by Palacio Nacional de Sintra (the map is out of date at all bus stops). The driver himself informed that the bus no longer makes this stop as a road is closed.
-line 435 has a very long interval, 30 minutes, while line 434 takes 5/5 minutes
-a bus that was on line 435, had a 434 sticker, as I just looked at the side I missed this bus and had to wait 30 minutes

The idea of the service is very good, they just need to prioritize customers and rethink effective and correct communication for them

title: The worst transport experience
text: The worst transport experience I ever had. Overpriced tickets with almost no options except 24h ticket for 13,5 Euro. If you don't need the day ticket, I think using a taxi is more convenient. By the bus 434 you can get to Pena and it is possible to buy one way tickets for 4.55 Euro from a driver, but you should repeat to the driver twice, because he is trying to sold you the day ticket. By the bus 435 they can't one way or return ticket, although on the site they mentioned about direct and return ticket for bus 435 for 6 euro, but don't provide it neither at office nor from the driver. It is cheaper to use public transport (for example 1253) with Zapping and make round trips, including Cabo de Roca.

title: Big scam
text: 13 euros 50 per person. The first bus (taken from the station) took us to the first stop. We then spent our time waiting for buses which did not pass, or did not stop because they were too busy. We had to do everything else on foot with the children on our backs. There were a lot of us tourists in this situation... to flee!

title: Transport scam in Sintra
text: A service of two buses offering tours to the sites to visit in Sintra, for 13‚Ç¨50 per person, to get off and back on wherever and whenever you want. In fact, it's a great scam, we wait for the buses for more than 3/4 of an hour, then we leave on foot... Extremely lousy service!!!

title: Would 100% Avoid
text: Waited at a bus stop for 40 minutes only to finally see our bus drive by without stopping. Signage showed we were in the right place, and the staff at the visitor center confirmed it. Ended up paying 9 Euros to an Uber to get us to the castle we had tickets for. When that castle closed we walked to the bus stop at 6pm since the brochure said the last bus runs at 6:30‚Ä¶looked at the sign there and if says the last pick up there is 5:15. That was not stated anywhere else, no times were given previously or other stops. Hopped on a random bus since we didn‚Äôt have phone service to find another option, so we then spent an hour on a bus getting motion sick as we had to go out of the way 45 minutes. So disappointed we went this route and weren‚Äôt served as promised.

title: Not worth is if you want info about the city
text: Though it is labelled as a hop on hop off, the bus is merely a fast shuttle that gets you quickly to various places to visit sites you should have researched before since there is absolutely no commentary of any kind. A better option is to book tuktuk or other small vehicle tours since they are more capable of getting you to places and answer questions...they can also park pretty much anywhere in those narrow streets.

title: Tourist trap
text: Very efficient ticket sales at the station. This is where the advantages of service end. no timetable information at stops. The lines towards Pena Castle (734) serve larger buses, so there is no problem with getting there, but the 735 lines serve small buses and it is not possible to board at the stops near the castles. Buses run very rarely, so even if you have a ticket, you may have to use an Uber or a tuk tuk.

title: They rob you on line 434 to Castillo da Pena
text: Disastrous experience on the Pena Palace bus line 434, they have deceived us in our face with the tickets, the bus driver, I asked him for 4 round trip tickets to the palace and he sold me 4 24 hour passes, the difference The thing is that a single ticket is ‚Ç¨4.10, there is no round trip ticket. They sell you a 24-hour pass that costs ‚Ç¨13.50 without informing you, you realize it inside the bus, you inform the driver of the error and it doesn't matter, they do nothing to solve it, they lie to your face saying that they informed you, they send you to the bus office. company at the train station, when you go to the office they tell you with all their might that a round trip ticket is a 24 hour pass, I answer that if they think we are stupid, if they don't exist they don't exist, but fool the people with another product, I have come to think that the driver works on commission of the deceptions they make. A very unfortunate experience that ruins your day, not because of the ‚Ç¨22 they steal from you, but because of the way they laugh in your face and the helplessness it generates in you.

title: Worst experience I had in Sintra
text:
Worst experience I've had. Very expensive, Rude, rude and without any training. I don't recommend it to anyone.
I recommend other transport options

title: Tourist trap and employees peddle tickets.
text:
This is a tourist trap.
As soon as u get off the train they r located outside the train station. Withh all the confusion and people u think u need to get on the bus but you don't .

Walk a block away and you will find public transport.

The employees are rude just peddling tickets.

Expensive and a tourist trap. No set time. Green route does not run all the time.

title: abuse,
text:
abuse....., yes more
On their website they indicate that there is a fee of 7.60 Euros to go and return to Palacio da Pena. We get to the bus and it tells us the rate is 13.50 per person (there are 4 of us), for the complete tour but 7 euros just to go to Castelo de Pena. I insist that I want the rate of 7.6 for going and returning, and he tells me that this rate is only for groups of more than 25 people (which he was not going to give me), that either we pay 13.5 for the tour or I stayed on the ground. We were afraid of not getting there because of the famous traffic jams that there are, in the end a robbery of 54 euros, standing, with a milk jam and the feeling that we were being kidded. I went to the palace, it's sad, and to the quinta da regadeira, now I think the best option is, Uber, tuk tuk, or cars with drivers, 20 or 25 euros per trip, you can get it, that's if no one can take it away from the traffic jam. One to go up to the Da Pena Palace and the other to go from there to Quinta da Regadeira, from there you walk back to the National Palaces (almost flat and 10 minutes), 5 minutes to the train station and 10 minutes to any parking lot you took in Sintra.

title: Expensive and bad
text: Bus packed, it took us 50 minutes to make the trip, we almost lost the tickets to the Pena Palace, everything has been complaints, VERY EXPENSIVE, in the end we did not make transfers so as not to waste time on the road. It's not worth it, better to take private transportation.

title: Tourist trap
text:
Tourist trap, low frequency, no fixed schedule. You are better served on other transport services. Note that there are 3 bus companies offering similar services. Count on low frequency and no fixed schedule to get you organised and catch the next bus.

Some casteles are just a few min walk from eachother. For the longer distances, boog a private casr and share costs with fellow visitors. You'll get better service and be cheaper off.

title: Shameful and awful
text:
Absolutely avoid.
The most beautiful scam I have encountered despite my numerous trips around the world.
How can a town hall allow such a situation to persist, giving such a bad image to its city and its country?
Unless she too is part of this disastrous organization that is ruining your day.

title: Everything is bad
text:
If I could give a rating below zero, I would give it that. Very bad.
Everything is bad.
As for tickets, the only ones that we were told could be purchased were those for 12.50 which include the 434 and 435 route (otherwise around 4 euros for one stage, around 7 euros for the return trip). The 434 stops at Castello dos muros, Palacio de la Pena and the historic centre, the 435 makes another tour which includes Quinta de Regaleira (Quinta Regaleira can easily be reached on foot in 10 minutes from the historic centre; Palacio de La Pena can be reached in walk from Castello dos muros, but it is slightly uphill).
The 435 is a legend: everyone has heard of it, no one has ever seen it! The worst thing was turning to assistance, a grumpy girl who spoke to us in English and Portuguese to her colleague thinking she wasn't understood, and to the complaints about the fact that we had bought 25 euros worth of tickets but had only used them once once because the bus hadn't passed, he replied "you made the wrong stop".
Now, although I'm a foreign country, as far as possible, don't understand everything 100%, but if you allow me, "at least" I can read the numbers!
Highly not recommended!

title: Very bad experience
text: Bad experience with buses that don't run as per the indicated time, the 435 line which should take a different route from the 434 and allow you to see attractions not covered by the 434 route is completely non-existent with people, even elderly people, waiting for 1 hour and 30 minutes then forced to go on foot. I highly recommend the single route to the Moorish castle and then walking to the Pena palace (the distance is short although with a difference in altitude) and then moving from Pena to the historic center from where it is possible to go on foot (about 7/8 minutes) to the Regaleira (worth the visit) then from here consider whether to take another bus or go on foot (about 7/8 minutes); alternatively there are private tours for 10 euros or taxi-type tours for 5 euros each way. I highly recommend this last option, perhaps slightly more expensive (2.50 euros total in my case) but which saves you from wasting a long time waiting for these ghost buses. PS: while I was at the stop several people tried to contact the number indicated on the tables which was disconnected and I went to their office in front of the station without receiving any assistance (I also missed the scheduled train due to this delay and was forced to wait for a another hour).

title: Awful experience - wish I could give them a zero
text:
This group is immediately on the left when you come out of train station. (Everyone seemed to be going this way). Wish we had known to go right to public buses.

Staff was rude. Explained nothing, except that you could pay for an all day ticket right there in line. No options. It was way too expensive for the one trip we wanted, but we did it. They packed people on the bus like sardines‚Ä¶.many standing. It took us a miserable hour to get up to the Pe√±a Palace. No information about what we were passing.

When we finished with the Pe√±a Palace we came back out to look for one of these buses. Nothing! Finally took a public bus (434, I think) back to the train station.

What a ripoff!

title: Terrible service
text: Terrible! They don‚Äôt show up timely and the bus is too full for everyone to get on when they do. Do not use.

title: Very badly.
text:
Slow and expensive. Since there is no other option, they do what they want.

A 15 minute trip takes more than 1 hour. And we lose the entrances to the palace.

0 information

title: Beware of scammers
text:
They shamelessly exploit their monopoly position. There are two "pimps" standing in front of the bus at the station who lie like crazy. Apparently there is only the ‚Ç¨15 ticket. The single trip for ‚Ç¨4.10 or the return trip for ‚Ç¨7.60 is apparently only available for groups of 45 people or more. Literally: "Are you 45 people?" Then the single ticket supposedly costs ‚Ç¨10. After 5 minutes of discussion I finally got the ticket for ‚Ç¨4.10 and was even able to pay with a credit card.
These scammers should be put to a stop. I will complain to the tourist board.
If something similar happens to you, please complain officially.

title: Don't ride this bus. Waste of money.
text:
Bus, when or if it shows up, was always full. Rode it exactly twice before giving up and just walking.
Do yourself a favor, skip Pena (its way too crowded) and take a tuck tuck to the Moorish castle then walk downhill to historic Sinatra. Had a nice meal there and enjoyed shopping.

title: No kindness
text:
A most unpleasant welcome, no friendliness due to the language barrier.
She absolutely wanted to sell us the ticket for 24 hours, even though we wanted a simple round trip to the Pe√±a Palace.

title: Do not use this company!!!
text:
The company that carried out the transport previously charged around 2.5 euros. This company is offering the tour for 12.5 euros in a bus without air conditioning. All the passengers, including elderly people, felt sick due to the temperature of this garbage bus. It's better to go there and back by Uber or Tuktuk, paying 20 to 30 euros, than using this pathetic company.
Driver was extremely rude and rude and drove without any care.
Anyway, don't spend 1 cent with this company.

title: SCAM ALERT!!! You will not get anything but ripped off.
text: This outfit is pure SCAM. I wasted 22 Eu on a fraud. Please stay away. I will contest w credit card and report to tourist police. They have one miserable bus that will not be there. It runs every hour, but I never saw it after ride up. Pay less and get the regular tourist bus, runs every 15 min. Or take a cab, or call a Uber or anything but these clowns. There is some inane narration that works at some seats. The bus driver is no help at all and super grumpy. They sell hard, tell you it‚Äôs a great idea and you will be out of your money fast and WILL have to look for plan B rides. I ended up walking mostly and paying for my tickets w another bus. It‚Äôs a rip off. Don‚Äôt even think about it! I wish I had known. Feel so stupid wasting my money.

title: Do not us! Get an uber / tuk tuk/ anything else
text: Absolute rip off - can‚Äôt hop on hop off as they are full!! 12.5 euros each? It‚Äôs 5 euros for an Uber down from castle. And - Pe√±a castle - interesting from outside but inside is a stately home you shuffle through in a constant queue of people. Underwhelmed

title: Bad choice. You buy it and can't use it.
text:
We bought it, paid 66 euros for 3 adults and we were very angry because at the exit of Pal√°cio Pena (1st point we visited) we waited for 65 minutes and the bus DID NOT ARRIVE. We had to pay +8 euros to go from the Palace to the center of the historic town.
THE SERVICE does not work because the traffic in Sintra is a mess. Chaotic and has zero supervision. Tuktuks are very popular, they stop anywhere and exploit tourists without mercy. Other than that, there are carriages, taxis, regular buses, several tourist buses, Ubers, private cars providing illegal transport. In short, a real mess that makes the visit a hassle. A shame because the place is beautiful, but impossible to recommend.

title: Seriously incorrect behavior
text: Once we arrived in Sintra, we tried to buy the ‚Ç¨7.60 tickets (return to the Pena palace) but the ticket sellers refused, saying that they could only sell the ‚Ç¨12.50 ones. I went to their office and threatened to call the police, they issued tickets. It really seems like a serious impropriety that perhaps the local authorities should check.

title: DO NOT BUY TICKETS!!!
text: Do not buy tickets for this bus. Bus timetables states 20 minutes, but in reality it takes over an hour for pick up. When they do show up, buses are too small and full to pick anybody up.

title: Round trip ticket. No tour 12'50.
text:
BE ATTENTIVE!!!!
They sell you the tour for ‚Ç¨12.50 to get on and off the bus as many times as you want.
The normal thing is that you go up and down one. They have a ticket for ‚Ç¨7.60 round trip to Da Pena.
The sellers will charge you directly for ‚Ç¨12.50. You have to tell him that you only want the other.

title: Scam and assault
text:
The experience with this transport company has been terrible. In short, a consumer scam with false information on the web, terrible and dangerous transport conditions for the client, impossible waiting times to access tourist attractions, and finally a cocky, threatening attitude that ends in attacks on their own clients. . INTOLERABLE.

We start with the purchase of the tickets, they do not give the possibility of buying the simplest tickets of a trip, but rather they force the purchase of the full-day ticket, this being 3 times the value of the single trip. The information offered on the website is not real.

After purchasing the tickets, we found a climb to the palace worth more than 1 hour, which made it impossible for us to buy tickets to the palace for that day. In their pamphlet it is supposed that the bus takes 15 minutes to get to the palace stop.
Once we decided to go down, to try to see other attractions, the waiting time for the arrival of the bus exceeded an hour, when they themselves in emails after the complaint indicated that the times are usually 30 minutes even if they are not done traffic charge in the area.

Once on the buses, conditions do not improve. Lack of air conditioning in the middle of summer, full buses with no space to move or get off at stops. One of the buses was rubbing the bottom of the car against the ground due to the weight it was carrying. The truth is that it is really dangerous to travel in these conditions on such a narrow road with curves and pedestrians..... Little happens to them.

As for the drivers, they are unpresentable, with a deplorable attitude towards the customer, aware of the scam they offer and wanting to laugh at those of us who suffer from it.
When trying to get on a bus on the way down from the palace, the driver did not allow us to pass, to which we complained because he had already passed us before and we had been waiting for more than an hour to get off. The driver's response was to yell at the bus saying it wasn't going to start, encouraging the rest of the bus to get off. Faced with this situation, we threatened to call the police because the screams he was making were not acceptable, to which he justified himself by saying "I'm the professional, I've been doing this for 20 years", the truth is that now it makes me laugh that boasts of professionalism. Seeing that there was no point in dealing with this person, we got off the bus to shouts and expletives from the passengers, encouraged by the driver. When I claimed it, the driver closed the door, hitting my partner and running away, doing an act of bravery and a clear demonstration of the attitude and intentions of this mafia.

Finally, we went to the company's office to file the claim. We asked for the complaint form, which we wanted to take to the police to write it up and let them know the treatment received.
The lady who served us refused to give us the sheet if we took it with us. Finally, after arguing, he gave it to us and when he was about to leave, he left the office to snatch the sheet from me and shove us out of the store with insults. UNHEARD is the treatment received by this company, which takes advantage of tourists

title: Appalling
text: Shame driver and receptionist. They don't help, they are rude and on top of paying a real outrage the only thing they tell you is to take the next one. I have had to wait for 2 days and I have been there for more than 1 hour and a half to try to catch a bus for which I had already paid, every day mind you. Terrible service and treatment.

title: Fraud company cheaters
text:
Fraud company , overcharges , rude staff
Don‚Äôt travel with them avoid
They overcharge you instead of listed fare of 7.5 dollars they charge you maximum fare

title: Scammed and attacked
