text: I do not recommend taking these buses at all. We went on 08/08/2023 in the morning to buy round-trip tickets, which is indicated on their website. The woman who was there told us that these tickets were only for groups (which is false since the website does not refer to groups), and that she only sold us the full-day ticket for ‚Ç¨12.50 per person. My husband told him that he should give us those bills and a complaint form. She started shouting expletives and refused to sell us the tickets or give us the complaint form. When I saw that things were getting ugly I started to record it and when she saw me she came towards me like crazy and tried to snatch the phone out of my hands. We were struggling because I couldn't let go of my phone, I was totally out of my mind. Between my husband and a bus driver, they managed to get me to let go and he forced me to delete the video in which it was seen how he scammed and insulted us. My hands were covered in scratches. A person in these conditions is not qualified to work in front of the public. It's a shame to go visit such a beautiful place and be treated that way. Scammed, verbally and physically attacked. In short, life will take care of giving you what you deserve. Conclusion: better to take a tuk tuk.

title: Not a Hop on Hop off service.
text:
OK, so not the hop on hop off experience that most expect, Firstly, we were very quickly loaded onto the bus, No seats available, then kept standing there for a further 10 minutes as more people were packed onto the bus, to the point you felt like the fish in tins that are so loved in Lisbon. The bust started on the journey, to wherever it was, because no information was given by the driver, At one point he said "Garden", as if this was somehow relevant information, and two people got of, 5 more got on making an already uncomfortable trip even more so. We went to the moreish castle, very impressive, But Im still not sure it was worth the extra ‚Ç¨45 we had paid to get there, the ‚Ç¨22 entry was worth it though.

Pick a number of passengers, and stick to it, Far too many people on the bus to make it an enjoyable experience.

title: Vente forc√©e
text: Surtout, si vous ne voulez faire que Pena, ne pas acheter de ticket dans le bus, ils vous arnaquent en vous faisant croire que le seul ticket possible est un 24h pour 12‚Ç¨50 ! Il faut aller au bureau de vente de la compagnie situ√© en face de la gare. L√† il faut encore demander pour avoir seulement un aller √† 4,10‚Ç¨ par personne sinon ils vous vendent le billet 24h. Les chauffeurs de bus ne renseignent pas du tout, ils doivent √™tre pay√©s √† la commission !

title: Worst experience ever
text: THIS IS THE WORST! First of all, it costs a whopping ‚Ç¨15,00. The busses simply don‚Äôt show up. We waited hours, but not a single sign of a bus. When you‚Äôre extremely lucky and manage to see a bus, they just drive by with a half-empty bus. Do yourself a favor and take a taxi or tuk-tuk. AVOID THIS COMPANY COMPLETELY!

title: Don't, just don't
text: Most terrible service ever!! First off all it costs 15.00 euro per person. Its not worth your money, they just dont show up or drive past without any notice. We had to walk most of the time because of it. Please do yourself a favour and take a taxi or tuk tuk......

title: Pessima esperienza
text:
Pessima esperienza! Volevo visitare Montserrate Palace e ho acquistato il biglietto da ‚Ç¨ 15.00 tanto pubblicizzato.
Sono salita alla stazione di Sintra, sul bus 435. L'autista ha sparato a mille la musica: assordante e sgradevole. Non ha fatto fermate e ci ha riportati, dopo un lungo giro, alla stazione di Sintra.
Alle lamentele dei turisti, increduli e arrabbiati, ha risposto che Montserrate era chiuso.
E perch√© non √© stato detto o segnalato fin dell'inizio? Perch√© dovrebbe essere interessante fare un giro a vuoto?
Ho perso soldi, tempo e non ho potuto vedere nulla.

title: Kein Verlass!
text: Ich w√ºrde den Bus auf keinen Fall mehr buchen. Es ist einfach kein Verlass. Wir haben √ºber eine Stunde auf den Bus gewartet und haben deshalb den bereits bezahlten Eintritt in den Monserrate Palast verpasst. Eigentlich sollte er alle 20 Minuten fahren. F√ºr die paar Kilometer, die man mit dem Bus zur√ºcklegt sind 15 Euro auch viel zu viel. Nehmt besser ein TukTuk, die sind flexibel und auf Zuruf verf√ºgbar.

title: P√©simo servicio y caro
text: P√©simo servicio y caro. Tienen publicidad enga√±osa porque no sube al palacio de la pena como pone ah√≠, pero lo peor es que no recogen al cierre de los palacios. Un conductor nos ha dicho que cada media hora pasaba una y hemos estado esperando una hora y no ha pasado ninguno. Una verg√ºenza de servicio.

title: Poor service on bus 435 in Sintra
text: We took bus 435 to shuttle between the Regaleira Palace, the Monserrate Palace, and the Sintra train station. There was no published schedule in the brochure. We have to wait a long time for the bus at each stop. The bus was also very crowded being a small bus. it was not a pleasant experience.

title: Scandaleuse arnaque !
text:
Tout d‚Äôabord, je d√©conseille le d√©placement vers Sintra.
Le voyage en train est assez d√©primant, qui traverse des banlieues, absolument sinistres, noy√©es sous le b√©ton.
Sintra √©tait peut-√™tre autrefois un joli petit village, dans un espace montagneux verdoyant.
Victime de son succ√®s, ils est tr√®s difficile de s‚Äôy d√©placer √† pied ou sur les petites routes, totalement encombr√©es par les autocars de tourisme, les tuk tuk et les automobiles.
La visite du village lui-m√™me n‚Äôa pas grand int√©r√™t, les ruelles √©troites sont noy√©es sous les flots de touristes qui se ruent dans les multiples √©choppes, qui vendent des souvenirs frelat√©s, fabriqu√©s √† des millions d‚Äôexemplaires‚Ä¶
Le pire, c‚Äôest le ticket de 15 ‚Ç¨ que la compagnie de bus vous vend pour faire le tour des diff√©rents ch√¢teaux √† visiter.
Le jour o√π nous sommes venus, le 9 juin, nous nous sommes acquitt√©s du prix de ce transport, et nous sommes mont√©s dans le bus, sans que la personne charg√©e de vendre les tickets n‚Äôait pris la peine de nous informer que tous les ch√¢teaux, √† l‚Äôexception d‚Äôun seul, √©tait ferm√©s, en raison d‚Äôune gr√®ve‚Ä¶
Quelle malhonn√™tet√© !
Comme les autres, nous avons donc parcouru un trajet interminable √† l‚Äôallure d‚Äôun escargot , (bien que tr√®s court en kilom√®tres), en pure perte, puisque nous n‚Äôavons pu rien visiter.
J‚Äôai √©crit √† la compagnie pour √™tre rembours√© de ses billets.
J‚Äôattends toujours la r√©ponse‚Ä¶
A la lumi√®re de mon exp√©rience, je mesure combien Sintra doit √™tre un v√©ritable enfer pendant la haute saison touristique, en juillet ao√ªt.
√âpargnez -vous surtout cette peine !
Aller plut√¥t visiter l‚Äô√©glise Notre-Dame de Lorette des Italiens , √† Lisbonne, c‚Äôest une merveille incroyable, qu‚Äô on ne soup√ßonnerait pas si on n‚Äô√©tait pas pouss√© par la curiosit√© de pousser la porte.
Et c‚Äôest gratuit !

title: GARBAGE
text: The buses were nonexistent on certain routes, paid expensive and still had to walk. Terrible company.

title: Avoid at all costs. Take local transport or tuk tuk instead.
text:
If i could rate it zero i would. Utterly misleading. Buses anyways cramped, the guardrails were broken in two if the buses. Instead of letting passengers know, the driver stood there laughing every time someone tripped on the rail. Drivers deliberately give misinformation - when asked where to take 435 bus, they said go to next stop - no such stop.
Just take local transport and support the economy than this lying pos company. The tuk tuk drivers were much more honest and forthcoming with information.

title: BEWARE‚ö†Ô∏è
text: BEWARE! Make sure castles are opened as strikes have occurred randomly without notice at all castles except the Quinta da Regaleira for the past few months. When the bus sales ticket agent was questioned she responded, ‚ÄúI sold you a ticket for a bus, not for castle admission.‚Äù Hundreds, if not thousands of tourists were stuck in long lines at closed castles trying to get a return seat. Shameful business practices. Perhaps they are preparing for Boca de Inferno?

title: Lied to for an over priced bus ride
text: DO NOT LIE!!! Over crowded buses and they said entry into the palaces was included in the price, it was not! Labelling the buses public is misleading, commentary is NOT worth the extra money AVOID, AVOID AVOID

title: Un servizio pessimo
text: Abbiamo pagato l'abbonamento giornaliero chiedendo anticipatamente il servizio offerto e ci √® stato detto che vi erano 15 bus che giravano continuamente passando ogni quindici minuti da ogni stazione. Preso il primo bus non siamo pi√π riusciti ad usufruire del servizio in quanto i bus o non si fermavano perch√© pieni o non passavano proprio.

title: Ripoff
text: Appalling customer service. They knew there were road works so only one route open but sold tickets for both. And then refused to give a refund despite drivers saying there eoukd be no bus

title: Mauvaise exp√©rience
text:
Mauvaise exp√©rience
On pensait que la gare de Sintra √©tait en face du parking gratuit P1N
En fait la gare de Sintra o√π l'on peut prendre les bus 434 et 435 pour les palais de la Pena et quinta de la regaleira est √† 15 mn √† pied en direction du centre de Sintra.
Nous avons attendu le bus 434 ( arr√™t de bus mat√©rialis√©) pour le palais de la Pena pendant 1/2 h avant de se rendre compte que l'arr√™t √©tait en fait 50m plus loin ( plusieurs bus √©taient pass√©s devant nous sans s'arr√™ter). Quand nous avons fait remarquer que l'on avait attendu √† l'arr√™t marqu√© 434 on nous a retorqu√© que le v√©ritable arr√™t √©tait celui ci !!!
Apr√®s la visite du palais de Pena nous sommes revenus devant la gare pour prendre le bus pour la quinta de la Regaleira ; pas de chance une partie du parcours du bus n'√©tait pas accessible et nous avons du reprendre le bus 434 qui nous a laiss√© √† l'arr√™t Quinta de la Regaleira mais qui demande une marche de 15 mn pour acc√©der au site.
Beaucoup de temps de perdu et avec un co√ªt √©lev√© pour le forfait bus journ√©e √† 11,5 ‚Ç¨ par personne.

title: Autob√∫s 434 a Pena muy caro
text: Enga√±an al turista , en la misma estaci√≥n de Sintra donde se toma el autob√∫s 434 para subir a sintra , paran taxis y tuc tucs , el taxi cuesta LO MISMO el trayecto y puedes decirle a m√°s gente si quiere subir contigo y compart√≠s gastos , no vay√°is en bus , son 11'50 por persona , es un robo , el taxi cuesta lo mismo y si sub√≠s 4 personas saldr√©is a 3 euros,

title: Do yourselves a favor and take a cab
text: On paper, the idea is great. There is an affordable hop on hop off service, running every 20 minutes, taking you to all Sintra s landmarks. Then you arrive and pay for the ticket and wait 50 minutes for the bus to arrive. It arrives. The driver parks and tells you they'll be back in 5 minutes. You wait another 10 minutes. The driver arrives. Finally you go. Then your visit is over. It's five thirty pm on 3 January. It is chilly. You start waiting for the bus and it arrives AT SIX TWENTY (and remember, there is supposed to be one every 20 minutes) and the driver tells you that it is better if you walk, because he would like to keep the space on the bus for people at the further stops and walking it is only 15 minutes. Now. Letting aside that if I could have walked I would have. I am not giving zero stars because it's not possible. I would demand my money back if I could. Next time I'm taking a cab.

title: Unfortunately bad experience and for me not worth the price...! Shouldn't be sold like that.
text: Unfortunately, I was blinded by the reviews. Contact with the owner was nice and friendly. Unfortunately, the tour was a total disaster. But that was probably more down to the captain of the day. It's more about speeding over the waves in a Zodiac (speedboat) and, with a bit of luck, spotting a dolphin or two. There are no real seats on the Zodiac, you sit alongside on benches and half of the people don't have a backrest. So far, OK. On our day, however, the waves were relatively high and the captain didn't care whether you got completely wet from the boat hitting the waves at full speed or whether you sprained your spine. After I complained, the captain threatened to leave me on a deserted island in the bay of Lisbon. But he didn't do that and just drove back to the harbor. The owner called after the tour and tried very kindly to clarify the situation and said he would get back in touch later, which I actually really liked. Unfortunately, the second call didn't come... My conclusion: This isn't about dolphin watching, but rather "speedboating" for too high a price. And there was definitely no marine biologist on board!

title: Over priced and under delivered
text:
We booked this tour partly based on the photos that the company posted on their webpage . Nothing could have been further than reality. The food was minimal. You only got half a Befana which was in all honesty quite bland - compared to one we ate in Porto . The ‚Äúmeal‚Äù:we had a the restaurant was ok but minimal . There was no cheese as shown in the advertising, the cured ham was one small piece rather than the plate of ham in the photos . We then had 1 croquette each which was half the size of a golf ball, a small slice of toast with a sardine , the ‚Äúsurprise dish‚Äù which to be honest was hardly surprising.
We then went to another location and had syrup soaked fig then to another location for the tart which was probably the highlight of the tour.
We left the tour quite underwhelmed.
We paid $300 AUD this money could have been better spent at a traditional restaurant, we would have been very satisfied and with change in our pocket.

title: There are better tours
text:
Lacked direction, food was minimal at best, the cost and delivery did not match a bit rushed and some facts told
Did not what was written.

title: Grossly overpriced....
text: Vanda was a wonderful guide, great knowledge and food was good. Issue is the price. It is greatly overpriced. I chose a more expensive one specifically because I expected a more high quality experience at off hours (4-7 and thus a "happy hour" discount). $83euros/person + tip for half a pork sandwinch (whole sandwich us $3 eu), a piece of cheese and portuguese ham, a light dinner and a pasties da nata and espresso, is way too much. Live and learn.

title: Worst company to deal with
text: One of the worst companies I had to deal with in Portugal. My daughter and I were not able to adapt on segway uphill - we requested to switch it to tuk tuk option, they agreed on that. Our original tour was 3 hour and it says on the site the time starts only after the customers are adapted to the segway. But they only gave us 2 hour tour claiming that we wasted their time adapting to the segway. Also, claiming that we requested them to stop the tour in 2 hours. I will never deal with companies who like to take advantage and make dimes off frauding the tourists.

title: not what we expected as far as customer service and punctuality
text: the driver/guide did not arrive on time; he was rude and after getting in the van he was rude to one girl of our group; this made us get off the van and not take the tour.

title: tr√©s mauvaise exp√©rience
text:
endroit tr√©s decevant, √† √©viter √† tous prix
Prix excessifs pour repas mauvais
Chanteurs et musiciens au top mais prestation trop courte et ponctuelle

title: Fine but could be much better
text:
The location of the bar itself is great and it isn't expensive. The staff was pleasant, although I wasn't a fan of one of the bartenders.
I find it unprofessional to be frequently on the phone with headphone and speaking arabic during the shift, and worse, making video calls, which can easily record us clients while we would prefer to keep our privacy.
I personally found it quite disrespectful.

title: Boring
text: Not very helpfull Not intrested boring no Wonder there was nobody in the bar i try one more time on Friday and see what‚Äôs happening if tey only wake up Wehen is busy

title: Atendentes grosseiros e xen√≥fobos
text: Fui diversas vezes ao Shelter e gostava muito. Apesar de saber da j√° famosa grosseria e xenofobia do staff nunca tinha sido de fato mal atendido. Por√©m ontem √† noite tive uma p√©ssima experi√™ncia. Estava com mais 4 amigos, havia pouca gente no bar pois estava chovendo, e ao fim ficou s√≥ o nosso grupo. Os funcion√°rios ent√£o resolveram fechar, apesar de estarmos todos ainda com copos cheios de cerveja, que haviam acabado de nos vender, acenderam as luzes e tiraram a m√∫sica. Entendemos que era hora de ir embora, apesar de ser muito antes do hor√°rio normal de fechamento do bar. Pedimos copos descart√°veis para levar ent√£o a cerveja rec√©m comprada e ao sair vimos que estava chovendo muito forte. Pedimos para ficar na entrada do bar enquanto esper√°vamos nossos ubers, mas o funcion√°rio simplesmente disse n√£o e bateu a porta, nos deixando debaixo de um pequeno toldo com uma chuva torrencial. Por sorte um de n√≥s tinha um guarda chuvas, e conseguimos nos abrigar minimamente no toldo e chamar nossos carros. Passados alguns minutos o outro funcion√°rio do bar abriu a porta e disse que ia recolher o toldo! Ou seja, ia nos deixar na chuva forte! Por sorte os ubers chegaram logo, sen√£o ter√≠amos ficado encharcados por pura maldade dos funcion√°rios do bar. No m√≠nimo ir√¥nico em um lugar que se chama SHELTER e se diz um ambiente acolhedor.

title: Mix of crap music and nasty staff
text: Went there to have a good time, instead got crap music and nasty staff. Not planing to go back anytime soon

title: Poor
text: The staff had great communication when booking an appointment. I went for a relaxing massage with oil. The massage room was quite nosy as it was close to the entrance and there was only a curtain as separation. The massage was quite vigorous despite me asking for relaxing. I ended up with swollen and painful temples as a result of the head massage section. I was also quite disappointed when the masseuse walked out abruptly during the massage to serve another customer. This time was not reclaimed. Not really what I was expecting.

title: Avoid for dinner!
text:
Overpriced for ordinary quality (we eat just as well or better in a regular sushi place around the corner, but for 5 times less expensive)

No seasoning, ‚Ç¨12 for 2 gyozas, ‚Ç¨6 for a carafe of tap water, ‚Ç¨26 for a small bowl of dry rice with 4 small slices of salmon on top...

Oppressive and cold service (surprising but true)

We pay for the view and the decoration.

Go as far as possible to have a drink with a view, because the cocktails are good.

title: A disappointment
text:
Great view of the city.
Nice service.
Below average food at prices that were beyond good and evil.
Would definitely not recommend this place for dinner.

title: NOT WORTH IT
text:
Service leaves something to be desired, the price is absurdly incoherent, I've been to several in Lisbon such as SUD, Sala de Corte, Brilhante among others. I don't mind paying a higher price but it needs to be very good. Paying a lot for nothing doesn't make sense, so it's worth warning because this place despite a beautiful view (the only thing) is outdated music... it's not worth it. The portions are mega small and the prices are super high, famous as ‚Äútourist catch‚Äù.

I'll leave a photo of the chicken kebab that costs ‚Ç¨15 and the pieces are smaller than an olive ü´í(I said I wouldn't pay) they removed the price but it costs ‚Ç¨15.

title: very bad
text: very bad place small menu card no stock of things on the menu very bad experience not recommended

title: Just OK and overpriced
text: Not as impressive as they like to think. Sushi was OK. Overpriced. Service was OK. Great view but unfortunately that's the only thing really positive about this place. Which was disappointing as I pre booked weeks before my trip to Lisbon. Lots of nicer places so don't waste your money here.

title: Overpriced
text:
Too overpriced, not great sushi. The experience was disappointing.
Drinks were okay. View is nice but there are much better rooftops

title: Bad "meal"
text:
The worst meal ever!
Expensive and I just thought it was bad but at least I hoped it wouldn't hurt me.
I don't recommend it to anyone for meals!

title: Notable dislike
text: Good food, nothing extraordinary, but with the exception of the collaborator Nuno, a notable dislike. I do not recommend.

title: odd
text: We went for late night drinks and the vibe was strange. Entry is via a dingy lobby and elevator. My mojito was warm and tasted horrible - expensive too. We left quickly as there was a strange atmosphere - which was hard to pinpoint.

title: Fomos expulsos por n√£o terem clientes
text:
Absolutamente terr√≠vel! Eu e os meus amigos decidimos dar uma oportunidade ao Silk Bar Rooftop, mas fomos tratados com total desrespeito e desprezo. Pag√°mos a exorbitante quantia de 20 euros para entrar, apenas para sermos expulsos como se f√¥ssemos lixo!

Quando pergunt√°mos sobre a hora de encerramento, disseram-nos que o bar fechava √†s 3 horas. No entanto, √†s 2 horas em ponto, fomos mandados embora. O seguran√ßa respons√°vel pela expuls√£o foi rude e seco, sem o m√≠nimo respeito pela nossa presen√ßa. Foi uma clara demonstra√ß√£o de falta de profissionalismo e falta de considera√ß√£o pelos clientes.

Indignados com esta atitude, procur√°mos o gerente para expressar a nossa insatisfa√ß√£o. No entanto, ele simplesmente recusou-se a fazer qualquer coisa, alegando que estavam a fechar mais cedo devido √† falta de p√∫blico. A s√©rio? √â assim que tratam os clientes que pagaram para entrar? Simplesmente fecham as portas porque n√£o t√™m pessoas suficientes?

H√° muitos outros bares e rooftops na cidade que oferecem um tratamento muito melhor aos seus clientes. Definitivamente, n√£o recomendo o Silk Bar Rooftop a ningu√©m!

title: Passez votre chemin
text:
On est accueilli dans le hall d‚Äôentr√©e de l‚Äôimmeuble par quelqu‚Äôun qui vous explique que le rooftop est accessible pour la modique somme de 20‚Ç¨ avec une boisson incluse ‚Ä¶ les cocktails sont entre 14 et 22‚Ç¨.
Nous avons pris un Gin Garden chacun a 18‚Ç¨ inclus donc dans le forfait de 20‚Ç¨. Pas trop mal mais √† 20‚Ç¨ le cocktail √ßa ne vaut vraiment pas le coup.
La vue est bien mais la terrasse est assez petite.
Les serveurs √©taient par contre sympathiques.
Nous avons ensuite d√©couvert le Palacio Ciado qui propose d‚Äôexcellents cocktails sensiblement moins chers et dans une ambiance unique/atypique.

title: Para enganar turistas.
text:
Espa√ßo com algum interesse no interior, no exterior muito pobre e pouco cuidado. De lamentar que n√£o se possa aproveitar o sol para usar o exterior para beber e comer, sendo que √© proibido comer no exterior.
Staff pouco profissional.
Mas o que fiquei mesmo estarrecido, foi o com o pre√ßo das bebidas, j√° que estas n√£o tem qualidade nenhuma, e sobre os valores da comida.
Consumimos, 1 caipiroska de maracuj√° que estava horr√≠vel, um Porto Tonic, 2 gyosas, 2 pe√ßas de niguiris com peixe branco e 1 carpaccio de salm√£o. Pag√°mos 72 euros. Seria para jantar mas pag√°mos est√° conta e fomos jantar ao lado no Boteco.
N√£o me lembro de sentir t√£o enganado.
No entanto n√£o fui inteligente, porque liguei um s√°bado 19 horas, e terem s√≥ duas reservas. N√£o senti o alerta.

title: Sooo bad!!!!
text: Horrible place. Expensive, bad service, really bad whine and small portions. Don‚Äôt go here! Save your money

title: SimplyBus fraud
text: Do not use this company? I took a group of students to Portugal and paid 1,500 euros for four days of service. No buses showed up and no one answered the phone or responded to emails.

title: Dissapointing experience for our destination wedding - would not recommend
text:
We used SimplyBus as the transportation service for our 250 person destination wedding. For us it was this was a very important service for our wedding as every single person was form outside of the country, and wanted to ensure the experience coming in and out of our venue was a good one. We paid to have buses every 30mins starting at midnight until 430am for the comfort of our guests. SimplyBus showed up delayed and failed to meet the required timelines through the night causing a lot of discomfort for our guests, some of which had to wait ~45mins for the bus to show up and leave. Not to mention that we had paid for a service that was not delivered. When we tried to address the issue with the team, they ignored us and completely disregarded that they did not meet our agreement. I would not recommend Simply Bus to anyone that expects a relaible service and good customer service.

In summary, our experience with Simply Bus was marred not only by delays on our wedding day but also by their refusal to address the issues afterward. The impact on our guests' experience was substantial, and the lack of a satisfactory resolution speaks volumes about their commitment to customer satisfaction

title: No show host
text: Terrible! The host did not show up and did not inform me the tour was canceled. We were there early and waited for 15 minutes before calling to inquire about the tour. The shop has been renamed by the new owners and confirmed I was at the right place. The help line staff couldn't reach the guide so we left. It ruined my day as I had made plans based on this tour. This provider should not be allowed to work on tours for you!

title: Poor show by Lisbon Segway firm.
text: We turned up, having paid in advance, and we're stood up. No Segway. We were refunded but poor show by Segway company. Not recommended

title: Total scam see comments
text:
This tour did not exist
Even the name of the Gelateria is was situated opposite didn‚Äôt exist
Still waiting to hear back from TripAdvisor
The two numbers for the local tour operator would not connect
The website was unavailable
Sat for half an hour not one sit way was to be seen
Furious that trip advisor have not got back to us re this scam

title: This is a scam!
text: This is a scam. Do not book. They are messaging like they are open but they are not. Took our money.avoid booking with them.

title: Attention, please do not rent cars here.
text: In September 2024, out of necessity, I once rented a car with Sixt at Lisbon Airport for a lot of money, other rental companies were half cheaper, but I only had my credit card digitally and not physically with me, which was the favor of the hour for Sixt to relieve my wallet. I had resigned myself to it, should have expected that not all landlords accept digital cards. But the real hammer came only later. SIXT wrote to me and told me that I still had to pay the tolls to the Pagamento de Portagens (Administration for Tolls). The rental cars are equipped with sensors and the SIXT dealer had told me that the fees are fully covered by the rental price. This is primitive rip-off, please don't.

title: excessive unjustified charges
text:
I had an incredibly disappointing experience with SIXT, which has left me feeling completely taken advantage of. After a simple tire puncture from a nail, SIXT arranged for a tow truck and a replacement vehicle without informing me of any alternatives. They chose to bring a replacement car from Porto, instead of the much closer city, and then charged me over 400 Euros for this service‚Äîwithout giving me any advance notice of the cost.

To make matters worse, SIXT charged me 190 Euros for a single tire replacement on a Dacia Jogger, even though a new tire typically costs around 80 Euros. They also charged me for road assistance, despite my contract clearly stating that it was covered under ‚ÄúExtended Assistance.‚Äù When I returned the towed car with a nearly full tank, SIXT billed me over 90 Euros for fuel, and after a complaint, only 30 Euros were refunded.

This experience feels like SIXT is taking advantage of customers through hidden fees and a lack of transparency. I complied with all my contract obligations, yet I was hit with excessive charges. This is not only frustrating but feels borderline unethical. I‚Äôm considering filing a formal complaint and would strongly advise others to be cautious when dealing with SIXT.

title: Sixt Lisbon Airport is Awful
text: Do not rent from sixt lisbon airport. Useless human beings in a god awful process. 2 hours to get car. Its worse than the seinfield episode.

title: Terrible experience with Sixt car rental, Lisbon city center
text:
I have just written a review regarding waiting for 2 hours at Lisbon airport to pick up the car. We thought that was bad, but the worse is yet to come, when we dropped off the car at a Lisbon city location.
When we booked our car online, we chose to drop off at a Sixt office located at the carpark of Hotel Tivoli, as it was more convenient for us. It was accepted by the system. When we picked up the car at Lisbon airport, the staff further confirmed with us the drop off time, date and the depot office are all ok, and printed the address of the depot office at Hotel Tivoli carpark with its opening hours. It reads ‚ÄúSunday - 9 am to 6 pm‚Äù.
So that was it, at least we thought so. When we arrived at the return depot on the Sunday, the office was closed! The door of the office said Sunday - Closed. So we called the hotline and obviously they didn‚Äôt know how to handle and put us on hold. After much waiting, they suggested us to drop off at another location which was a bit far away. But we could not do it as we have already made plans and reservation that we have to go to. Even without this, it is not our responsibility to drop off to another location. After a while, the help line reluctantly asked us to park the car in the hotel garage and return the keys and the parking ticket to the hotel reception. This is after 30 mins on the phone. So we did as was told but when we tried to drop the key and the ticket at the hotel reception, it refused to take them as there was no instruction from Sixt and they didn‚Äôt want anything to do with it.

So we called the hotline again and another staff answered our call. He repeatedly asked us to drop off to the other location. We said we couldn‚Äôt as we have an appointment. He put us on hold and then hang up on us. This was another 30 mins!

We have no choice but to leave the car at the hotel car park. The next morning at 9 am, we made a special trip and returned the car keys back to SIXT's office at the Hotel Tivoli. Once we showed them the parking ticket, they said we have to pay for the parking fees, how ridiculous! We refused and after some checking, the staff came back and said that we are ‚Äòlucky‚Äô as the hotel won‚Äôt charge it!!!! They even dare to tell us that this is not their mistake, it was the airport office colleaques' mistake as they have told them many times that this office does not open on Sunday. What kind of attitude and customer service??? We, as customer, had to go through all this nonsense and at our precious time to make a special trip to return the keys, not to say that we are tourists with only limited time in the city. Instead of getting apologies and appreciation in return, we received such 'service'. Very disappointingly, the SIXT's staffs at the Hotline and in the office at Hotel Tivoli were impolite, unprofessional and absolutely unhelpful, not to mention SIXT's management and its on line system really requires some major reviewing and revamping. Bottom line, I shall never return to SIXT!

title: Beware Sixt
text:
This company rents decent cars. BUT, they do try to strong arm you AFTER returning the vehicle. This is first-hand experience. Burn mark in a seat cover, made by a NON smoker. ? A button on steering g wheel popped off. It is a volume control tab for an unused radio.
So, beware, they will bill your credit card for damages you've not done. In spite of accepting the option of full coverage, Insurances via them.

title: The worst service experience in Lisbon
text: The worst gastronomic and service experience I've had lately. Excellent, bad service, very dirty bathrooms... all bad. It may be very well decorated and have fantastic views, but that's not enough...

title: Disappointing and Exorbitant Prices
text:
The experience at Sky Bar Oriente was far below expectations. To begin with, the sound environment was almost non-existent ‚Äì an indefinite background noise, without any decent ambient music. A space of this level should invest in an appropriate sound system, which would really create a pleasant environment.

The prices are simply absurd. There is no single bottle of wine for less than 30‚Ç¨, which is already an exaggeration, and the food follows the same pattern: 4 guides, 8 pieces of sashimi and a small nail cost about 100‚Ç¨. To make it worse, the sashimi was of doubtful quality and I don't know anything special about it. If it was a top-notch restaurant, maybe the price would be justified, but here it seemed just an exploitation.

In addition, the place was poorly visited, which would not be expected in a space that costs so much for the experience. In short, a place that could be a reference point, but that fails in both the gastronomic offer and the environment. I do not recommend and will definitely not come back.

title: Bad behaviour
text: Bad service all staffs are use bad language with clients they don't have any kind of experience about high profile bars, how to treat clients. Do arguments with us about reserve tables.

title: Disappointment
text:
After more than 10 visits and several thousand EUR both at the hotel and at the Sky Bar restaurant, the lack of consideration and customer orientation during my last visit with my family made me draw a definitive line. I reserved for 10:45 p.m. and arrived at 10:50 p.m., time to sit down and order, at 11:06 p.m. I was informed that half of the order could no longer be produced even though the chef and cook were still active and the restaurant closed 24 hours.
Too bad, I'm only a customer, but one less customer...

title: P√©ssimo num todo
text:
Espa√ßo bonito,por√©m serviram me uma entrada de salada de algas que me fez fcar super mal,a massa que pedi ao mesmo tempo ficou esquecida e depois fizeram em 2m o que significa que √© comida pr√© aquecida...
N√£o volto mais,uma vistA bonita n√£o basta para alinhamentos contaminados e mal servidos.
P√©ssimo para um restaurante destes.

title: Great view terrible customer service
text:
Great view with potential for being a great place to sit back and relax with friends. Unfortunately our 2 experiences were not positive!
As guests of the Tivoli hotel we invited friends to join us at Sky Bar. Upon arrival, we were asked if we wanted to sit outside or inside. I walked over to the outside to see how it felt. The Brasilian waiter very quickly said, "you can't go out there without unless Isay so" I didn't realize it was so restrictive. Considering it was 35¬∞C outside and around 29 inside NO AIRCON!! I was looking for the coolest place for us to sit. The rest of our 3 hours there were forgettable. Service is 1*. The worst daiquiri we've ever had, when we asked if they had some kind of munchies to accompany the drinks, it took 10 minutes for them to show up with thimble sized bowl of nuts.
The second day we went up there ( the view is great)we asked for an outdoor table. We were seated in a back corner, all the nice seats were taken.
The gentleman who sat us said if one of the nicer tables became available they would move us. Before we even looked at our menus, two tables became available immediately and we moved to the one with two empty glasses from the previous guests. The same Brasilian waiter came to us a few minutes later and, once again, scolded us because we couldn't sit there until he cleaned the coffee table!! Really?! Instead of coming over with a "allow me to clean this table for you" he made a point of scolding as if we were children!!! So we walked out!!

title: Atendimento
text: Eu gostei muito do ambiente. Eu fui atendido por duas pessoas no s√°bado dia 03/06/23, o responsavel da sala foi estremamente sem educa√ßao e indelicado, eu nao lhe faltei o respeito em nenhum momento, devido estar acompanhado nesse dia. Por outro lado, o outro funcionario que viu o ocorrido foi nos server e nos deu aten√ßao, foi estremamente educado e atencioso, e se mostrou um otimo profissional, essa pessoa se chama Paulo. Segurem esse funcionario, porque por causa dele, eu nao fui embora do bar e qualquer cliente que for atendido por ele, ir√° ser bem atendido.

title: Espa√ßo maravilhoso, o staff n√£o
text:
O espa√ßo √© bastante agrad√°vel. Os valores e a carta apresentados est√£o de acordo com o local. A localiza√ß√£o/vista √© maravilhosa. Infelizmente n√£o posso dizer o mesmo dos funcion√°rios, o barman chegou inclusive a ser rude e o porto tonico n√£o tinha qualidade.
Espero que melhorem no staff, pois o espa√ßo tem potencial.

title: Chefe de sala mal educada
text:
Fui mal atendido ! Chefe de sala rude e grossa! Ainda por cima perto dos meus amigos, o que lhes causou p√©ssima impress√£o.
Lament√°vel situa√ß√£o.

title: Beyond disappointed
text: Dreadful customer service, disinterested staff, allergenic ingredients not noted on menu and when sent back tried to charge without replacing. The best thing about the experience was leaving, happy to pay expensive prices for the benefit of experience but not for a mediocre drink mainly filled with ice and total lack of service.

title: Scam
text: Arrived at the meeting point to be met by a gentleman who told us Sky Wine is not there. He said he‚Äôs had many people come looking for this business. It‚Äôs a scam.

title: the salesperson at Restauradores was very rude
text: the salesperson at Restauradores was very rude, when we told him that we already had tickets for another company, very bad

title: A desaster
text:
The bus tour was canceled the day before by the tour operator because of the Pope's visit. Despite our requests for reimbursement, no reimbursement was made to us.
A scandal, avoid at all costs this activity offered by trip advisor.

title: AC does not work.
text: AC did not work. Glass roof and sides made for an inferno inside. Do not take on a warm day. Drank all of my water and thought about asking to be let off early but didn't have an easy way to talk to driver. Was relieved to get out when the outside was over 90 degrees don't want to even guess how hot the interior got.

title: Disappointing
text: Stay away from the CitySightseeing tour. Boring, hot and unfriendly operators. After purchasing two day tickets and waiting for the next bus we realized that there are two operators; the other busses would stop regularly but not the one from CitySightseeing.

title: Skip it! AC not working properly and it wasn‚Äôt interactive. Felt we were in a fishbowl w/ no communication.
text: AC was nonexistent. The video narrator was just ok. The bud was moving pretty quickly so it wasn‚Äôt always possible to see what was being pointed out. The guys were friendly but there was little to no live interaction besides giving us ear buds to use in our native language. That would‚Äôve been nice yet some of the audio wasn‚Äôt working properly so I moved to other seats. Luckily it wasn‚Äôt a full bus. I would skip it.

title: AC not working properly
text: We chose this tour because it was super hot and we thought would be a better option but unfortunately the air conditioner was not working properly. It was too hot even if the air was on. My son (4 years)and my mom (78) were desperate and we couldn‚Äôt enjoy fully

title: Avoid this
text: Really disappointed. Am automated narrator so looking at annoying person on the screen & very hard to follow the landmarks as no one to point them out . Avoid ! Get the Tuk tuk tour instead

title: Bad experience
text:
Very bad experience, no time to take photos, bus go very fast, 45 minutes and not one hour as it as been told.
Not recommend at all!
A Sunday to forget!

title: Let down in Lisbon
text: The whole point of the tour was missed as the driver forgot to hand out the earphones so we had no idea what was being said. A Portuguese lady on the bus tried to explain to the driver so he turned the music on but we still had no voice to go with the narrator. The bus was clean.

title: Twice the price, half the steak
text: I had good memories of this place, unfortunately it is gentrified now. It is now way more expensive than before (they charged me 3 euros por a tiny piece of bread) and the steak is half the size it used to be. Better options elsewhere in the city. I used to like this place and I'd go there every time I was in Lisbon, unfortunately I don't think I'll be back any time soon.

title: Wrong time information
text: Group of 4 people. Arriving at 1:15 in the morning and informing us that the kitchen was already closed. According to the post on the internet the kitchen closes at 2:00. The rule changes the will?

title: COMIDA PESSIMA, PARECIA COMIDA DE FAST FOOD ( E PRE√áO ALTO pela qualidade, horrivel)
text: Tenho muitos amigos portugueses que elogiaram este lugar, mas foi terr√≠vel. Ainda estou com dor de est√¥mago. Eu pedi carne com molho tipo portugu√™s, o mesmo prato que pediu uma malta/grupp ao lado. E no final chegou a carne com natas e ketchup. Eu at√© perguntei quais eram os ingredientes e ningu√©m mencionou ketchup. N√£o recomendo, existem muitos outros bons restaurantes portugueses. E sinceramente, o prato da foto n√£o vale 15‚Ç¨, muito caro e sem qualidade (a carne estava boa, s√≥ o molho p√©ssimo, imposs√≠vel de comer, lembrou-me mesmo fast food)

title: P√©ssima experi√™ncia
text:
Restaurante onde fui cliente, e desde ontem deixo de ser.

O servi√ßo j√° n√£o √© o que era. Donos est√£o zangados com a vida e trabalham chateados e sem modos

title: Get a tour guide
text: Very difficult following a map to find locations while trying to take in the sights. I saw more sights just wandering around myself and stumbling across some of the beautiful scenery of Lisbon. If you want to tour such locations I suggest joining a tour group where you can really embrace the sights

title: Long lines to enter even after purchasing ticket
text:
Even after you purchase your tickets there was , at least, an hour long wait time in line to enter. Plus the ticket office, on site, apparently closes for 1.5-2 hours each day around noon.
Very interesting looking from the outside, but after asking several other tourists who had been inside, and the ticket office employee (who was very patient and informative), we decided to not wait 1-2 hours standing in line to get in the austere Belem tower. Several people said that the monastery down the street (walking distance) was a stupendous example of Manuelleta architecture, and definitely worth the wait in line. And the famous original Belem pastry shop is close to the monastery.

title: Captain left my family at the dock yelling ‚Äúwelcome to portugal‚Äù
text: There are so many great sailing companies in Lisbon I recommend taking any other besides this one. We setup a pickup at the dock at 7:15. We arrived at 7:10 and after multiple calls to the office asking where the boat was it finally came at 7:45. I asked about the delay and he proceeded to yell at me, tell me their delay was my fault, and that we weren‚Äôt there on time (I sent him picture evidence showing that we were there on time). He was triggered by the picture evidence and responded by screaming at me that we weren‚Äôt in America anymore, welcome to Portugal, and that we couldn‚Äôt come on the boat. My family and I had this specially planned on our last evening of the trip, so this was a bummer. We thankfully were able to shake this off and have a wonderful evening elsewhere, but I‚Äôd be aware of the owner of this company ‚Äî he was out of control and continued to message me me via WhatsApp in such a horrible way that I had to block him. I hope you can find a company that won‚Äôt cancel on you and yell at you.

title: Dangerous to life and do not keep agreements!!
text: Never again!!! Dangerously dangerous to drive these cars through Lisbon! Really not recommended. All vehicles are damaged. As soon as you drive yourself, you still pay an insurance ‚Ç¨ 300,- excess. They promise to mail you the insurance papers, but you won't receive anything. Fat thugs! Please make a different choice for an activity!

title: Overpriced and overrated
text: Ticket is only for transport. This does not include the price of the ticket to the exterior of the palace. One does not get to see the palace interior as it is not included. All you get is to see the outside for extra that we pay to the driver. Very disappointing not to see the Sintra palace interior.The walk from the village to Regaleira is so steep and endless. However in spite of it all our driver was so cheerful and humorous, kept us going.

title: Host cancelled five minutes before tour
text:
Tour guide cancelled on us 5 minutes before the tour was going to begin, claiming car problems (we were already waiting in the meeting place). If you had car problems, you would know more than 5 min in advance. I think they cancelled because they didn‚Äôt have enough people and it wasn‚Äôt worth their while.
We still tried to go to Sintra on our own, which was very difficult without a car or any reservations to the various attractions.
It was a very disappointing experience. Beware before booking!!

title: Anticolonial Lisbon
text: A recent statue, inaugurated just eight years ago, romanticizes the "exploits" of this man, a Portuguese man who went to Brazil where, in the name of religion, he committed genocide against indigenous communities, murdering the fathers and mothers of children whom he then sent to the order's schools, where they were abused, raped, and murdered. We must be critical of the colonial history of European countries; it is no longer time to give rise to heroes for murderers, plunderers, and genocidaires.

title: Didn't get a tour.
text: We were 20 minutes late and could never connect with the guide. He kindly sent us a link to show where he was as he walked along; however, he was never where the "X" indicated. At one point the "x" didn't move for 10 minutes and we stood there looking for him. We gave up after 30 minutes so we never had a tour. Very disappointed.

title: Awful
text: Awful. Drivers are rude, don‚Äôt ideal English and wait for people who are late to the detriment of the schedule. My pick up was 45 min late so I nearly missed my flight and the WhatsApp people kept telling me they would be there in 10 minutes. Never again.

title: Rubbish company
text: Do not not use this company,10 of us left stranded at Faro airport as the chaos of passport control meant we were late to get out and, and the driver would only wait for an hour, apparently all the locals hire companies know of this problem and they allow extra time but this lot wouldn't wait , they still took our money, upon the return journey the driver was speeding so much on the motorway we had to ask him to slow down as we actually thought we might not make it home to our families. Avoid these cowboys at all cost.

title: Sun Transfers do not use
text: This company failed to show up for our return journey and I have been trying to get refund for over 45 days. Impossible to get money back from them. Do not use unless you want to get robbed. Theft is their most reliable attribute.

title: Taxi pickup no show
text:
TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE
Transfer from hotel in Alvor Portugal to airport never arrived we were left with 6 small children and 13 adults
Panic - had to take 3 Maxi taxis who drove like the wind to get us there in time to catch the flight back to the UK
They didn't answer my calls or emails basically took my money
Do not book this company

title: Failed in Funchal
text:
Booked Suntranfers for travel between airport and hotel in Funchal. On the way out, BA cancelled our flight with 6 hours notice so we went out a day late. Had to pay again for the sun transfers pick up. Pickup from airport worked ok.
For the return, received confirmation msg 24 hrs before, but then nothing turned up to get us back to airport. We had to get our own taxi.
I put in a refund claim to Suntransfers, which was eventually paid. The email response was very patronising and more or less blamed us!
They said that they have a contact number to resolve and quickly fix issues and they would expect customers to ring it. I had rung it (twice). They couldn‚Äôt find the booking.
They said that on this occasion they would make the refund because the driver had not contacted them either.
An apology rather than a patronising email would have been more appropriate.
Never again!

title: Stay Away From This Horrible‚Ä¶ So called co
text: Horrible Co to deal with. STAW AWAY. Cancelled my pre booked and fully paid taxi without telling me and my young family. We were to be picked up from accommodation to airport at 3 in the morning‚Ä¶ we had four young kids under 10 ‚Ä¶. Never replied to phone calls .. never replied to emails‚Ä¶ when we eventually spoke with spoke with someone.. they hung up. They didn‚Äôt care..

title: Absolute Crap
text: Arrived at Funchal airport, driver not there called customer services and put on hold. 15 minutes on WhatsApp to try and get a response. Got a cab in the end.

title: Rubbish service
text: Absolute rubbish an hour late then he turns up no offer to help with bags or any normal behaviour. Might as well have booked a taxi from side of street

title: Left stranded with kids late night. Lost 200 euros. Avoid.
text: Paid 200 euros for a transfer from Lisbon airport. Plane landed only 20 minutes late. Some queues at passport. Communicated immediately to advise. Driver said he was waiting and very friendly by message. But he left the airport and didn't even tell us he was leaving. We were left stranded at the airport. Kids in tears. Had to eventually find a taxi with a price we could afford. Email was pretty efficient though - saying no refunds, take it up with airline. Disaster class of a service. Leaves you upset and having paid more than twice what you thought once you have to make emergency arrangements. Feels like have been scammed. What an awful start to a family holiday. Cue the cut and paste 'management' response on here which will be empathetic but not serve any purpose or provide any refund. You have all been warned. Avoid

title: No guarantees!
text: On arrival at Faro airport the queue for passport control was chaos. I had booked a taxi with Suntransfer.com to take us to our hotel in Albufeira. After 40 minutes in the queue I had a call from Suntransfers to say they would only wait 1 hr. They then phoned again after an hour to say the driver wouldn‚Äôt wait any longer. I pleaded as we were about 10 people from the front of the queue. They declined!!! My friend and I then had to pay 80 euros to get a taxi. I would never use this company again as no refund was offered by them when I complained. Beware!

title: Sun transfers drivers
text:
I can honestly say this was by far the worst experience of transfers I‚Äôve ever witnessed. I‚Äôm not usually one for writing reviews but from start to finish with our transfers has been nothing but a nightmare!!!
The first driver turned up an 25 mins late picking us up and then said he was there looking for us and blamed myself and my family although we were standing exactly where we were told to be.
Secondly we received a WhatsApp message telling us that our transfer driver picking us up was going to be early due to traffic‚Ä¶ he turned up 2 hours early. Not quite sure why??
When we finally had all our belonging together to put in his vehicle he told us all to hurry up and then moaned about the time.
Yes I reacted and told him we are leaving early and weren‚Äôt due to leave for quite some time so we were potentially doing him the favour.
All in all very rude and complained about the service they were providing us, as though we have had them out of pocket.
I can‚Äôt speak for all drivers but from the ones I‚Äôve now experienced. Very unprofessional and a smile wouldn‚Äôt kill either

title: BEWARE and NEVER use this company!
text:
BEWARE! This transfer company is a scam and do not deliver what they say. I booked and prepaid an airport transfer at BKK airport. The service I paid for and the instructions I was given was for a driver to meet and greet me at the arrivals hall. This did not happen. I was sent a text with a photo of a piece of paper with my surname on it and I had to find it within the entire arrivals hall at BKK airport. This area is massive. It took me 15 min to walk around and find it. Once I found it, I was met with rude staff sitting on the airport floor eating food and telling me to wait for them to call me when the driver arrived! I waited 20min for them to tell me the driver was outside. The driver was not waiting outside and I returned to the rude women twice to advise them the driver was not outside. Because I had interrupted them eating their dinner, they were hurling abuse at me while one of them walked outside to try and find the driver. Once the driver was located, his car was a tiny hatchback which did not fit my partners and my luggage. I had booked a Toyota Camary. The terms and conditions stated that if a Toyota Camary was not available, a car of GREATER size would be allocated. This was not the case. I asked them to arrange a car that was a suitable size. I then received abuse from the driver and the transfer woman. By this time over an hour had lapsed from when I arrived in the arrivals hall. They told me they were not going to arrange a new transfer so I had to go downstairs and catch a taxi to my hotel.
Because I had already booked and prepaid the return transfer, I promptly cancelled this. On the day of my return to the airport, the transfer company sent a text saying my transfer had arrived even after I had cancelled it!
I would NEVER NEVER recommend this transfer company to anyone. Please avoid this company at all costs.

title: Dreadful service!
text: Shocking service - AGAIN! We've been provided with dreadful service on two occasions now. On both outward flights - to Tenerife and Faro - we waited for over 30 minutes for our pick-ups at the airports. And, for the return flight from Faro, the company was unable to move our pick up from the hotel to help us get an earlier flight back to the UK due to adverse weather conditions!

title: Transfer from Hurghada airport to hotel in Makadi Bay: no driver available
text:
I booked a transfer from Hurghada airport to a hotel in Makadi Bay. There's not much you can really do wrong: when you leave the terminal, you immediately see a group of tour guides and taxi drivers with name signs. But my transfer wasn't there. After waiting for about 30 minutes, I ended up taking another taxi. It wasn't until I was driving to the hotel in the Uber taxi that Suntransfers tried to call me.

Later, after I complained, they claimed that the driver hadn't found me. No refund.

Well... I've actually had good experiences with Suntransfers several times in the past, but I don't want to deal with complications like that. And when a transfer goes wrong and there's no refund, all I can say is: Thanks, not with me!

title: Awful
text: Never use this company, our transfer never showed and we made our flight by the skin of our teeth and was left out of pocket

title: Late for meet & greet, booster seats missing
text:
We booked two personal transfers from Antalya airport and one to the airport.

In both outward trips, the driver was not waiting for us as promised, and we had to contact the transfer agency to find out what was going on. They then directed us to a different meeting point, giving the impression that the driver was somehow around but we had trouble finding each other.

After about 15 minutes of waiting (and roughly 1h after flight arrival), the driver then arrived at the new meeting point. It was obvious that they were coming from the parking lot and thus only had just arrived.

Pickup for the transfer to the airport was on-time.

We paid an extra fee for booster seats which were missing on both trips. When complaining about this, Suntransfers informed us that their terms and conditions specified that these were "on a best effort basis only, and not guaranteed" and that we could request a refund for the fee. So far (2 weeks later) I still haven't received the refund.

The vehicles were okay, but in one case the seatbelts were not working.

Driver was reasonably courteous.

title: No Show
text: Disguisted. A no show to collect us from Madrid Airport. After several phone calls advised take a Taxi and lodge a complaint. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY - Warning

title: AVOID AVOID AVOID
text: Was waiting upon arrival for 20/25 mins after being told driver just parking be 5 mins. Had to make 2 phone calls to see where he was. On return they booked us 2 Ubers, the wrong address was given for a start had to ring taxis He arrived 5 mins late and didn‚Äôt know if the second was on way. We all got illegally into 1 car as didn‚Äôt know if second taxi on way. While on way to the airport the second taxi rang to say waiting at address, he was 30 mins late! We booked a premium van so no way did we get what we paid for! Asked for a refund, offered the sum of ‚Ç¨10 refund!! What a joke, considering we paid nearly ¬£100. Will never use these cowboys again

title: Terrible, hot, sweaty.....never again!
text: Absolutely shocking service. I paid for a return minibus from Faro airport to our apartment. We waited 20 minutes at Faro for a little car to arrive (wrong size car), luckily we only had 1 big base with 5 little cases (otherwise we probably would have had to hold them on our laps), the seat which was in the boot wasn't big enough for a cat, let alone a adult or a child. The wrong car arrived plus 20 minutes late, my poor son had to squeeze in the back which had no air con or leg room (and he is small). I have since spoken to SunTransfers and I have emailed them with my concerns and told them how upset my young son was, he was hot and felt sick and had cases literally on him. They have not apologised or refunded this single journey but have had the cheek to say because of my sons affected leg, they will refund me 25 euros. We will never use them again. I have no words.

title: Do not use this transfer service!
text: The driver never arrived and the emergency number went straight to voicemail. Unfortunately we were not the only family with that experience waiting in arrivals and had to get a taxi from outside the airport.

title: Don‚Äôt get stranded abroad
text: I booked a series of round-trip transfers with this company and received a cancellation notices just hours before landing at the airport leaving us stranded abroad with no option. We had a group of 12 people that were left at the airport with no way to get to their hotel in a country where they didn‚Äôt speak the language with no warning. Do not book with this company. They will give you a refund but they will waste your time and ruin your vacation.

title: Two driver no-shows in the same trip!
text: DO NOT book with this company in France! We were stranded at the airport for a couple hours do to a driver no-show. The customer service offices are in another country and do not have reliable communication with the drivers. On the way home, the driver went to the wrong address and would not re-route to the new address. I had to cancel with no refund! Uber is the way to go. Simple, reliable, and cheaper!

title: Use Uber instead
text: Booked a transfer so that the driver would be waiting and we could leave immediately. Was instructed to look for driver near Vodafone. They were shut so easy to miss and no one was showing our name. On going back I checked the long list of names under a different company and we were listed. The lady then rang for a driver and we had to wait 10 mins. The vehicle felt unsafe and groaned on corners. The driver had no idea where to go and we had to show him the address when he pulled into a rd miles away. Awful. Use Uber.

title: Absolute joke - avoid like the plague
text:
An absolute joke - didn't bother to turn up. My 8 year old son and I waited over an hour from the time the flight landed - albeit 12 minutes early and noting that Suntransfers.com's website states that they monitor arrival times and 50 minutes after the scheduled landing time and the driver never showed. Every other driver for those on our flight was waiting when we got through passport control around 11am. Telephone calls were handled rudely and false promises of "they're nearly there, five minutes etc etc were given. In the end, after waiting nearly an hour, I had to get a taxi. Not great with a small child.

They told us on the phone that they have issues with drivers at Faro - funnily enough, they didn't tell me that when I paid them months ago.

Avoid. Avoid. Avoid.

title: INADMISSIBLE
text:
Nous avions r√©serv√© un v√©hicule mini-van pour 8 personnes pour le transfert de l'a√©roport √† notre location sur Lisbonne.
A notre arriv√©e, personne ne nous attendait. Nous avons attendus 1 heure et demie et rien. Entre temps nous avons essay√© de joindre les num√©ros donn√©s dans les documents. Nous avons d√ª payer 2 taxis ( 48‚Ç¨ ) pour nous transporter jusqu'√† notre appartement. Donc aucun service de transport malgr√© une facturation de 39,41‚Ç¨.
Je d√©conseille cette soci√©t√©.

title: Worst shuttle experience
text: Difficult to find the small box they are in to arrange transport. I walked way past it. Had to call and the lady was very helpful on the phone. Found the box and gave my name and asked how and was told had to wait for 5 more people. I waited 16 minutes then asked when are the others arriving. The lady did not know I said well how long do I wait or I will get a taxi as my flight was delayed 2 hours and now waiting for the shuttle. The lady said I must wait an hour. There was no clock I had travelled from New Zealand and was shattered. I asked her the time and she kept repeating you have been here 16 minutes!!! ZERO assistance. I attached photo to aid other poor souls trying to locate but I would avoid.

title: Use with caution
text:
Booked airport transfers via Suntransfers as prices were competitive. Received confirmation straight away via email. Arrived at Faro airport only to be hanging around as no driver was there to meet us (my Mum and I, Mum is a pensioner). Waited, then called customer service who were quite good and apologetic (although did have to keep 'pressing numbers' before being connected. They called the driver and called back to say that the driver was on his way.
When the driver arrived, no apology, didnt offer help with our cases until we were practically at the car. The customer service agent did call back again to ensure that we were picked up but the driver was awful. He was using a sat nav on his phone which kept redirecting so was obviously going his own way. Then he pulled into a petrol station, didnt say anything and went inside for a good few minutes. Then he came out and started filling his car!! He did eventually apologise when he got back in the car but the damage was already done at this point.
Longest half hour transfer ride ever, he kept driving too close to car in front on motorway.
Was so relieved when we got to our hotel.

For our return journey, called the company 2 HOURS before pick up to check all was ok as pick up was 8am. Were told all was fine, just before 8am, we waited outside the hotel hoping that we wouldnt get the same driver, 8am came and went and was just about to call up when a black van pulled up. Our transfer! A lady called Vanda, got out and apologised saying that her colleague who was due to take the job, called her last minute stating an issue with his car! (Whats the bet it was the same guy who came to the airport a few days earlier)! Vanda had to rush to us for the job. Vanda was lovely and gave us lots of info for when we book another trip. Vanda saved the day but overall, the experience was quite stressful.

title: Worst Experience Ever
text:
We reserved a shared transfer from Faro airport to Lagos for May 1 2023 through the SunTransfer website. Unbeknownst to us, our reservation ended up being subcontracted to a different local service, MTS. The voucher SunTransfer emailed us indicated we would be met in arrivals area by a driver with either "SunTransfer " or our names on a sign. Upon arrival, there was no one with such a sign although we searched the entire area for a half hour. We tried calling the SunTransfer number but our cell phone did not seem to be working (later found out it was a simcard problem). Eventually, a gentleman working with a different tour company noticed our plight and asked if we needed help. When we explained the situation, he told us to go to the MTS window because MTS sometimes works with SunTransfer. We went to the window and spoke to the woman working there, who clearly was not interested in listening to us. She glanced at our voucher, said SunTransfer staff should be waiting in front of the cafe, and turned her attention to the next customer, ignoring our protests that no one was there and we could not reach SunTransfers by phone. We headed to the airport information booth next, whose staff directed us to have the MTS rep call SunTransfers to resolve the situation. When we approached her again, the MTS rep continued to act as if our problem was unrelated to her and refused to call SunTransfers for us. She finally let us use her phone to call SunTransfers. We were able to reach SunTransfers on her phone and gave them our reservation information; they apologized for the situation and promised to call back shortly. While we waited nearby for the callback, the MTS rep unexpectedly approached us (apparently SunTransfers had called her back instead of us) and admitted that our reservation was indeed included

















on her list of reservations. However, she continued to deny all responsibility for the situation, saying that our voucher was in the wrong format. At this point we had spent close to an hour of panic running . She assured us that a driver was coming to take us and another family who would be dropped off first in Albufeira. After waiting another 15 minutes, the driver appeared. We asked how long it would take to get to Lagos, and he told us an hour and a half, since Albufeira was well out of the way. So in addition to enduring over an hour of unnecessary stress and maltreatment at the airport, we had to endure an hour and a half ride to Lagos, with no apology! I really feel we should have received our money back--have never seen customer service this poor in our lives!

title: You Can Do Better Yourself
text:
Last time I use Suntransfers. You‚Äôre better off scheduling a local service through your hotel. It‚Äôs absolutely ridiculous that this is a company. They simply have a service they call at the local market, pay in advance and then send a driver. They‚Äôre middlemen. They cannot guarantee no more reliability than if you called yourself and without the surcharge. The online chat doesn‚Äôt work. 24 hour response time is only for phone calls. Email responses are molasses slow.

You can do better.

title: Do not use these cowboys
text:
Booked a return transfer to and from our airport
Really annoyed that they were 40mins late to collect us from the airport but at least we were in the country.
No apologies driver did not care.
Could it get any worse? Unfortunately yes.
On the return leg they failed completely to turn up at our hotel to take us the the airport.
We tried phoning but no answer.
In the end we had to get a taxi to avoid missing our flight.
How can this be acceptable???
AVOID AVOID AVOID

title: Be aware deceptive!!!
text: We booked a private tour. ($350) the night before. When the driver came to pick us up we were informed most of the attractions were closed due to fire risk. This was known by the tour operator prior to our booking yet no mention made. No option to cancel in the morning at pick up either. The driver Sandro made the best of what was left to see. Upon inquiry the hotel said limits due to fire risk a common occurrence. This was very deceptive. Be aware prior to your booking.

title: Obliged to a private tutor with expenses borne by us for a lack thereof
text: We did not participate in the tour because the tour operator stated that they had not received the booking. After more than 1 hour of waiting and trying to contact by phone, we manage to talk to the tour operator. As the only solution to their lack, he proposes to carry out the same tour but privately with a surcharge of ‚Ç¨100. We accept because it is our last day in Lisbon and given the time it is also the only way not to waste the day altogether, but basically we had to pay for their mistake. In all this I asked for a refund of the difference of ‚Ç¨100 that I had to incur from Viator who refunded me only about 25% of this amount without giving me any explanation. I would also add that the tour we did was done with a driver, not a guide, which is a totally different service.

title: Scam!!!!!
text:
The agency charges you for a non-refundable reservation when the owner of the property has already cancelled and delete the rental ad! This is what happened to me! I confirm the reservation and call the owner! Unfortunately no one answers and after many reminders of customer service! Really nothing! Real hustlers! Since January 2025 No refund So far! But then the property is still rented and other people fall into their trap! Be careful!!!!
To flee completely!

title: Driver and guide turned out to be driver only
text: Sintra full day with driver & guide was driver only. He did not educate us Just accompanied us to sites. No history education of sites or anything else. Didn‚Äôt even offer to take a pic of us when we were doing a selfie. Nice man and good driver but we paid for a guide too. How about less time on the phone? Complaint got us 10% refund totally unacceptable. Trip Advisor wanted pics as proof‚Ä¶ a pic of someone driving & not talking or walking & not talking? Have used TA/Viator all over the world for years. Our 1st complaint.

title: Worst local tour experience.
text:
This is the worst local tour experience.
There is no one showed up for pickup.
Only number I got from the booking is going to voicemail.
No one contacted me and I waited at the lobby for an hour.
Bad bad bad.
Turn out they push the blame to the system. Speechless. Almost ruined my last day in Lisbon with wife for the valentine‚Äôs celebration.

title: Great sites, poor tour
text:
While the sites we saw were definitely worth visiting and worth the trip, the tour was lackluster. There was no agenda and no plan or options for lunch. We meandered for an hour at our first stop while having to wait for the correct times for our next stop. At one point, we had to wait 30-40 minutes while our tour guide had to charge his car. Which is a bit ridiculous, especially while we had just spend 1.5 hours on our own and he had plenty of time to charge.

In addition to that delay, the tour was supposed to be 8:30-2:30 and even though we left our hotel about 15 minutes early, we didn't get back until 4 with no lunch stops and had to adjust our afternoon plans.

We paid extra for 'Skip the Line' and our tour guide said that didn't get you anything and he needed to talk to the owners about that.

title: Sad
text: plug a poorly trained, short-term, so-called guide into a car the guide doesn't know how to use for our private tour of Sintra. Insights? Less than what I could have read in a guide book. The guide was sincere in their efforts, but inexperienced. No, I would not use this service again or recommend it to anyone else.

title: BEWARE - Description is VERY misleading
text:
I use TripAdvisor and Viator frequently to select tours (30+ times). I have never been mislead and have had satisfaction with every selection to date ... until this SCAM tour.

In the itinerary/description, they list 9 sites to be visited. Later, after you book, they tell you will need to choose 3 of 6 monuments. What? not 3 of nine, buy 3 of six. ???

When I contacted the tour company days prior, and then again the night prior - communication was terrible. AND, the women stated that I would discuss my choices with the driver when he picked me up. When I discussed our itinerary with the driver/guide, he gave me excuses as to why it would be difficult to see certain places because of traffic, but we would try. HE DIDN'T EVEN TRY. He dropped us off and picked us up 3 hours later.

The result ... WE ONLY went to National Palace of Queluz for 5 minutes, Quinta da Regaleira (unguided) for an hour, spent 2 hours in town (unguided) and the Pena Palace. THAT IS IT.

When I confronted the drive/guide, he blamed Viator. He stated their description is wrong and a lot of customers complain. WHAT? I have never had an issue with Viator. And ... if the tour description is wrong, SWINGO should have it changed.

I chose to spend twice as much on this tour because of the comprehensive itinerary. I should have gone with a different tour company. YOU SHOULD GO WITH ANOTHER TOUR COMPANY.

title: Bad experience
text: The visit basically didn't happen. We spent 3 hours in the car to see only the castle. The Guide did not warn us of the traffic, did not give us alternative solutions and also made us lose the tickets we had bought on his indication to see quarta de regaleira. We had no explanation regarding the city or the history. Basically we had a very nice driver but certainly not a Guide. Pretty much a wasted day!

title: Worst transfer experience
text:
Booked these airport transfers for clients travelling to Lisbon. For 8 adults we booked 2 vans, roundtrip.
Upon arrival, only one van was dispatched and no-one had any idea what they were talking about when they asked where their second van was.
The return transfer to the airport didnt show up at all. Called both their regular line, and their 'emergency' line and got no answer. No response to emails.

Absolutely do not recommend. Look elsewhere.

title: ‚ÄºÔ∏è TO BE AVOIDED
text:
We booked, through GetYourGuide, a daily tour from Lisbon to Sintra-Cascais-Cabo da Roca managed by the agency Swingo by Avenidas.
At the place fixed for the appointment no one showed up!
We waited for an hour and called endless times, empty.
GetYourGuide also tried to contact Swingo without receiving a response. So we had to start the procedure for the refund... day spoiled because of Swingo: SCONSIGLIATISSIMI!

title: Deplorable customer service
text: Well, as long as you don‚Äôt need help because of an administrative error. It is very difficult to contact them and almost impossible to get an answer and help from them. A very incompetent Customer Service who obviously does not know the travel environment. After a fifth unsuccessful attempt to obtain a flight reservation number recognized by the airline, the person from the private travel customer service masked his incompetence by submitting a false request for assistance. We have just received a message regarding a so-called request to modify the bedding.... Nothing to do with our case. And this after receiving an email giving the booking codes of another unknown family for an airline just as foreign to our file. This is absolutely ridiculous! Customer service above all!!

title: Sweet guide, but not a tour
text: Our guide was very sweet, but provided almost no information on anywhere we visited or passed by. We had almost no plan whatsoever, showing up to the first castle an hour before they opened with no plan to fill the time. Came across as very organized and was a glorified taxi to some of Sintra‚Äôs attractions.

title: Just a driver - not a tour guide
text:
This tour fell short of my expectations. I won‚Äôt identify the driver because there were no issues with him, but I emphasize that he is just a driver: this isn‚Äôt really a tour, you‚Äôre essentially paying to have someone drive you from place to place. It‚Äôs nice to be able to customize an itinerary that suits you, but we expected that there might be a bit more of a guided tour involved. Instead, the driver stays in the car and is unable to enter any of the palaces or monuments, so you‚Äôll see other tours with guides who explain history to the attendees, but we didn‚Äôt have that. Would‚Äôve been nice for the price we were paying.

We also found the tour company to be disorganized. We had to reach out to them the night before, as we hadn‚Äôt heard anything other than a generic confirmation upon booking. When we called, they put us in touch with the wrong driver. They also didn‚Äôt inform us that we needed to book any tickets in advance‚Äîit ended up being fine but you should book Pena Palace in advance and ideally get an early time slot, which wouldn‚Äôt have been communicated to us had we not reached out ourselves. Overall, a bit frustrating.

title: Not good
text: I booked a transfer with Swingo from the Lisbon airport to my hotel on Sep 29. I received a text in advance from Swingo giving me my driver's name and phone #. When I arrived on time at the airport, I went to the designated meeting point, but couldn't find the driver, so I called the driver's phone and left a message. Swingo had changed drivers without notifying me, so the new driver didn't get my call. The new driver showed up after a few minutes wearing a tee shirt. Didn't expect a coat and tie but feel he should've been better dressed for a private car. Then the driver couldn't find my hotel - he was using a phone GPS and it was obvious he didn't know Lisbon. I could tell we were close according to the GPS on my phone and was tired of going around the block, so I asked him to let me off. We were 1/2 block away from my hotel. I feel I could've had a better experience with a taxi or Uber at a much lower cost.

title: Unfortunately, a No Show
text: Actually, the driver never showed up. We had an overnight flight from the US, and arrived after 5:30 am. The driver never showed and the local contact had no after hours number and did not open until 8 am. We finally ended up taking a taxi at 8:30 when our driver was not reachable. I hope nothing happened to the driver... but plan if you book something outside of business hours, you need to get an emergency number, just in case.

title: Taxi scam at Lisbon Airport
text: So we waited in the line(que) for the taxi manager to direct us to a airport taxi the black and green ones. I had asked about the cost to cascais he said it was metered so could not give an estimate. We got in the cab and was totally distracted initially by the sights and speed of traffic. It was when we got into our trip I noticed the meter was not on and turned facing in . When we landed in cascais the driver who was obviously had scammed us charged us a flat rate of $64 and showed me the flat rate guide he had conveniently tucked up in the visor. So traveller beware make sure the meter is on or better still use Uber / Bolt located in the departure area.

title: Forget the address
text:
Attention: This review refers to a trip I made with my wife in April 2017 to Lisbon and Queluz to review the cities, not December 2023. I didn't have the option of putting the right date.

As a cigar lover and author of the only book originally written in Portuguese on the subject, I made a list of places I wanted to visit in advance. I already knew of the incomprehensible prohibition of taking pictures of the place. I was holding my cell phone in hand, as I used to stand to receive messages, and the rude gentleman behind the counter said, "He's taking pictures! You can't!"
