I didn't say I didn't even try to photograph. I got very upset with the stupid attitude of the citizen and we left the store. The man was still after us saying "Go back to Brazil!" If you are Brazilian, look for Casa Havaneza, it is another level of service. Let's leave the unbalanced Tabacaria Monaco serving the ghosts of the clientele of the past.

title: Creed!
text: A dangerous thing to drive, I would crash several times along the way! Narrow streets and it tucks into the sidewalk, almost hitting people. Very disturbing

title: Experience that could be improved
text: Some explanation could be given for what can be seen from the boat. The tour is a bit expensive for what it provides, it only includes one drink and they could offer something more.

title: Disappointing
text: We paid a fortune for a luxury yacht cruise. We got the power catamaran for 4 a hour tour. What they gave us was a 2 hour cruise but just drove the boat very very slowly. Additionally, the power catamaran has no comfortable outdoor seating. We could have say inside but for the outside seating there was only a railing surrounding all out door benches. They made no effort to actually give us what we paid for. The Captain Phillippe could not have been nicer but that does not excuse the misrepresentation of this catamaran being anything remotely resembling luxury. It was barebones not luxury. They should have just told us that they do not really have a 4 hour tour and that they should have just said we only have 2 hour cruise and not to drive the boat at an average of 3 knots around the harbor. F0r the 4 hours we paid 1200 pounds and it was simply not worth it - having nothing to do with the captain or his crew - they were very nice. I regret the extra 2 hours I spent of my vacation on this cruise.

title: Terrible experience. Did not get on board because of wheelchair users, although they have separated with ‚Äúpriority boarding‚Äù.
text: It's terrible! They have signs that show that it is priority boarding as wheelchair users, but when we get there as a follow of 9 in the family, the wheelchair user does not let on the boat. They also refuse to refund the ticket. This despite the fact that also getyourguide that we booked through, has suggested this activity as a wheelchair-friendly activity in Lisbon. We feel discriminated and humiliated. There was no service arrangement from the company to help us with this, they only refused us to get the tickets we had paid for, since we had a wheelchair user with us, and that he was not allowed to board in principle.

title: Bad experience
text: The experience could have been pleasant if it weren't for the lack of character, transparency and friendliness on the part of the staff, particularly Francisco.

title: Lack of professionalism
text:
Something not to repeat!
Despite the welcoming view, the poor disposition and lack of versatility of the staff was the biggest cause of nausea.
For me, they were going sailing!

title: We expected better service
text:
We didn't really like the fact that they promised us that the trip could last for another half hour but then the people who went with us threw sand in our faces saying that it couldn't be done because of the maritime police.
They also didn't give us the crackers that had been promised and we had to ask for drinks.
Overall, we liked the experience but we didn't like the relationship with the drivers who came with us on the boat, as well as some outings that one of them had.

title: Walking Tour with Jessica in Lisbon - Could have been better
text: We did our walking tour in Lisbon with Jessica. Am afraid the tour wasn‚Äôt quite great. One expects such walking tours to be engaging, insightful and a little funny. This was mostly one-way communication. The local recommendations were nice, but otherwise we felt the tour didn‚Äôt do justice to the beautiful city that Lisbon is.

title: Rubbish
text: The guide although enthusiastic was not great and really could have a whole lot better. Never again don‚Äôt recommend to anyone

title: 38 people and seemed very similar to Rick Steves audio tour but less info
text: This was a very disappointing experience. There were way too many people on this trip counted them twice and it was 38. There were a few stops on the walk where we went off and then came back to the guide, as you can imagine with 38 people this took time. In the afternoon we decided to follow the Rick Steves audio tour we had downloaded and tour surprise it went to the same places and had a lot more information. My recommendation is to download FREE Rick Steves audio guide that also has a map and the text of the audio and do that, remember these walking tours are not free, the Rick Steves audio is and in our opinion, had a lot more information and we weren‚Äôt with 36 others. Photo is showing only part of the group. There were a number of people behind us when I took this photo.

title: Take Lisboa tour a no show
text:
We confirmed from three sources that we were at the pickup site. We were there 10
minutes early and waited until 30 minutes after the pickup time. While many other tour busses stopped, nothing from Take Lisboa. Very disappointed.

title: They forgot Saramago
text: I was thrilled to find the Jos√© Saramago Nobel Prize in literature Foundation, very close to where I stayed and to know the tree where his ashes are located. There is nothing to add about the figure of this character, recognized worldwide, so I was surprised that in the tour of his red truck (which charges) through which the traveler can tour the most prominent sites, there was not a single mention of the novelist. Unexplained and unforgivable. I sent an email to the Lisbon tourism department and received no reply.

title: Customer Distraction
text: I arrived 10 minutes late for the 10:30 am tour and, when I called support to join, the attention was very rude: they offered no alternative or meeting point and called me ‚Äúirrational‚Äù. Fortunately, on the 11:00 h tour the guide Javiera was excellent, very attentive and friendly, and had no problem joining me explaining everything clearly. My negative vote is for the poor treatment of the company support, which clearly does not take care of its customers.

title: Guide not very understandable and not very interesting for us
text:
Reservation made that same morning on the internet very simple and we found the guide without problem.
We had the guide Bruno although very friendly, it was difficult to understand in French. And what little we understood was of little interest to us: We left the tour in the middle after leaving a tip.

title: The Rafa guide is TOTALLY EXPENDABLE. A SCAM because we wasted our time.
text: The Rafa guide did not fulfill the agreed itinerary and not even an alternative one: walk and stop to sit and smoke. A lot of scholarship and little basis. I felt obligated to PAY as he asked me exactly that ONE PAYMENT.

title: A simple walk
text: Bruno, our guide, walked us for 2 hours in the Alfama district. We had very little information. Luckily the neighborhood is superb. This made the walk fun but it was by no means a guided tour

title: Worst experience ever
text: Awful experience and would never use again! I booked a group of 6 for a FREE tour of Lisbon and a friend of mine booked for a group of 4. Unknown to us there is a policy around groups of 7 or more so when we have our names to the tour guides they wanted to charge us ‚Ç¨10 per person because we were all together even though we booked separately. How can this be? They quoted something about the quality of the tour if there are big groups so what difference would it have made being all together in amongst everyone else? Absolutely shocking customer service. Tip - if this is you don‚Äôt tell the guides you are together!!! üò°üò°üò°üò°

title: Very loose tour with zero recommendations
text:
Loose Aranzazu tour, with a huge group of people which made explanations difficult. He took us through the places that appear in the guides and counted the texts that appear in the guides. Nothing you can't read online. Also very dedicated to people tipping more than telling curiosities. It is a shame because according to her she had been living in Lisbon ‚Äúfor many years‚Äù.
He did not give recommendations individually and only provided a document that he sent on WhatsApp at the end of the tour and after waiting for people to contribute the tip.
Very mercantilist

title: I don't recommend them.
text: When the guide arrived he saw us talking to another group of people from our country. He assumed we were forming a group and refused to join the tour. We explained we weren't together and he refused. The bookings of one of the groups were made two weeks in advance and ours were made directly with one of the guides. We were told liars. Disrespectful.

title: I would change guides
text: Beautiful visit and prepared guide, but becomes unfashioned as soon as you make a joke .. Then people like that also expect a tip at the end of the tour.. Bha...

title: Free Tour Jose
text:
The overall tour has been a bit awkward. We asked him questions during the tour and apart from not answering it seemed to bother him.
We have gone to the ‚Äútypical‚Äù restaurants he has recommended and the nefarious experience.... all very expensive and not worth it at all. We had to leave the restaurant how unpleasant the food was.

I'm so sorry to post this rating and comment, but I don't like being treated like I'm not.

I want to stress that Jose has always, even before we started, made it clear that we had to be respectful of his work, including that we had to pay, when he has not been.

title: Lisbon tour
text: We were a few minutes late and the tour was not there when we arrived. Waste of 7$. A disappointing experience. I understand that we were late but curios to why no grace time

title: Disappointed
text:
Great disappointment! We came to the meeting place early in the morning to learn that the visit in French was cancelled or not scheduled. We didn‚Äôt even understand.
We're waiting for the refund

title: Don‚Äôt do free tour with Lili
text: The city is nice, but the free tour is lousy gave us the Freeman tour LILI which was dedicated 90% to recommend restaurants and Free tours of friends of them for your benefit, it is a total scam!!

title: Tour Alfama
text: My experience with Rafa was not so positive. While his colleagues were friendly and professional, he adopted an attitude that generated discomfort, making us feel ignorant and sharing personal and political opinions that diverted attention from the tour. I believe that a more focused approach to academic content would be more beneficial to all. I pray to God heartily that Rafa fulfills his dreams as a painter and stops bittering the holidays of tourists.

title: Weren't allowed to go on the tour
text: We didn't even get to do the tour. My group showed up with some other groups that reserved separately, we are all family but reserved separately. The tour guide informed us that since we were friends/family the tour would cost ‚Ç¨10 per person prior to the start of the tour, despite having separate reservations, or we could not go. We were not informed about this prior to the tour date. Later we saw a message on tripadvisor only 2 hours before the tour telling us the same thing. This is totally misleading and seems to be a way to get everyone to pay despite promoting the tour as free. Very disappointed.

title: Dire
text:
Dire
They won't let us join the tour because we made two reservations
Don't hire them.
First impression of Lisbon very negative because of companies like this

title: Very unpleasant!
text: I DON'T RECOMMEND THIS AGENCY AT ALL. The guides Dani and Elena treated us terrible!!! Just to say we were 7 people, with two different reservations!!! Never happened to us before.

title: Fatal
text: After seeing a good review, the kid got aggressive to yell telling me what a tough face for not giving him money. I went to answer him and he was yelling at me. I think the tour to start with is free, I don't have to pay anyone if I don't want to or can't. He's left me with a bad body for yelling at me like that, and there's so many people. I don't want to tour with this rude character again. Awful.

title: Tour without relevant city information, recommendations only
text: We did the free tour of the center with Liliana. Nearly three hours of tour in which he gave little relevant information about the city or its history. Almost 80% of the time was spent recommending where to eat, where to drink and recommending other tours that she offers. In fact he spent a good time explaining how to get around Sintra when many of us who were present said we were not going to visit him. It doesn‚Äôt make any sense for you to dedicate a tour of downtown Lisbon to talking about how to manage a visit elsewhere. It gave us the feeling that he treated us like the tourist of the topic. The one who just wants to know where to eat. It is very good to recommend restaurants etc but not spend so much time on it. It gave us the feeling that I really didn't know what to talk about the city and its history. We also consider that he spent too much time explaining how a free tour guide works and the importance of reviews when there was NO ONE in the group who hadn‚Äôt done a free tour before. It's okay for me to explain, but not so many times or so long. I have done quite a few free tours and this was probably the worst I have ever done.

title: Guide dependent
text:
Sorry but this was rather a tired tour and probably got more kickbacks for the guide than information for any of the group. If someone is flagging with the hills then wait until they arrive before pointing anything out would be more thoughtful.
Not the biggest group so perhaps explains his lack of much information.
The stops at the cake shop and Ginjinha (both excellent) were justifiable to perhaps earn him something extra but the wine nonsense at the end in a friends bar where it was a tasting with (oh I forgot to tell you it‚Äôs 4 euros a glass of very average wine - after pouring umpteen glasses) was pretty blatant. We‚Äôve done these tours in various cities and this was lowest on the scale unfortunately. Rather awkward and I think the guide sensed that but didn‚Äôt really care.

title: Disappointing
text:
A tour should serve to know a little more the history of the place, the culture and traditions of its people and their day to day. At the moment that a guide dedicates himself to politicizing the tour itself, manipulating the minds of people, as well as the true history of a place, something fails. To say barbarities, such as that the pictures of Alfama‚Äôs own neighbors on every corner are a lie, is flatly false. They are a tribute to the people who lived in the neighborhood and who have mostly died and that it was a work carried out by an American neighbor of the neighborhood. To say that the dictator Salazar built the castle of Saint George is equally false. It was rebuilt in the 1940s, not built. To say that tourists are the worst thing for the residents of Alfama because they disturb the latter, is not true. Tourists stroll its streets, sometimes talking to their neighbors. To say that the only thing that interests tourists is the center, which, has no interest whatsoever is false. Tourists are interested in neighborhoods other than Baixa, such as Alfama, Mouraria, Bairro Alto, Bel√©m...
Finally, it is not normal to leave the tour on several occasions to talk to neighbors. We found a perfectly orchestrated theater to give an unrealistic image of the neighborhood itself. Everyone's political ideas, better at the ballot box, not on a tour.
In short, the tour was an absolute manipulation by Rafa, our guide.

title: Doesn't make up for the tour
text: One hour left over from the tour. It seems like a school outing with a stop to buy Belen cakes and time to take pictures, both activities take away my lot of time and it is something that everyone can do whenever they want before or after starting. The information provided is very basic.

title: Nefarious guide
text: The visit has been horrible, the guide has had a chaotic speech, with many stops and has not focused on showing us the neighborhood of Belem. I have had the feeling of losing a whole morning of the 3 days we are in Lisbon. Too much history and little to see, for this I put a documentary

title: For education to the Guide and the tour companions do not leave it. But I thought I was wasting time in several o'clock
text: Tour with very little relevant information, too long stops and too many comments that did not come with the visit. I think the center of Lisbon has more and offers more than the Guide offered us.

title: Frustration
text: Hiked down from my "hotel" at the top of Bairro Alto, wandered a bit, but arrived at the stroke of 4 at rendezvous point. Saw no sign of "blue umbrellas". Hiked back up hill.

title: Rude guide. Disappointing. AVOID
text: I booked this tour for myself and my family (4 of us). Other members of my family then said that they would also like to attend so I booked 3 more tickets. When we arrived at the meeting point, the guide rudely told us that she could not let us do the tour as we were a group of 7 and it would be classed as a private tour. I told her we had already paid and had separate bookings. Again, very rudely she said that we could only go if we paid her 10 euros each. We walked away. My family included 3 people over 80 years old who had walked from the port to get to this tour in time for the meeting time do we were not at all happy when we were told we couldn‚Äôt do it. I would recommend you avoid this. I‚Äôm 100% sure that there are better tours with more friendly guides.

title: A lost afternoon in Lisbon
text:
A lost afternoon in Lisbon, this is how I define my experience on this Free Tour.
We did not plan to do this tour but a Guide of the first day recommended them, told us to know the neighborhood, that we would see water gushing from the stones, we would see the best views of the city and that we would live an experience in the unique neighborhood.
NOTHING LIKE THAT.
The Guide has already started badly, he arrived with a cigar, without speaker and with a dim voice, he told us to enter the museum of Jos√© Saramago and there he would explain in Tour and some more things. The explanation was not bad, it indicated a little the origins of the neighborhood and the age of the city, this was all we did from what we hired.
Once we left the museum came chaos. He was standing in the closed houses to see the arches of the portals, we arrived at the Cathedral trying to explain something and we didn‚Äôt understand anything, we entered the neighborhood of Alfama and he was stopping to talk to the neighbors leaving the group cut in ‚Äúexplanations‚Äù, we entered to courtyards to not get to explain anything clear, we entered the neighborhood and he kept talking with neighbors and passersby, in short, an experience that has nothing to do with the reserved.

Already indicated that it would be a slightly out of the ordinary experience, I understand it since everyone approaches their work as they want, what I don‚Äôt understand is that they offer this experience as a Tour of Alfama, when they should offer it as an experience like ‚ÄúTour of Rafa the Galician‚Äù or something and not take people has been wrong, saving you from losing one afternoon the 3 days that are in Lisbon.

Money is optional, but time lost is not recovered by anyone.

title: Alphama neighborhood
text: I didn't like it at all, our guide was Rafa, 3 hours and a half tour where I saw nothing. No comment. We only had this day to meet and we wasted our time.

title: FREE TOUR, REALLY????
text:
Some of the guides are good, some are not. Who cares? What is matter for a Take A Free tour is to collect the passive income through the guides!

Every client has a cost of 4‚Ç¨ for the guide!

So next time, you book a free tour, make sure to pay the guides with a minimum of 10‚Ç¨

Free tour industry is shameful, a great example of what is neocapitalism!

title: Route visits neighborhood Alfama responsible Rafa only interested in us giving you good references to continue having ensures
text: Visit the neighborhood of Alfama curious and helps to know better the situation of the country as well as the history, it is worth doing

title: A bad experience
text:
We have done the tour with Jos√© and the truth that leaves much to be desired. I explain almost nothing about the neighborhood. On the contrary, he complained on several occasions about the economy, tourism in Lisbon... Etc
From the first moment I explain what he pays for each person who will do the tour (data that in our review is irrelevant since he is doing a job).
At one point in the tour we wanted to leave as I had made several comments which were out of order. He followed us in the middle of the tour to demand fair remuneration which we felt he did not deserve. We explained politely what we thought and since our review did not like it, he verbally assaulted us.
It wasn't a pleasant experience at all.

title: Not to repeat
text: Gu√≠a Rafa. Worst tour I've ever done in European cities. The Guide was improvising, talking about his stories. He didn't explain any history. We haven't been to places in the neighborhood because he wasn't interested. Tedious, politicized, and graceless. I left the neighborhood without hearing from him because his Guide has not explained anything but his life in the neighborhood.

title: Not to be repeated
text: As prepared as Antonella was, it was hard to keep up ... the tour was mainly based on Portuguese lessons, notions about food and spam from other tours ... little history and few notions (some of which were at odds with what other guides had previously explained to us)

title: Not suitable for Catholics
text:
I had never hired a free tour and recommend the experience. I already knew Lisbon, but I discovered things I didn't know. Moreover, with Diego, one ‚Äúenjoys‚Äù a political, moral and religious sermon, neither requested nor necessary, and charged with deep sectarianism.
You have to recognize the courage ‚Äì or ignorance ‚Äì of believing yourself in a position of moral superiority and supremacism when your income depends on those who come to your rally involuntarily. Obviously, the political harangue was discounted in the payment.
By the way, the Catholic Kings did much more than kill Jews and Muslims. Nothing worse than a graceless funnyman who thinks it's humorous to constantly disrespect those who don't think like him

title: Diego lousy guide
text: Super bad the guide diego, said it lasted 2 1/2 hours and lasted no more than 1 hour 30. He didn't remember where to go, he didn't remember what he said, super improvised. I did at least 10 or 15 tours in these last 2 weeks and loved the guides all! But this one was lousy. A pity because alphama is beautiful but with a bad guide, it ruins everything. I don't know if yesterday was Saturday and went to party but it was terrible.

title: Very disappointed
text: We arrived 20 minutes early. Checked with those who worked nearby. Yes we were told this was the right spot. No one showed up. No one shot us a message that the tour was cancelled. Not cool

title: None from none.
text:
None from none.
I did not make the visit.
In fact I had booked in French.
When I arrived there the tour was in Italian.
So I don't have any

title: Melanie great guide!
text: We arrived at the meeting point and M√©lanie, who we had had in the morning for the essential Lisbon visit, told us that the group was going to be split in two and that we were going to be with Antonella. Antonella and right next to Melanie and doesn't look up from her phone or greet us. No response to our ‚Äúhello‚Äù. Before being offended by her rudeness I ask M√©lanie if she is indeed French. Antonella then takes two steps towards me and responds very aggressively "if I didn't speak French would I offer tours in French?!!". Faced with such aggression, I asked M√©lanie to change groups. M√©lanie accepts and takes us with her. We are delighted! Melanie is awesome!! I recommend it 100%!! And I strongly advise against Antonella. M√©lanie is friendly, very interesting, the timbre of her voice is pleasant. She is very cheerful and despite her experience and the rhythm of the guided tours that follow one another, she does not make us feel tired and responds very pleasantly to our questions. The rhythm is perfect. Not too fast and not too soft. She's great, try asking her for your turn, you won't be disappointed.

title: Last minute cancellation of the visit
text: We had organized our 4-day trip with a whole program made in advance to optimize the time. The visit was canceled less than 3 hours before even though we had organized our day according to the appointment made for this visit. Very disappointed

title: Guide Never Showed
text: I guess he/she had something better to do. We waited at the designated time and place looking for a blue umbrella to no avail. Pretty wicked climb to get to the meeting place, as well.

title: Weird situation with the guide, decided to leave
text: The guide Araceli started the tour offering unnecessary, private details of her contract with Take & Civitatis, as well as indicating that one HAD to pay at the end of the tour (we always had contributed in the many walking tours we've done over the years). She also said that the contribution was later split among 3 guides, suggesting that we had to be "generous". What an awkward situation! She finally started the tour, explanations were bland. We decided to leave (first time ever!) and do some walking on our own.

title: Improvable
text: The tour was very nice, but the guide Fernanda was average. It finished in exactly two hours and could explain something else...

title: Guide Juan's jokes out of place
text:
The guide I had (Juan) made a joke when he explained the massacre against the Jews that was not good... "Also whoever thinks of it" he said when he explained that a Jew had denied that Jesus was there and said that it was just a shadow and they killed him for it.
You have to be more tactful with these things.
There were other jokes that were also out of place.

title: No show
text: No show at pick up site. Not good. I would skip this due to no show. It is a free show and you just pay them as you see fit. No motivation to show up.

title: We walked, listened to stories, ate, took photos, enjoyed, laughed, shared, beautiful group
text: Yerlin gave us a beautiful tour, we will surely repeat it on another tour. He explained every detail of the city to us, recommended where to eat and everything with great friendliness.

title: Sintra, Uncomfortable
text:
The views were impressive and we loved the history of Sintra, very exciting and striking.
We did the tour with Kike and we would not recommend him as a guide. He has a lot of historical knowledge but blurs it with his ways. Instead of giving us a friendly welcome, he was very rude in responding to whether he was the guide, whether that was the place... continuing with the eternal explanation of what he earns and inviting people who did not agree with what he said to leave to leave. agreed", emphasizing that it is not mandatory to stay. We consider that it is not the best way to join a group or start a tour.
We value Virginia Checa and Juan who guided us in Famma and Lisboa Centro.
If you come across as rough and direct, don't expect recommendations. It is just our opinion of tourists and experiences with freetour.

title: Our experience
text:
Diego, our guide, spent the visit cross-selling, in our opinion, more concerned about how much he was going to charge than about being a guide.
3 years ago I did that same tour and it was totally different.
It is true that there were people who seemed to like the visit very much.

title: Highly recommended!
text:
The tour is great, the history of the places was explained very well.
The views where they take you are amazing
Highly recommended

title: A free tour with an experience that is not at all ‚ÄúMarian‚Äù
text: The tour started 20 minutes late, and although we asked him why the delay was, he answered: ‚Äúloves, relax and breathe, you are on vacation,‚Äù with a tone that was far from the respect expected of a guide, the first lack of respect from some of the tour. The next thing, when we left almost half an hour late due to waiting for a family, she brought in 5 more people, which, together with the fact that she didn't have a microphone, made it very difficult to hear her on some occasions. Every time you asked him something his response was: ‚Äúrelax, loves, you are on vacation.‚Äù As for what the tour is, I would have appreciated more information and history of Alfama and less political discourse on the housing problem in Lisbon. I don't think I've ever suffered a lack of respect on a free tour and it's clear that with Mariana I wouldn't do it again. To say that I only did it because in theory it was done by Gabriela Londo√±o who showed that she had more education and respect for the people who spend their time in this city and who encouraged me to do more tours with the company.

title: No sign of tour guide or tour party
text: Can only describe this as a ‚Äòmissable tour‚Äô, I arrived at the designated starting point in good time (9.50am, 3 October) and looked out for a person carrying an umbrella as shown in the photo but it turned out that the tour had commenced without me. I went on a great walking tour with a competitor instead. Please spend my booking fee wisely!

title: Much improvement
text: It feels like we could have seen a lot more of Lisbon in two and a half hours. Our guide Clara has explained a lot of history, but more visits and recommendations have been missing.

title: Wonderful
text:
Natalia told us a lot of history, anecdotes in a passionate and exciting way.
He gave us many practical tips to get around Lisbon and enjoy it.

title: Disappointment
text: More than a tour, it was a walk with someone local around Lisbon or a gastronomy guide. I'm not talking about anything you can't look up on the internet and read.

title: The tour that time forgot
text: Never got to ho on the your Mx meeting addresses with same address . Could never find the group or guide . No number to call or reach for assistance. Bern on countless tours in Mx countries ‚Ä¶., FAIL

title: Alfama
text: As much as the guide Elisa is prepared and knows Alfana's soul, we didn't feel it and it was a boring tour. Too many mythical tales, and little history of Alfama, as it was and now as it is

title: I would repeat again
text:
Dani made our visit super entertaining.
Great for a first impression of the city.
Lots of tips and recommendations.

title: Bad experience, waste of time ‚òπÔ∏è
text:
Free tour - Lisbon
We have done quite a few free tours through different cities and, honestly, I expected much more from this one. Our guide has been Juan; The tour started more than half an hour after the appointment time (ok for organizational reasons), chaotic explanations that jumped from data to data, without much sense or linearity and a couple of stops in bars in the middle of the tour. Honestly, it seemed like a waste of my time and I didn't leave out of shame, just as we gave him ‚Ç¨10 because we were more embarrassed not to pay him anything, which is what the activity deserved. The worst thing is the feeling of loss of time for a few days that we are going to be in the city.

title: Lousy
text: Today we did the Sintra tour with the guide Juan and it was a disaster! We went from one place to another like headless turkeys, he seemed to have nothing prepared and stop wherever he thought of unexpectedly. The same thing he told us that we were going to a place and then he changed his mind and we didn't go. The explanation without contributing anything, a lot of names of flowers and philosophy but nothing interesting. Talk about your life and little else. Other colleagues were heard saying very interesting things. And on top of that, coercing us to give 5 stars in the review so that he could tell us where to eat. Anyway, a shame because the place deserved much more.

title: Very disappointing visit
text: Very disappointing visit, very little information on the history of Lisbon, too few visits to monuments... on the other hand useless information and visits: the bra bar, where to find cheap beers... And unfortunately our guide had poor command of French and was difficult to understand, our children, usually very interested in history and guided tours, understood nothing, and dropped out after 5 minutes. A waste of time and money for us...

title: Very nice
text: The views have been very beautiful and Javiera has explained everything to us in detail, we have walked a lot but it was worth it.

title: P√©sima Gesti√≥n
text: Pedro el gu√≠a de Bel√©n no nos dej√≥ participar en la actividad ya que se invent√≥ que al se dos familias conocidas nos indic√≥ que ten√≠amos que hacer reserva de grupo, cosa que Civitatis en ning√∫n momento nos indic√≥ y nos permiti√≥ reservar sin problemas. Desde la oficina no nos dieron ninguna soluci√≥n lo que nos trastoca todos los planes de la ma√±ana. EVITEN ESTE EMPRESA SI NO QUIEREN PROBLEMAS DE ULTIMA HORA. ATENCION @CIVITATIS ESTA EMPRESA INCITA A LOS PARTICIPANTES A CANCELAR LA RESERVA CON Civitatis PARA HACERLA DIRECTAMENTE CON ELLOS Y PAGAR MENOS COMISI√ìN.

title: Dissappointing guide
text: We were a little bit disappointed with Eduardo. Although he knew enough history and stories about Lisbon, he wasn't very passionate or enthousiastic. As non-native English speakers, we couldn't understand everything. He stopped close to the building (not a good view) and in the sun (even when there was shadow a couple of meters away). He kept complaining we took too long to take photos or to go to the toilet. We've had better guides in other cities.

title: Too Large/Difficult to Find
text: These tours are jus too large. Our group was 35+ people. The guide was very difficult to understand. Also, our group was very difficult to find in the plaza because there are A LOT of tour groups meeting there and our guide did not have his umbrella. Also we were told to find a blue umbrella and there were many blue umbrellas. I would suggest just paying for a tour...much better service and smaller group. We tried the free tour in Porto as well and it was the same problem. His umbrella wasn't even the correct color and again, so many groups and so large. Very, very disappointed. Next time we will just book a paid tour with a small group of people.

title: Harry Potter tour...underwhelming
text: I booked the free Harry Potter tour in Porto and I was super excited about it. Unfortunately, it was pretty lackluster and the tour guide didn't seem as engaged as I hoped. He also spent a good amount of time getting to know the other female members of the tour and barely engaged with me and my husband. He was nice and all but of all the tour guides I've completed, this was underwhelming. This is supposed to be the same tour that was created by someone who now charges for it on Airbnb or Tripadvisor. Maybe if I paid for an HP tour, it would've been better.

title: Jewish tourism deserves much betterer
text: Worst Viator experience we've ever had. Synagogue visit was informative. The guide was engaging and knowledgeable about the Lisbon Jewish community. The next 2 hours were useless. No real information was given, just conjecture and misinformation about Jews and their impact on Portugal and the world. We didn't see any other Jewish sites. We walked thru a China shop and used the bathroom in a hotel, being told not to touch anything. Tour guide spoke negatively about the changes in Lisbon due to tourism and immigrants.

title: More wine, more wineries, stop for lunch please
text: I might recommend this for a group that is new to wine and intimidated by the wine-tasting experience, as the guide simplifies and demystifies wine. For anyone who knows and is interested in wine, you will not find the reductive explanations uninteresting. He claims that all wine makers do exactly the same thing and that it‚Äôs just chemistry. He says there is no difference between an expensive wine and an inexpensive wine except storage time and marketing. What about the yield of the vines, the selection of the grapes, and the many choices the winemaker makes? It‚Äôs nice to be chauffeured to tastings, but the pours are so small you could have driven (except that it‚Äôs illegal to drive in Portugal with any measurable amount of alcohol in your blood). The guide discouraged us from buying lunch and just to eat the cheese and charcuterie, but it comes rather late in the tour so be sure to eat a hearty breakfast. The last stop is not a winery but a wine store. I recommend a Douro Valley wine tour from Porto instead.

title: Decent tour, unfortunate refund policy
text: Nice tour and we liked our guide Vasco, very nice and knowledgeable on wine. One of the wineries was very old and had a great tour guide. Would be nice if they included lunch with the tour. Our biggest issue is that our child got sick so one of the three of us had to cancel the day before. Because it wasn't 24 hours (even though it was the day before), they wouldn't offer even a partial refund (even though 2 of us still went on the tour). Bad enough to have to miss the tour to take care of a sick child, to then have to pay 100 euros for nothing on top of it. In contrast, we didn't have to pay for a trip we took to Sintra through Portugal Unknown until the day of. Should consider a policy that allows for extenuating circumstances.

title: To flee, driver never arrived!
text: The Talixo driver never showed up at our Pension. He did not answer our multiple calls. However, I had received a text that morning confirming the pick-up, with the driver‚Äôs name. I don't understand Booking.com working with these people. Booking reimbursed us for the ride and also paid for the taxi we took in a disaster so as not to miss our plane in Lisbon. However, not the slightest commercial gesture of Booking.com. In short, if you notice that Booking subcontracts with Talixo, cancel!

title: Company not recommended
text:
Instead of picking us up at the airport at 12:30 p.m., the driver arrived at 1:30 p.m. and returned from the hotel to the airport at 6 a.m. no taxi. After calling the driver at 6:12 a.m., he told us I'll come in 20 minutes. So look for another taxi so as not to miss the plane.
Really not correct.

title: Bad experience
text: We hired a transfer with Talixo through Booking from Lisbon airport to the city. We arrived with the flight on time and without checking in, and upon arrival we had to wait 50 minutes for the driver to arrive. Don't even think about it, terrible organization and waste of time and money.

title: Stay away.
text: We received our driver information and called him at the pickup time because we did not see him. No answer‚Ä¶ we reached out to chat support who took a few minutes to reply and said that they would reach the driver and to wait 5 minutes. There were about 12 names on the board but no one holding a sign. 35 minutes later some guy comes and asks if I‚Äôm there. I explain yes we‚Äôve been here and he proceeded to yell at me and tell me I was not there waiting. He then had us follow him through the parking lot to put us in a random bolt that was waiting for a fare. The man in charge was incredibly unprofessional. The driver we were assigned did not end up taking us as they instead put us in a small bolt with all of our luggage. Would not recommend.

title: They are not worth the money :-(
text: Was neither delivered nor picked up at the address we wanted, so we recommend that you use the metro/Bus, we were not informed that they could not deliver the service we were looking for, on collection at the airport they came with a car where there was none space for our luggage.

title: The worst
text:
Another company made by a tech bro that is utterly bad.

Reviews everywhere are awful. I now arrived and they tell me the driver supposed to pick me up is doing another run. If I book a cab that is very expensive I expect that the driver is waiting for me.

title: talixo doesnt worth a penny, they dont refund and don¬¥t do their job
text: The worst service ever. You hired them, they get your money, the don¬¥t show up and don¬¥t refund you. It looks like that ¬¥s their way of working. They fool people , that¬¥s what they do best. If you ever consider to hire them, don¬¥t do it. I have been reading messagens and comments on the internet about their lack of compromise and manners of getting people¬¥s money, it¬¥s not only my money they have been getting. So, Run away from them.

title: Appalling Lack of Service
text:
This company is a complete sham and should be avoided at all costs!
We waited almost an hour for a previously booked and paid for premium collection by Mercedes Vito which did not arrive at all! No answer from the driver number or the emergency contact number provided. A lady who took our details at the meeting point in the airport waited with us and eventually put us in a normal taxi because that is all she could get for us!

The same driver was booked for return, and was due to arrive at 7am. At 7:10 I rang the driver number and he answered after a while, did not apologise and just said he would be another 10 minutes which would then make him 20 minutes late. When he did eventually arrive, I complained that he had kept us waiting outside the hotel for all that time but he made no attempt to apologise, just shrugged his shoulders and said he didn't understand English.

title: Worse tha appalling
text: This is the most appalling and deceitful company I have encountered. No taxi waiting at the airport despite all the text messages confirming there would be. We were asked to wait 10 mins, then a further 15 mins then a further 25 mins at which point we lost patience. The rep at the airport is rude and unhelpful and blatantly lies. The hotline help number is useless as no one answers. The return journey was no better, the driver just didn‚Äôt turn up despite a text message stating he was a few minutes away resulting in us almost missing our flight. Avoid at all costs.

title: Total disappointment -2.255878
text:
Space completely abandoned.
Bad treated. Blurred roads. Shiny houses, broken windows. It wasn't worth the ride.
Disappointment.

title: O abandono total
text:
Um jardim que supostamente est√° sob al√ßada da freguesia da Estrela e est√° num abandono completo. S√£o 10 hectares de jardim, passeios, equipamentos e edif√≠cios fant√°sticos completamente desfeitos.
N√£o √© com certeza parte do circuito tur√≠stico mas ainda assim h√° muita gente a tentar desfrutar deste espa√ßo.

title: Very Disappointing for a ‚ÄúPremium‚Äù Lounge
text: The space felt overcrowded and noisy, with very limited seating available. The food selection was poor and lacked variety ‚Äî most items looked like they had been sitting there for hours. The staff were indifferent and not very helpful. Cleanliness was also an issue, with dirty tables left uncleared for long periods. For something labeled as a premium experience, this lounge did not deliver. Would not recommend unless you have no other option.

title: Worst lounge I've ever visited
text: The worst lounge in the world, nothing sweet, nothing medium edible. Absolute garbage and full to bursting. Nothing recommended

title: Uncomfortable
text: This lounge is not recommended at all. It's like a better canteen. You can't find peace there at all. Cosy seating is sought in vain.

title: Maximal eco lounge
text:
They let more people in but fit in. Station atmosphere.
Wc Ladies 3 pcs with broken floor tiles....well
There are kl cake pieces and at the tables people are sitting.with notebooks or there are sleeping some on the benches
Only the staff is top

title: Very uncomfortable.
text: Flew TAP business in the United States. Miami is even less normal, there's the A330, back from NY, there's the A321. Small, not comfortable cheap business class. Lounge at Lisbon airport, that's a separate story. It's full all the time, small, the seats are not comfortable, the food is disgusting. It's not just TAP in the room, it's other companies. Anyway, a national Portuguese low-cost carrier with business class.

title: Insufficient service for the price
text:
I occasionally travel in business class. This time, the first TAP experience between Lisbon and Geneva, I wanted to take advantage of my free time at Lisbon airport to go to the lounge, have a drink and eat something before my flight. This is the first time in all my travels around the world that the lounge is overcrowded. After 30 minutes of waiting, I walk through the door. Inside, it's hell, too many people, nothing's restful, the staff run all over the place, the bar is dirty and there wasn't much to eat. Anyway, the worst lounge experience of my life.

Given the price we pay for this service, I will avoid taking TAP in this configuration in the future.

title: A epic disappointment
text: I moved from the ANA Lounge which was equally awful in hopes that there might be some seating availability. No such luck. A zoo, overcrowded, people sleeping fully stretched out, dreadful food. The glamour days of lounges and credit cards and airlines providing gratis access is an epic joke. DON‚ÄôT BOTHER!

title: Horrible tour guide ruined the whole experience
text:
I had what was about the worst tour guide ever. Ricardo, sounded like a used car salesman and pretty clearly memorized a script and was repeating it word for word. I literally had thoughts about leaving the tour 20 minutes in.

On top of that, the script he memorized was horribly written and didn't at all sound authentic. Literally every one 1-2 minutes he would say "Ladies and gentleman" for 3 hour straight. And he tried to use every adjective in the book, and failed miserably. Often he would say "... is unrealisticly" hot, for example. And at other times like a car sales man would say "We have not ONE, but TWO items for you sample". And it sounded so fake.

The entire script sounded so fake and memorized that it completely ruined the experience. The food samples were fine, so that was good. He also didn't even engage the group for 2 minutes at the start to have everyone share where they were from or names.

All of the other tour guides from other companies, in stark contrast, feel like a local was being totally authentic and told a story. Ricardo was just spewing out facts with hyperbole and in such a scripted/memorized manner that it completely ruined the entire experience. He should NOT be doing any tours.

title: A space to avoid
text: I visited the museum to see that it is very poor and dated. It presents a collection related to the torture of animals and, unfortunately, they try to convey the false idea that bulls are not harmed in Portugal, which is not true. Bulls and horses suffer various types of aggression and are killed at the end of the bullfight in a slaughterhouse. A place to avoid for anyone who likes and respects animals.

title: Cancelled without even warning
text: Terrible experience. They cancelled the same day, without any warning. They say it is by river conditions when it is calmissimo and with several boats. A shame. Don't trust.

title: Please book your water taxi somewhere else
text: After many attempts, I booked a taxi ride from Alc√¢ntara to Cacilhas, only to find on the day that there was no-one there. We waited for half an hour and eventually had to take the car to the other side of the river. We missed our restaurant reservation. We later heard from someone else with similar bad experiences. Our impression is that this company is not functioning well. I will take my service elsewhere.

title: Unfriendly, miserable old fart!
text: Unfriendly unhelpful man. Service was terrible. I think he assumed that we weren‚Äôt wealthy so couldn‚Äôt be bothered to help us.

title: Very expensive
text:
Located inside the Pra√ßa do Com√©rcio, there is this stand that serves Port tasting.
Prices for 4 glasses ranging from 17 upwards: as good ignorant ants we opted for the cheapest.
In fact, the propitiatory nectars were certainly up to par, but what cries out for vengeance are the paltry quantities that are served.
Enough

title: Lack of organization!
text:
Bad experience!
I wanted to offer tickets to my parents and some friends to watch a show, I called the theater, I was very well attended to by Mr. Carlos who was ready to help me choose the seats I wanted (next to the central middle aisle and in row G). He sent me the details with information about the places, payment references and the email address to which I should send the receipt.
A few days later I call the theater and ask if they have received payment and proof. They told me that everything was fine. I informed them that I am 350 km away and that I would not be able to collect the tickets, to which they replied that they do not send them by email and that they would simply be collected on the day.
On the day of the show, in advance, my parents and friends went to the ticket office, where they were asked to pay again because the tickets had not been paid for. They called me and I spoke to Mrs. Mila, who tells me that the tickets are not paid for. I inform them where I sent the receipt and after a few moments and confirming with colleagues, I concluded that they had been paid. After much confusion, tickets were allocated in a queue that was not the one intended and was not the one in which the reservation had been made. The lady was extremely arrogant, she didn't want to speak to me over the phone, as I handled the entire process, she informed me that there was nothing to do, so she would call the call center the next day. My parents and friends tried to resolve the situation and luckily they were allocated other places with better visibility. A very humiliating situation, a shame, without any organization.

title: Lugares horr√≠veis
text:
Infelizmente est√£o a vender lugares que n√£o deveriam ser para p√∫blico . Balc√£o 1fila D s√≠tio horr√≠vel! Tem hosstes que n√£o tem capacidade de explicar os lugares . Foi a primeira vez que comprei em cima ,por n√£o haver lugares em baixo ,mas isso e indignante,pois trouxe 3 meninas que n√£o conseguiram assistir o espet√°culo..
Estes lugares n√£o deveriam existir, ou pelo menos explicar sempre ao cliente que s√£o lugares de muito pouca visibilidade .
Estou muito triste .

title: Bad theater
text: Air conditioning doesn't work, unbearable heat that makes it impossible to concentrate on the piece. Poorly educated and very poorly trained employees. I was almost assaulted by one of them because I didn't want to let my wife go to the bathroom on the other floor, the only bathroom available., and I had to force passage. I do not recommend the place.

title: Oh, bad. Horrible and unacceptable service from the team.
text:
Today at the 17 hours session of the play, I and 40 other people with a ticket were prevented from attending the show derived from the prepotence and arbitrariness of the service employees. Most people were delayed due to the chaotic traffic in the city of Lisbon, a fair on the avenue of liberty and at the same time a demonstration. They closed the doors of the theater and told everyone that there was only a 10-minute tolerance. I arrived 15 minutes late due to my mobility difficulty and I was not allowed in. All security missing mandatory identification. Ladies dressed in black ‚Äúeventual uniform‚Äù also without identification and no one told us the name to complain. A lady who approached us at our request, informed that she was in charge in an arrogant Latin told the security to close the doors and that she would not talk to us anymore, nor had to explain anything. In my case, I asked why my request for priority and sensitivity was not met and this lady arrogantly showed no understanding. People started shouting ‚Äúabram abram‚Äù ‚Äúlet us watch the show, we have a ticket‚Äù and nothing. Until one of us called the police! The Authority emerged, appeared some 15 policemen including personnel of the motorcycle intervention brigade. People complained gently but the lack of sensitivity and education of the staff leads a normal person to lose control. Little was missing but we would lose reason! I regret this situation happening in Portugal, I feel completely ashamed to know that there are Portuguese who do not meet the requirements of urbanity, sensitivity and reasonability. I didn't see the show and I had bought tickets for my family who was inside, not knowing what was going on out there. The most amazing thing is that the show started 20 minutes late and if we've been let in nothing of this shame had happened.
The staff at Tivoli Theatre BBVA Lisbon were a shame and did not represent the company dignely.

title: Avoid this place
text: Not friendly to tourists-they would not take my order and ignored me. The bar next door was tine- but I would avoid this rude place and go elsewhere

title: Classic tourist thing
text: Not worth the money. The tour is short and fast, it is quick jumping on and off. You'll see as much if you walk that part along the sea

title: Dispensable
text: Total nonsense. It only takes you from side to side. It's not high, it has no view of anything, it's just to waste time and money. Completely dispensable
this Attraction is expensive and unnecessary go your way (10min for this fare ....), doing it on foot is much better...

title: No point of interest
text: The cable car is modern, quiet and great... But... I wouldn't count them among Lisbon's attractions. No wonder the taxi driver who drove us there did not know that there was a cable car in Lisbon at all. There is no nice view at all

title: Beware of the scam
text: I was enjoying the trip, until when I got back, the so-called "no strings attached photo" they took of me was already printed without my consent and I needed to pay 10 euros.

title: Nothing special
text: From the outside it seems interesting, in reality it is nothing special. You can get a one-way or return ticket. The journey is just over a kilometer but you don't see anything in particular except the sea and the buildings of the new city. Disappointing

title: We were deceived
text:
As soon as we entered the cabin, a photographer came to us and said that he would take a free photo and it would be delivered as soon as we left. To my surprise, we were charged ‚Ç¨10.
It was a well-designed scheme to deceive people. This is mafia.
I will file a complaint against the company.

title: Discreto ma non eccezionale.
text: Sbarco alla Stazione Oriente della Metropolitana e connessa Stazione ferroviaria, ove si pu√≤ ammirare la bella ed originale copertura creata da Calatrava. Marcia di avvicinamento alle stazioni di partenza, piuttosto lunga in entrambi i sensi di marcia (consigliabile un bus per il ritorno, specie se c'√® sole e fa caldo). Belle passeggiate lungo le rive. Piuttosto caro considerando che in genere si effettua un tragitto di sola andata, di pochi minuti. Vista interessante ma non eccezionale. Non lo ripeterei n√® lo consiglierei.

title: Give it a miss
text: Very quick tele cable with not much to see from above. Only good thing was to get to the other end of the area from the aquarium.

title: We felt scammed
text:
While the driver and guide were excellent, they were contracted by TempoVIP and are not actual employees of theirs. The driver and guide were fantastic. This review pertains to TempoVIP itself. They had scammed us and charged ‚Ç¨225 per person for a charcuterie board picnic in a public space. They claimed that it was because it included the cost of the tour of Biester Palace but the entry sign stated that it only costs ‚Ç¨10 per person and so it was a complete scam.

They were not accommodating of minor changes and did not reserve the restaurant recommendation as we had asked. They were also very difficult to communicate with directly and would require multiple messages to get answers from them.

We would never recommend them again.

title: AVOID PURCHASING BABY CLOTHES
text: The quality of baby clothes is very poor. I was given a baby suit the material of which became damaged after my baby wearing it only once. I took it to the shop to show the damage and they held onto it for over a week (during which I obviously couldn‚Äôt dress my baby in it) following which they told me to collect it and try washing it. I dutifully did this following which the problem was not resolved and I was told it actually didn‚Äôt matter and they would never replace it or provide an exchange. The material is of very poor quality. The customer service was terrible, and embarrassingly disappointing for such an overly expensive shop. I do NOT recommend purchasing baby clothes from this shop.

title: I had a bad experience
text: I asked for a deep massage but the therapist who attended me did not have enough knowledge for this type of massage and applied very aggressive movements without prior preparation of the area and without distinguishing between muscles, tendons or bones. I complained several times but still I left with more pain than I had when I entered.

title: Forced change of therapists after paying
text:
Be VERY careful about how you book online. Even though you are given a time that specifies a person they can change it on you unless you go back and say ONLY this person. Terrible UI. In person I was not told until after I paid. Felt forced to proceed with someone random after taking the time to pick a therapist that mentioned physio therapy. Ended up much worse with numbness and tingling down the arms.
Very unhappy about this experience. Fix your UI. Notify clients of changes before they pay. Give them a choice to say no.

title: Lack of training
text: No fault to the eager-to-please masseusse, and despite the wonderful vibe of the place, Terra Heal got one thing wrong: the massage. The person doing my body work lacked skill. I felt she could be easily be better with training and feedback in strokes, body knowledge, session management, etc. Using inadequately trained staff is a management issue.

title: Rua Da Madalena Terra Heal was Terrible
text: My husband and I went for a 90 minute therapeutic couples massage. The venue is dimly lit with soothing music, quiet, and calm. They give you some tea. Terra Heal has two locations. DO NOT GO TO THE ONE ON Rua Da Madalena!!!! We had two males that were both so inept and gross. We have had many massages and these two clowns were the worst. The guy who worked on me was pushing and shaking my body all over. He was so fast and inconsistent- I felt like he was treating my body as a piece of meat to pound on. I was so stressed out. I asked him, please slow down, but he couldn‚Äôt, he was all over the place and getting so close to my face breathing all over me. I thought I was going to be sick. It was not soothing at all!! My husband‚Äôs technician was neither here nor there. He was doing just enough to create some kind of massage without really being present or vested to do any thing real. Both were very unprofessional and I am wondering what training or licensing they have because it was basically paying ‚Ç¨160 for a fake and very unpleasant massage. I reached out to the person who took our reservation and our money, but just like the massage- only response was platitudes.

title: Very disappointing
text:
Two years ago I came to your other salon, the massage was exceptional. I had also left a 5 star review.

But this evening what a disappointment, the massage started at 9:00 p.m. but was over after 50 -55 minutes.

Massage without interest a simple spread of oil with movement from bottom to top.

I don't call it a massage. My good friend could have done the same without paying 55 euros.

And to end it all I go back up at 9:55 p.m. and the team is rushing to close so I don't really want to drink herbal tea in this atmosphere.
I clearly felt too much.

title: Muy mala experiencia mi regalo de aniversario fue un castigo corporal
text: Hloa soy mujer Tengo 61 a√±os y de anuversario me regalaron un masaje en o con oleo yo me imagine que hiba a salir relajada suave despu√©s de media hora salgo como apaliada me trataron como lo hubiese hecho un quiropeactico un maltratado corporalcomo para un hombre 30 hoy dos dias despues sugo adolorida . Y aparte de eso mucho contacto fisico que senti su calor corporal en mi cuerpo PREGUNTEN ANTES DE AXEDER QUE ES LO QUE VAN A HACER

title: Be at least prepared for bitter disappointment
text:
It was clear sky and little wind. But unfortunately we didnt see anything after 2.5 hours of boat ride.

We understand its wild life so nothing is guaranteed. But with the advertised success rate, our expectations were really high. If you have young children, we advise to think about this possibility. Our children were bitterly disappointed, there were lots of tears and this became the absolute low light of our Lisbon trip.

The crews were friendly. But as we didn't see anything, we didn't get any explanations, not about animals, not about monuments. Sitting thru the 2.5 hours was tough and we were really glad it was finally over. Maybe we were extremely unlucky. All the wholesome reviews you could find in different platforms did give us (maybe unrealisticly) high expectation.

We were offered another trip 3 days later or another trip in the future. But as tourists, it's highly unlikely for us to do it again. A partial refund would have been nice.

title: Erraram na massagem e cobraram
text: Comprei uma massagem ombros, pesco√ßo e cabe√ßa. Com muita pena minha n√£o massajaram nada a cabe√ßa, referi isso e ainda assim ela continuou a massajar as pernas e os bra√ßos, quando n√£o foi pedido.

title: Less time. Painful
text: It was my second time there in 10 days. The first time was great. So the second time I decided to go with the same therapist. But it was anything as the first time. I felt pain rather then relief and my Massage only lasted 45 minutes so several body parte weren't massaged. I would have expected better care for a returning and possibly long term customer

title: Horrible‚Ä¶all around a bad experience!
text:
1000% would not recommend this place. I made an appointment for a massage here for my mother and myself, and specifically asked twice to ensure we were in separate rooms. This was confirmed by the staff, twice, that we would be in separate rooms. After we show up, they were going to put us in the same room with a curtain separating the 2 of us. There was essentially no privacy and there would be no way that this would be relaxing to have a full body massage with my mother in the same room as me.

This was after we planned our entire day around these appointments and the staff really screwed this up. A day gone that we can‚Äôt get back for my mom‚Äôs first trip to Europe and a massage I was so looking forward to. The receptionist was not nice or willing to help at all, either.

Btw‚Ä¶there are only 2 rooms at this spa in the specific location where I visited. 1 room with a single bed and another room with 2 beds. So, unless they have another building somewhere else, this is what you should expect.

0 stars if I could rate it that.

title: Very disappointed
text: Very Disappointing. Therapist used a mishmash of styles that really wasn‚Äôt working. Involved lots of hitting and pinching. When I asked her to stop pinching, she kept saying she had to open the energy lines, or would wait a few seconds and do it again harder. There is a spot on the back of my knee that is still hurting hours later. I have had many massages in many countries, digging or pinching the soft tissue on the back of the knee is avoided for obvious reasons. She also did not do the areas I asked for, she thought it was a back massage only, and when she realized it was full body she hurried over the rest. I asked several times to move to different areas, and she would nod and say yes, but not do it. Her strokes were very fast and pulling the skin a lot, not relaxing at all. When I left, the receptionist asked how it was, I said not so good, and the owner called me a little while later to offer for me to come back for a free massage. He said the therapists English was not good and the receptionist did not explain what I wanted well, it was a miscommunication. Not sure that really covers it, and I‚Äôm probably not interested in another massage like this one, but it‚Äôs 2 stars instead of one because at least they cared enough to call.

title: Poor Communication, No On-the-Ground Support ‚Äî Think Twice Before Booking
text:
I recently traveled with Budget Wanderer as part of a group trip organized through Amigas y M√°s, and unfortunately, I cannot recommend this company based on my experience.

From the outset, communication was abysmal. I reached out multiple times via email with questions about the roommate list and the option to book my own room. After three unanswered emails, I had to go through our group founder just to get a response‚Äîonly to then be told to message them on Instagram instead of receiving a proper reply through professional channels.

The issues continued once the trip began. The included transportation was not made available to everyone in our group, with extremely limited and poorly coordinated time slots. Upon arrival, the hotel refused to check us in until a Budget Wanderer representative showed up, which created confusion and unnecessary stress. There was no designated guide or point of contact for our group, and the absence of on-the-ground support was felt throughout the trip.

One of the most troubling moments came when the entire itinerary for a full day was changed without any notice or input from our group organizer. This lack of transparency and disregard for communication eliminated any sense of partnership or professionalism.

I also paid for a cooking class as part of my package. Our organizer tried to get pick-up details the night before, but Budget Wanderer didn‚Äôt respond until 5am the following morning‚Äîwell after reasonable hours‚Äîcausing us to miss the class entirely. Despite the company‚Äôs failure to communicate in a timely manner, they refused to issue a refund and falsely claimed that the pick-up time was clearly listed on the itinerary. It was not. Nor was there any mention of the itinerary being subject to change.

What‚Äôs most disappointing is the clear lack of accountability and basic customer service. At no point did it feel like Budget Wanderer was committed to delivering a quality experience or supporting its travelers. I would strongly urge anyone considering a trip with them to look elsewhere or, at the very least, proceed with caution.

Travel companies should be reliable, communicative, and responsive‚ÄîBudget Wanderer was none of these.

title: Cancelled the day before due to ‚ÄúLogistical issues‚Äù
text:
They cancelled the tour the day before due to logistical issues and told us they could
Move to the next day‚Ä¶but we were already leaving Lisbon! Fortunately they promptly refunded our money but don‚Äôt understand why the collected the deposit and canceled less than 30 minutes later.

title: No parking
text:
I‚Äôm only rating it poor as there was no parking and crazy with cars squashed in everywhere . The tour guide was lovely and contacted us, and we drove past him to speak to him, but due to lack of parking we couldn‚Äôt get out of the car.
Being from another country and I do my research, I didn‚Äôt know the parking would be such an issue and we would have made alternative arrangements if we had of known ‚Ä¶I was so looking forward to this tour! sorry

title: Missed trip
text: Pickup directions were so confusing I couldn‚Äôt find the pickup spot as a result I missed the trip There was no phone number to call for help There was no phone number to call for refund

title: Disappointing overall
text:
Sintra and Cascais guided tour ‚Äì disappointing overall

The tour started badly: the guide arrived 30 minutes late. We then lost about 30 extra minutes to pick up other customers, then a forgotten child seat, which unnecessarily lengthened the start of the day.

The transport was also uncomfortable: we were three adults in the front of the minivan, which is not suitable for a long journey.

During the visit to the Palais de la Regaleira, we noticed that the guide seemed to be reselling some unused tickets, which raised questions about the transparency of the organization.

The tour ended at 5:30 p.m. instead of the 6:00 p.m. scheduled, which, combined with the morning delays, reduced our actual time at the sites.

Only really positive: the recommendation of the restaurant in Cascais, which was worth a visit.

Overall, the experience does not justify the ‚Ç¨100 per person requested.

title: AVOID.
text:
AVOID! I appreciate a real review before booking and hope to save someone from the experience we had. 1.) Our guide was driving while calling, texting, internet (as well as maps), hit a sign when parking, came inches from backing into an oncoming car in a round about, blew through a stop sign (luckily on a small road). Not a safe driver.
2.) Shouldn't the plan with the tide tables and boat be known ahead of time and planned appropriately so it's not a constant question through the day if you can even attend the castle part of the tour? The whole tour seemed very unorganized. 3.) The guide was very hard to understand at times for most of the group. When we got to the templer church there were other guides taking their groups around explaining the subjects of paintings ect. Basically what's expected for a tour guide. We had the most general of explanations and were then tol
d we could walk around for 10 minutes. He was not pleased and somewhat condescending when we attempted to ask questions. Frankly I think the knowledge base was minimal or perhaps the conversion of that knowledge to English simply was not there. 4.) Because of a sporting event in Lisbon the drop off point was changed. We had not known how much it would change! We were dropped off a 30 minute walk away-there was a poor elderly couple with us. They took the tour as they thought they would be dropped off next to their hotel. He couldn't walk up steps due to health issue so the metro was not an option (this is what our guide stated to do ) no ubers or taxis due to the game. They did not have internet on their phones. He just kicked them out of the van and said goodbye. We made sure they got home walking but it was very hard for them.

title: Skip the line convenient, but did not learn much about the Cloister and its history.
text: This Jeronimo tour is only good for the skip the line entry. I don‚Äôt believe our guide Bruno really had any historic knowledge of the cloister or the people that dwelled there. He brought his homeland Angola into the discussion which was not relevant to the cloister. He was late to meet the group, and the audio headsets were not always working well for many people. but for skip the line and getting in and out, it is convenient. We did not learn very much about the history of the cloister if that is something you are looking for.

title: GetYourGuide the worst to travel
text: We showed up in advance of the meeting point (08:00) and the operator Cooltours did not show up and also did not give timely notice. We waited until 08:30, called and were told that the driver and guide had had an urgency. We request the refund of the activity, 170 euros (2 people), which did not happen and that GetYourGuide protected. We headed to Sintra on our own, we spent 65 euros round trip by Uber. In the town of Regaleira Cooltours offered us in ‚ÄúCompensation‚Äù to join a local tour, we asked and clarified if they would return our money and we all confirmed even the guide Ricardo that it was a ‚Äúcompensation‚Äù. The activity lasted 2 hours of the original 8 hours. At the end of the day we were informed that they would not return our money. I claimed GetYourGuide and presented conversation photos and expense voucher. Result GetYourGuide stated that it would not return the tours and that it supported the operator Cooltours. Just a robbery. Since then GetYourGuide blocked me from placing comments on their page, I can only access purchase, which I will never do again. I've traveled many places before and it's the first time I've had such a negative experience

title: Customers, f#+# them
text: Tour didn't go, not even informed about it, after 30 minutes waiting I called them, they say tour is not going, such awful customer service. Problem with van. They couldn't find a vehicle to transport 3 people in the whole damn world. Just BS! I get the feeling that either three customers weren't worth the hassel or they needed the van for another bigger group. But the total lack of communication was the worst.

title: Pick Any other option. Awful tour operator!!
text: Absolutely the worst tour guide. Instead of learning about the monestary and history of the building, we were subjected to a three hour rambling history tour of 50 years of Lisbon. I can‚Äôt say enough bad things. So angry we wasted our money!! The guide was from Italy. Telling, at the end of the chapel tour he skipped Jer√≥nimos tomb. AWFUL!!! Wish we could receive a refund!!!

title: Poor Marriott Bonvoy Homing experience
text:
I stayed at a Marriott Bonvoy homing apartment in Lisbon, Largo dos Arautos, for four nights in May 2024. The apartment itself was clean, but the furnishings were poor. The rug in the living area was old, and with many stains.

After having spent two nights in a beautiful Marriott hotel in Porto, with comfortable bedding and nice towels, the apartment in Lisbon was a huge disappointment! My queen bed had an uncomfortable mattress, with a poorly fitting, old flat sheet barely covering it, (no fitted sheet) and just a thin duvet as a cover. There was no top sheet (except the above mentioned). The two pillows were small and lumpy. There was no extra bedding, no blanket or extra pillows. There were two older towels left for each person, certainly not what one gets in a Marriott hotel. There was no hand soap in the bathrooms requiring us to go to supermarket to buy. There was no hair dryer, as advertised.

I can say that the apartment was clean, but otherwise would never recommend a Marriott Bonvoy apartment. It is certainly not what is advertised, and does not meet the Marriott standards! I thought for sure, that I would have a much better experience!

title: A real disappointment
text: I can only say that for me it was a real disappointment. I booked this tour explicitly because it was in Spanish and it was total chaos. It was the second time I booked this excursion because I went a few years ago with my mother and it was an incredible experience, we loved the guide and I booked this excursion again thinking of sharing it with my partner on his birthday and it turns out that the rest of the The group was English and unfortunately the guide Nuno only spoke in English because what little Spanish he spoke was not understood. I don't know how they can get a guide like that who barely knows how to speak Spanish or English. I was very sorry that my partner didn't even know about half of the excursion and no matter how much I asked Nuno to explain in Spanish, he translated half of it and I ended up explaining to my partner half of the excursion that I could remember from the previous one. excursion. I am truly sorry for what a regrettable excursion it was that we did not take advantage of the day as much as the previous time.

title: A van ride and an unadvertised shanghai
text: Typically don't like to leave negative reviews unless the experience was awful. But at the insistence of Cooltours-Lisbon's 5:00a texts trolling for positive reviews here is our input. To start with, if we had learned our driver was late because he gave notice and was talked into one last trip it would have explained the enthusiasm. Basically the 93.00 was for a van ride little explanation and then there was the surprise 25 euro fixed price lunch at a desolate restaurant. Having dinner reservations in Lisbon we passed. Would have enjoyed a coffee but that was 25 euros also. The good news, our driver got the preverbal free lunch and Cooltours most likely got their beaks wet. Wasted over an hour which we would have loved to have spent in Cascais rather than the whistle stop we got. The sights were terrific the company not so much.

title: Disappointed experience
text: We were very disappointed with our tour: we paid for small-group tour but it was 18 people plus the driver and the guide. We paid for pick-up and drop-off from/to our hotel, but it was not happened. It was many messages that we have to come to the meeting point, then somebody come. We were drop-off not at our hotel and nobody care, even we did not know we're we are. They tour guide recommend to take a taxi to our hotel.

title: Not worth it
text: We do not recommend this tour company. As others have noted, the tour was rushed and there was not enough time allocated for Regaleira or Pena. Our tour guide Miguel did not seem to want to be there. He was primary focused on telling us what time we had to be back on the bus and threatening to leave us behind if we came back late. He gave us minimal details on the sites, was not approachable, and always seemed to want to be somewhere else. We got back to Lisbon 2 hours before the tour was supposed to end and clearly could have spent more time at the sites instead. We did not feel we got our money's worth for having such a rushed experience and a negative tour guide.

title: Poor service
text: Your guy/driver has an attitude and was frowns the whole trip. Uncleared meeting point at Fatima caused my group and another group to go look for the guy for 40 minutes and he had the nerves to blame us! If 3 out of the 7 people total in the tour were lost and had to search for you, then that‚Äôs a you problem, not us. I have booked tours in Paris, Barcelona and Lisbon and this tour left a sour taste.

title: Worthy sites, apathetic guide
text: The sites were worth the trip, vehicle was clean and comfortable but the guide ‚Äî who set the tone and learning‚Äî was awash with negativity.

title: Not as advertised
text:
This tour is not what they claim it to be. You do not get to see Pena Palace, only the gardens. It was supposed to be a guided tour as well, our guide stayed with the bus.

Tour was badly organized, spent too much time waiting for the bus, rushed through stops.

It was supposed to be a small group tour but we ended up with 18 for the same price.

Waste of time and money

title: Not the tour we were hoping for.
text:
Cooltours via Get Your Guide: Tour to Sentra
While this tour hit all the right places, it was so poorly organized that we ended up spending most of our time waiting in lines or waiting for tardy tour mates. The guide was terrific but had to spend much of her time fighting fires and reorganizing the tour because of our lateness. Finally, the tour vehicle broke down. I‚Äôm not sure how you avoid these long lines but I‚Äôm sure the good tour operators have figured out the best ways around this. Obviously Cooltours has not. We give them one clam on the coveted Five Quahog Rating Scale.

title: Poor day in Sintra
text: A guide that actually provides some insight into what you are seeing would have been nice. Our guide used his microphone once to introduce himself and never again.
